1b1: rgya gar skad du/ sarba ta thA ga ta twA da tA sa gra ha nA ma ma hA yA na s+'utra/ bad skad du/ da banan gshogs parna
1b2: cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/ / bam po dang po// sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad
1b3: la phyag 'tshal lo/ / 'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad thugs rje chen po
1b4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs dang / dam tshig gi ye shes rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par dang
1b5: ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbu rgyan gyis khams gsum gyi chos kyi rgyal po dbang
1b6: bskur ba mnga' brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rnal 'byor chen
1b7: po'i dbang phyug/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad mnyam pa nyid du thugs su chud cing //
1b8: thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa nyid kyis sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams da kyi ba yongs

2a1: skong ba'i phrin las mdzad pa/ thugs rje che ba rnam par snang mdzad dus gsum du rtag par bzhugs shing / sgra dang gsung dang thugs thams cad rdorje lta khur gyur pa 'de bzhin gshegs pa/ bzhin
2a2: gshegs pa thams cad bzhugs shing bsngags bstod pa/ nor bu dang / rin po che chen pos sbas pa/ kha dog sna tshogs shing dril bu btags pa/ dar dang / 'phan dang / me tog gi phreng ba dang / rnga ma dang / dra ba dang /
2a3: dra ba phyed pa dang / zla ba rlung gis bskyod pa rnams kyis mdzes par byas pa'i 'og min gyi lha'i rgyal po'i gnas na bzhugs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu la 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'
2a4: sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje dang / kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang / nam mkha'i snying po dang / rdo rje khu tshur dang / 'jam dpal dang / sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / nam
2a5: mkha'i mdzod dang / bdud kyi stobs thams cad rab tu 'joms pa la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu dang / gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams
2a6: dang thabs gcig tu bzhugs te/ de yang 'di ltar 'dzam bu'i gling na de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med grangs med pa de dag gi sus kyang til gyi gang bu bzhin du gang bar snang ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku re re las
2a7: kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med tshad med pa rnams snang ngo / / sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na yang chos kyi tshul 'di dag 'chang ngo // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad chen po/ nam mkha'i dbyangs thams
2a8: cad bzhin du rtag par bzhugs shing sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje lta bur gyur pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid du 'jug pas rdo rje dbyings thams cad thugs su chud pa'i ye

2b1: shes sems dpa' nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs las byung ba'i ye shes kyi snying ngo po/ / de bzhin gshegs pa mtha' yas pa nyid kyi rdo rje chen po'i ye shes rin
2b2: dbang bskur ba'i rin po che chen po/ / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du spros pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pas/ byang chub par gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid
2b3: dag pa'i phyir chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dag par thugs su chud pa/ nam mkha'i khams thams cad du khyab pa'i gzugs thams cad du yang dag par ston pa mkhyen pas sems can gyi khams ma lus shing
2b4: lus pa med pa'i khams rnams gdul bar spyod pa'i mchog tu gyur cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' nod cing don yod par mdzad pa nyid kyis thams cad dang mnyam pa med cing bla na med bI
2b5: phrin las thams cad mdzad pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub chen por sems brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drangs pa'i dam tshig dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
2b6: thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i ye shes kyi dbang phyug dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i dbang chen po bskur ba dang / de bzhin
2b7: gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyi ma'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam pa'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i rgyal po'i rin po che'i dpal dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
2b8: cad kyi bzhad pa chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dag pa'i chos chen po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab chen po'i ye shes dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor

3a1: lo dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa 'chad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za bar thams cad kyi dgongs pa mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams
3a2: cad kyi brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha shin du brtan po dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i gnod sbyin dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya
3a3: bcings pa'i ye shes rnams so/ / kun bzang rab tu gdon mi za// bdud dang rab dgyes gtso bo dang // mkha' skyes shin tu gzi chen dang / rin chen dpal dang 'dzum pa che// kun du gzigs pa'i dbang chen
3a4: dang / / 'jam dpal dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // mi gsung ba dang thams cad las// brtson 'grus ma rungs dam du gzung // rdo rje lcags kyu mda' gzhu dang // rin chen nyi ma rgyal mtshan 'dzum// pad
3a5: mo ral gri 'khor lo gsung / / las dang go cha 'jigs byed bcings// thog ma tha ma med cing zhi// ma rungs khro bo bzod pa che// gnod sbyin srin po dam pa brtan// gzi chen dpa' bo dbang po che// dbu ma'i ba
3a6: po skye dgu'i mgon/ / gtogs 'dod rgyal 'dod thub pa che// 'jig rten skyong dang mkha' dngas// 'jig rten gsum dang khams gsum pa// 'byung chen sems can don rab mdzad// thams cad gu lang
3a7: tshangs pa dang / / 'khor dang mya ngan 'da' dang rtag/ yang dag 'tsho dang mchod pa che// sangs rgyas dag pa theg pa che// srid gsum rtag pa'ang de yin no// 'jig rten gsum rgyal bde spyod dang // bde spyod
3a8: gtso bo rab 'dul mdzad/ / rdo rje gtso dngas rab mchog/ ye shes pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi spyod// sangs rgyas don dang sangs

3b1: rgyas thugs/ / byang chub kun dang bla na med// rnam par snang mdzad rgyal ba'i gtso// rang byung gzungs dang dran pa dang // sems dpa' che dang phyag rgya che// ting 'dzin sangs rgyas phrin las mdzad// yang dag sangs
3b2: rgyas kun bdag nyid/ / yod pa rtag don rtogs mdzad pa// sdong po chen po nag po che// 'dod chags chen po bde ba che// thabs chen dang ni mchog chen mchog/ kun gyi mchog dang gnas dbang po// bcom
3b3: ldan byang chub chen po'i thugs/ / byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs la gnas so// // de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis// sangs
3b4: rgyas kyi zhing 'di dper na til gyi gang bu bzhin du yongs su gang bar gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dus te byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba byang chub kyi snying
3b5: por bzhugs pa gang na ba der gshegs te/ byang chub sems dpa' de la ched du rdzogs par longs spyod pa'i sku bstan nas 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis gang gi phyir de bzhin gshegs
3b6: pa thams cad kyi kho na nyid mngon par ma rtogs par dka' ba spyod pa thams cad la spro ba bskyed cing / ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par bya snyam/ de nas byang chub sems
3b7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bskul bas mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin de las bzhengs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal nas
3b8: 'di skad ces gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi de kho na nyid ni ji lta bu lags/ ji ltar na bsgrub par bgyi bka' stsal par gsol// de skad ces gsol ba dang / de bzhin gshegs

4a1: pa de dag thams cad kyis gsung gcig tu 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / rigs kyi bu rang gi sems la rtog cing mnyam par zhog la/ rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'di ci dgar zlos shing / bslab pa
4a2: gyis shig/ oM tsi ta ta pra ti be d+hi ka ro mi/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'adon thams cad grub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams pas
4a3: gi snying ka na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gda' ba bdag gis rtogs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ rigs kyi bu sems de ni rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal bas na de ni ji ltar sbyangs pa de ltar
4a4: gyur te/ dper na ras dkar po mtshon gyis bsgyur ba bzhin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i sems shes pa rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/ oM bo d+ha tsit+ta ud pa tam
4a5: mi zhes bya ba rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i sngags 'dis/ yang byang chub sems dpa' chen po de'i sems bskyed par gyur to// de nas yang byang chub sems dang des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bkas byang chub kyi
4a6: sems bskyed nas 'di skad ces gsol to/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lta bur mthong ba gang lags pa de ni zla ba'i dkyil 'khor nyid du mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin
4a7: gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po khyod kyis mngon sum du gyur gyis/ de legs par bsgrubs shig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems bskyed pa kun tu bzang po
4a8: de brtan par bya ba'i phyir sngags 'dis rang gi snying gang zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la rdo rje'i dbyibs su soms shig/ oM tiSh+Thabadz+ra/ byang grub sems dpas gsol pa/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams

4b1: zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng du rdo rje 'dug par bdag gis mthong ngo / / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi kun tu bzang po'i sems rdo rje 'di sngags 'dis
4b2: brtan par gyis shig/ oM badz+ra Ad ma kohaM// de nas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje dbyings ji snyed pa de dag thams cad
4b3: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin brlabs kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje der bzhugs so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po don thams cad grub
4b4: pa de la rdo rje'i dbyings/ / rdo rje'i dbyings zhes bya ba'i ming gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje dbyings kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das
4b5: de bzhin gshegs pa rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi d+harma'i sku ni bdag legs par mthong ngo // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bka' stsal pa// sems dpa' chen po de lta bas na/ sems
4b6: dpa'i rdo rje de rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi skur bdag nyid rang bzhin gyis grub pa rig sngags ci dga' bar zlos la sgoms shig/ oM ya tha sarba ta thA ga tasta tha a haM// de nas de skad ces
4b7: bka' stsal pa dang / byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdode dbyings kyis bdag nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag byas te 'di skad ces
4b8: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis bdag byin gyis rlobs la mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa 'di brtan par mdzod cig/ de nas de skad ces gsol pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa

5a1: thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje der zhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i dbyings kyis skad cig mad nyid kyi chan/ de bzhin gshegs
5a2: pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dmatshig du zhugs so// de bzhin gshegs
5a3: pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dbang bskur ba mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dam tshig du zhugs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rtogs pa rang bzhin gyis
5a4: dag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mnyam pa nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal zhing ye shes kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
5a5: sangs rgyas su gyur to/ / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa'i rdo rje de las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes
5a6: bskyed/ nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang bskur bas dbang bskur ro// kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes bskyed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las
5a7: thams cad la bzhag nas/ ri rab kyi rtse mo gang na ba dang / khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa gang na ba der gshegs te byon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings de bzhin
5a8: gshegs pa thams cad du byin gyis brlabs nas dbyer med par gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi seng ge'i gdan la zhal kun tu bstan te bzhugs par gyur to// de nas de bzhin gshegs

5b1: pa mi bskyod pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ldan dang / de bzhin gshegs pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang / de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pa rnams/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams
5b2: cad du so so nas bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs te/ bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir phyogs thams cad mnyam pa nyid du dmigs nas phyogs
5b3: bzhir bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring po ma lon pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs kun tu bzang po zhes
5b4: phyag de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nam mkha' las byung ba'i nor bu rin po che chen po'i dbang gis dbang bskur ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i chos kyi ye shes ngas
5b5: pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa brnyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad gdon mi za bar ston pa/ thogs pa med pa/ dgongs pa rdzogs pa/ yid kyi bsam pa'o cog yongs su rdzogs pas de bzhin
5b6: gshegs pa thams cad du bdag nyid kyis byin gyis brlabs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ sems dpa'i byin gyis
5b7: bzlas pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa zhes bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs
5b8: ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra satwa/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das kun tu bzang po de nyid zla ba'i dkyil 'khor du gyur nas byung ste/ sems can thams

6a1: cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po yang dag par sbyangs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyogs phyogs su 'khod do/ / de nas zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dag las kyang de bzhin gshegs pa
6a2: thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs su zhugs par gyur to// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa
6a3: thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas nam mkha'i khams thams cad du 'od zer rtse lnga pa'i phreng bas khyab par zhugs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dgra
6a4: rdordzom bu'i rdo rje byings gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas byung ste phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje de las rdo rje de lta bu'i 'od zer gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs pa/ 'jig rten gyi
6a5: khams thams cad du snang bas khyab par byed pa rnams byung ngo / / rdo rje lta bu'i 'od zer de dag gi rtse mo las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/
6a6: chos kyi dbyings kun tu khyab pa thams cad dang / nam mkha'i khams kyi mthas gzugs pa thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab thams rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
6a7: mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes mngon par byang chub pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / kun du bzang po'i spyod pa sna tshogs pa bsgrub pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
6a8: rigs mnyes par mdzad pa dang / byang chub kyi snying po chen por gshegs pa dang / bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi byang chub chen por mngon par byang chub pa dang / dam

6b1: ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba nas/ ji srid sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su skyob cing thams cad la phan pa dang / bde ba mdzad pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
6b2: dang mngon par shes pa dam pa'i dngos grub bslab pa la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang tsho 'phrul rnams kyi bar du bstan nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu bzang po yin pa dang shin tu
6b3: brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ 'di skad du ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
6b4: e ma'o bdag ni rang byung ba'i// kun tu bzang po sems dpa' brtan// de ni brtan phyir lus min yang // sems dpa'i lus su gyur pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi
6b5: thugs kanas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang /
6b6: ye shes kyi dam tshig rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin pa snyoms pa shags nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / shes rab dang / rnam par grol ba dang / rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba dang / chos
6b7: kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang sems can gyi don bya ba dang / thabs chen po dang / stobs dang / brtson 'grus dang / ye shes chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i rnams yongs su bskyab
6b8: pa dang / thams cad kyi dbang por bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa bla na med pa dang / theg pa chen po

7a1: mngon par rtogs pa grub pa'i mchog thob pa'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang ba de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyilakhong lo sbyar ba nyid du/
7a2: rgyas thams cad kyi sku rin po che'i dbu rgyan dang cod pan gyi dbang gis dbang bsrung na/ de shin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub pa'i rdo rje de'i lag par byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis/ laganardo rje las
7a3: nordo sa bu rje'i mi gi dbang gis nga gyur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje/ phyag g.yon pa rdo rje bsgyings par bzhugs te/ phyag g.yas pas rdo rje thugs kar gsor zhing 'ben pa'i
7a4: tshul du 'dzin cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi grub pa yi// rdo rje bla na med pa 'di// bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// rdo rje la ni rdo rje gnas// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems
7a5: dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po 'damatshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan dras
7a6: pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra rA dza/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas zung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das
7a7: phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi lcags kyu chen por gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje lcags kyu chen pos
7a8: dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i dbyibs chen po de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku

7b1: rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po yin
7b2: pa dang / shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gdon mi za ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa
7b3: 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o rdo rje las byung ba'i// lcags kyu nges pa'i rgyal po bdag/ gang phyir kun tu sangs rgyas khyab// grub phyir kun nas spyan 'dren to// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po shin tu gdon
7b4: mi za ba'i rgyal po'i sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de
7b5: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa
7b6: med pa thams cad dgug pa dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dra ba'i byin gyis brlabs dam pa'i bar du bsgrub pa'i phyir rdo rje'i lcags kyu de byang chub sems dpa'
7b7: gdon mi za ba'i rgyal po de'i lag par de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje du brjon du pa zhes bya ba'i rje'i mi ga nga gis dang gyung ro/ den byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dgug pa
7b8: rdo rje lcags su des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje yi// ye shes blan med pa 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi don grub phyir// kun nas spyan du

8a1: dam pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba 'dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
8a2: pathams cad mnyes par byed pa'i dmatshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs gnas byung ngo / / badz+ra rAg/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'dzin
8a3: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi me tog gi mdar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje'i
8a4: mda' chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje mda'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung
8a5: ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin du bdud byed pa dang rab tu
8a6: brtan pa'i phyir/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya bar gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched brjod do// e ma'o//
8a7: bdag gi rang bzhin dag/ rang byung ba dag dgyes byed pa// 'dod chags bral rnams dag bya phyir// 'dod chags kyis ni 'dul bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po// bdud de'i lus bcom ldan 'das/
8a8: kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs so// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

8b1: cad mnyes par byed pa'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud rdo rje dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
8b2: narnams mgu bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyis bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdud kyi mchog 'grub par 'thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje'i mda' de byang chub
8b3: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bdud ces bya ba de'i phyag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rngog rdzo byab rje ming shi pa gis dang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa'
8b4: chen po rdo rje'i gzhu zhes bya bas rdo rje'i mda' des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bdud byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// ye shes 'di ni dri ma med// 'dod chags
8b5: kyis ni chags bral bcom/ / bde ba thams cad sbyin par byed// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i sems dpa'i byin
8b6: gyis gazlas pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dga' ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs gnas
8b7: byung ngo / / badz+ra sA d+hu// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de legs so zhes bya bar gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi
8b8: thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje dgyes pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang

9a1: mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis legs so zhes bya ba la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang tshe 'phrul rnams byas nas/
9a2: de rje sems dpa'i nge 'dzin ni shin tu dga' bar byed pa nyid dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po btu dga' ba'i rgyal po'i lus su gyur te/ bcom ldan
9a3: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas par gyur nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o thams cad mkhyen kun gyi// legs sbyin nang na bdag mchog pas// rnam rtag bral bde
9a4: ngag gi/ nges par bgyes pa bskyed pa yin// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i rgyal po 'bru de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs gnas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyis
9a5: 'khor la gnas nas/ yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
9a6: gshegs pa thams cad kyi rab tu dgyes pa bla na med pa'i ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa'i sems can thams cad mgu bar bya ba dang thams cad bde ba dang mi pa rtsod
9a7: b ar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgyes pa'i ngoblan med pa dam pa 'grub pa 'thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rjed gyes pa dbyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab tu dga' ba'i
9a8: rgyal po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dgyes pa rdo rje dgyes pa zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dang gis dang gra'o// de nas bya chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje

9b1: dgyes pas rdorjod dgyes pa'i dbyibs des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la legs so zhes bya bas rab tu dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi legs sbyin pa// 'di ni rab tu
9b2: 'jug byed pas/ / rdo rje thams cad dgyes par byed// lha rdzas dgyes pa spel ba'o// byang chub kyi sems chen po dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba'i dam tshig dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
9b3: mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes dang / dgyes pa chen po dang 'di bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig chen po'i sems dpa'o// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dgra
9b4: chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rin po che'i byin gyis rlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dbang bskur ba'i dmatshig
9b5: ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra rad na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni rdo rje sems dpa'i ting
9b6: 'dzin/ thams cad na mkha' dang mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa yin pa'i phyir/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de na mkha' thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur nas byung ngo // na mkha' thams cad kyi 'ong
9b7: zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas pas thams cad nam mkha'i dbyings lta bur gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ na mkha'i dbyings de dag thamaH
9b8: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin shin tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir yang nam mkha'i khams thams cad las byung ba'i// 'jig rten gyi khams thams

10a1: cad du mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam kyang rdorje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje rin po che'i dbabs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi
10a2: rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang tshe 'phrul rnams 'jig
10a3: rten gyi khams thams cad du byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni na mkha'i khams thams cad kyi snying po las shin du byung ba dang / rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'
10a4: sems dpa' chen po na mkha'i snying po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o chags med rgyal ba yang // khams gsum dbang por
10a5: dgongs pas na/ / rdo rje rin chen dam pa yi// dbang gi mchog ni bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po'i lus de bcom ldan 'das kyis thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin
10a6: gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan dran tha pa dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka nod cing bzugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyinang byan po rdo rjenas byab nga
10a7: yinas stoms par na pa nang/ de na gagags thamasas cad kyidags yos mchogs par bya da cig dang / sems can gyi khasas las shing lum pa med pa dan mas pad pa su
10a8: m a de khyo bya sa da na gagags pa ma cadan ca da ma bcun rgya gas pa sa sa kyag bya rgya mad 'a mams na sa

10b1: snying po rdo rje rin po che'i 'khor lo bskor bar rdo rje rin po che'i myu gu'i dbang gis dbang bskur nas lag tu rdo rje'i nor bu de byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po rdo rje zhes bya ba'i rdzi'i ming gi dbang gis dang /
10b2: bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje'i snying pos rdo rje'i nor bu de rang gis dbang bskur ba'i gnas su 'jog cing cheng du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi sems dpa'i dbyi
10b3: dbang bsrur de ni bdag yin te/ bdag gi lag tu byin pas na// rin chen la ni rin chen bzhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po zhes bya ba'i dam
10b4: tshig las byung ba'i rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
10b5: snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra te dza// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por gyur nas/
10b6: bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje nyi ma'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor de
10b7: las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer 'gyed pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs//
10b8: pa thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin du gzi brjid che ba nyid dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' sems

11a1: dpa' chen po gzi brjid chen po'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par sdang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'i sems can khams kun du// sdang
11a2: byed gzi brjid depe med bdag/ gang phyir sangs rgyas dag pa yi// 'dren pa rnams kyang sbyor bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dri ma med pa'i gzi brjid de'i lus bcom ldan 'das
11a3: kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te/ bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams
11a4: cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing
11a5: lus pa med pa rnams kyi gzi brjid mtshungs pa med pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od thob cing dngos grub dam pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi
11a6: phyir/ rdo rje nyi ma de byang chub sems dpa' gzi brjid chen po de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i 'od// rdo rje'i 'od ces bya bag/ rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//
11a7: nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje nyi ma des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang bar byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi snang ba 'di// mi shes mun nag
11a8: 'joms byed pa/ / shin tu phra rdul ji snyed pa'i// nyi ma'i 'od pas shin tu lhag/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin

11b1: gyis sa ni rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dgongs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
11b2: snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo / / badz+ra ke t+ya/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka las byung ma thag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de rgyal mtshan kha dog dang gzugs dang /
11b3: rgyan dang dbyibs sna tshogs par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so//
11b4: de nas rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi dbyibs de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i rgyal
11b5: mtshan bsgreng ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ rin po che'i dpal dang shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byung
11b6: chub sems dpa' rin po che dpal gyi skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o don kun grub pa dang // dgongs pa thams cad rdzogs pa yi//
11b7: don rnams thams cad rdzogs byed pa'o// 'dri med dpal ni bdag yin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa/
11b8: thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing 'dug par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes bya

12a1: ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi nor bu yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa
12a2: rnams kyi re ba thams cad yongs su bskang bar bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don chen po dngos grub das pa thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag
12a3: gi phyir rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan de byang chub sems dpa' chen po rin po che'i dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan to// rdo sa gis dbang
12a4: gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyis/ rdo rje'i rgyal mtshan des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sbyor du bcug nas chang du
12a5: brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi dgongs pa kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed pa yi// yid bzhin nor bu'i rgyal mtshan ni// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin pa'i tshul// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
12a6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i dam tshig las byung ba rin po che'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
12a7: gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra has/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma/
12a8: theg pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'dzum par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/

12b1: rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs su gyur te/ phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje 'dzum pa'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung
12b2: nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mad du byung ba la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i
12b3: dbang po yin pa dang shin du brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
12b4: kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / rtag tu mnyam par banag rnams kyis// sangs rgyas don la rab sbyor phyir// e ma'o bdag ni kun mchog gi/ bzhad chen mad du byung ba yin// de nas byang
12b5: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas
12b6: yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rmang du byung ba byin gyis brlabs pa'i rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshes
12b7: pa thams cad kyi rmad du byung ba bskyed pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa thams cad kyi dbang ba ldan med babu ba dang thams cad bde ba dang / yid dbade ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs
12b8: p a thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su spyod pa'i ye shes mngon par thob pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir byang chub sems dpa' chen po rtag par dga' zhing rab tu mgu ba'i dbang po de'i lag tu rdo rje 'dzum pa de de bzhin du byin

13a1: no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje dga' ba rdo rje dga' ba zhes rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dga' ba rdo rje 'dzum pa das /
13a2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes par byed cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rmad du byung skyed ston pa po// dgyes pa chen po byed pa mkhyen// gtsug lag gzhan gyis shes
13a3: minus/ / dbang bskur ba chen po dang 'od kyi dkyil 'khor 'dom gang ba dang / sems dpa' chen po'i don dang dgyes pa chen po dang 'di bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang chen po'i sems dpa'o// de nas yang
13a4: bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo /
13a5: / badz+ra d+ham/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
13a6: phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i chos mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes rab tu rtogs pa'i phyir dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer du gyur te byung
13a7: po/ dam pa'i chos kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kun tu snang bar byas pas chos kyi dbyings lta bur gyur to// chos kyi dbyings de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
13a8: kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ nam mkha' thams cad dang mnyam par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam gyi pad mo chen mo'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje pad mo'i dbyibs/

13b1: de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin dang / ye shes dang mngon par shes pa
13b2: la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / tshe 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po yin pa dang
13b3: shin tu brtan pa yin pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po'i bskur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas
13b4: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o rang byung gdod nas dag/ dam pa'i don ni bdag yin te/ gang phyir gzings 'dra'i chos rnams las// rnam par dag pa dmigs par gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa
13b5: sems dpa' chen po kun du sman ras gzigs kyi lus de bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas te bka' nod cing
13b6: bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
13b7: gshegs pa thams cad rnam par spang ba'i dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi bdag dang gzhan rnam par dag par bya ba dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba
13b8: nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ye shes dang / mngon par shes pa drug thob par byed pa'i bar du/ 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dam pa'i/

14a1: chos kyi 'khor lo skor bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sku'i dbang gi dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu rdo rje pad me de byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje spyan rdo rje'i spyan
14a2: zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gi dbang skur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rdo rje pad mo de'i 'dab ma kha phye bas/ 'dod chags rnam par dag cing mi chags pa'i ngo bo nyid du gzigs
14a3: pas gzigs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'dod chags kyi// de yi kho na rtogs pa 'di// bdag ste bdag gi lag tu byin// chos la chos ni gnas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom
14a4: ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs
14a5: pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra tik+Sha Na/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs//
14a6: las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de shes rab dang ye shes kyi ral grir gyur te de byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/
14a7: rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas rdo rje ral gri'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa
14a8: sku rnams byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni/ shin tu 'jam/

14b1: pa'i dpal yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas
14b2: nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// 'jam dbyangs bdag ni yin par dgongs// gang phyir shes rab gzugs med kyang // dbyangs nyid du ni dmigs pa yin// de nas byang
14b3: chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyi sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod
14b4: cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab dang ye shes kyi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin
14b5: gshegs pa thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad gcad pa'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi sdug bsngal thams cad gcad pa dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang /
14b6: yid bde ba rnams myong bar byas nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba'i shes rab dam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir rdo rje ral gri de byang chub
14b7: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje blo rdo rje blo zhes bya ba'i rdo rje'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro//
14b8: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje blos de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje ral gri des 'debs shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// shes

15a1: rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul/ / dgra rnams thams cad tshar gcod cing // sdig pa thams cad 'joms pa'i mchog/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems
15a2: bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyi byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo'i dam tshig
15a3: ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra he tu/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de
15a4: nyid de/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po la sogs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor du gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par
15a5: gyur nas/ rdo rje 'khor lo dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi phyag gnyis su gnas par gyur to// de nas rdo rje 'khor lo'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i
15a6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas/ sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byas
15a7: te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed
15a8: ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// rdo rje dam pa chos can gyi// e ma'o rdo rje 'khor lo

15b1: bdag/ gang phyir sems bskyed tsam gyis kyang // chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i sku de bcom ldan
15b2: 'das kyi thugs kanas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs
15b3: pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tham cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med par
15b4: 'jug pa phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dam pa grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi
15b5: phyir/ rdo rje 'khor lo ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sems bskyed ma thag tu chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje snying po
15b6: rdo rje snying po zhes bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje 'khor lo des de bzhin gshegs pa phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'jog cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do//
15b7: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos rnams thams cad rnam par sbyong // phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo yang // byang chub snying po yin par dgongs// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen
15b8: po mi gsung ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i chos kyis byin gyis brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brjod pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs

16a1: pathams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs gnas byung ngo / / 'draH// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las zung mthag pa 'di ni/ bcom ldan 'das phyag nardo rje nyitid de na/
16a2: gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi yi ger gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su
16a3: gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje brjod pa'i dbyibs de las/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos nyid
16a4: la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul la sogs pa byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni shin tu tshig ma yin pa dang shin tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/
16a5: byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshig ma yin pa'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi gsang /
16a6: ldem po dag du bdag dgongs te/ gang phyir dam pa'i chos 'chad pa// tshig tu spros las rnam par bral// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa'i sku de bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs
16a7: las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mi gsung ba'i
16a8: gsung gi rdo rje'i dam tshig las byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa

16b1: rnams kyi tshig grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung sang bapo pa po gru dang pa bang du 'grub par bya ba'i phyir/ rdo rje brjod pa de byang chub
16b2: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshig ma yin pa de'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje tshig rdo rje tshig ces bya 'i rje ming gis gang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub
16b3: sems dpa' chen po rdo rje tshig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rdo rje brjod pas yang dag par smra zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje'i brjod par brjod/
16b4: pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi// sngags ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje chos nyid kyi ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes dang chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor
16b5: ba'i ye shes dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi spros pa rnams par ldog pa'i ye shes dang 'di bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi sems dpa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das
16b6: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyi brlabs rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas
16b7: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra kaH// de nas rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin las thams
16b8: cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes shin tu rtogs pa'i phyir/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs thathams cad kyi phrin lnga

17a1: k yi 'od zer du gyur te byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi 'od zer de dag gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las
17a2: kyis dbyangs lta bur gyur to/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs de yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad du mnyam
17a3: par 'jug pa'i tshad tsam du gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las kyi dbyibs de las/ las thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su gyur nas phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas yang rdo rje'i dbyibs de
17a4: las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku rnams byung nas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
17a5: phrin las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las mtha' yas pa yin pa dang / shin du brtan
17a6: pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres par gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i skur gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs las gnas
17a7: nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e me'o sangs rgyas rnams kyi nges// phrin las mang po kun bdag yin// sangs rgyas don ni lhun grub phyir// rdo rje las ni 'jug par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa'
17a8: chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad ces bya ba'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs la byung nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi spyan sngar zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ yang

17b1: bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gdon mi za ba'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rdo na bu 'i'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
17b2: zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod par bya ba la sogs pa gdon mi za 'i tshad med pa dang las kyi chog rgyas pa thams cad kyi mtshig dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med
17b3: pa rnams kyis las thams cad grub pa dang / thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i phrin las nyid dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dam pa rnams
17b4: 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las thams cad kyi 'khor los bsgyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang gis
17b5: dbang bskur nas de'i lag tu las kyi rdo rje de byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje thams cad rdo rje thams cad ces bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems
17b6: dpa' chen po rdo rje thams cad ces bya bas rdo rje de rang gi snying kar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las la sbyor zhing / ched du brjod pa 'di med bu brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/
17b7: las rnams thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ bdag ste bdag gi lag du byin// las rnams kun tu byed du bcug/ de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka'i dam
17b8: tshig las byung ba las thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab par rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin

18a1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kanas phyung ngo / / badz+ra rak+Sha/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid
18a2: de/ cho ga brtan par gyur te byung nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te/ gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas/ rdo rje go cha chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so// de nas
18a3: rdo rje go cha'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsrung ba'i go cha rgyas
18a4: pa'i las la sogs pa dang / sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang / cho 'phrul rnams byas nas/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni brtson 'grus dam pa thub dka' ba dang / shin du brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres
18a5: bar gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thub dka' ba'i lus su gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o brtson/
18a6: 'grus go cha ni// brtan pa'i bdag nyid rab brtan bdag/ de ni brtan phyir lus med kyang // rdo rje'i lus su byed pa mchog/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus chen po thub dka'//
18a7: pa de'i lus bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs ka nas byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yas phyogs na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas par gyur nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to// de nas bcom
18a8: ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje brtan pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig dang

18b1: sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyed pa dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba myong ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes thob pa'i mchog 'grub par bya ba'i
18b2: bar du/ de dag gi phyir rdo rje go cha de/ byang chub sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus thu bdaka' ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje grogs po rdo rje grogs po zhes rdo rje zhes
18b3: bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje grogs pos rdo rje go cha des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la go cha skon zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod
18b4: do/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// byams pa'i go cha dam pa ste// brtson 'grus brtan pas bsrung ba che// grogs po chen por brjod pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen
18b5: po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ las kyi byin gyis bzlas pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dam tshig
18b6: ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po'i di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra ya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
18b7: 'dzin pa de nyid de/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha chen por gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs du su gyur te phyag
18b8: gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje mche ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bos

19a1: gdul ba lasags pa sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang tshe 'phrul rnams byas nas rdo rje sems dpa' kyang 'dzin ni bdud thams cad rab tu 'dzums pa yin pa dang / shin tu brtan par byung gcig tu
19a2: 'dres par gyur te / byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o
19a3: bdag ni sangs rgyas rnams/ / thugs rje can gyi thabs chen te// zhi yang sems can don du ni// marungs par ni ston par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad ba tu 'joms pa'i lus
19a4: bcod ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rab tu blo
19a5: b o rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ma rungs pa gdul ba'i dam tshig dang sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams 'jigs pa med par
19a6: bya ba dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba spyod par bya ba nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thabs chen po dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa rnams thob cing dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir
19a7: rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de byang chub sems dpa' chen po bdud thams cad rab tu 'joms pa de'i lag cu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khro bo rdo rje khro bo zhes rdo rje ma gas
19a8: gis dbang bskur ro/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khro bas rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon cha de rang gi thugs khar bzhag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bsdigs shing / ched du brjod

19b1: pa 'di med du brjod do/ / 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// ma rungs thams cad 'dul ba'i mchog/ rdo rje mche ba'i mtshon no ste// byams dang snying rje'i bdag nyid do// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis
19b2: d e bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba'i dam tshig las byung ba las kyi byin gyis brlabs pa rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin
19b3: gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i bangs pa'i dam tshig ces bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po 'di rang gi thugs kanas byung ngo / / badz+ra san d+hi/ de nas de bzhin gshegs
19b4: pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag pa 'di ni bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad bcings par gyur te byung nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam
19b5: par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te gcig tu 'dres par gyur nas rdo rje bcings pa'i dbyibs su gyur te phyag gnyis su gnas so/ / de nas rdo rje bcing ba'i dbyibs de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams
19b6: cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya dang ye shes la sogs pa dang sangs rgyas
19b7: thams cad kyi rdzu 'phrul dang tshe 'phrul rnams byas nas/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ni// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur shin du bcings pa dang rab tu brtan pa'i phyir gcig tu 'dres te
19b8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs te ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e

20a1: ma'o rab tu brtan bcings pa'i/ / dam tshig bdag ste brtan pa'i bdag/ bsam pa thams cad 'grub phyir// grol ba rnams kyang bcing bar byed// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs
20a2: pa thams cad kyi khu tshur gyi sku bcom ldan 'das kyi thugs las byung ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rgyab na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas yang bka' nod cing bzhugs par gyur to/ / de nas yang bcom
20a3: ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ba cing 'i dam tshig dang / sems
20a4: can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang / lha rnams kyis dgongs pa brtag pa dang grub pa thams cad dang thams cad kyi bde ba dang / yid bde ba myong bar bya banas
20a5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang phyag rgya'i dbang dam pa 'grub pa'i bar du 'bras bu de dag gi phyir/ rdo rje bcing bde byang chub sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa
20a6: cad kyi khu tshur zhes bya ba'i lag tu de bzhin du byin no/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje khu tshur zhes rdo rje bya ba'i ming gi dbang gis dbang bskur ro// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
20a7: rdo rje khu tshur zhes bya ba des rdo rje bcings pa des de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la 'ching zhing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ phyag rgya bcing ba che zhing brtan// sangs rgyas kun
20a8: gyis myur grub phyir/ / dam tshig shin tu 'da' bar dka'// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i las dang brtson 'grus chen po'i go cha brtan pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi

20b1: thabs chen po dang phyag tu thams cad bcings pa'i ye shes dang / 'di banini de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phrin las chen po'i sems dpa'o// // bam po gnyis pa// deras de bzhin gshegs pa
20b2: mi bskyod pa zhes bya bas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis
20b3: brlabs pa'i phyir rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms pa ju sa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dam tshig ces bya ba'i de bzhin
20b4: gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag tu 'ding gi thugs gnas byung ngo / / sar+b+ba badri// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad thugs las 'di byungs thag tu/ rdo rje'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das don/
20b5: 'dzin pa byed do// 'od bar de las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dral shi tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi sa mar nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo ba ros tu
20b6: phyin pa'i ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje'i dbyibs chen por gyur te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
20b7: ya / na la ba ga na ma // mam mangs rnam pas cad/ mam pa na // kyir ldan pas sa nga/
20b8: su gyur pa yin// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung ba zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis

21a1: b rlabs par bya ba'i phyir rin po che'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang
21a2: gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / rang na badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'dri phyung ma thag tu rin po che'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de
21a3: nyid do/ / rin po che'i 'od zer de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
21a4: rnams la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje rin po che chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang
21a5: mdzad kyi g.yas phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas shing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje rin chen bdag yin grags// gang phyir phyag rgya thams cad
21a6: kyi/ / dbang gi tshul ni dam pa yin// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gyi dbang phyug gi rgyal pos de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa
21a7: thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir chos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje'i byin gyi brlabs kyi ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ chos kyi dam tshig ces bya ba rang
21a8: gi phyag rgya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / d+harma badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu pad mo'i 'od zer du gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid//

21b1: seM 'od zer de dag kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas
21b2: byin gyis brlabs nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi rdo rje pad mo chen po'i dbyibs su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi rgyab kyi zla ba
21b3: dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// chos kyi rdo rje gtsang ma bdag/ gang pyir rang bzhin rnam dag pas// 'dod chags yin yang drim med// de
21b4: nas bcom ldan 'das gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes la phyag rgyas byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir las kyi
21b5: p ha rol tu phyin pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rang gi phyag rgya 'dir dgi
21b6: thugs ka nas byung ngo / / karma badz+ri/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ma thag tu las thams cad kyi 'od zer du gyur te bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// las kyi 'od zer de
21b7: dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes rnams la phyag rgyas
21b8: byin gyis brlabs te yang gcig tu 'dres nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang mnyam pa'i tshad tsam gyi thams cad du rtse mo las byung ba'i las kyi rdo rje chen po'i dbyibs su gyur te/ bcom ldan 'das

22a1: rnam par snang mdzad kyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// las kyi rdo rje mang po bdag/ gang phyir gcig
22a2: kyang sangs rgyas dbyings/ / ma lus par ni las bzang byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dam tshig dang dbang bskur ba chen po dang / rdo rje'i chos nyid dang / mchod pa thams cad ni de bzhin gshegs
22a3: pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i pha rol tu phyin pa chen po rnams so/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dgyes pa'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes
22a4: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra la s+ye/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las
22a5: 'di phyung ma thag tu rdo rje'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// rdo rje'i phyag rgya'i rtse mo de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin/
22a6: gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha mo chen mo rdo rje 'dzin ma'i lus thams cad rdo rje sems dpa' dang 'dra zhing kha dog dang gzugs dang mtshan ma dang spyod lam sna tshogs pa rgyan thams
22a7: cad kyis klubs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad sdud par gyur pa rdo rje sems dpa'i lha mor gyur nas bcom ldan 'das mi bskyod pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas
22a8: te/ / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rang byung rnams kyi ni// mchod pa bdag 'dra gzhan med de// gang phyir 'dod pa dga' mchod pas// mchod pa thams cad byas par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan

22b1: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i phreng ba'i dbang gis dam tshig las byung ba/ rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mtshan
22b2: me 'odi rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra mA le/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di byung ma thag tu rin po che chen po'i phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de/
22b3: rin po che chen po'i phyag rgya de dag las kyang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas// yang gcig tu 'dres te/ lha me chen ma
22b4: rdo rje phreng bar de bzhin du gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das rin po che 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs kyi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o rin chen mchod
22b5: pazhes/ / bdag dang 'dra bar grags pa med// gang phyir khams gsum rgyal mchog kyang // rab tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi klu'i mchog
22b6: gi dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ri gI ra te/
22b7: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgyar gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de bzhin gshegs
22b8: p a thams cad kyi chos kyi phyag rgya de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mo chen mo rdo rje skur

23a1: gyur nas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pa' rgyal ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o bdag ni kun gzigs
23a2: pa'i/ / glu mchog tshul gyis mchod pa yin// gang phyir sgra brnyan 'dra ba yi// mchod pa rnams kyis mnyes par byed// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dam tshig las
23a3: byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi lha mo chen mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo / / badz+ra nir ti/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thug
23a4: las byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas par gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gar gyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa
23a5: de dag thams cad las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas yang gcig tu 'dres te lha mtshon mo rdo ga du gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa
23a6: gdon mi za bar grub pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi g.yon phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o mchod kun don mdzad pa'i// mchod pa rgya chen bdag yin te// gang phyir rdo rjegar
23a7: tshogs/ / sangs rgyas mchod pa rab tu byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba bla na med pa'i dam tshig dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phreng ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi glu
23a8: dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i las bla na med pa rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa mi bskyod pas de bzhin

23b1: gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rab tu tshim pa'i dmatshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/
23b2: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi g.yog me'i gtso mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra d+hU pA/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las phyung ma thag pa 'di bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de
23b3: bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin mang po rnam pa du mas rdo rje dbyibs thams cad du khyab par gyur nas byung ngo / / bdug pa'i mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho de dag las kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam
23b4: pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi skur gyur nas byung ste yang gcig tu 'dres nas rdo rje bdug pa'i lha mo'i lus su gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang rin po che
23b5: las byas pa'i gran zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o bdag ni mchod pa che// rab tu tshim ldan dge ba yin// gang phyir sems can 'bab ldan pas// myur du byang chub thob pa/
23b6: 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir rin po che'i rgyan gyi mchod pa dam tshig las byung ba rngo/
23b7: rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsol ka ma 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra puSh+pe/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las 'di phyung ma thag tu
23b8: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid de me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ngo / / me tog thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi

24a1: k hams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te rdo rje me tog gi lha mo'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang du
24a2: brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i grwan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o me tog mchod pa bdag/ thams cad kyi ni rgyan byed de// gang phyir mchod
24a3: nas de bzhin gshegs/ / rin chen nyid du myur du 'grub// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten dbang po'i rgyal pos bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i byar
24a4: debazhin gshegs pa thams cad la snang ba'i mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya mo 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo / /
24a5: badz+ra A le ke/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las dbyung ma thag tu thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa'i bkod pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rje
24a6: rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ / thams cad du snang ba'i mchod pa bkod pa de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te lha me rdo
24a7: rjesnang ba zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs su khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i gran/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du
24a8: brjod do/ / e ma'o mchod pa'i mar me ni// rgya chen dge ba bdag yin te// gang phyir snang bcas myur du yang // sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan yang 'thob// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gdon maza bar

24b1: g rub pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyis mchod pa'i lan du slar mchod pa'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dris mchod pa'i dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la
24b2: snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bran mo 'di rang gi thugs kanas phyung ngo / / badz+ra gan te/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs pas sa byung ma thag tu dri thams cad kyi mchod pa
24b3: bkod pas/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad khyab par byed par gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// dri thams cad kyi mchod pa bkod pas/ de las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin
24b4: d u phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te lha ma rdo rje dri zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi g.yon phyogs kyi khang bu brtsegs partse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin
24b5: po che las byas pa'i grwan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o lha rdzas mchod pa yis// yid 'ong dron bdag yin te// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dri// lus rnams
24b6: kun la 'byin par 'gyur/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes dbab pa dang / byang chub chen po'i yan lag bstsags pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kun du snang ba dang tshul khrims dang ting nge
24b7: 'dzin da shes pa nganam par gro pa dang rnam par grol ba'i ye shes mthong ba ston pa'i dri rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis/ yang de bzhin
24b8: g shegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags kyu dam tshig las byung ba sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po thams cad kyi bdag

25a1: ba 'dra nga gzugs kunas byung nga / / badz+ra a k+sha sh+tsa/ da nas de shin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las dbyung ma thag tud bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyiphyag rgya mang pa thams cad du
25a2: gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs
