25a3: pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres te byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs brtse ma rdo rje dang nor bu dang / rin po che las byas pa'i
25a4: rdo rje ni khang gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis spyan 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// yang dag spyan
25a5: 'dren brtan pa bdag/ gang phyir bdag gis spyan drangs pas// dkyil 'khor kun la bsten par 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig du 'jug pa/ sems dpa
25a6: chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya 'dren pa gsol ka ba 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo / / badz+ra pA sha/ de bzhin
25a7: gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las de byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do// de nas de bzhin
25a8: g shegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'dren pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas yang gcig tu 'dres

25b1: te/ byang chub sems dpa' chen brdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin pa tshe las byas pa'i sgo khang gi nang na zlaba'i dkyil 'khor la
25b2: gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'dren cing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / a ma'o/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje zhags pa dam po bdag/ rdul phran bzhugs pa thams cad kyang // bdag gi
25b3: slar yang drang bar bya/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi lcags sgrog/ sems dpa' chen po'i dam tshig las byung ba/ sems dpa' rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin
25b4: la snyoms par zhugs nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pho nya 'di rang gi thugs ka nas phyung ngo // badz+ra s+pho Ta/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams
25b5: cad kyi thugs las de byung ma thag tu/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang por gyur nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam
25b6: tshig bsdams pa'i phyag rgya mang po de dag las 'jig rten gyis khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung nas/ yang gcig tu 'dres te/ byang chub sems dpa'
25b7: chen po rdo rje lcags sgrog ces bya ba'i skur gyur nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje chos kyi sgob gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ de bzhin gshegs
25b8: pa thams cad 'ching zhing ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje lcags sgrog dam po bdag/ bcing ba kun las grol ba rnams// sems can don du 'ching bar 'dod// de nas yang

26a1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbab pa zhes bya ba sems dpa' chen po dam tshig las byung ba/ sems dpa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs
26a2: pa thams cad kyi phyag/ rgya thams cad kyi bran 'di rang gi thugs ka nas byung ngo // badz+ra a be sha/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las de byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya ma
26a3: po thams cad du gyur nas byung ste bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa de nyid do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya mang po thams cad las 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de
26a4: b zhin gshegs pa'i sku rnams byung ste gcig tu 'dres nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje dbab pa'i skur gyur te bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i rdo rje las kyi
26a5: sgoslob gi nang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'bebs shing / ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rdo rje dbab pa brtan pa bdag/ kun gyi bdag
26a6: tu gyur nas kyang / / bran du yang ni gyur pa yin// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad spyan drang ba dang / gzhug pa dang bcang ba dang / dbang du bya ba rnams ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bka' bzhin byed pa'o// de nas
26a7: bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu bar byin gyis brlab pa'i phyir/ / rdo rje se gol gyis mtshan ma mdzad nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyis brlabs 'di gsungs so//
26a8: badz+ra sa madz+ra// de nas skad cig yud tsam thang cig de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi se gol gyi mtshan mas bskul ba dang 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam rgya mtsho'i sprin thams cad nas/ 'jig rten gyi kham

26b1: thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor mang po dang bcas te 'dug nas khang bu brtsegs pa'i rtse mo rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin po che las byas pags/ na ba dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad gang na bder gshegs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/
26b2: / oM sarba ta thA ga ta pa ta ban d+ha naM ka ro mi zhes brjod do// rang bzhin gyis grub pa'i
26b3: sngags de ci dga' bar zlos shing de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o byang chub sems dpa' ni// kun du bzang po'i spyod pa mchog/ de bzhin
26b4: gshegs pa'i 'khor lo mdzes/ / dbus na de bzhin gshegs pa mdzes// de skad ces smras pa dang // phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas 'dus pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad
26b5: byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas te de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so// de nas
26b6: d e bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las rang rang gi byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas te byung nas bcom ldan 'das kyi khang bu brtsegs pa rtse me rdo rje dang nor bu dang rin
26b7: che las byas pa'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor du byung nas/ snyoms par zhugs te bzhugs nas/ rkyed brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma 'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// rgya chen gdod nas smras pa min/
26b8: rdul phran ji snyed thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas rnams ni gcig tu 'gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang 'dus nas/ sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa

27a1: rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba bstabs pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes dang mngon par shes pa dang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
27a2: byang chub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyir/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'di byin gyis brlabs par bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po rang gi rdo rje sems dpa' thog ma dang tha ma med pa rdo rje
27a3: len chen po la ming bcu rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// rdo rje dang po kun du bzang // phyag 'tshal phyag na rdo rje la'o// rdo rje rgyal po sangs
27a4: rgyas mchog/ rdo rje lcags kyu de bzhin gshegs// nges pa'i rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'gugs khyod la// rdo rje chags pa bde chen po// rdo rje mda' ni dbang byed pa// bdud kyi 'dod pa rdo rje che// phyag
27a5: 'tshal rdo rje ga'u khyod la/ / rdo rje legs pa sems dpa' mchog/ rdo rje mgu ba dga' ba che// rab dgyes rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje dgyes khyod la// rdo rje rin chen rdo rje don// rdo rje nam mkha' nor bu che// nam
27a6: mkha'i snying po rdo rjes phrug/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po khyod// rdo rje gzi brjid cher 'bar ba// rdo rje nyim rgyal ba'i 'od// rdo rje 'od gzer gzi brjid che// phyag 'tshal rdo rje 'od khyod la// rdo rje dpal rab sems can don/
27a7: rdo rje rgyal mtshan rab dga' byed// rdo rje chen po rin chen dpal// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dpal khyod la// rdo rje bzhad mo bzhad pa che// rdo rje 'dzum pa ngo mtshar che// dga' zhing rab dga' rdo rje ston// phyag 'tshal rdo rje dga' ba la/
27a8: rdo rje chos rab de nyid don// rdo rje pad mo rab dga' byed// 'jig rten dbang rab rdo rje spyan// phyag 'tshal rdo rje spyan khyod la// rdo rje rno ba theg pa che// rdo rje ral gri mtshon chen po// 'jam dpal rdo rje rab tu zab// phyag 'tshal

27b1: rdo rje blo khyod la/ / rdo rje nu dang snying po che// rdo rje 'khor lo tshul chen po// rab sor rdo rje las byung ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje snying po la// rdo rje gsung b.rab rig mchog/ rdo rje zlos par bgrub sbyin// migasung rdo rje mchog grub pa//
27b2: phyag 'tshal rdo rje gsung khyod la// rdo rje las rab rdo rje bka'// las kyi rdo rje kun rab 'gro// rdo rje des pa rgya che ba// phyag 'tshal rdo rje kun khyod la// rdo rje bsrung ba brtan pa che// rdo rje go cha sra ba che// brtson 'grus mchog
27b3: ni thub pa dka'/ / phyag 'tshal rdo rje brtson 'grus la// rdo rje gnod sbyin thabs chen po// rdo rje mche ba 'jigs pa che// bdud 'joms rdo rje mi bzad pa// phyag 'tshal rdo rje drag po la// rdo rje mtshams sbyor rab tu 'dud//
27b4: rdo rje 'ching bar 'grol byed// rdo rje khu tshur dam tshig mchog/ phyag 'tshal rdo rje khu tshur la// su zhig ming rnams 'chang ba ni// zhi ba brgya po rtsa brgyad de// rdo rje ming dbang bskur la sogs// mchog rnams kun gyis de
27b5: dbang bskur/ / gang zhig yon tan ming rnams kyis// rdo rje 'chang ba chen po la// rtag tu glur blangs bstod pa ni// de yang rdo rje 'chang 'drar 'gyur// ming brgya rtsa brgyad de dag gis// bdag cag gis ni bstod pa yin// theg
27b6: pa chen po rtogs pa yi/ / tshul chen yang ni rgyas par mdzod// mgon po khyod la gsol ba ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor lo che// dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa yi// cho ga mchog ni bshad par gsol// de nas bcom
27b7: ldan 'das rdo rje chen po 'dzin pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsol ba btab pa'i tshig thos nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig 'byung ba rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyis byi kyis da lan byaba'i/
27b8: ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas// rdo rje dbyings shes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas yang dag bshad bya ba// rdo rje dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje dbyings shes bgyi

28a1: bar grags/ / sems dpa' tshe yi phyag rgya cher// bsgom zhing byin gyis rlob bgyid cing // dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus nyid du// ci rigs par ni mchis nas kyang // phyag rgyal gnas de bzhin langs// kun
28a2: du rnam par bltas nas ni/ / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes brjod nas// bsgyings pa'i tshul gyis yongs su bskor// sar pa la ni bkal nas kyang // tshad dang mthun la mdzes pa yi// thig gis mkhas pas ci nus kyis// dkyil
28a3: 'khor gyi ni thig gdab cing / / gru bzhir bgyi zhing sgo bzhi dang // rta babs bzhis ni mdzes bgyis la// thig bzhi dang ni ldan gyur pa// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// grwa yi phyogs ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi ni nang
28a4: rnams su/ / rdo rje rin chen spras par ni// dkyil 'khor phyi rim thig gdab bo// de yi rim pa'i nang zhugs la// 'khor lo 'dra bar rdo rje yi// thig gis yongs su bskor bar bgyi// ka ba brgyad kyis mdzes bgyis la// rdo rje
28a5: ka ba'i nang logs su/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor lngas brgyan la// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni gzugs gzhag cing // sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun gyi// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus rnams//
28a6: rim bzhin du ni dam tshig mchog/ bzhi po legs par gzhag par bgyi// dkyil 'khor bzhi po de dag tu// rdo rje'i gom pas song nas ni// mi g.yo ba la sogs pa yis// sangs rgyas bzhi po thams cad bzhag/ mi
28a7: g.yo ba yi dkyil 'khor du/ / rdo rje 'dzin sogs bcas par bzhag/ rin chen 'byung ba'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje snying sogs rdzogs par bzhag/ tshe dpag med pa'i dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje spyan sogs dag par
28a8: gzhag/ gdon mi za grub dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje rgya gram la sogs bzhag/ 'khor lo yi ni grwa rnams su// rdo rje lha mo rnams kyang bzhag/ dkyil 'khor phyi rim grwa rnams su// sangs rgyas mchod pa rnams

28b1: kyang gzhag/ sgo rnams kyi ni nang du ni// sgo bsrungs bzhi yang gzhag par bya// dkyil 'khor phyi rim phyogs su ni// sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang bzhag/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis// dam tshig mchog
28b2: gi phyag rgya ni/ / cho ga bzhin bcings zhugs nas kyang // s+pho Ta'i phyag rgyas dbab par bgyi// de la thams cad dbab pa'i snying po ni 'di lags so// a/ bdag la byin gyis brlab la sogs// ji lta bar ni bka' no
28b3: do/ / de ltar bgyis nas bdag ming brjod// de nas rdo rjes bsgrub bgyi ba// rdo rje slob dpon sems dpa' yi// rdo rje lcags kyu bcings nas ni// se gol mang po brdab gyis la// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar
28b4: bgyi/ / de tshe sangs rgyas thams cad ni// rdo rje sems la sogs par bcas// dkyil 'khor thams cad gang ba rnams// dkyil 'khor rnams su 'dus par 'gyur// de nas rdo rje sems dpa yi// phyag rgya chen po
28b5: sgom byed cing / / ming brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// cung zad rab tu brjod par bgyi// de nas 'dus pa dgyes pas na// de bzhin gshegs rnams brtan par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' ra grub pa// grogs po nyid du nye bar
28b6: gnas/ / de nas sgo rnams thams cad du// lcags kyu la sogs las bgyis nas// las chen mchog gi phyag rgya yis// dam tshig rnams ni gzhag par bkye// dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya dang // sems dpa'
28b7: rje la sogs pas/ / de ltar sems dpa' chen po bsgrub// dza hUM baM he zhes brjod cing // de nas sangs rgyas la sogs pa// sems dpa' chen po kun bsdu bar// spyan drangs nas ni rab tu bcug/ bcings nas de yi
28b8: dbang du gyur/ / de nas bdag nyid chen po rnams// gsang ba'i mchod pas mnyes bgyis la// thams cad grub phyir sems can don// thams cad mdzod ces gsol bar bgyi// dkyil 'khor thams cad du rdo rje slob dpon

29a1: gyis de bzhin du las bgyi'o/ / de nas rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir ni rdo rje slob ma dkyil 'khor du zhugs pa la sogs pa cho ga rgyas par mchis so// de la dang po gzhug pa lags te sems can
29a2: gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams yongs su bskyab pa dang sems can thams cad kyi phan pa dang bde ba'i mchog grub par bgyi ba'i slad du'o/ / dkyil 'khor chen po 'dir bzhug pa la snod du gyur pa dang snod du
29a3: ma gyur pa brtag mi 'tshal lo/ / de ci'i phyir zhe na/ bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni sdig pa chen po bgyid pa yang mchis te de dag gis rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs te mthong na/ ngan song thams
29a4: cad dang bral bar 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das nor dang nor bu dang bza' ba dang btung ba dang / 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang dam tshig la mi dga' ba dang sngar spyad pa la sogs pa mi nus pa'i sems can
29a5: dag kyang mchis te de dag kyang der ji ltar 'tshal ba bzhin du bgyid cing zhugs pa rnams kyi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/ / bcom ldan 'das sems can kha cig ni gar dang glu dang gad mo dang rtsed
29a6: mo dang kha zas dang spyod pa la dga' ba rnams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i chos nyid khong du ma chud pas lha gzhan gyi rigs dang dkyil 'khor du 'jug gi/ de bzhin gshegs
29a7: pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs par yang dag par gyur pas/ / bla na med pa'i dga' ba dang mgu ba dang rangs pa rnams 'byung ba der ni bslab pa'i tshig gis 'jigs shing skrag nas/ ma
29a8: 'jug pa dag kyang mchis te/ de dag ngan song gi dkyil 'khor gyi lam du 'jug par kha ltas shing gnas pa rnams kyang dga' ba dang mgu ba'i dam pa thams cad 'grub cing bde ba dang yi bde ba myong bar bgyi ba dang /

29b1: ngan song gi rgyud thams cad du 'jug par kha ltas pa'i lam las bzlog par bgyi ba'i slad du rdo rje dpyid kyi dkyil 'khod chen po der 'jug tu rung ngo // bcom ldan 'das chos can gyi sems can de bzhin gshegs pa thams
29b2: c ad kyi tshul khrims dang ting nge 'dzin dang shes rab dam pa 'grub pa'i thabs kyis sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub tshol ba na bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa dang sa rnams kyis 'bad cing nyon mongs par gyur pa dag
29b3: kyang mchis te/ de dag kyang rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po der zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub par yang dka' ba lags na dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang ci 'tshal de la dang po kho nar
29b4: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag bzhi bya'o/ / de ni 'di ltar lus thams cad kyis rdo rje thal mo brkyang ste phyag 'tshal zhing sngags 'di skad du/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pra dzo ba shwA na ya Ad ma naM nir+yA ta ya mi/
29b5: sarba ta thA ga ta/ badz+ra satwa A d+hi tiSh+Tha swa maM zhes brjod do// de bzhin du 'dug ste rdo rje thal mo snying gar bzhag ste dpral bas phyag 'tshal zhing / sngags 'di skad du/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza a b+hi She ka ya Ad
29b6: mnai ni r+yA ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rad na a b+hi ShaShiny+tsa maM zhes brjod do/ / de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje thal mo spyi bong sbyar te khas phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad du/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta bA dza prA ba ra ta na ya Ad pa
29b7: na nar+ya ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+ha ma pra brta ya maM zhes brjod do/ / de nas de bzhin du 'dug ste/ rdo rje'i thal mo spyi bo nas thob te/ snying gar bzhag ste spyi bos phyag 'tshal zhing 'di skad du/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza
29b8: kaR+ShA Ne Ad ma naM nir+ya ta ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kar+N+Na ku ru maM zhes brjod do/ / de nas stod g.yogs gos dmar po gyon la/ gdong ras dmar pos dkris nas sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la snying

30a1: po 'di brjod do/ / sa ma ya s+t+waM// de nas gung mo gnyis kyi me tog gi phreng ba 'dzin bcug la drang zhing snying po 'di brjod do// sa ma ya hUM/ de nas bcug ma thag tu 'di skad du bsgos shig/ deng khyod kyis
30a2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs su zhugs kyis/ ngas khyod la ye shes gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad du 'grub pa'ang thob na/ dngos grub gzhan lta smos kyang rtsa dgos te/ de lta bu'i ye shre/
30a3: bskyed par byas/ khyod kyis dkyil 'khor chen po ma mthong ba rnams la ma smras shig/ dam tshig nyams par gyur ta re/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon nyid kyis sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya kha na na bstan pa dang phyir bstan pa
30a4: bcings la rdo rje slob ma'i spyi bor bzhag ste 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ / 'di ni khyod kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig yin gyis gal te 'ga' zhig la smras na/ gal te klad pa 'gas par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgyad
30a5: nyid dang mna'i chu'i snying pos sngags la slob ma de 'thung ngu gzhug go/ de la mna'i snying po 'di yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa' deng khyod kyi// snying la yang dag bzhugs par mdzad// gal te tshul 'di smras na ni// de ma thag tu/
30a6: dral te gshegs// oM badz+rod ga tha/ de nas slob ma la 'di bsgos shig/ deng phyin chad khyod kyi phyag na rdo rje nga yin gyis ngas 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba gang yin pa de bya dgos so// khyod kyis ngal brnyas par ma byed
30a7: cig/ mi bde ba ma spangs pas khyod dus byas nas dmyal bar ltung bar gyur ta re zhes smras la 'di skad du/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis rlobs la/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag la 'bab par gyur cig/
30a8: ces brjod du gzhug go/ de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis myur du sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la/ 'di skad du slar gzhug go/ 'di ni rdo rje'i dam tshig ste// rdo rje sems dpa' yin par grags// rdo rje'i ye shes bla

30b1: med ni/ / de ring nyid du 'bab par shog/ oM badz+ra a be sha a/ de nas khro bos phyag rgya bcings la// sems dpa'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya lamadud cing drangs la theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i tshig ci nus par spar
30b2: gzhug go/ / de nas pabaste babs ma thag tu lha'i ye shes skye bar 'gyur te/ ye shes des pha rol gyi sems shes par 'gyur ro// 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa dang / da ltar byung ba rnams kyi dgongs pa thams cad shes
30b3: 'gyur ro/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i bstan pa thams cad la de yis sems brtan par 'gyur ro// de yis sdug bsngal thams cad zad par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa thams cad dang bral nas gnod pa med par 'gyur ro// /
30b4: sems dpa' thams cad dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// dngos grub thams cad 'di'i mngon sum du 'gyur ro// rgyu med par sngon ma byung ba'i dga' ba dang mgub dang
30b5: bar byed pa'i bde ba thams cad de la skye bar 'gyur ro/ / bde ba de dag kha cig gis ni ting nge 'dzin 'grub par 'gyur ro// kha cig gis ni gzungs/ kha cig gis ni re ba thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa nas// kha cig gis
30b6: ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'grub pa'i bar du 'gyur ro/ / de nas phyag rgya de bcings la/ rang gi snying gar bkrol zhing snying po 'di yang smrar gzhug go/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra Di D+ho ma b+ha ba// sha shwa to ma b+ha ba hri da ya me/ a ti ti
30b7: sarba sid d+hi m+me pra yats+tsha hUM/ ha ha ha ha hoH/ de nas me tog gi phreng ba de dkyil 'khor chen por dor zhing snying po 'di yang ched du brjod du gzhug go/ pra tits+tsha badz+ra hoHde nas gang la bab pa de des 'grub bo// de nas
30b8: phreng ba de blangs te/ mgo bor bcings la snying po 'di slar gzhug go/ oM pra ti grah+NA sa mi maM satwa ma hA ba la/ de bcings pas sems dpa' chen po des bdag gir byas par gyur pas 'di myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro//

31a1: de nas de ltar babs bzhin gdong g.yogs pa krol te/ snying po 'di yang slar gzugag/ oM badras hAs yan te/ d+yanak+ta dgatan ta dpar lud ga ta ya tis rba// badz+ra mu/ an+dan+ta tA ra ta badra dwa ga/ de nas
31a2: dkyil 'khor chen po ram pa bzhin du bstan to/ / dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ma thag tu yang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs par 'gyur ro// rdo rje sems dpa' yang de'i snying ga na gnas so// de nas de
31a3: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byin gyis brlabs pa'i phyir/ 'od zer sna tshogs la sogs pa'i dkyil 'a khor mthong ba la sogs pa dang rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul rnams kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro// gal te na bcom ldan 'das
31a4: rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po nyid dam/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku cig ston par 'gyur ro// de'i phyin chad don thams cad dang yid kyis dgongs pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / dngos grub thams cad nas rdo rje 'dzin pa nyid dam de bzhin
31a5: gshegs pa nyid du 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas dkyil 'khor chen po mthong ba'i 'og tu rdo rjes byin gyis brlabs pa'i bum pa'i nang gi dri'i chu dang snying po 'dis dbang bskur bar bya'o// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa/ de nas phyag rgya
31a6: dang breng ba gang yang rung ba gcig bcings la rang gi mtshan ma lag par bzhag la 'di skad du brjod par bya'o/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi rdo rje'i dbang // de ring khyod la bskur bar bya// sangs rgyas kun du rab 'grub phyir// rdo rje
31a7: de ni khyod kyis long / / oM badz+ra a ti ba ti twaM a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra sa ma ya s+t+waM// de nas snying po 'dis rdo rje zhes bya ba'i dbang bskur bya'o// oM badz+ra satwat+ta a b+hi Shiny+tsa mi// badz+ra nA ma a b+hi she ka taHkye rdo rje zhes
31a8: gang gi ming gis gang brjod pa der/ kye zhes brjod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad du 'jug pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas ci khyod den 'byung ba'i dngos grub kyi ye shes dang rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes

31b1: rang rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i ye shes nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi mchog 'grub pa'i ye shes kyi bar du/ gang 'dod ces spras la de nas gang gis gang 'dod pa de de la brjod par bya'o//
31b2: de nas don thams cad kyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbyings ni gter gnas pa// snying gar yongs su bsgom par bya// bsgoms nas sa la gnas pa yi// gter ni de yis mthong bar
31b3: 'gyur/ / rdo rje'i dbyibs cig bris nas kyang // nam mkha'i ngos la bsgom par bya// gang du ltung bar mthong ba der// gter yod par ni bshad par bya// blo ldan mi yis rdo rje'i dbyibs// lce yi steng du bsgoms nas ni// 'di
31b4: na yod ces bdag nyid kyis/ / bden pa nyid du smra bar 'gyur// bdag gi lus ni thams cad la// rdo rje dbyibs su bsgoms nas ni// babs par gyur nas gar gnas par// gter ni de na yod par bshad// de dag gi snying
31b5: be ni 'di dag yin no/ / oM badz+ra ni d+hi/ oM rad na ni d+hi/ oM d+ham+ba ni d+hi/ oM kar+m+ma ni d+hi/ de nas rdo rje rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje'i dbab pa byas nas ni// chu la rdo rje'i dbyibs/
31b6: 'dra bar// bsgoms nas chu yi steng gnas par// 'gro ba'i dngos grub myur bar 'grub// de ltar dbab pa byas nas kyang // gang gi gzugs su bdag gi lus// bsgoms par gyur na bdag nyid ni// sangs rgyas kyi ni skur yang
31b7: 'gyur/ / de ltar bdag la phab nas kyang // bdag gis bdag nyid nam mkhar ni// bsgoms par gyur na ji srid du// 'dod pa de srid mi snang 'gyur// rdo rje babs par bdag gyur nas// rdo rje yin par bdag bsgoms na//
31b8: gnas nas ji srid lding 'dod pa// de srid mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra dza la/ badz+ra ru pa/ badz+ra A kA sha/ badz+ra ma haM// de nas rdo rje rig 'dzin gyi dngos grub 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i

32a1: ye shes bslab par bya ste/ zla ba'i dbyibs gcig bris nas ni// steng gris pa la 'phags paste// lag par rdo rje bsgoms na ni// rdo rje rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur// zla ba'i dbyibs steng 'dug gnas nas/
32a2: rdo rje rin chen rab bsgoms na// bdag nyid bdag pa ji srid 'dod// de srid skad cig lding bar 'gyur// zla ba'i dbyibs kyi steng 'dug nas// rdo rje pad mo la gnas par// bsgoms na rdo rje spyan gyis ni// rig 'dzin go 'phang
32a3: sbyin par byed/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus gnas nas// las kyi rdo rje bsgom na ni// rdo rje sna tshogs 'dzin pa las// rig 'dzin kun tu myur bar 'gyur// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra d+har/ rang
32a4: nad+ha ra/ d+haram+ba d+hAr/ kar m+ba d+ha ra/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa 'grub pa'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya ste/ rdo rje kun dga'i ting nge 'dzin// nam mkha'i dbyings su bsams na ni//
32a5: rje'i bdag nyid ji srid 'dod// de srid rab tu lding bar 'gyur// kun las dag pa'i ting nge 'dzin// bsgoms na bla med de bzhin du// ye shes bsgrub pas myur du ni// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'
32a6: 'dra bar ni/ / nam mkha' thams cad dran byas na// bdag nyid dran pa brtan ldan zhing // rdo rje 'dzin par myur du 'gyur// nam mkha'i dbyings ni thams cad du/ sangs rgyas gzugs su dmigs nas ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi
32a7: ti 'dzin las/ / sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub par 'gyur// de dag gi snying po na 'di dag yin no// badz+ra badz+ra/ shud d+ha shud d+ha/ satwa satwa/ bud d+ha bud d+ha// thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes 'grub pa rnams so// de nas
32a8: gsang thub pa yin pas/ de la dang por mna'i snying po brjod par bya ste// oM badz+ra satwa swa yan t+ye/ hri da ye sa ma pa sti ta ni bid d+ha/ ta dak+Sha da nAn/ yA yA da ya ti phru yang i da dan na yaM// de nas 'di skad du khyod kyis mna'i

32b1: snying po de las 'da' bar ma byed cig/ khyod kyis gnod pa ma spangs pas// dus ma yin par shi bar gyur ta re// lus 'di nyid kyis dmyal bar lhung bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo bar bya'o// de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab
32b2: par bya'o/ / rdo rje dbab pa byas na ni// mnyam par bzhag pas rdo rje yi// thal mo ngos kyis dal brdabs na// ri bo yang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje thal mo'i phyag rgya'o// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams pa'i ngos kyis
32b3: na/ / dal gyis brdab par sbyor ba yis// ri bo yang ni kun nas 'gugs// de bzhin dbab pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje bsdams mas rkyang nas ni// sor mo'i rtse mo mnyam brdabs na// rigs brgya yud kyis brlag par 'gyur// hra
32b4: dbab pa'i cho ga yis/ / sor mo thams cad mnyam bzhag cing // rdo rje bsdams la bkrol ba ni// sdug bsngal thams cad sel ba'i mchog/ de nas de dag gi gsang ba bsgrub pa yin te/ bud med dam ni skyes pa yi// bra ga'i
32b5: nang du gzhug par bya/ / yid kyis de ltar zhugs nas kyang // de yi lus kun khyab par bsam// de la thal mo'i snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra pA sha/ badz+ra a be sha/ badz+ra ha na/ badz+ra ha ra/ de nas rang gi rigs kyi lha'i
32b6: phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bslab par bya'o/ / cho ga 'di skad du bsgo bar bya ste/ khyod kyis phyag rgya mi shes pa gzhan su yang rung ba la// phyag rgya gang yang rung ba bstan par ma byed cig/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni 'di ltar dkyil
32b7: 'khor chen po ma mthong bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag gis phyag rgya ba cing ba byas nas/ de'i tshe de dag de ltar 'grub par mi 'gyur ro// de nas de dag the tsom du gyur te/ gnod pa ma spangs pas myur ba nyid du dus byas nas
32b8: dmyal ba chen po mnar med pa zhes bya bar ltung bar 'gyur ro/ / khyod nyid kyang ngan song du 'gro bar 'gyur ro// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' sgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes gang yin pa ste/ sems

33a1: rtogs pa nas brtsams nas ni/ / rdo rje byings shes brjod byed cing // sangs rgyas skur ni bdag bsgyur la// rdo rje nyi ma bsgom par bya// grub ma thag tu de yis ni// ye shes che stobs na chod dang // kun tu 'gro
33a2: ba nyid rnams 'thob/ / sangs rgyas 'grub pa'ang dka' ba min// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i phyag rgya'o// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrub pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba yin te/ sku gsung
33a3: thugs ni rdo rje yis/ / rdo rje bsgyings par sems bskyed de// bsgyings bcas rdo rje gsor byed na// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid 'gyur// nges ni kun du 'gro ba dang // 'dod pa kun bdag bde can dang // rdzu 'phrul che stobs gzugs
33a4: mchog rnams/ / rdo rje sems dpa' 'dra bar 'gyur// sku gsung thugs ni rdo rje yis// ji ltar ri mo'i rjes mthun zhing // mtshan ma'i phyag rgya rnams ldan pa// sems dpa' chen por bsgrub par bya// 'dir ni dum bu thams cad kyi//
33a5: sgrub pa dang ni dngos grub dang // grub pa rnams kyi las chen rnams// go rams bzhin du bshad par bya// dang por nyin re'i dus bzhin du// rang la byin gyis brlab la stsogs// byas nas thams cad bsgrub bya ste// de yi 'og tu ci dgar
33a6: bya/ / de la phyag rgya chen por bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ rdo rje dbab pa byas nas ni// phyag rgya chen po cho ga bzhin// bcings nas de yi mdun phyogs su// sems dpa' chen po de bsgom mo// ye shes sems dpa'
33a7: de mthong nas/ / rang gi lus su bsgom par bya// bkug cing bcug la bcings pa dang / dbang du byas te bsgrub par bya// de dag gi snying po ni 'di dag yin no// badz+ra satwa a/ rdo rje dbab pa'i snying po'o// badz+ra satwa dri sha ho// sems
33a8: dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ba'i snying po'o/ / dzaHhUM baM hoH/ sems dpa' chen po spyan drang ba dang // gzhug pa dang bcing ba dang dbang du bya ba rnams kyi snying po'o// sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod pas// rgyab du zla ba grub nas ni//

33b1: der bdag sems dpa'i lus su bsgom// sa ma ya s+t+waM a he brjod// sems dpa' gang gi phyag rgya gang // de ni bdag tu bsgoms nas ni// rdo rje bzlas pas bsgrub par bya// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub pa'o// gzhan yang bsgrub
33b2: pa chen po na/ / hUM baM hoHzhes brjod la// legs pa'i tshogs yid kyis ni// lus su sangs rgyas kun gzhug go/ de nas bla med rdo rje'i las// de dag gi ni las bshad de// sangs rgyas rjes su dran grub na// sangs rgyas nyid
33b3: du myur du 'gyur/ / sems dpa'i rdo rje ma grub na// phyag rgya kun gyi bdag por 'gyur// rin chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis// de ni rin chen kun dbang 'gyur// chos kyi rdo rje grub na ni// sangs rgyas chos ni 'dzin par 'gyur// las
33b4: kyi rdo rje'i phyag rgya yis/ / rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// sems dpa'i phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dren pa'i cho ga yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan 'dren 'gyur// rdo rje 'dod pa'i phyag rgya
33b5: ches/ / sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes par byed// rdo rje legs pa'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas thams cad dgyes par byed// rin chen phyag rgya'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas dbang bskur de bzhin du// rdo rje gzi brjid cho ga
33b6: yis/ / rdo rje gzi brjid myur du 'grub// rdo rje dpal 'dzin bsten pas na// re ba rnams ni yongs su skor// rdo rje bzhad pa'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam du bzhad// rdo rje chos kyi cho ga yis// rdo rje chos ni
33b7: 'dzin par 'gyur/ / rdo rje rnon po'i cho ga yis// sangs rgyas kun gyi shes rab mchog/ rdo rje 'khor lo 'dzin bsten pas// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// rdo rje gsung gi cho ga yis// ngas rgyas gsu gi ni 'grub pa thob//
33b8: rdo rje'i las mchog bsgrubs pas na// rdo rje'i las su myur du 'grub// rdo rje'i go cha bskon nas ni// rdo rje'i sku ni 'thob par 'gyur// rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgrubs pas na// rdo rje gnod sbyin mnyam par 'gyur// rdo rje khu tshur

34a1: bcangs pas na/ / phyag rgya thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pa bsgrubs pas na// rdo rje rol pa chen pa 'thab// rdorje phreng ba bcings pas na// sangs rgyas kun kya dbang myur 'gyur// grum chag yis//
34a2: rdo rje glu ni len par 'gyur// rdo rje'i gar gyi sbyor ba yis// sangs rgyas kun la des mchod do// rdo rje bdug pa'i cho ga yis// 'gro ba thams cad tshim par byed// rdo rje me tog sbyor byed pas// des ni 'gro ba dbang du byed// rdo rje snang ba'i
34a3: phyag rgya ches/ / rab mchog mig ni sbyin par byed// rdo rje dri yi tshogs ni// sdug bsngal thams cad sel bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyus drangs pas na// 'dren pa kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// rdo rje zhags pa'i tsho gas ni// thams cad rab tu
34a4: 'jug par 'gyur/ / rdo rje lcags sgrog sbyor ba yis// thams cad bcing bar nus par 'gyur// rdo rje dbab pa'i cho ga yis// thams cad dbab par rab tu 'grub// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dam tshig
34a5: gi phyag rgya ye shes bshad de/ thal mo dam du sbyar ba las// sor mo thams cad bsnol ba ni// rdo rje thal mor bka' stsal te// rab tu bsdams phyir rdo rje bsdams// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje brnams las
34a6: byung bas na/ / de dag bsdams pa rdo r+m+ma // bsdams pa bla med bshad par bya// rdo rje bsdams pa dam bcas la// gung mo myu gu ltar mnyam bskyed// gung mo nang du gshibs pa ni// sangs rgyas gnyis pa'i yin
34a7: par bshad/ / gung mo ran chen 'dra ba dang // gung mo pad mo 'dra bar dgug/ sangs rgyas lnga pa'i phyag rgya ni// de bzhin 'dzub mo bkug pa'o// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa yi// rigs kyi dam tshig 'dzin pa yi//
34a8: phyag rgya bsdams dang dngos grub dang // las rnams yang dag bshad par bya// zla ba lta bu'i lag gnyis kyi// gung mo btang bar gyur pa yi// mthe bo mthe chung so sor bsgreng // sems dpa'i rdo rje bsgreng rdo rje/

34b1: 'dzub mo lcags su 'thub po b+hang // legs so ston pa 'dra ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' ban pa yas// phyag rgya mang po'i dngos grub 'o// mthebo ba shibs la 'jub gnyis bcag/ smad rin chen rdo rje yin// de nyid
34b2: gang mi ston lag dang / / mtho'i chung rnams ni bcwol brkyang ba'o// de las srin lag mthe rlung nyis// mnyam par bgobs pa rgyal mtshan no// de nyid las ni gtor nas kyang // yi phyogs su bzhag pa'o//
34b3: mthe bo gnyis ka mnyam par gshib// 'dzub mo gnyis ka bkug pa dang // gung mo bsgreng ba'i rtse mo dkug/ de nyid rdo rje ral gri'o// de las srin lag mthe'u chung ba shib// 'khor lo yin par bshad pa yin/
34b4: bsdams la mthe bo gnyis bkrol la// bkan te kha phyogs bzhag pa'o// mthe bo mthe'u chung rtse sprad bkyed// las kyi rdo rje yin par bshad// de las 'dzub mo gnyis bshibs la// snying gar brkyang ste bzhag pa'o//
34b5: 'dzub mo rtse mo gnyis bkug la// mthe'u chung gshigs pa mche ba'o// mthe'u chung gnyis par mthe bo gnyis// 'dzub mo gnyis kyis btsir ba'o// snying gar mthe bo mnyams nas bzhag/ rab tu brkyang ba phreng ba'o//
34b6: thal sbyar rtse mo kha nas dbyung // gar las thal sbyar spyi bor gzhag/ rdo rje bcings pa thung du grugs// thal mo sbyar ba gyen du gtor// mthe bo mnams te rab tu bsdams// btubarkyang nas thug pa'o// 'dzub mo
34b7: gcig pu dgug pa dang / / mthe bo gnyis ni mdud pa dor// mthe bo 'dzub mo gdu bur bcing // rdo rje bcing ba 'dzub mo bsdams// de nas 'di rnams bsgrub bshad de// rdo rje'i bsgrub padam pa'o// rdo rje sems dpa' ting
34b8: 'dzin gyis/ / rang gi phyag rgya snying gar bzhag/ de nas 'di rnams las bshad pa// rdo rje las ni bla na med// rdo rje dbyings lnga'i phyag rgya ni// de bzhin gshegs rnams 'dus pa yis// dkyil 'khor slob dpon slob

35a1: mar bcas/ de ma thag tu byin gyis rlob// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings pas na// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje ljags kyu bcings pa yis// sangs rgyas kun kyang 'gug par byed// 'dod pa'i rdo rje sbyar ba/
35a2: ni// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed// rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun// legs so pas ni bstod par byed// rin chen rdo rje bcings pas na// sangs rgyas kun gyis de dbang bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas na/ sangs
35a3: rgyas kyi ni 'od 'drar 'gyur/ / rdo rje rgyal mtshan 'chang 'gyur bas// re ba kun kyang rdzogs par byed// rdo rje bzhad pa'i tshul gyis ni// sangs rgyas kun dang lhan cig bzhad// chos kyi rdo rje bcings pas na// rdo rje chos dang 'dra
35a4: bar 'gyur/ / rdo rje ral gri thogs pas na// nyon mongs thams cad nges gcod do// rdo rje 'khor lo brtan pas na// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbang por 'gyur// rdo rje smra ba'i sbyor ba yis// rdo rje dag mchog 'grub par 'gyur//
35a5: las kyi rdo rje bcings pas na// rdo rje las dang 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje go cha brtan byas pas// lus ni rdo rje 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya mchog/ ma rungs bdud ni nges 'joms so// rdo rje khu tshur dam
35a6: bcings pas/ / phyag rgya kun yang dbang du 'gyur// 'dzum pa'i lha yi dga' ba rnams// phreng ba yis ni rgyan gyi rnams// glu yis rtag tu skad gsal ba// gar gyis mchod pa rnyed par 'gyur// bdug pas 'jig rten
35a7: dga' bar byed/ / me tog gis ni mdzes pa'i gzugs// mar me yis ni snang ba dag/ dri yis lha rdzas dri can du'o// rdo rje lcags kyu dgug pa ste// rdo rje zhags pa 'jug par byed// rdo rje lcags sgrogs bcings pa ste//
35a8: rdo rje dril bu 'bebs pa'o// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya rnams bshad do// badz+ra dz+nyA na sangs rgyas rnams// rdo rje dbyings ni brten par byed// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// chos kyi phyag rgya cho ga bzhin// sa ma ya ste

35b1: zhes brjod na/ / phyag rgya kun gyi dbang por 'gyur// a na ya swa zhes brjod na/ gdon mi zla bar sangs rgyas 'gugs// ma ho mu kha zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas rnams kyang mnyes par 'gyur// sa dus
35b2: ru zhes smras na/ / legs pa'i tshig gis de dgar byed// su mA tad tAM zhes smras na// sangs rgyas kun gyi dbang bskur 'thob// ru po d+ho ha zhes smras na// chos kyi gzi brjid nyid du 'gyur// an+ta prA b+hA zhes smras
35b3: na/ / re ba kun ni rdzogs par byed// ha ha hUM he zhes band na// sangs rgyas bzhad pa rnyed par 'gyur// sarba ka ri zhes smras na// mi bya pra ya rnams kyang spyod// duSh+Ta ta zhes smras na// de ni sdug bsngal thams cad
35b4: gcod/ / bud d+ha bo d+hi zhes smras na// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi bdag por 'gyur// pra ti sha ba ta zhes smras na// sangs rgyas rnams dang lhan cig smra/ su b+ha shidatra zhes smras na// kun gyi dbang dang ldan par 'gyur//
35b5: nir b+ha ya s+t+waM zhes smras na// de ma thag tu 'jigs med 'gyur// sha dru bAk+Sha zhes smras na// dgra rnams thams cad za bar 'gyur// sarba sid d+hi zhes smras na/ thams cad grub pa nyid du 'gyur// ma ha ra tilha
35b6: yi dga'/ / ru ba sho pes gzugs bzang ba// sho tra so khya bde ba sbyin// sarba pU dza mchod par byed// ba la ha d+ha yid bde 'gyur// pa lA ga mi 'bras bu 'thob// su ti dza gri gzi brjid che// su kan d+ha gi dri mchog
35b7: can/ a ya hi dza 'gugs par byed// a yA hi hUM 'jug par byed// he s+pho Ta baM 'ching ba che// gan d+ha ma a rab bskyod pas// de nas de dag gi chos kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa dge ba bshad do// lce la rdo rje bsgoms nas
35b8: kyang / / las rnams thams cad byed par 'gyur// de namalas kyi phyag rgya bcing ba bshad de// rdo rje khu tshur dam bcings te// mnyam par gzhag pas gnyis su bya// rdo rje'i phyag rgya gnyis bcangs te// de nas bcing

36a1: ba rab tu bshad/ / g.yon pa'i rdo rje 'dzub mo ni// g.yas pa'i nang du bsgreng bar bya// byang chub mchog gi phyag rgya ste/ sangs rgyas byang chub mchog sbyin pa'o// mi g.yo ba yis reg pa// rin chen gyi ni
36a2: mchog sbyin pa'o/ / tshe dpag med pa'i ting 'dzin mchog/ gdon mi za ba'i mi 'jigs sbyin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// mdor bsdus rab tu bshad par bya// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' rnams// rdo
36a3: rje las rnams byed pa ste/ / bsgyings bcas gsor ba gnyis ka yis// lcags kyu 'dzin ltar gnas pa dang // mda' 'phang ba yi tshul dang ni// legs so zhes pa snying gar bzhag/ dbang bskur ba ni rdo rje gnyis//
36a4: snying gar nyi ma brtan par bya// g.yon pa la ni gru mo gzugs// de bzhin kha phyogs bskor bar bya// g.yas pa yis ni g.yon pa dbye// snying gar g.yon pa ral gri bdud// 'gal me 'khor lo bskor ba dang // rdo rje
36a5: gnyika kha nas dbyung / / rdo rje gar bskor dkrol ba yi// thal mo 'gram pa spyi bor bzhag/ go cha mthe'u chung mche ba dang // khu tshur gnyis ni gnon pa'o// rdo rje 'gying ba'i tshul gyis su// bsam pa g.yos pas gdung
36a6: bar bya/ / phreng ba 'ching dang kha nas dbyung // rdo rje gar ni bskor ba yin// rdo rje khu tshur tshul gyis ni// bdug pa la stsogs de bzhin sbyin// sangs rgyas kun la mchod pa yis// phyag rgya'i mchod pa byed pa'o// 'dzub mo
36a7: lcags kyu bcing ba ni/ / mthe'u chung las te lcags kyu che// 'khrig ma mdud pa 'dzub gnyis gdub// rgyab gnyis kyang ni mnyam te gnan// de nas 'di rnams bsgrub pa bshad// rdo rje'i las ni byed dang mnyam// rdo rje kun
36a8: dngos rdo rje ni/ / rang gi snying la bsgom par bya// de nas las kyi phyag rgya rnams// rdo rje las ni rnam pa mang // ye shes khu tshur bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas ye shes 'jug par 'gyur// mi g.yo ba yi bcings pas ni//

36b1: yid ni g.yo ba med par 'gyur// rin chen 'byung ba'i phyag rgya yis// gzhan la phan par byed par 'gyur// dam chos 'khor lo'i phyag rgyas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// mi 'jigs mchog gis myar
36b2: bar ni/ / sems can kun la mi 'jigs sbyin// rdo rje 'gying ba brtan byas pas// rdo rje sems dpa'i bde ba rnyed// rdo rje lcags kyus skad cig tu// de bzhin gshegs pa kun kyang dgug/ bdag gis mnga' yi phyag
36b3: rgyu yis/ / rdo rje lha mo mnyes par byed// rdo rje dga' bas rgyal ba kun// legs so zhes ba'i tshig kyang sbyin// rdo rje chen po'i nor bu bcings// ston pa rnams kyis de dbang bskur// rdo rje nyi ma bcings pas ni/
36b4: rdo rje nyi ma 'dra bar 'gyur// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bsgreng bas ni// de ni rin chen char yang 'bebs// rdo rje 'dzum pa bcings pas ni// sangs rgyas 'dra bar myur bzhed 'gyur// rdo rje me tog bcings pas na// de yis rdo
36b5: rje chos rnams mthong / / rdo rje ral gri brtan bcing san// de ni sdug bsngal thams cad gcod// rdo rje 'khor lo bcings pas ni// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig rnams ni/ rdo rje bzlas
36b6: pas 'grub par 'gyur/ / rdo rje gar gyi mchod pa yis// sangs rgyas kyang ni dbang du 'gyur// rdo rje go chas lus bcings pas// rdo rje snying po thob par 'gyur// rdo rje mchi ba bcings pas ni// rdo rje nyid kyang bdag gis
36b7: choms/ / rdo rje khu tshur kun 'phrog cing // phyag rgya grub pa kun kyang rnyed// rdo rje 'dzin pas dga' ba sbyin// rdo rje phreng bas gzugs bzang ba// rdo rje glu yis glu snyan pa/ rdo rje gar gyis dbang du byed// bdug pa yis ni yid
36b8: dga' ba/ / me tog gi sa ni rgyan rnams te// mar me yis ni gzi chen po// rdo rje dri ni dri rab ldan// rdo rje lcags kyu 'gugs pa ste// rdo rje zhags pa 'jug pa'o// rdo rje lcags sgrog 'ching bar byed// rdo rje dril thu bskyod pa

37a1: de nas phyag rgya thams cad kyi spyi'i phyag rgya bcing ba'i chog rgyas pa bshad de/ / de la thog ma nyid du rdo rje bcing ba'i sor mo snying ga brdab par bya ste snang po 'ang brjod do// badz+ra ban d+ha draT/ de nas phyag rgya bcings pakun/
37a2: rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems kyi rdo rje'i dbang du 'gyur ro// de nas rdo rje dbab pa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la snying po 'di brjod do// a/ de nas babs nas grogs po nyid du nye bar gnas par 'gyur to// de nas phyag
37a3: rgya'i dam tshig gi sems dpa' chen po rjes su dran par bya ste snying po 'di brjod do/ / ma hA sa ma ya satwa haM// des ni phyag rgya thams cad 'grub ste/ phyag rgya thams cad 'grub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas spyi'i bsgrub pa'i
37a4: cho ga rgyas pa bshad do/ / de la thog mar rang gi phyag rgya bcings nas/ rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag gi snying po 'dis bsgom mo// sa ma yo he/ de nas rang gi phyag rgya'i sems dpar bdag bsgoms nas sngags
37a5: 'dis byin gyis brlab po/ / sa ma ya satwa a d+hi tiSh+Tha sa maM/ de nas bsgrub par bya'o// bsgrub pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa bshad de de la thog mar re shig nor bsgrub par 'dod na snying po 'di yin/
37a6: no// ar+tha sid d+hi/ des phyag rgya grub na nor chen po skye bar 'dod do// de nas rdo rje 'grub par 'dod na// snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra sid d+hi/ des ci 'dod pa bzhin du rdo rje 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas rig 'dzin gyi grub pa 'do/
37a7: na snying po 'di yin no// badz+ra bid+hi d+ha ra sid d+hi/ des ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du rig 'dzin 'grub po// de bzhin du dam pa 'grub par 'dod na rang gi phyag rgya'i snying pos bsgrub bo// dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'o// de nas phrug rgya
37a8: thams cad kyi spyi'i rang gi lus dang ngag dang sems rdo rjer bya ba'i spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad de/ nam phyag rgya'i byin gyis brlabs lhod par gyur tam bdag gtong bar 'dod na// de nas snying po 'dis brtan par bya'o// oM badz+ra

37b1: sarbas ma ya/ / ma nu pA la ya/ badz+ras dri nog/ tiSh+ThaTA mi b+ha ba su te Sh+yo me thAb/ sra bo ma b+ha ba/ a rur ga tom b+ha ga/ sarbAs da rje mas sarbag ma su cam/ tsad+ha shra ya ku ru/ ga tag to// blag sa
37b2: na/ / sar+b+ba ta thA ga to// badz+ra mA me mul+ya badz+ri b+ha ba ma hA sa ma ya satwa AH/ des ni mtshams med pa byas pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bslus pa dang dam pa'i chos la smod pa dang nyes pa thams cad byas pa
37b3: yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa pos rdo rje sems dpa' brtan par gyur pas tshe 'di nyid la ji ltar 'dod pa'i dngos grub thams cad dam/ dngos grub mchog gam rdo rje dngos gruba'am rdo rje sems
37b4: dpa'i dngos grub 'am/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi bar du myur du 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de nas phyag rgya thams cad dgrol ba'i
37b5: spyi'i cho ga rgyas pa bshad do/ / de la thog mar phyag rgya thams cad gang dang gang nas byung ba de nas snying po 'dis dgrol lo// oM badz+ra muH// de nas snying ka nas byung ba rin chen rdo rje'i phyag rgya rang gi dbang bskur ba'i gnas na
37b6: gnas pas dbang bskur te 'dzub mo gnyis kyis phreng bar bskor zhing bcings nas de bzhin du/ go cha yang snying po 'dis bcing ngo // oM badz+ra rad na a b+hi/ ny+tsa tsasarba mu drA ma tri D+hi ku ru ba ka brtsen baM/ de nas yang go chang
37b7: mthar phreng ba bcings pa btang la/ thal mo mnyam par brdabs te snying po 'di mnyes par bya'o// badz+ra dus+ya ho// cho ga nges phyag rgya rnams dgrol ba dang / bcing ba dang mnyes par byas na rdo rje lta bur 'gyur ro// yang na rdo/
37b8: rje sems dpa'as kyang bya'o// rdo rje sems dpa' lan cig bzlas// ji ltar 'dod pa bdag bde bar// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// phyag na rdo rjes gsungs pa bzhin// zhes bam ldan 'das kun tu bzang pos

38a1: gsungs/ / rdo rje sems stsogs sems dpa' rnams// bsgrub pa dang ni las kun la// 'dir ni ci dgar bzlas na ni// rtog pa kun las dngos grub thob// snying po phyag rgya sngags rig rnams// ji ltar
38a2: 'dod pa'i tshul gyis ni/ / rtog pa las bshad byas pa 'am// bsgrub pa 'dirari na thams cad do// de nas gsang ba'i mchod pa brjod cing rdo rje bstod pa'i glu blangs te gsang ba'i mchod pa bzhi bya'o// oM rdo rje sems dpa' bsdus
38a3: pas na/ / rdo rje rin chen bla na med// rdo rje chos ni glu blangs pas// rdo rje las ni byed par 'gyur// de nas dbus kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje bstod pa'i glu nyid kyis// rdo rje gar lag pa gshibs shing bsang ba'o// bdag
38a4: pa la sogs pa'i mchod pa bya ste de nas phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor du rdo rje bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byas la mchod pa de dag rang rang gi gnas su gzhag go/ de nas thams cad ci nus pas mchod cig ces bsgo nas/
38a5: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsil te ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin bdug pa la sogs pas mchod pa byed du bcug la// ji ltar zhugs pa rnams ci 'byor ba'i ro dang kha zas la sogs pa thams cad da dkyil 'khor
38a6: chen por phul ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis mgu bar byas te/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub rdo rje'i brtul zhugs sbyin no// 'di de sangs rgyas thams cad de// rdo rje sems dpa'i lag na 'dug/ khyod
38a7: kyis kyang ni rtag tu bcing / / phyag na rdo rje'i brtul zhugs brtan// oM sarba ta thA ga ti sad d+hi badz+ra sa ma ya/ tiSh+Tha e Sha tAM d+ha ra ya mi badz+ra satwa hi hi hi hi hUM/ de nas thams cad su la yang ma smra shig ces bsgo zhing mna'i snying
38a8: po yang bstan to/ / de nas ji ltar zhugs pa'i rnams slar bkye ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la gsol ba ni sems dpa' rdo rje'i phyag rgya bcings la// kha gyen du bstan te/ snying po 'di bzlas shing bkrol nas/

38b1: oMkhyed kyis sems can don kun byas// rjes su mthun par dngos grub stsal// sangs rgyas yul du bzhud par mdzad// de nas slar yang gshegs par gsol// badz+ra satwa muHde ltar dkyil 'khor thams cad la
38b2: yang bya'o/ / dam tshig mchog gi phyag rgya rnams kyang dgrol bar bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyal po las/ rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po'i cho ga rgyas
38b3: pa rdzogs so/ / // bam po gsum pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gzungs dam tshig las byung ba rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ snyoms par
38b4: t hugs ma thag tu yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid rdo rje 'dzin pa'i gzugs 'dzin pa kun du 'bar ba'i snying po rdo rje gzungs kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i lha mo
38b5: rnams su gyur nas byung ste/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kun gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i gzangs kyi ye shes bsgrubs te/ de bzhin
38b6: gshegs pa thams cad kyi dmachog gi phyag rgya'i gzungs su gyur nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen po bkod pa'i tshul du/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor rnams la bkod
38b7: ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma'o gang phyir byang chub sems// sems can kun la phan 'azhed pa// 'dul ba'i dbang gis dpa' bo gang // bud med gzugs su mdzad par gyur// de nas bcom ldan 'das
38b8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig rdo rje dbyings kyi byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ / oM badz+ra dzA dI shwa ri hUM badz+ri Ni/

39a1: de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyi brlabs pa zhe bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang
39a2: gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM badz+ra badz+ri ni hUM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che'i dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin
39a3: gyi brlabs pas bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te/ / rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM ra da na badz+ri ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje
39a4: chos kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM d+harma badz+ra ni hUM/ de nas de bzhin
39a5: gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor gyi byin gyis brlabs pa ni bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
39a6: zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ / oM kasma badz+ra ni hUM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzungs chen po'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po
39a7: bshad do/ / oM badz+ra satwa gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM// oM gu h+ya rat+na oM gu shi hUM/ oM gu h+ya ra gi rA gA ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya badz+ra sa d+hi shwa ri hUM/ kun du bzad mo dang de bzhin gshegs pa'i lcags kyu mo dang dga' ba chags
39a8: ma dang legs ldan ma ste rdo rje gzungs chen mo rnams so/ / oM badz+ra gu h+ya rad+ha sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya pra b+he hUM/ oM badz+ra d+h+wa dza a gra gu h+ya hUM/ oM badz+ra ha sa badz+ri hUM/ rin po che'i gtso mo dang rin po che'i sgron ma dang

39b1: rgyal mtshan gyi rtse mo'i dpung rgyan ma dang rgod pa dang ldan ma ste rdo rje rin po che'i gzungs rnams so/ / oM badz+ra d+harma gu d+ha sa ma ye d+hu/ oM badz+ra ko shA gu h+ya sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu d+ha maNaDa le hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya la tsas
39b2: ma ye hUM/ / rdo rje pad mo dang / kun 'dzin ma dang kun du 'khor lo dang steng du zlos ma ste chos kyi gzungs rnams so// oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma sa ma ye hUM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya ka btso hUM/ oM badz+ra gut+ta dAdaShA d+har NI hUM/ oM badz+ra/
39b3: guh+ya muSh+Ti hUM/ dngos grub kyi gtso mo dang / thams cad srung ma dang mdangs slar 'phrog ma dang gzungs kyi phyag rgya ste thams cad kyi gzungs rnams so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rje byang chub sems dpa' chen pos// de
39b4: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad do/ / oM badz+ra gu h+ya satwa badz+ri ni hUM/ oM badz+ra gut+yA rad na Ne gra hUM/ oM badz+ra guh+ya d+harma Ni oM b+hu/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya karma/ oM hUM// rdo rje pha rol
39b5: t u phyin pa de dag nyid la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje gsang ba'i dam tshig gi gzungs sru dpa'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya rnams te rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug ma'i dkyil 'khor chen por 'bar ba dang
39b6: bcas par zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 'dug par gzhag go/ de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gas dpa'i mchod pa dam tshig gi phyag rgya bzhi po bshad// oM badz+ra gu h+ya ra ti pa dza ma sa ma ya/
39b7: sarba pu dza pra brta na ya tAM/ oM badz+ra gu h+ya a b+hi She ka prA dza sa ma ye sarba prA dza pra brta na ya hUM/ oM badz+ra gra h+ya gI ti pA dza sa ma ye sarba prA dza prag mash+tsa/ dzu l+ri yA dzA ma ma la bang brag nA Sh+ku dzi kho pa de nyid yang dang ma yang gi na/
39b8: phyag rgya rnams 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gyi grwa rnams su dgod do// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes rdo rje gsang ba zhes bya ba rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor chen po 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor

40a1: dam pa ste/ / rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bas na// rdo rje gsang ba zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas phyag
40a2: rgya bri bar bya/ / mchod rten khri la legs 'dug pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// khri yi steng du rdo rje brtsegs// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes bshad pa'o// rdo rje rin chen khri yi steng // rang gi dbang ni bskur bar
40a3: bshad/ / rdo rje pad mo khri yi steng // mtshon cha zhes ni bya bar bshad// las kyi rdo rje khri yi steng // rdo rje kun zhes bya bar bshad// pad mo'i steng rgya bri ba ni// 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rten pa'o// khri yi steng du rdo rje bri// sngags
40a4: kyu bsgreng pa gnyis de bzhin/ / rdo rje rdo rje la skyes par// legs par sbyin pa gnyis de bzhin// rin chen 'od zer 'bar ba bya/ nyi ma'i phyag rgya'ang de bzhin no// rgyal mtshan rtse mo 'od 'bar bcas// rdo rje gnyis
40a5: par po yi phreng / / rdo rje'i dbus su pad mo bri// ral gri 'bar bcas de bzhin no// rdo rje 'khor lo rdo rje rtsibs// 'bar ba 'od zer can gyi lce// rdo rje kun du rtse mo dang // go cha rdo rje yang dag ldan// rdo rje mche ba de bzhin bri//
40a6: lag gnyis khu tshur phyag rgyar bya// sems dpa'i rdo rje la sogs bri// dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor ji bzhin du// mtshan ma'i phyag rgya bri ba ni// rdo rje 'dzin stsogs dkyil 'khor du// phyi rol du yang ci rigs par// rang gi
40a7: mtshan ma rnams kyang bri/ / byams pa la sogs rang gi mtshan// ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du bri// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor 'dir 'jug pa la stsogs pa'i cho ga rgyas pa yin te de la thog mar rdo rje slob dpon gyis
40a8: sems dpa'i rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya rang gis bcings te 'jug par bya'o/ / zhugs nas lan cig bskor te phyag rgya de bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje la phul nas rang gi snying kar tshul bzhin du dkrol te sgo bzhir rdo rje lcags kyu

40b1: la sogs pas/ / ji lta ba bzhin du las rnams byas nas phyir byung ngo // phyir byung nas kyang rdo rje slob ma rnams rdo rje dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor chen por gzung ba'i tshul gyis gzungango // de nas btsud nas dngos grub kyi gsang
40b2: ba'i rdo rje mtshan ma tshang bas g.yogs la byin te rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po/ / de la dang por rdo rje gsang ba'i lus kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rkang lag bral mo
40b3: sbyar nas kha/ / glal zhing rdo rje bsgom byas na// rdo rje ma yang chags par byed// dpung pa bskum pa'i lcags kyu dang // mgo la rdo rje bsgom par bya// lag pa yis ni 'byed byed cing // lcags kyu ma yang 'gugs par
40b4: byed/ / mda' 'phen pa yi tshul gyis ni// glal zhing snying gar 'phangs na ni// nyid kyis rdo rje dga' ma yang // bdud kyi tshul gyis mnyes par byed// bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni// rdo rje go cha'i tshul gyis ni// dpung
40b5: pa bskol bar bcings na ni/ / sangs rgyas nyid kyang srung bar byed// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra ra ga ma to// badz+ra a gu sha dza/ badz+ra mA ra ya mA ra ya phaT// badz+ra ban d+ha rak+Sha haM/ de nas rdo rje gsang
40b6: ba'i blta ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po/ / rdo rje blta ba'i chags pas ni// dga' bas mig gi rab tu bgrang // de yis bud med bltas pa na// rtag tu dbang du 'gyur ba yin// rab tu myur bar mig bskul zhing //
40b7: mig gi rdzi mas 'gugs byed pa// lta ba gzi can yin par bshad// 'gro ba thams cad 'gugs byed pa'o// khro gnyer gnyer ma rab bsdus pa// khro ba'i mog ni btsum pa ste// khro bo'i blta ba byas nan// khams
40b8: gsum yang ni 'jig par byed/ / ri rab ri yi brag 'dra bar// brtan par 'dzums pa med pa'i mig/ byams pa'i blta ba yin par bshad// nad dang gdon dang dug sel to// de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di dag

41a1: yin no/ / badz+ra tI N+Dis bi ti Tik+Shi ma thu/ dza kro d+ha triSh+Ti Sh+Ti krin+ta tISh+Te phaT// de nas rdo rjegasang ba'i dag gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// ho ho ho ho zhes smras na// sgra dang bral bas de mthag/ sems
41a2: can kun ni mgu bar byed/ / de ni rdo rje'i tshig stsal pa'o// dz+dza dz+nyA d+hA dz+nyA zhes brjod na// khro bo'i tshig ni gsal ba ste// rdo rje 'dzin pa 'dra ba yi// skye bo kun kyang 'gugs par byed// tsA n+da hUM hUM zhes brjod na// tshig tu brjod
41a3: pa gsal ba yi/ / ri rab dang ni 'dra ba yi// sems can kun gyi bdud byed do// haM haM haM haM zhes smras na// phra ba'i tshig ni gsal ba ste// 'jig rten pa ni srung byed pa// rdo rje'i bdag nyid rgyal ba'ang srung // de la snying po 'di
41a4: rnams yin no/ / badz+ra ho badz+ra dza badz+ra hUM badz+ra haM// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// phyag na rdo rje bdag nyid du// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na
41a5: sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du byed/ / rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje snying po bdag nyid du// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na// phyag na rdo rje 'gugs par byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/
41a6: chos kyi spyan gyi bdag nyid du// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na// chos rnams thams cad des bsdud byed// rnam pa thams cad mchog ldan pa'i// rdo rje thams cad bdag nyid du// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgoms byas na//
41a7: rdo rje thams cad des bsrung ngo // de la snying po ni 'di rnams so// badz+ra pa Ni sarbaSha man ya sarba budad+ha ho// badz+ra gar b+ha badz+ra pA Ni ma shigrA a kar sha ya hUM/ dzaHdz+ran tra sarba d+harma mA ra ya hU~M phaT/ badz+ra bi sharak+Sha saH
41a8: na hUM/ de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// bdag gi lus kyi snying gar ni// sems dpa'i rdo rje bcings byas la// rdo rje mig gis bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad dbab par byed// rang gi lus kyi snying gar/

41b1: ni// rin chen rdo rje bcings byas la// 'bar ba'i mig gis bltas na ni// thams cad dbang du byed par 'gyur// bdag gi lus kyi snying kar ni// chos kyi rdo rje bcings byas na// khro bo'i mig gis bltas na ni// 'gro ba
41b2: thams cad nges bsdud byed/ / bdag gi lus kyi snying kar ni// las kyi rdo rje bcings byas la// byams pa'i mig gis bltas na ni// 'gro ba thams cad srung bar byed// de nas rdo rje gsang ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya de dag
41b3: gi snying po 'di dag go/ badz+ra ga h+ya sa ma ya ho// badz+ra guH sa ma ya dza/ badz+ra ga h+ya sa ma ya hUM/ badz+ra guh+ya sa me ya haM/ de nas rdo rjegs pa'i phyag rgya chen po bcing ba bslab bo// rdo rje thal mo las byung ba// gsang ba chen po yin par bshad//
41b4: phyag rgya chen po mdor bsdus pa// de dag gi ni bcing ba bshad// mthe bo gnyis ni bsnol byas la// 'dzub ma gnyis ni bkug pas ni// gung mo bsnyams te tshigs su sbyar// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// de nyid
41b5: gung mo rdo rjer bya/ / gung ni gnyis ni nor bur bya// pad mo srin lag the'u chung gung // lag pa'i sor mo rab tu brkyang // 'dzub me rdo rje 'dzub gnyis rtsa// de nyid mthe bo gnyis kyis sbas// legs pa sbyin dang 'dzub rin
41b6: chen/ / 'dzub mo rin chen de 'bar bya// srin lag gshibs la mthe'u rin chen// de nyid kyang ni bskor ba'o// kun gyi rtse mo rab tu dbye// mthe bo mthe'u chung rab tu gzhug/ sor mo rab tu 'khor lo bskyang // de nyid
41b7: kyang ni kha nas byung / / mthe bo bskyang ste rdo rje dgab// 'dzub mo mnyam nas nang du gzhug/ mthe'u gnyis dbye ba de nyid las// de nas nang du rdo rjer bya// rdo rje gsang ba 'di rnams ni// rdo rje bcings la 'byung ba yin//
41b8: chos kyi gsang ba mtshan rnams kyis// thal mo nad du bkug nas so// las kyi gsang ba nang gnas pa'i// mtshan mas las su bstan pa'o// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad pa// chos kyi phyag rgya mdor bshad pa// a/ dz+dza/

42a1: sa/ !/ ga pa gan d+hag// gsang pa phyag rgyaganyis byas nas// las kyi byug d+harnams sa bya// dmachag sa gan dag/ sasu bral nas na // dam dang /
42a2: kyi bsgrub pa bshad de// sa ma ya swA zhes smra zhing // bdag gis bcings pas 'grub pa ni// 'dod la chags pa bde ba'i bdag/ 'di rnams lhag par gcig kyang ni// dus kun tu ni bcing mi bya// gsang ba'am ni don chen
42a3: la/ / mkhas pa yis ni sbyar bar bya// de rnams kun gyi bdag nyid gnas// rang byung rnams kyi lha mo brtan// bsgrub pa rnams pa rang chags pas// rtag pa'i bdag po btang dare// de nas phyag rgya de rnams thams cad
42a4: bcings pa la sogs pa'i las rnams yin no/ / bdag gam 'on te gzhan la'ang rung // rdo rje dbab pa byas na ni// snying po bya ba 'di yin no// bcing ngam 'ching du bcug kyang rung // badz+ra hUM ban d+ha/ de nas dgrol ba yin
42a5: no/ / mdor na phyag rgya thams cad ni// snying po bya ba 'di nyid kyis// gang dang gang nas byung ba yi// de dang de nas dgrol bar bya/ oM badz+ra muHde nas brtan par bya ba yin te/ rin chen rdo rje brtan byas te// snying ga nas ni
42a6: spyi bor dgrol/ / 'dzub mo yis ni go cha bcing // snying por bya ba 'di nyid do// oM Di D+ha badz+ra ka ba tsa/ dri d+ha/ de nas bcing ba'i dam tshig yin no// ji ltar gnas pa rnams su dgrol// go cha yis ni brtan par byas// thal
42a7: mo brdabs pas kun sbyar ba/ / snying por bya ba 'di nyid do// oM gu h+ya sa ma ya tha/ rdo rje sems dpa' ci dgar bzlas// dkyil 'khor dang ni las kun la// dus de nyid du sbyar bar bya// thams cad grub par byed pa'i
42a8: mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen mon par rtogs pa'i rtog pa chen po'i rgyal po las rdo rje gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor rdzogs so// // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs/

42b1: pa thams cad kyi rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyi brlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa// oM su k+Sha badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye
42b2: hU~M/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpa' ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis rlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par
42b3: zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ / oM badz+ra satra suk+Sha badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'byung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje rin po che ye shes phra mo la
42b4: dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ / oM rang na su k+Sha badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hU~M// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe
42b5: tshad med pas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje chos kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di
42b6: smras pa/ oM badz+ra d+harma suk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi ye shes phra mo'i dam tshig gi dkyil 'khor byin
42b7: gyi brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs te rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ / oM badz+ra karba suk+Sh+ma badz+ra dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad
42b8: kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so/ / bcom ldan 'das snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu// de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams

43a1: c ad kyi thugs ka nas rdo rje ye shes phra mo'i 'od zer de rnams byung nas 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byas te sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje'i ye shes pa
43a2: mo'i ting nge 'dzin du mnyam par zhugs pa brtan par bya ste yang gcig tu gyur nas ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i skur dmigs de gcig tu 'dus nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes su gyur to/ / bcom ldan
43a3: 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi thugs su zhugs nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes phra
43a4: mo dam tshig chen po'i rdo rje 'di smras pa/ su k+Sha badz+ra/ de nas de smras ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs ka nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid byung nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
43a5: kyi ye shes phra mo'i rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs su gnas nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams
43a6: cad kyi/ / rdo rje phra mo bdag ste che// gang phyir phra yang che ba'i phyir// khams gsum yang ni rgyas par mdzad// de nas de skad ces smras pa dang / bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje
43a7: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shangs kyi rtse mo'i phyogs nas/ / rab tu phra ba'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rgyas par bya ba'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku la khyab par byas nas// chos kyi
43a8: dbyings thams cad khyab par bya ba'i tshul gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi mtshan ma rnams kyis khyab par byas so/ / nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad khyab par byas nas/ de

43b1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te 'dug go/ / de nas de nyid kyi tshe na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes
43b2: kyi rdo rje'i dbus su rdo rje chos nyid du dmigs nas/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i ye shes phra mo'i byin gyi brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs so// de nas de bzhin gshegs
43b3: pa thams cad kyi rdo rje de las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying po 'di byung ngo // badz+ra nA bI ta thA ga ta hUM/ de nas de byung ma thag tu bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje ye shes phra mo
43b4: 'jug pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skur zhugs nas snying po rdo rje'i dbyings su gyur te gnas so/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje de las ye shes chen po'i snying po 'di
43b5: bzhi byung ngo / / badz+ra Ad ma ka dri D+ha badz+ra aM ku sha ti ShA rA ga badz+ra pra b+hi sha hri da yaM/ a ho badz+ra duSh+Ti/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bsdu ba'i byin gyi rlabs kyi ye shre
43b6: kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / dga' ba chen po ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin chen po rnams so// de
43b7: nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra mo 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi thugs su zhugs te snying po rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag nyid byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so/ / de nas
43b8: rdo rje dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo / / badz+ra rad na ad ma ka/ hri da ya badz+ra sur+ya/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra d+hA dzA gra paM/ hri da ya/ badz+ra ha sa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje'i dbang bskur ba'i ye shes kyi

44a1: phyag rgya dang / 'od chen po'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi re ba rdzogs par byed pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
44a2: kyi dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya sna de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po che'i ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phrams 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rang gi stong ga
44a3: rdo rje snying por zhugs nas rdo rje'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs nas bzhugs so/ / de nas rdo rje'i dbyibs de las snying po 'di bzhi byung ngo // badz+ra pad ma a ma ka/ hri da ya badz+ra ko Sha/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra tsa/
44a4: hrid yaM pra be sha/ badz+ra dzi ha gra hri da ya/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / 'khor lo chen po
44a5: 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi tshig spros pa med pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi ting nge 'dzin to/ / de nas yang
44a6: phyag na rdo rjes rang gi snying po rdo rje thugs ka'i rdo rje las byung nas ye shes phra mor 'jug pa'i tshul gyis rdo rje thugs der zhugs nas rdo rje shin du phra mo'i dbyibs su bdag byin gyis brlabs te bzhugs so/ /
44a7: de nas rdo rje phra mo'i dbyibs de las snying po 'od bzhi byung ngo // sarba badz+ra ad ma ka/ hri da ya badz+ra kA ba tsa/ tiSh+Tha badz+ra rakA hri da ya/ badz+ra muSh+Ti hri da ya/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ye shes kyi
44a8: phyag rgya dang thub dka'i brtson 'grus kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang bdud thams cad kyi 'khor 'doms pa'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'ching ba'i ye shes kyi phyag rgya ste/ de bzhin/

44b1: gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi ting nge 'dzin to// de yang bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes ye shes phra mo'i mtshan mas khyab pa'i tshul gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las byung ste/ byang
44b2: chub sems dpa' phyag na rdo rje'i skur gyur nas de nas yang rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi skur gyur te rang gi phyag mtshan nyid kyi thugs kar bzhag nas/ rdo rje dbyings kyi kyil
44b3: 'khor chen po dgod pa'i tshul gyis zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la gnas nas/ rang gi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin la mnyam par bzhag ste bzhugs so// de nas yang phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
44b4: ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang mngon par shes pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/ / rdo rje phra mo'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di bshad do// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba// chos kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dnga'ang tha
44b5: na/ rdo rje phra me zhes bshad do// de nas dkyil 'khor tshul du ni/ sems dpa' chen po rnams kyang gzhag/ rdo rje'i dbus su sangs rgyas bri// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor rnams su yang // sems dpa' chen po
44b6: rnams bri zhing / / de bzhin thugs kar nyid phyag rgya// ting nge 'dzin du bzhugs pa dang // phyag gnyis rdo rje bcing ba bcings// de nas rdo rje phra mo'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir dgug pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas
44b7: ba yin te dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du zhugs pa la sogs pa'i cho ga rgyas par byas nas/ ye shes kyi phyag rgya lag tu byin nas rang gi sems las su rung bar bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes bslab po//
44b8: lce ni rkan la gzhar byas te// sna yi rtse mor bsam bya ba// rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pas// sems ni mnyam par gzhag par 'gyur// rdo rje phra mo'i bde reg pa'i// mtshan ma gal te byung ba dang // mtshan mde ni

45a1: khyab byab/ / sems na kun du khyab par bya// rnga tsam 'dod par sems khyab nas// khams gsum du yang khyab par 'gyur// de nas de yang bsdu ba ni// rtswa rtse mo bar du yang // de dag
45a2: shin tu mnyam par gzhag/ gang yang rung ste bsgom bya'o// de dag thams cad brtan par 'gyur// ting 'dzin shes rab btags pa'o// de nas de rnams kyi snying po ni 'di yin no// suk+ka badz+ra s+pha raH/ sa
45a3: na bad+ha/ badz+ra kr-id ti// / sems dpa gang gis byams pa ni// mnyam 'gyur ba rtan pa tshan po yis// sems kyis khyab pa'i tshul gyis ni// sems can kun la ngas khyab go// byams pas khyab pa'i
45a4: tshul gyis ni/ / snying rje can ni gang yin pa// sems can kun don ldan pa yis// bsgrub pa yis ni khyab par bya// kun kyang rang bzhin 'odogasal ba// gdod nas dag pa nam mkha' bzhin// chos sam yang na
45a5: chos ma yin/ / bsam pas khyab cing dga' bar 'gyur// gdul dka' ba dang mtshungs 'dra ba// sangs rgyas byang chub stong ma yin// de dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir// btang snyoms chen po bsgom par bya// de la
45a6: snying po ni 'di rnams yin no/ / ma hA me tri s+pha ra Na ma hA ka ru NA s+pha ra Na/ sarba bud d+ha pra mo ha s+pha raN/ sarba satwa sa~M bo d+hA ya// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rjes su dran pa'i ye shes bslab bo//
45a7: nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// 'greng ngam yang na 'dug kyang rung // rdo rje dbyibs ni goms par bya// de bzhin du'ang gnas kun tu// rdo rje phra mo'i sbyor ba yis// mnyam
45a8: par gzhag pas snying gar ni/ / byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom// de lta bu yi rim bzhin du/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// phyag na rdo rje dbyibs chen po// gnas rnams kun du bsgom par bya// rnam pa

45b1: thams cad mchog ldan pa'i/ / sangs rgyas sku ni dus kun du// ci lta ba yi gor ma bzhin// mnyam par gzhag pas bsgom par bya// de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// badz+ra mu khi b+ha ba/ ma hA bo d+hi satwa a
45b2: sha/ badz+ra pA ni d+haR+sha ya swa ru pa/ bud d+ha a nu smr-i t+yA a be sha/ rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// goms par bya ba bdag nyid kyis// zla ba'i dbus su bdag nyid kyis// byang chub sems kyi bsgom pa'i// zla ba'i
45b3: dkyil 'khor dbus su ni/ / bdag nyid rdo rje dbyibs gyur par// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// sems dpa' rdo rje bsgom pa'o// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// bdag nyid snying gar rdo rje sems// bdag nyid
45b4: kyis ni bsgom bya ba/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i bsgom pa'o// rnam pa kun du mchog ldan pa'i// sangs rgyas gzugs su bdag nyid ni// bdag nyid kyis ni bsgom bya ba// sangs rgyas byang chub bsgom pa'o//
45b5: de la snying po ni 'di rnams yin no// sa man+ta b+ha dra a be sha/ badz+ra satwa badz+ra a be sha/ badz+ra satwa sa mA d+hi/ dz+nyA na a be sha ta thA ga to hA// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi gsang ba'i phyag
45b6: rgyu'i ye shes bslab po/ / bdag ni de bzhin gshegs dang mnyam// rdo rje'i tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// sems can thams cad chags par byed// bdag ni rdo rje chen
45b7: por mnyam/ / rdo rje tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam par sbyar// gdon mi za bar 'jig rten 'gugs// bdag nyid rdo rje chos dang mnyam// rdo rje tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni
45b8: mnyam sbyar bas/ / de yis 'jig rten thams cad 'jig/ bdag ni ma lus rdo rjer mnyam// rdo rje tshig tu lan cig brjod// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar bas// las rnams thams cad des bsgrub bo//

46a1: de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis rlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab po// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje'i dbus su bsgom
46a2: bya ba/ / bdag nyid sangs rgyas sku nyid du// des ni sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// de nas rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul sbyar la// snying
46a3: gar rdo rje la sogs 'khod/ / bsgoms nas rdo rje la sogs pas// rang gi dngos grub sbyin par byed// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes
46a4: bslab bo/ / rdo rje bcings pa las byung bar// bcu drug rnams su bshad pa ste// ting nge 'dzin dam tshig mchog/ de rnams kyi ni bcings pa bshad// skyil mo krung 'dug gan rgyal du// g.yas bcus de bzhin
46a5: slar bcug pa/ / snying gar gnas pa bzhi pa ste/ rdo rje sems sogs dkyil 'khor to// dpral bar bshad dang lhag pa dang // phrag pa dang ni dgod par sbyar// khar gzhag snying gar ral gri dang // snying gar rgyas dang
46a6: kha nas dbyung / / skye bo mthong khar gzhag byas la// 'dzub mo gnyis bkug mdun de bzhin// de nas gzhan yang chos kyi phyag rgya bslab par bya'o// tsa~Mk+ki/ gra gra/ ma Ta/ a gra/ tre traM/ oM A~M/ ba ba~M/ tiT/ hrIT/
46a7: kra sha~M/ haha~M/ bab/ bang bang / phaT/ gras/ de nas chos kyi las kyi ye shes phra mo rnams kyi mchog pa shad do// ye shes khu chur dam tshig las// gnyis su byas nas sbyar bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa
46a8: thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa las rtogs pa chen po'i rgyal po'i rdo rje ye shes kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/

46b1: thams cad kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi ye shes kyi byin gyis brlabs pa shes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/
46b2: oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+hA tu a nud tA ra pU dza karma s+pha Na sa ma ye hUM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa mi g.yo bas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje sems dpa'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas/
46b3: khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa a nud ta ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma
46b4: ye hUM/ / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i rin po che 'byung bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdo rje rin po che'i mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas par khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes/
46b5: bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra rad na a nud ta ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hU/ de nas de bzhin gshegs pa tshe tshad med pas de bzhin
46b6: g shegs pa thams cad rdo rje chos kyi mchod pa bla na med pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo na byi byis rlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras
46b7: pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+har+m+ma a nud ta rA pA dzA karma s+pha raN sa ma ye hUM// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa gdon mi za bar grub pas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje las kyi mchod pa bla na med
46b8: pa'i cho ga rgyas pas khyab pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa'i mchog 'di smras pa/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra kar+tha/ a nud

47a1: ta ra pU dza karma s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM/ de nas yang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab
47a2: pa'i las kyi dam tshig gi rdo rje zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par 'azhugs te snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi thugs las bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje de nyid de/ de
47a3: b zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad du khyab pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings kun du rgyas pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa'i mchod pa thams cad kyi rgyan gyi cho ga rgyas pa'i sprin gyi
47a4: rgya mtsho'i lha mo rnams su gyur te byung na/ / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam gyi sprin gyi rgya mtsho rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
47a5: bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi sems chen po bskyed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs mnyes par bya ba dang / kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa bsgrub pa dang / byang chub chen po'i snying por nye bar 'gro ba dang /
47a6: bdud thams cad 'dul ba dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bya ba dang / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor chen por bskyed pa dang /
47a7: khams gsum thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar bya ba dang // dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang / sems can gyi khams ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don du bya ba la sogs pa sangs rgyas
47a8: kyi rdzu 'phrul dang cho 'phrul thams cad bstan nas bzhugs so/ / mchod pa'i sprin rgya mtsho'i lha mo de dag kyang rang gi phyag rgya lag pa gnyis kyis 'dzin cing / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la cho ga bzhin du
