116a5: gsang ba gsang ba yi/ / dngos grub bzhir sgyur sbyin par byed// ji ltar rdo rje'i gsang ba'i sbyin// dus rnams kun tu bcings mi bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i mdo bshad par bya'o// tri grI treHsa/ gra
116a6: d+hIHhaMHpreHde dkreHbi kraHraiH5/ miHgsang ba gsang ba'i khu tshur mchog/ gnyis su byas na las kun byed// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po lnga
116a7: rin po che'i phyag rgya'i gas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba mkhyen pa'i dam tshig 'byung ba'i
116a8: byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas/ / rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM sarbata thA ga ta a b+hi She ka dz+nyA notata ma d+hu/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyagan

116b1: rdorjes rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM badz+ra dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka sa ma ya hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM ma Ni rat+na ad+hi She ka hA
116b2: nahUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM d+harma a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di
116b3: gsungs so/ / oM sarba a b+hi She ka dz+nyA na hU/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyis ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//
116b4: ye shes dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen ye shes zhes bshad de// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad srang bus bre// chos kyi dkyil 'khor
116b5: tshul du ni/ / snying kha'i mtshan mi bri bar bya// de nas dkyil 'khor 'di'i ye shes kyi snying po 'di rnams gsungs so// oM dz+nyA na sarba sid d+hi dz+nyA na hU/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na oM ku sha/ oM maN+Di dz+nyA na
116b6: rA ga/ oM ma NI dzA Na duSh+Te/ oM ma NI dA na duSh+Ti ma Ni hUM/ oM dz+nyA na a b+hi She ka/ oM ma Ni dzA sA d+ya/ oMm dzin dug yos nyi// a Te Ta dwe sa/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na pad ma hUM/ oM ma Ni t+ye ga/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na koSha/ oM d+h+waM
116b7: na ma Ni tsakra/ oM dA na ma Ni b+ha Sha/ oM dz+nyA na ma Ni raSh+Tab ra sha hUM/ oM ma Ni dz+nyA na ni kyai pU dza sa ma ye hUM/ oM ma Na dz+nyA na rak+Sha yi ga tshid pa yog na ga/ de nas yang dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa dzil ba bzhin du
116b8: byas nas slob ma la 'di skad bsgo bar bya'o/ / khyod kyis chos ma mthong ba su la yang ma brjod cig/ khyod dngos grub ma thob par myur bar shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgo la nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi ye

117a1: smye / 'dzin gyis ras mags pa/ / mas chen na / gas ga / na /
117a2: na sa sa ma sa //
117a3: la/ gsos pa/ ma sa thas ma ldang/ nas sun sa dam pa la sa/
117a4: sa// / na
117a5: mnag na ga/ rnam ma pa'i phyogasasas phyogs // rnamam kha byed ba legs mams pa/ sa // /
117a6: A nas lasagagan yon ga lags zhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // norab sags pa ni gsol bar bya// nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// nam mkha'i snying po min
117a7: mnyam par zhigasus pa sgom san lag/ san+da mA ma chis nagasal ga // rnams pa phyugs sa ma phyogs gzhan na// rnamam pa'i stong pa legs sams pa// /
117a8: khas pasdam nas kyang // 'asogs pa na gsal bag ga/ da gi sung ba ni rnams so// yo dran go// da nyis mamathun mdun gtad nyis ca ma k+Sha/ tham

117b1: rdo rje snying po bros nas kyang / snying khar yongs su bsgoms byas pa// gang gicin snying 'phar ba// de tshe grub pas nor ster ro// rdo rje snying po dbral bar ni// bris te rnam par bsgoms nas gyu
117b2: gang che mgo 'dir gyur pa/ / des ni mngon par bang thob bo// rdo rje snying po khar bzhug sa// de nyid du pa sgoms nas kyang // gad na don byed gyur ba// de na des na dag 'gyu 'o// rdo rje mang po bdas
117b3: ga ste bsgoms nas byung / / gang tse ni 'bar gyur ba// de 'bang du snang bar 'gyur// des de dag ga steng poni 'di rnams so// ma d+hid lag N+DI / ma mas kyi/ ga
117b4: ag+ni ga gan me d+ha/ oM hrIn ga ts+tsha Sha wA k+Sha shagaH// rdo rdo stong gi phyug na re// ra mnyam bzhag pas bskam san ni// bdag la gle ba stsal nas gsalal// oM la~M hA nas
117b5: 'khrug/ nam mkha'i snying po dam tshig ni// rab mnyam bzhig pas bcings nas kyang // dbang bskur ba ni gsol btab la// mi yi rangan nas brjod 'thob// rdo rje snying po tong 'dzin du// rab mnyam
117b6: bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni/ / chos bdag stsol zhes gsol btab la// tsi li dadran zhes brjod 'breg// nam mkha'i snying po las kyi mchog/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas ni// rin chen
117b7: thams cad gsol btab la/ / ki li rang na zhes brjod 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po na 'di rnams so// oM a la~M/ oM maM laM/ oM tsa li/ oM ki ma~M/ de nas nor bu ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i
117b8: shes bslab bo/ / nam mkha'i phyogs sam phyogs gzhan du// rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam smad na// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// gzhil rim bris pa bzhis

118a1: rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni/ / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// sdug pa de dang dag
118a2: brtses pa/ / 'jig rten kun gyis de dgar byed// nam mkha' kun gyi rdul dbyibs kyis// rdo rje snying po bsgoms nas ni// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// thams cad 'grub par nges par 'gyur/
118a3: de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di rnams so// A kA sha gu h+ya dz+nyA na sa ma ya hU~M / Shitsita tra gu h+ya dz+nyA na a b+hi Shany+tsi hUM/ pri ya nu smr-i ti dz+nyAn gu h+ya sarba lo ka na rA ga ya n+tu/ sarba guh+ya dz+nyA na sarba sid d+hi me pra yats+tsha hA/
118a4: de nas phyag rgya chen po 'di ji lta ba bzhin bcing bar bya'o// dngos grub kyang de dang 'dra'o// de nas chos kyi dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab bo// rdo rje nor bu ni rdo rje ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
118a5: tshul du gzhag par bya'o/ / de nas chos kyi phyag rgya ni 'di yin no// sA bA ra sar te ka ha da ma ti he ba kan kang ya ma/ de nas mdor na las kyi phyag rgya ni gnas ci bzhin par gzhag par bya'o// de bzhin
118a6: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi brtag pa'i rgyal po chen po las ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhi/
118a7: gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i las kyi dam tshig 'byung ba'i byin gyis rlabs zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa 'di gsungs so// sarba ta thA ga ta kam
118a8: a b+hi ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi las 'byung ba'i rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hU~M kA ra a b+hi She ka/ de nas byang chub sems

118b1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa man ta a b+hi She ka hUM/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spun gyis rang
118b2: go rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so/ / oM sarba d+harma a b+hi She ka rad na/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje sde tshogs kyis rang gi rigs pa dam pa/ 'di gsungs so//
118b3: oM bau shwa a b+hi She b+h+rUM de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi rigs kyi dam tshig 'di gsungs so// de nas rab tu bshad byas/ las kyi dkyil
118b4: 'khor dam pa ste/ / rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra ba la// rin chen dgos pa zhes bshad do// dkyil 'khor chen po'i tshul du ni/ dkyil 'khor thams cad srad bu bre// de yi dbus su tshul bzhin du//
118b5: sangs rgyas sku gzugs gzhag par bya// sems dpa' chen po tshul gyis ni// rin chen mchod pa rnams bri'o// de la de dag gi phyag rgya ni 'di rnams so// oM ma Ni rat+na pU dza gra/ oM sarba aH
118b6: sid d+hi badz+ra rAHa b+hi She kahU~M/ oM ma Ni d+ha sa )/ oM ma Ni rat+na mA kar Sha karma sa ma ye hU~M/ oM ma Ni rad na rA ga ra ti karma pU dza pra ba ta/ oM ma Ni rad ne sA d+hu kAr pU dza sa mas pa
118b7: oM ma hA ma Ni rat+na triSh+TamatwAr sha/ oM ma Ni rat+na mA la pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na sUr+ya lo ka pU dze/ oM ma Ni rat+na d+h+wa dza bad ka pU dze/ a me Ni rat+na a T+TaT+Ta dA ma pU dze/ oM bi ma ma Ni sa mA d+hi sa ma yo hU~M/
118b8: oM sarba t+ya ga nu smi ti sa mA d+he karma ka ri hUM/ oM ma Ni rad na~M tik+Sh+Na sa ma yets+tshin da hU~M/ oM ma Ni rad na tsakra sa ma yau hUM/ oM ma Na~M rad na b+ha Sha b+ha da b+ha da hU~M/ oM ma Ni pa ni g+ha~M oM ma Ni shA ni ng+ge/ mi ga N+Di dan/

119a1: g+ha9/ am lan/ 'du 'ad / a / Ar+ya/ @/ sam+b+ha staH// zung sa sa rmA sa
119a2: d+yai pU dza ya/ oM maN+Di gA d+hU bi pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni rat+na puSh+pe pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni raSh+Tha.a lo ki pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni raHgan d+he pU dza ya/ oM ma Ni ra a~M kuM sha A kAr Sha ya dza oM ma Ni ratA pra shaM r+m+ma/
119a3: ma Ni rat+na s+pho Ta baM/ oM maNi rat+na a be sha aHde nas las kyi dkyil 'khor 'dir cho ga ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par byas nas bcug ste 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// 'di khyod kyis su la yang ma smra shig
119a4: khyod las kyi sgrib pas non nas shi bar gyur ta re zhes bsgol/ las kyi ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje snying po phyag rgya che// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // mchod pa kun gyis mchod na ni//
119a5: sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur// ting nge 'dzin gyis dam tshig mchog/ phyag rgya gang yang rung bcings la// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod na ni// dbang bskur ba ni nges 'thob po// rdo rje snying po ta
119a6: 'dzin du/ / rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rab mchod na// 'gro ba'i dam pa 'dul bar 'gyur// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// sarba
119a7: rgyas thams cad mchod gyur na/ / skad cig tu ni don kun 'thob// de la de dag gi snying po ni 'di nams so// oM rat+na pU dza pa shI ku ru yi ga k+sha / oM hA pU dzas ma pa ma d+hiShiH/ oM rang+ga pU dza ya d+harma nA sha ya thA
119a8: di/ oM rat+na pU dza karma sarba ar+tha yan mes d+ha/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar nas// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod/

119b1: na ni// 'jig rten thams cad des mgur 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya chen po'i ye shes kyis dngos grub dam pa 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// rdo rje rin
119b2: chen bcings nas ni/ / gnas rnams kun du gzhag par bya// rdo rje dgos pa'i tshul du ni// lta 'og go rims ji bzhin bya// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes ni 'di yin te/ trarnga gdang tu sarba rak+Sha sha
119b3: mak+Sha kri ti/ / rdo rje rin chen gnyis byas la// las kyi phyag rgya de bsgrub po// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po las las kyi dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rgyas
119b4: pa rdzogs s+ho/ / / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis rin po che'i phyag rgya zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs nas rang gi rig pa dam pa 'di gsungs so//
119b5: oM badz+ra ratA ni trA~M// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra mA lAM// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje snying pos
119b6: 'phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ / oM ma Ni rang ne/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rdo rje spyan gyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra d+ham rang ne/ de nas byang chub sems dpa'
119b7: chen po rdo rje sna tshogs kyis rang gi phyag rgya 'di gsungs so/ / oM bi shra driSh+Ti/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying pos rang gi nor bu'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bzhi pa'i dkyil
119b8: 'khor 'di gsungs so/ / de nas rab tu bshang bya ba// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ste// phyag rgya bzhi pa'i tshul du ni// dkyil 'khor yongs su btag par bya// de nas ji lta ba bzhin du bcug nas

120a1: bsgrub par byaste/ / khyod kyis sprul yang ma zla shig ces bsgo bar bya'o// de nas ye shes paste u0f7fste// rdorje chen te 'dzin // rje can ngas ras ni// dbul
120a2: ba rab tu bzhag nan/ / dngos grub thams cad thob par 'gyur// de nas de dag gi snying po ni 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra hatan lams stegs pang kyi sa gyu pa sa tha~M/ de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bslab par bya
120a3: ste/ khyo 'am yang na sdug pa 'am// bud med dang ni skyes pa'ang rung // dpral ba gnyis ni smad nas kyang // gtugs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de la de bsgrub pa'i snying po ni 'di yin te/ oM badz+ra rat+nas
120a4: khaM bad+yA d+ha ra ba/ pra yan+d+re shIg+h+raM a b+hi Shiny+tsi ya hi ha ha ha u0f7f/ de nas phyag rgya bzhi bslangab po// dngos grub thams cad kyang de bzhin no// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying
120a5: bos den thams cad grub pa zhes bya ba'i snying po 'di gapungs so/ / oM badz+ra ma Ni d+ha rA sarba ar+tha sid d+hi me pra yats+tsha to// b+ha ga bAn badz+ra rat+na hU~M/ de nas dkyil 'khor 'di yin te// de nas rab tu bshad bya ba//
120a6: dkyil 'khor chen po dam pa ste// dngos grub kyi ni dkyil 'khor ni// ji bzhin par ni bri bar bya// de nas 'dir ye shes gsang ba'i phyag rgya'i ye shes bslab par bya'o// gzugs la sogs pa'i 'dod
120a7: pa'i rnams/ / chags par gyur pa'i bde ba ni// sangs rgyas la yang phul gyur na// las kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur// de nas phyag rgya bzhi'i ye shes bsgrub par bya'o// ras la sogs pa la yang
120a8: sems dpa' 'am phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor bris te bsgrub par bya'o/ / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad cig tu 'dus nas mtshu nags gsogs shi nis da / lags rdo rje sems

120b1: dpa' khyod/ / rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos khyod legs pa ste/ rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa// rdo rje/
120b2: theg pa blar med// mdo sde 'di ni legs par bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig ces bya ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal chen po du
120b3: rdzogs s+ho/ / // bam po brgyad pa// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dpon nyid kyi gargyas pa'i drud 'di gsungs so// de la re shig dang
120b4: por ni phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rgya che// bcings nas mkha' dbyings thams cad du// sangs rgyas sku gzugs byin brlabs la// rang gi snying du
120b5: bcug nas ni/ / ci ste 'dod na tshe 'di la// zhi ba dam pa mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas nyid 'thob des 'di bsgrub// ci ste mi 'dod dngos grub bzhin// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas kyang // de nyid chen po chog
120b6: re rer/ / brjod nas kun dang ldan par yang // thams cad bdag ni yin bsgoms na// ci ste 'dod na bdag nyid des// de bya gzin na dge ba yi// go 'phang tshe 'di nyid la 'thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gong
120b7: ma bzhin/ / de nas dam tshig phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin 'grub pa// de ltar bdag ces bsgoms na ni// sangs rgyas dang ni gzi chen 'thob// mi 'dod dngos grub gong
120b8: ma bzhin/ / de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ chos rnams thams cad rang bzhin gyis// dag ces brjod na nges par yang // sangs rgyas dang ni gzi can 'gyur// mi 'dod do/
120b9: grub gong ma bzhin// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de/ thams cad kyi ni kun dag par// las rnams thams cad sbyangs na ni// sangs rgyas gzi can thob ci ste// mi 'dod

121a1: dngos grub gong ma bzhin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dam pa'i dngos grub rnams so// de nas phyag na rdo rjes rang gi rig pa dam pa'i dngos grub kun gyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// dengos
121a2: grub ldan skyong sangs rgyas kyi/ / blags ni sems can kun don dra// phyag rgya chen pong bsgrub na// tshe 'di nyid la sang sa rgyas 'grug/ de na mtshig gi phyog rgya ngam pa'i dngos grub sa rgyu pag
121a3: ro/ / phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni/ ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin grub pa// de bzhin bdag ces bsgom sa ni ni// skad cig gis ni gzi chen thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyung ba shad do/ yig
121a4: med pa'i chos rnams la/ / rab tu spros pa yod min te// chos mchog 'di ni brjod byed cing // bsgoms na gzi can nyid du 'gyur// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyur bshad de/ dge ba
121a5: 'am yang na mi dge pa'i/ / gang gis las rnams byas pa ni// rgyal ba rnams la phul byas na// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes pad pa'i
121a6: rigs dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la dang por ni phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ba shad de// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid kyis dag/ mu stegs can gyis smad gyur la// de la rags
121a7: ba'i chos 'di ni/ / zag pa chel 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te// ting 'dzin bstan pa'i tshul gyis ni/ khyams pa chen po bsgoms nas kyang // chog
121a8: bzhin ldan khyab byas na/ / skad cig gcig gis gzi can 'thob// de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// 'dod chags ngo bo nyid dag ces// smra bar gyur pa'i tshul 'di ni// 'a

121b1: chags pha rol phyin rnyed de/ / skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thob// de nas las kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// bdag gi lha dang reg pa dang // mnyam pa dang ni dran pa'ang rung // sems can
121b2: rnams ni thams cad kyi/ / sdug bsngal kun gyi mthar phyin 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes nor bu'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la
121b3: phyag rgya chen po dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ rdo rje snying po rnga bzhin du/ sangs rgyas kun dbang bdag gyur ces// bsgoms par bya ba rnam bsgoms nas// skad cig gis ni gzi can 'thog/
121b4: de nas dam tshig gi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// nam mkha'i snying po 'dra bar na// sems can kun gyi re ba kun// yongs su rdzogs par byed gyur cig/ skad cig gis ni gzi can
121b5: 'thob/ / de nas chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// bdag nyid las ni phyung nas kyang // nor byin rab tu dga'abyed cing // chos byung phyag rgya sma ni na// gzi can tshe 'di nyid la 'thob//
121b6: de nas las kyi phyag rgya'i dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad de// dbul po rnams la phan pa'i phyir// nor bsgrub pa la brtson ldan na// gzi can 'gyur ro tsa ste yang // mi 'dod dngos grub gong ma bzhin
121b7: rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya rnams kyi sangs rgyas dang / byang chub sems dpa' dam pa rnams kyi dngos grub thob pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'o// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdza
121b8: rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dacig gi dngas su rjid 'di yin te// gang gis 'dod la

122a1: skams zhugs pa/ / de la 'dod pas sbyong bar byed// sangs rgyas phyag rgya ngan pa la// ye shes das tshig yin par bshad// de nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang pa rgyag gangs du
122a2: rlung bshad de/ 'dod pa rnams la chags bral min// dam tshig mdzes pa chen po 'di// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs dag pa// rgyal bas kyang ni 'da' mi mdzad// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi
122a3: hU~Md ni 'di yin te/ / sems can don du khro man yang // khre bo chen por ra on/ rdo rje'i rigs ni chen po y-i// das tshig 'di ni 'da' dka'o// del pad mo'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te/
122a4: bzhin dag par shes nas kyang // de yi dgos pa de byed de// pad mo'i rigs ni chen po yi// dam tshig 'da' bar dag/ 'a ba'o// de nas nor bu'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi ngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'dri yin no// chu ngapa yang
122a5: namang yang rung / / ci tsam nus pa nyid du ni// sbyin pas nyim stongs par ni// bya min dam tshig 'di yin no// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi ngos su gyig sa da do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag
122a6: nardorjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi sdud 'di gsungs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin te// sang sa
122a7: rgyas chos nas grags so zhes/ / brjod na chos nyid yi ge ni// sangs rgyas chos kyi phyag // ye shes mchog gi tshul yin no// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi
122a8: rgyud ni 'di yin no/ / 'dod chags las ni dag pa'i chos// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin byed// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ni// dngos grub byed pa'i mchog 'di'o// de la rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dngos gru

122b1: rgyud du'ang yin no/ / sangs rgyas bka' na sbyang ba dang // sems can drang bar bya ba byor// de la khro bar mgyur yang // ma bus bdud byas dngangos grub 'thab// da la pad ma rags kyu chos kyi dngos grub kyi hrung na
122b2: 'di yin no/ / pad mo chu yis mi chags pa// de bzhin 'dod pas ma chags zhes// smra zhing dgos min byed kyang ni// sdig pas gos par mi 'gyur ro// de la nor bu rigs kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud na 'di
122b3: yin no/ / sbyin dang mnyam pa'i chos med do// sgrub par byed cing smra ba ni// nor bu'i rigs ni chen po'i chos// mi 'dod dngas grub gong ma bzhin// rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
122b4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di sa
122b5: te/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas dang // byang chub sems dpa' nyid rnams su// ji bzhin du ni btul nas su// las kyi phyag rgya'i mchog 'grub sbyin// de la de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi
122b6: dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ / dus bzhi yi ni tshul dag tu// mchod pa rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rtag tu ldan pa rnam bzhir yang // byas nas las rnams bsgrub par bya// de la rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dngos
122b7: grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ / ma rungs sems can gnod bya'i phyir// dgos pa gang dang gang de byed// las kyi rdo rje rigs kyis 'di// dngos grub thams cad rab sbyin byed// de la pad mo rigs kyi las
122b8: kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no/ / 'jigs pas gzir la mi 'jigs sbyin// ji bzhin par ni 'dul de bzhin// 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi las// sangs rgyas dngos grub sbyin pa'o// de la nor bu rigs kyi

123a1: las kya dngos chub kyi rlung ni 'di yin no/ / sangs rgyas dbang bstsur de bzhinan// lus can rnams la sbyin pa dang // dbabams pa rdzogs da pa'i// las don ng+gAl ga/
123a2: thams cad kyilas kyi dngos grub kyi tshig rgyas pa'i rgyung ngo // de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams nam na ma
123a3: na ma ma ldanam yangs rgyas rnams kyi chos nyid dgos/ / 'dri na sangs rgyas sangs rgyas nyid// gzhan la sangs kyis 'gyur ba med// de la
123a4: ring bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ phyag rgya chen po bsgoms na ni// dngos grub thams cad bsgrub par bya// 'di ni de bzhin gshegs rigs kyi/
123a5: chos nyid dngos grub dam pa 'thob// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos nyid kyimigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// phyag rgya chen po'i tshul du ni// dam tshig mchog ni bcings nas kyang // las rnams thams cad
123a6: bsgrubs na ni/ / rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// dal 'dri ni pad mo'i rigs kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi phyag brgya'i tshul gyis ni// chos kyi phyag rgya rjod byed cing // rdo rje chos ni rlo
123a7: rnams kyi/ / chos nyid du ni 'dis bsgrubs pa'o// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi chos nyid ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// las kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// las kyi rdo rje snying khar gzhag/ chos nyid 'di
123a8: dge bsgoms na ni/ / las kyi chos nyid 'thob par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi chos nyid kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs

123b1: pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin te/ rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// zla ba'i rdo rje tshul
123b2: gyis ni/ / ji ltar de gnyis kha dog shes// de ltar 'jig rten de shes te// mdog la dag dang dkar 'od gsal// chags la dmar dang dam ser khro// shes nas kha dog ji bzhin pa'i// de yi bdag nyid nyid du 'gyur// de la 'di
123b3: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud dang / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa'i// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni// rang gi lus la ji ltar shes// da ltar 'gro ba'i yid shes so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs
123b4: kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ / nam mkha' 'am ni phyogs gzhan du// dbos par gyur nas dkyil 'khor ni// ji lta bur yang mthong 'gyur la// de lta bur ni yid shes so// de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs kyi ye shes
123b5: kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud dang/ nam mkha' 'am sa phyogs phra mo 'am// yi ge phreng ba mthong 'gyur na// mdor na kha dog ci 'dra bar// shes pa de 'drar des sems shes// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi mni yid ma yind do//
123b6: 'jig rten kun la bltas nas kyang // ji la bur ni snang 'gyur cing // mthong bar gyur na 'dra bar// 'gro ba'i sems ni shes par bya// de gnyis snyoms par thugs nas ni// 'gro ba dang ni 'ong ba dang // byeng ba dang ni 'chag
123b7: 'ang rung / / ji ltar mthong bar ltar rtogs// snyoms par zhugs nas bsams na ni// sems can gang dang gang yin pa'i// de dang de ni de bzhin du// sems can thams cad rtogs par 'gyur shes bcom ldan 'das rje
123b8: rje dzin pas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi ye shes kyi cog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi

124a1: sun mag ga smras/ su sa// sa sa
124a2: dang kun sa la / mar bye // kyil la la pa smra pa/ ma ga / stsa
124a3: gyur ra / / de la din de rigs kyi ngas zab kyi ye shes kyi kyang // des m+bu'i byibs gyur pa yi// dubus na rdzo ba sangs da nan// gas mas gdus gyu / na pa
124a4: sa yin te/ / de nyid pa nim la ru ba'i/ 9/ sa kya ni lags par 'gyur// de la dzi ni na gas kyi gas kyi sa zla sh+tsa chu dang // dam
124a5: dbyigs gzhanas/ / kyi ma pa bzhin dri ma pa// za kyil la ba // mthang ngas gyu myur sna cig// rnamams rmugs sems mnasapa// kyil ba sas pa//
124a6: tha bzhin // dug cid kyis ni ma nam na napa/ rigs thams ca kyi ngas gyu kyi migs kyi nag rgyas 'i rgyud // nas kya bsam sna pa sems da na pa b+hags
124a7: gshegs papas kyi gas kyim pa gas sa kyi gas kyi phyag kya byung ga po pa/ / ngam dzi da gshegs pa rnams ga pa 'i
124a8: n+ya da/ rjemam sa dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// mam thun de bzhin gshegs rnam pa dang / byang nab sems dpang rnams pazhims pa// de bzhin lam las zung mamang nano// de la 'dzin bzhin gshegs so

124b1: rigs kyi mngon par shes pa rnams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya rtsa// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// sgrub pas chog 'di yis ni// mngon shes ldani thob par 'gyur// de la 'din
124b2: 'phrul gyi spyan gyis ye shes kyi dngos grub yin no/ / phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// mig gi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // gang yang rung ba des bsams na// shin du ring ba'ang mthong 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan rdo
124b3: sems dpa' gsungs/ / phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// rna ba'i rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // des ni dgos pa gang bsams kyang // shin du ring na gnas thob zhes// bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs//
124b4: phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// yid kyi rnam shes bskyed nas kyang // sems can gang la des brtags na// de yi sems ni des shes 'gyur// phyag rgya chen por zhugs nas ni// bdag gam sems can gang yang
124b5: rung / / yid kyis bltas nas gar skyes pa// gzugs ni de yis shes par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de nas rdzu 'phrul gyi cho ga shes pa'i dngos grub ni 'di yin no// phyag rgya chen
124b6: po bcings nas kyang / / rdzu 'phrul gang dang gang 'dod pa// de nas gang yang rung bar ni// ting 'dzin gyis ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi
124b7: mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / khams gsum rnam rgyal mchog tu ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob po// khros nas dgos pa tham
124b8: cad ni/ / lta 'og rim pa ji bzhin bya// rdzu 'phrul mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes kun bdag nyid du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi mngon par she

125a1: pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgya'i mchog/ rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo// lha 'og go rims ji
125a2: bzhin du/ / cho ga bzhin du 'dod pas chags// 'phrul gyi mig la sogs tshul gyis// mngon shes thams cad thob 'gyur zhes// bcom ldan 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi
125a3: mngon par shes pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / don kun grub pa'i phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings na ni// cho ga 'dis ni sgrub pa pos// mngon par shes pa lnga 'thob bo// lta 'og rim pa ji bzhin du/
125a4: 'phrul gyi mig las sogs tshul gyis// sangs rgyas rnams la mchod byas la// mngon shes lnga ni des 'thob po// zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mngon
125a5: par shes pa'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi
125a6: rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ni 'di yin no// bden pa'i rjes su 'jug pa yi// tshig gis mna' ni 'dor byed cing // bden pa chen po bsrungs na ni//
125a7: myur du sangs rgyas nyid thob po// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs
125a8: 'byung ba'i dam tshig la ni mna' bor la/ / rdo rje'i bden pa bsrungs na ni// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bden pa'i dang

125b1: grub kyi rgyud do/ / ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// shin tu 'di las 'da' bar dka'// rdo rje 'dzin la mna' dod cing // bden pa 'di la bsrung bar bya zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsung so//
125b2: de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ci ste dngos grub mchog 'dod na// pad me chen po rigs mchog gi/ pad mo chos la mna' 'dor zhing // bden pa'i dam tshig bsrung bar bya zhes bco
125b3: ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi bden pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'di las shin tu 'da' dka' bar// sangs rgyas chos la mna' mdor zhing // bden pa mchog 'di gsungs
125b4: na ni/ / dbang bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas mchod pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mna'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems
125b5: dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud//
125b6: sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod nas de yi 'og tu ma bsgrubs pas// rigs kun gyi ni phyag rgya rnams// nyid kyis bcings nas dam chag 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so// de la 'od
125b7: ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / su rad ta s+t+waM zhes brjod na// de nyid skul ba'i bdag nyid che// ma bsgrubs par yang phyag rgya kun// nyid kyis bcings na 'grub
125b8: par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das dam tshig chen po'i de kho na nyid kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// hU~M zhes bya ba gcig tsam gyis// mdor na phyag rgya thams cad

126a1: ni/ / bdag gam yang na gzhan yang rung // nyid bcings 'ching du bcug kyang rung // de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sarba shud d+hA zhes brjod na// bdag gar
126a2: yang na gzhan dag gis/ / bud med chags la sogs ldan na/ thams cad du ni grol mi 'gyur// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi cig ni yo nyid kyi nga thab kyi rgud do// oM zhes bya bas mdor bsdun// phyag rgya thams cad 'grub/
126a3: 'gyur te// 'jig rten kun gyi mchog nyid kyi// rang 'byung nyid la mchod par 'gyur// rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gi de kho na nyid kyi dngos grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po
126a4: phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi phyag rgya'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di yin te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dran byed cing // sangs rgyas
126a5: phyag rgya bcings nas ni/ / sangs rgyas byang chub brtan par yang // bsgrubs na myur du 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// bcings
126a6: sa ro yi mdun du yang / / rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni// shin tu myur bar dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// dam tshig gi ni mchog bcings
126a7: rdo rje sems dpa' bsgoms na ni/ / nyi rim du ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// chos kyi phyag rgya bcings nas kyang // 'jig rten
126a8: mgon po bsgoms na ni/ / nyi rim du ni dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po'i ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi phyag rgya bcings nas ni// rdo rje snying po bsgoms na ni// nyi rim du

126b1: ni dngos grub 'thob/ / rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grubasgrub pa'i rgyud 'di
126b2: gsung so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// bdag nyid dang ni mdung du yang // sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa bsgom// de nas
126b3: ngam thag tu 'grub ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa'i rgyud do// rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshul gyis ni// 'dod pa
126b4: bdag ces bsgobs nas kyang / / phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs na ni// grub pa'i mchog ni kun bsgrubs pa'o zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad sgru
126b5: pa'i rgyud do/ / bdag nyid nyid kyis rdo rje dbyibs// rab mnyam bzhag pas sgom byed cing // phyag rgya thams cad bcings na ni// de ma thag tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes
126b6: gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad ma'i rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ye shes kun 'byung dngos grub kyi// pad mo chen po'i rigs la gnas// bdag nyid kyis ni bdag nyid nyid// pad pa'i dbyibs su bsgom par
126b7: byazhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub thams cad kyi sgrub pa'i rgyud do// nor bu rin chen 'od zer 'bar// bdag nyid nyid kyis bsgoms na ni//
126b8: nor bu chen po'i rigs mchod na// kun las 'byung ba'i dngos grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i sacho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems

127a1: dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi brlabs kyi phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi dngos
127a2: grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje dbyings dbang phyug rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // snying la mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// bzhag na sangs rgyas byin rlob po zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so//
127a3: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyud yin no// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// sems dpa'i rdo rje dam byas la// snying kha mdzod spumagrin pa dang // spyi bor bzhag na byin gyis rlob ces
127a4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi byin gyis brlab pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje hU~M gi phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang // snying kha mdzod spu mgrin sde
127a5: bor/ / bzhag na nyid du byin gyis rlob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gtso bos gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi byin gyis brlabs pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje pad mo dam byas
127a6: la/ / snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po tang
127a7: 'dzin gyis/ / rdo rje nar bu che bcings la// snying kha mdzod spu mgrin spyi bor// byin gyis brlab phyir gzhag par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi byin gyi brlab pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i
127a8: rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dbang bskur ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i dbang bskur

127b1: ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / rin chen rdo rje bcings nas ni// dpral bar rab tu gzhag byas na// rgyal ba rdo rje rin chen gyis// dbang bskur bar ni nga 'gyur ro zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis gsungs so//
127b2: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbyings dbang la sogs pa// sangs rgyas phyag rgya mdun nas ni// brtsam pa byas nas ngos bzhir yang // phreng ba nyid kyis
127b3: dbang bkur gyur/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rags kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje dbang gi phreng ba ni// bcings nas dpral bar gzhag na yang // phreng ba'i dbang ni de yin no// rdo rje rnams med dbang 'gyur/
127b4: de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chos kyi rdo rje bcings nas kyang // mgo bor bzhag ste de dbang bskur// sangs rgyas kyis ni 'jig rten gyi// dbang phyug gis ni dbang bskur ro zhes
127b5: bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dbang bskur ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje rin chen myu gu bcings// dpral bar bzhag ste nges dbang bskur// sangs rgya
127b6: kyis ni mchod pa yi/ / dbang phyug tu ni dbang bskur 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chenapo/
127b7: gan dzaHsa de pa'ad gshegs pa thabs ca u0f7fta nge 'dzin b+ha sa grub rgyu di gsus so// de la 'dzin bzhin gshegs pa mi yas ni ti ting nge 'dzin kyang dngas grub kyi rlung ngo // rgyal bcan
127b8: rnam par ni/ / phyag rgya mnyam par bzhag par bcings// zlos shing sngags kyi rigs pa ni// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin

128a1: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// ting 'dzin rdo rje chos kyis kyang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// zlas pas myur dgrub
128a2: par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi ting nge'i dzin gyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags las ni khyod phyung ste// bdag ni khro bo yin bsgom
128a3: nas/ / snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs rnams// myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rags kyi ting 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud
128a4: do/ / 'jig rten dbang po rig zlos pas// byams pas dgongs pa'i tshul gyis ni// snying po la sogs bsgrubs na yang // dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzugs
128a5: dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nam mkha'i kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// rab mnyam bzhag par bsgoms na yang // snying po phyag rgya sngags rigs
128a6: rnams/ / bsgrubs na kun du 'gro bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems
128a7: dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos
128a8: grub kyi rgyud do/ / rab mnyam bzhag pas dang por ni/ bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la// de nas dngos grub 'dod pa yis// bsgrubs na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis

128b1: gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// gas ba'i mchod pa rnam ban yis// gsang ba'i mchong ba brjod byed cing // dag dbul ba la sogs pa yi/ mchod
128b2: pa byas na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa / sa gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo rdo rje mchod chen po// khro bo gsang brjod byed cing // wa
128b3: bo'i khu mur rab sbyar na/ / myur du bdag gi rigs 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad ma rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mdo sde zab cing rgya che ba'i//
128b4: yul rnams legs par brjod nas kyang // yid dang ngag gis phul na ni// dngos grub myur du 'thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'dzin tshi/
128b5: bu rigs kyis mthod pa'i dngos grub kyi chung // gdugs dang 'phan dang rgyal mtshan gyis// rgyal po'i mchod pas mchod byed cing // sbyin pa thams cad byinan ni// nor bu'i rigs ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom
128b6: ldan 'das rdo rje snying po gsungs so/ / nyid la byin gyis brlabs sogs ldan// rdo rje sems dang 'dra bar 'gyur// cho 'phrul rnam pa bzhi yis ni// rdo rje sna tshogs ting 'dzin gyis// dngos grub thams cad 'grub par
128b7: 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi byin gyis brlab pa dang / dbang bskur ba dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / mchod pa rnams kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems
128b8: dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mngon par shes pa'i ye shes

129a1: kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud yin no/ / lus la sangs rgyas ting 'dzin ni// 'di ni bde gshegs nyid mngon shes// de ni rab tu rtogs nas ni// sangs rgyas pa sa su lagams rgyas da mig sa ga dod //
129a2: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'phrul gyi mig sogs mngon shes ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // mngon shes ldan bdag gyur na// dngos grub
129a3: mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro bo mngon shes bskyed nas ni// rab mnyam
129a4: bzhag pas bsgoms na yang / / mngon shes lngani bdag gyur nas// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni ying rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shA
129a5: kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / 'dod chags mngon shes bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lnga ni bdag 'gyur nas// dag pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rje/
129a6: rje spyan gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// mchod pa'i mngon shes bskyed nas kyang // rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// mngon shes lnga
129a7: yang bdag gyur nas/ / dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad mngon par shes pa'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas
129a8: byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa'i thams cad kyi rigs kyi byang chub kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi nga chu kyi legs kyi sa

129b1: grub kyi rgyud do/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bdag gis sangs rgyas dran byed cing // sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das
129b2: kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// phyag rgya chen por sgom byed cing // byang chub chen po'i
129b3: ye shes 'di/ / bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro
129b4: bo'i rgyal po'i ting 'dzin gnas/ / lag pas dam tshig mchog bcings la/ byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di
129b5: ni pad mo rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug ting 'dzin gnas// de bzhin chos kyi phyag rgya bzlas// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub
129b6: thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje snying po'i ting
129b7: 'dzin gnas/ / las kyi phyag rgya las legs byed// byang chub chen po'i ye shes 'di// bsgoms na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams
129b8: cad kyi byang chub chen po'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsung so// de la/

130a1: di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// nyid kyi sangs rgyas byang chub phyir// sems can don rnams rab byed cing // sangs rgyas rjes su dran gyur nas// sangs rgyas thams//
130a2: cad mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chags pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mnyes par bya ba gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// ji ltar yul dang ldan 'gyur nas//
130a3: sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed ces/ rdo rje sems dpa' sgom byed cing // de nyid bskul na myur bar ni// mnyes par 'gyur ba des 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni
130a4: rdo rje rigs kyi mnyes par byed pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba dang // sems can don ni sbyang pa'i phyir/ rngam pas mngon spyod byas na ni// rdo rje rnams ni mnyes par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan
130a5: 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad mo rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// chags pa kun du blta ba dang // byams dang snying rjes chos smra dang // mi 'jigs kun
130a6: sbyin byed pa rnams/ sangs rgyas kun gyis mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// dbang bskur ba ni rab sbyin dang / nor
130a7: bos gos rab tu sbyin byed cing / / de yang sangs rgyas don du sbyor// 'di ni sangs rgyas mnyes par byed ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub
130a8: kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs

130b1: kyi dbang bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / de ltar nam dag bde sbyin pa// 'dod chags la ni brnyes mi bya/ sems can kun gyi don du brtson// 'di ni sangs rgyas dbang du byed ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so//
130b2: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod ston bde ba'i bdag nyid kyis/ swa ra tA trUM zhes smra zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' bsgrubs na ni// de nyid bskul na dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom
130b3: ldan 'das kun du bzang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs rgyas bka' ni sems can rnams// dag bya lus can skyabs sbyin dang / sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir/
130b4: bsang na yang ni dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba sa gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// pad mo 'dab ma kha 'byed cing / 'dod chags dag la kun rtog
130b5: la/ / gdul ba'i phyir ni chags byed cing // 'dod par byed pa dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'gas pa kun du kun das gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dbang du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sangs
130b6: rgyas thams cad dbang bsur phyir/ / rdo rje rin chen nyin re rer// spyi bor bzhag skye dbang bskur na/ sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dbang
130b7: du bya ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
130b8: gsang pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sems can kun don ma mthong zhing // sangs rgyas de nyid ma sbyangs la// yid dang ngag dang lus kyis ni// bas na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams

131a1: u0f7f/ cad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi chud do// dngos grub thams cad mthob la// rigs rnams kyang nim brtson ning / rdo rje kun du brtags nas ne/ sang na dngas
131a2: grub bur du thob cas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i dades grub kyi rgyud do// ma rungs mi btul khri med cing // de bzhin sems can mi 'dul la// bdag nyid sdug bsngal 'thon
131a3: byed na/ / hU~M zhes bya bas gsang bar bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi gsang pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// snying rje med cing byams med la// sems can ma tshungs mi stong ni
131a4: bdag nyid kyis ni bslus na yang / / bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud
131a5: ro/ / mi gtong ba dag la nor med cing // nor stor ba dang gnod byed la// dbul por 'gyur la sems can rnams// bsad na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das re ba thams cad skong bas gsungs so// ba cig
131a6: gis ni sangs rgyas kyi/ / rnal 'byor mthob gsad bcug na/ de dag drang bar bya ba'i phyir// bdag gi dngos grub sbyin par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du bzang pos gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyigs
131a7: ba'i dngas grub kyi chog rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i phyag rgya'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
131a8: gshegs pa'i bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sems can thams cad mi gtong zhing // rtag tu sangs rgyas mchod bdag nyid// rtag par sangs rgyas yid la byed// 'di ni bsrung ba rmad kyi mchog ces

131b1: sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i mtshan tsam zhig/ lan cig tsam yang brjod gyur na//
131b2: 'di ni bsrung brtag chen po// skad cig dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// rigs dang rgyud kyis chog mi
131b3: shes/ / 'jig rten gsum rgyal bdag nyid kyi// rdo rje hUM la mos byed pa// 'di ni bdag nyid gzhan la bsrung zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub
131b4: kyi rgyud kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags dag cing byams pa che// thams cad la ni mi 'jigs sbyin// 'jig rten dbang gi mtshan zlos pa// bsrung ba 'di ni rmad du che zhes bcom ldan rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni
131b5: nor bu rigs kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sangs rgyas sems can gtor byed par/ ci nus par ni sbyor byed cing // nyi ma stongs par mi bya bar// bsrung ba dang ni rmad kyi mchog ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bsrung
131b6: bas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi bsrung ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das de
131b7: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi rgyu 'di ba rnas par gsol/ / gang gis sems can thams cad brtag pa thams cad kyi dbang zug tu gyur nas rtogs par bgyi ste// myu du than med pa yang dag par
131b8: rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i slad du'o/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// phyag na rdo rje legs par bshad pas nged kyis blangs

132a1: shing byin gyis brlabs kyis legs so legs so/ / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin te// rdo rje theg
132a2: pa bla na med/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo sde 'di ni legs bshad pa// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod
132a3: legs te/ / rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las brtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po
132a4: phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la dang po 'dir ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud do// sangs rgyas
132a5: byang chub ting nge 'dzin/ / rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// byang chub bde bas thob par 'gyur// bsams nas de ni rtogs par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs
132a6: so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dam pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems dpa' rdo rje snying khar bcings// nga yi chung ma khyod sdug pa// brtan par gyur cig ces
132a7: smras nas/ phyag rgya thams cad bsgrub bya ste/ cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// rang gi las rnams ma grub kyang // gsang ba'i chung ma zhes smras na// shin du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das sems
132a8: dpa' rdo rjes gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs dam pa gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi chud do// ji lta ba bzhin bsrubs na yang // dngos grub thob par mgyur na// hUM ga phyag rgyas gas dan ni// skrag ste dngos grub sbyin

132b1: par byed ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi dngos grub dam pa'i gsang ba'i rgyud do// ting 'dzin phyag rgya bcings nas kyang / rdo rje
132b2: blta bas bltas nas kyang / / bdag gi chung ma'am gzhan chung ma// sdug pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo 'dod pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs dam pa'i dngos grub gsang
132b3: ba'i rgyud do/ / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// bde ba'i mchog ces smras byed cing // sangs rgyas kun la nyid dbang po// phul na myur du dngos grub 'gyur ces bcom ldan 'das nor bu bzhed pas gsungs so// rigs
132b4: dam pa thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de
132b5: la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / sa ma ya s+t+waM zhes brjod cing // bud med kun la chags byas la// sems can don gyis mi skyo na// nges par sangs rgyas des mnyam
132b6: so zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// 'dod chags la ni brnyas mi bya// bud med kun dang brtse byed pa/
132b7: rdo rje rnams kyi gsang dam tshig/ 'di ni bsrung na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// gsod pa
132b8: 'jig rten thams cad gsod/ / lus dang ngag la dam dgyes pa// 'jig rten rnam par sbyangs nas ni// dam pa'i dngos grub sbyin pa'o// zhes bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas gsung so//

133a1: de la 'di ni pang mo rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// dag pa'i bdag nyid 'dod chags dag/ mu stegs rnal 'byor ma dag la// dag pa'i bdag nyid dam tshig ni// bsrungs na dngos
133a2: grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje snying po ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje nor
133a3: bu sngar bcings la/ / ma rungs rnams kyi nor phrogs ni// dam tshig dngos grub smin par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
133a4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gyo sa gru ba gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dngos grub gsang /
133a5: ba'i rgyud do// chos rnams rang bzhin dag par ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms nas kyang // dgos pa thams cad byas nas kyang // sangs rgyas pa yi dngos grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis
133a6: gsus ga/ dal 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngos thab gsang pa'i rgyud do// sems can can la chags byed cing / sbrul la sgru bar mthar pa// bud med dka' ba'i dag pa ni// gsung tshig dngas
133a7: mas ga gags sa/ / la da ngas mags rgyu nga/ di pa gas / zla dzin / 2
133a8: bas pa/ / rabatu bar ba'i rdo rjes bskye// dam pa' dengs grub sbyin pa'i nas bcom ldan 'das dam che gdas pas gsungs sa// des 'di ni padam rigs kyis chas kyi dngas thub gas

133b1: rgyud de/ rje bla ma'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje chos kyi ting 'dzin gyis// bung ma kun dang brtse byed cing // chos kyi dngos gru' thob par 'gyur shes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs
133b2: so/ / de la 'di na nor bu'i rigs kyi chos kyi dngas grub gsang pa'i byung ngo // dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyar la// re ba thams cad yongs bskangs nate/ bud med dam ni sdug pa yi// dngos grub bla med thob par
133b3: 'gyung zhes bcom ldan 'das dzang rin pa rjes gsungs sa/ / gas thams cad kyi chos kyi dngos ba gas ba'i byung de// de nas byang chu ba sems dpa'i chen pa phyagan rdza rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams
133b4: cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'dri ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rjes sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran
133b5: bsgoms la/ / 'ad med lags kyi phra gar thugs// bud med rnams ni dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi sa
133b6: grub gsang ba'i rgyang ngo / / rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// bu gnas ni de bzhin zhugs// bud med lus su legs khyab byas// sems med pa yang mgu bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dgyes pas gsungs
133b7: so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// dza rje nA gi phyag rgya ni// rab mnyam bzhag pas bcings nas kyang / khros nas zu gar zhugs na ni// yid kyis de ni dbab par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das
133b8: rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so/ / de la 'di na pad mo rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// chos kyi las kyi phyag rgya ni// bcings nas pad mo'i ting 'dzin gyis// bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// thams cad

134a1: kyang ni bsrungs par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad mos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// las kyi rdo rje nor bur bcings/
134a2: bu gar bcug na bud med rnams// nyid du phab nas gar byed 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje rin po ches gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems
134a3: dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor lo dag pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i
134a4: rgyud de/ / chos kyi 'khor lo 'dra bar ni// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor bri bya zhing // phyag rgya bud med rnams kyis bskor// de ni sangs rgyas gzhag par bya// gsang ba der ni zhugs nas kyang // sangs rgyas la ni nyid du sgra// bar+ya he te baSh+Ta
134a5: sa ba pi bo da da swa mA ma sarba/ rigs rnams kun gyi phyag rgya ni// tshul rnams la yang de skad brjod// sangs rgyas rnams ni mnyam med pa'i// gsang ba'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung
134a6: so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dkyis kho thams cad kyi dngos grubacigs da de/ rdo rje dbyings dang 'dra bar ni// dkyil 'khor legs par bri bar bya// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rnams ni// thams cad kyi ni
134a7: mchog tshul te/ / dkyil 'khor du ni zhugs nas kyang // dngos grub 'dod pas myur bar ni// su ra ta sa ma ya d+hi ho// badz+ra satwa Ad+ya sid d+hi maM/ ces brjod snying po 'di bzlas te// bsgrubs na thams cad 'grub par 'gyur// de nyid
134a8: skul ba'i tshul gyis ni/ / mgu nas myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// khams

134b1: gsum rnam rgya la 'dra bar ni/ / rdo rje rigs kun rnams kyi ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad 'jug par yang // mkhas pas legs par bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni myur ba yang // dngos grub 'debs pa gsol byed
134b2: cing / / rA gA tA si sa ma b+ha ta// zhes smras kun tu 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/
134b3: pad mo'i rigs ni thams cad kyi// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i tshul du ni// mkhas pas dkyil 'khor bri bar bya// der zhugs nas ni brjod bya ba// rA ga d+harma ma hA pad ma pra sid d+ha la gu me bi bo// de skad smos nas dkyil 'gro
134b4: ni/ / kun gyi des ni dngos grub bo ces bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// nor bu chen po'i rigs
134b5: rnams ni/ don kun 'grub pa'i tshul du yang // dkyil 'khor legs par bris na ni// zhugs nas 'di skad smra bar bya// sarba bri ya sidA d+hi maM// rA ga shi sid d+hi maM// sid d+hi sid d+hi ma hA satwa/ bcom ldan mams ga/
134b6: pa'o// de ga smras nas kyi ba'or // zhugs nas mchod gsang bla med pa'i// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// phyin chad dngos grub bdag nyid kyis// bsgrubs na dngos grub 'grub par 'gyur// gang cha myur du mi
134b7: 'grub na/ / de nyid bskul ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub
134b8: sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya thams cad kyi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i phyag rgya

135a1: gsang ba'i rgyad dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / ta thA ga ta ma hA de bi bya// pi ya sarba su la bri te// bden las byung ba'i tshig bden pas// bsgrubs kyang de ni ma grub na'o// zhes sa sa rgyas som ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// la
135a2: ni ni ni shegs pa'i gis kyi ga khyen po'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / lha 'og go rims ji bzhin du// phyag rgya chen po bcings nas ni 'di ni de nyid gsang ba yi// rdo rje tshul gyis 'di spros shig/ badz+ra satwa sa ma ya te/ ta ma ma
135a3: bar+ya ti tiSh+Tha/ / sarba kA ya mA ma ri shwar+ya dza// badz+ra gar+b+he sa mud k+Shi pa// rdo rje 'gyid pa'i lha mo che// de nyid bskul bas chags 'gyur bas// lus kun la ni brtan 'gyur nas// ji bzhin myur du dngos grub 'gyur shes
135a4: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'gying ba'i bdag pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sid d+ha sid d+ha sa ma ye/ sa ma yo hi taM pri ya maM// zhes bskul myur du chags
135a5: gyur na/ / rab tu yang ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi chos kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// bud d+hA bud d+ha ma hA satwa/ brgya
135a6: ma a ti pra ya/ / zhes ni bskul na myur bar yang // rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi phyag rgya gsang ba'i dngos
135a7: grub kyi rgyud de/ sarba karmad par+ya pa// tA ma me sid d+h+ya d+ha badz+rI Ni// rdo rje can gyis bskul myur bar// rjes su chags nas 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// rig
135a8: thams cad kyi phyag rgya'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la

135b1: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ / mu stegs can rnams phan gdags phyir// ri mo'i phyag rgya'i tshul du ni// sangs rgyas btsun mo rab sra bar/ shes na rab tu
135b2: grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam tshig gis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// sems
135b3: can kun gyis yid la khyab/ / sems can kun la bde sbyin zhing // sem can kun gyi yab nyid ni// dam tshig mchog gi 'dod pa'i mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so//
135b4: 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// gsang ba'i mchog ste rmad che bar// dad ldan shes nas dang byas nas// bsgrubs dka' ba yang 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungasu so//
135b5: de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// chags pa dag pa'i chags bral gyi// mem zen don gyi yi mu na ga/ su dregs ltabar byas pa te// bag pa'i gcong rong ltung // theg pa che la dgod pa'i phyir/
135b6: gsod pa'i tha tshig mchog yin te// de ltar shes na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// mu stegs can
135b7: rnams gzhom pa'i phyir/ / 'byung ba che las thams cad 'byung // mi gtsang zhes ni ci phyir brjod// nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje spyan gyis gaspangs so// de la 'di ni nor bu
135b8: rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ / bud med chags phyir rin chen rnams// rtag tu legs par bsag par bya// bud med bla med rin chen zhes// bsams nas de ni grub par 'gyur zhes bcom

136a1: ldan 'das kyis bka' bzhin du mdzad pas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi tshig rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes
136a2: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// bud med
136a3: chags rnams yongs bskor la/ / kun nas brtsas pa'i bde pa ni// sangs rgyas mchod phyir phul na yang // mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur/ zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis
136a4: gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// rab dgas ngal te skyob na// rab dga' las byung ba de ba de/ phyag bzhi pos ni mchod pa'i
136a5: bI / / sbrul na myur du grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pa sa gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ hUM gi dam tshig bcings nas
136a6: niskye bo zad med 'khyud nas ni/ 'khyud par 'gyur ba'i skye ba de/ phul na de ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// de la 'dri ni pad mo rigs kyi mchod
136a7: pa'od nges grub gsang pa'i rgyud do/ / 'jig rten dbang por bdag bsgoms la// sdug pa'i gang du bltas nas ni/ bltas par gyur ba'i bang bde// bral na da ni 'grub par 'brur gas
136a8: ldan pad mo spyan gyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyu dang // las kyi phyag rgya bcings 'gyur la// rgyan rnams kun gyis brgyan nas kyang //

136b1: bud med 'khrud pa'i longs spyod ni/ mchod phyir phul na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan rdo rje rin chen gyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi mchod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'o//
136b2: rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub rgud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi
136b3: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas sa ni bdag bsgoms la/ ci nas sus kyang mi tshor bar// gzhan gyi bud med brtse byed na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs
136b4: rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs mi gi sa pa'i mchod pa'i rgyud de// rdo rje 'dzem byas nas kyang // rdo rje phrang ba 'ching dbyed cing // de nas rdo rje grwa blangs la// rdo rje
136b5: gar gyis mchod byas la/ 'dod pa'i dga' bas dbang bskur mchog/ glu dang gar gyis bde ba las/ bde ba gzhan gyi myong min te// de phyir gsang mchog 'di bla med// de la 'don rdo rje rigs kyi
136b6: gsang ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ / 'jig rten gsum las rnam rgyal bsgom// cho ga ji bzhin tshul du yang / gsang ba'i mchod pas mchod na ni/ mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur
136b7: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gas bas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi mchod pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgud de// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i phyag rgyar gnas// gsang ba'i tshul ni ci bzhin
136b8: bar/ / las kyi phyag rgya sa rab mchod na/ mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi gsang/

137a1: ba'i mchod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgud do// don kun grub pa'i rnal 'byor gyis// gsang ba'i tshul ni ji bzhin par// las kyi phyag rgyas rab mchod na// mchod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom
137a2: ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mchod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs
137a3: bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cung 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i de kho na nyid bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// mdor na ting 'dzin ye shes las// sems can
137a4: rnams la chags tshul gyis/ / sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub 'gyur na// myur du bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
137a5: pa'i rigs kyi de kho na nyid chen po bskyed pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / sems can thog ma tha ma med/ na mkha'i 'byung ba'i mtshan nyid de// kun tu bzang po kun bdag nyid// 'dod pa 'gro ba kun
137a6: bdag po/ / sems can kun gyi sems gang ni// bstan phyir sems dpa' zhes bya'o// rdo rje mnyam par mnyam gzhag na// nges par rdo rje nyid gyur pa// sems dpa'i byin rlabs tshul gyis ni// rdo rje sems
137a7: dpa' nyid du gyur/ / bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid de// rdo rje bzhed pa de bzhin gshegs// nyid sems rab tu rtogs las sogs// sangs rgyas byang chub cho ga bzhin// de nyid bcom ldan de bzhin
137a8: gshegs/ / thams cad kyi ni rigs su 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs nyid de// de nyid rdo rje'i rigs chen po// de nyid pad

137b1: mo'i rigs dag pa/ de nyid nor bu'i rigs kyi mchog ces bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor los gsungs so// rigs thams cad bskyed pa'i gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga
137b2: rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyu da'i di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin
137b3: gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ / bcom ldan sems dpa' de nyid ni// rdo rje sems dpa' thugs la gnas// mnyam par bzhag las ting 'dzin te//
137b4: sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrub ces sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi mtshan ma'i mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de rab
137b5: tu togs phyir rdo rje ste/ gzung ba'i tshul gyis lcags kyu yin// phra mo rtogs phyir mda' yin la// mgu bar gyur phyir legs shes bya// spras pa'i phyir yang rin chen gsungs// gzi brjid tshul gyis nyi ma
137b6: ste/ / rgyal mtshan legs par sbeng bar gsungs// 'dzum phyir bzhad par grags pa la// 'dod chags dag phyir pad mo yin// ral gris nyon mongs dgra gcod yin// dkyil 'khor tshul du 'khor lo ste//
137b7: tshig gis brjod pas s+tha zhes bya// rgya bra ma tshul du kun rdo rje// mi tshugs tshul gyis go cha yin// 'jigs byed tshul gyis mche ba ste// phyag rgya'i tshul gyis bsdams pa'o// ji ltar bcom ldan sems rtag pa//
137b8: rdo rje sems dpa' kun 'gro ba// de bzhin rdo rje mtshan las sogs// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan mas gsungs so// rigs

138a1: thams cad kyi mtshan ma mngon par brjod pa'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi drug tu pa'i
138a2: bskye ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gis kyi phyag rgya bcing ga/ skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud do// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gnas// rdo rje
138a3: dkyil mo krung bcings la/ / lag gnyis rdo rjer bsdams pa las// myur du sangs rgyas nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
138a4: pa'i rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ ji ltar rgyal po nyid phyag rgya// rgyal po khrims la 'debs pa ltar// bdag nyid chen po skye bo rnams// sku gsung thugs//
138a5: ni rdo rje yi// gzugs brnyan gyi ni tshul du yang // nyid kyi phyag rgya btab pa ni// bdag nyid che ba'i phyag rgya cher// shes na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag rgya chen pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni
138a6: rdo rje rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing bskye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ / ji ltar dam tshig dam pa ni// skye bo 'gas ni bcing 'gyur na/ shin du 'da' bar mi bya ba// de ltar de bzhin gshegs kun gyi/
138a7: dam tshig phyag rgya bcings pa yis// rdo rje bcing ba'i mchog bcings na// ma shi bar du mi 'da' bar// shes nas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dam tshig gis gsungs so// de la 'di
138a8: ni chos kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcing ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de/ / mdor na rgyal bas rdo rje dag/ 'da' bar bya ba ma yin te// 'di ni bcings par shes nas kyang // des ni chos kyi dngos grub

138b1: 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje las kyi rigs kyi phyag rgya bcings pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos grub gsang ba'i rgyud de// rdo rje bka' dang las mang rnams// 'da'
138b2: bar bya ba ma yin zhing / / bka' nyan pa yi las de ni// shes na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya bcing bskye bar 'gyur ba'i
138b3: dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa gsang ba'i rgyud do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das 'di yang bdag gis yongs su gzung
138b4: zhing byin gyis brlabs so/ / de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag po phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes bya ba byin
138b5: ro/ / rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsad/ theg pa chen po sngon 'das pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so//
138b6: rdorje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las rigs thams cad kyi brtag pa gsang ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho//
138b7: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi chud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos
138b8: dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do/ / sangs rgyas rjes su dran tshul gyis// sangs rgyas chos kyi ting 'dzin ni// mnyam par bzhag pas bsgoms na yang // bla med dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de

139a1: bzhin gshegs pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi chos dam tshig dngos grub kyi rgyud de// chags pas rjes su dran tshul gyis// sems dpa' thams cad ting 'dzin gnas/
139a2: rab mnyam bzhag pas bsgoms na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos dam pa'i
139a3: dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su// bsgoms nas mdun dang de bzhin ste// phyag na rdo rje'i mthur gyur nas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das
139a4: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi chos dam pa dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'gro ba 'dul ba'i chos su ni// bsgoms nas mdun du de bzhin te// rnam pa kun gyis mchog ldan par//
139a5: 'dul bar de ni rab byed ces// bcom ldan 'dab rdo rjes kyi gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don kun grub pa'i skur yang ni// bsgoms na mdun du de bzhin te/
139a6: rnam par mchog kun ldan pa yi// phun sum chogs don des 'thob bo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje nor bus gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi chos dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang
139a7: chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
139a8: chos kyi dam chog gi dngos grub kyi rgud de/ / sangs rgyas rjes su dran 'gyur la// rdo rje phra mo tshul gyis ni// badz+ra badz+ra zhes brjod na// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das

139b1: sa gsums/ / del 'dun bzhan gagags pa dgas sa canam chag ga ngas phru rna nga // rnams sna dz+ra pa/ tham sas byud cing // bangs zhes gangs/
139b2: sems dpa' nyid 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// khams gsum rnam rgyal cha lugs su// dran byed mdun
139b3: dride bzhin te/ dz+dza hA hUM hI zhes brjod na// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// de la 'di ni par mo rigs kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'gro ba 'dul
139b4: ba'i gzugs kyis no/ / rdo rje pra mo sgom byed cing // sid d+h+ya sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi chos kyi
139b5: dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ don grub pa yi gzugs kyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms nas kyang // sir d+ha sid d+h+ya zhes brjod na// don gyi dngos grub mchog thob 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nor bu chos
139b6: kyis gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi chos kyi dam tshig gi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sem dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye
139b7: shes kyi dngos grub kyi chung 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// dam pa'i chos ni yi ge med// ting 'dzin ye shes 'byung ba ste//
139b8: a zhes bya bas chos rnams ni// skye ba med par dgongs pa ste// phyag rgya 'di yi tshul gyis ni// shes pas bsgoms te de nas kyang // yi ge kun gyi ye shes ni// bder gshegs skad cig gis 'gyur zhes// bcom

140a1: ldan 'das 'phags pa 'jam pa'i dpal de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
140a2: rgyud de/ de bzhin gshegs kun de nyid kyi// mdo sde 'di ni dad pa yis// dad nas bcangs sam klags gyur na// dngos grub bla med thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// /
140a3: de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sdig pa'i sems can phan don du// sdig can sdig spyod bzlog pa dang // sangs rgyas bka' ni bsrung ba'i phyir// gsang ba byas
140a4: na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// 'dod chags rang bzhin dag par shes// dam
