140a5: pa'i don du dgongs nas kyang / / thog ma tha mar 'di bsgoms na// chos kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu
140a6: rigs kyi chos mkhyen pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ / sems can don phyir sbyin byed cing // bsam pa thams cad rdzogs byed cing // chos bsgoms 'di ni nor bu yi/ rigs kyi dngos grub thob par
140a7: 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das chos rin chen gyis gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos kyi ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de nas
140a8: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs

140b1: rgyas kyi ni ting 'dzin las/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab bsgrubs pa// 'di ni bsgom par byas nas kyang // dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbyings kyis gsungs so// de la
140b2: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi 'i'i gyi dngos grub kyi rgyang / / rdo rje sems dpa' tid 'dzin gyis// bla med dang ni las mang rnams// sems dpa' gan 'gyur thams cad dang / !
140b3: na yang ni grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// sdig pa dag pa'i rgyu ba'i phyir// mtshams med
140b4: byed las mi zlogs na/ / gsod pa'i las la dad pa na// des ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub
140b5: kyi rgyud de/ sdig kun rnam par dag pa'i bdag/ kun dag pas na dgos pa kun// des byed las 'di yin no bar// shes na yang ni 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mos gsungs so//
140b6: de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// srang ldan dbul po thams cad kyi// rtag tu bsam pa kun bskang la// don kun grub pas kun bdag ni/ grub 'gyur 'di la the tsom
140b7: med ces bcom ldan 'das rin po che rgyal mtshan gyis gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi las kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen
140b8: po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi

141a1: rgyud de/ rtag tu rdo rje phra mo'i tshul// 'bud pa kun gyi sbyor na ni// rnam pa'i mchog kun ldan pa yi// mngon shes lnga ni thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so//
141a2: de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// slob dpon ma yin gzhan dang ni// slob ma ma yin bu min pa'i// mdun du phyag rgya mi brjod de// de dag gsang ba
141a3: phyag rgya 'grub ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi ye shes kyi rgyud de// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// sna nas hUM byung ldan gyur la// rdo rje
141a4: khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis/ / dgos pa thams cad sgrub par byed ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi phra mo'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// pad mo chen po'i ting
141a5: 'dzin gnas/ / rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje blta bas bltas na ni// 'dod pa'i dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo bzhad pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni ni bu gis kyi phra mo'i
141a6: ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ / rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// shin tu phra ba'i lha 'bar bas// don ni thams cad 'dren par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje
141a7: nor bus gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi phra mo'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mig
141a8: gi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgud do// gang tshe phyag rgya'am ting nge 'dzin// bsgrub phyir stsol bar gyur pa

141b1: na/ / gang tshe mkha' la skar ma 'dra// dkar po rgyug par des mthong na// de tshe blo ldan sangs rgyas kyi// spyan ni bdag gis thob 'gyur zhes// phyin cad sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// rtog pa kun las
141b2: bsgrub par bya zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// gnas dang 'gro ba de bzhin te// ji snyed
141b3: dngos po yod 'gyur ba/ / de rnyed kyi ni gzugs brnyan rnams// mkha' rgyug 'gro ba'am 'ong yang rung // mthong ni rdo rje spyan dag par// shes pas mchod na dngos grub ni// bla na med pa thob par
141b4: 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi mig gi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// g.yas pa'am ni g.yon phyogs kyi// mkha' la nam mkha'i dbyings nyid
141b5: ni/ / sprin 'drar myur du 'khor bar yang // mig gis mthong bar gyur pas kyang // rdo rje las byung phyag rgya de// mthong nas 'jigs par ma gyur la// phyag rgya de ni bzung na ni// rdo rje spyan ni 'grub par
141b6: 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rjes gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ gang tshe skya 'am dmar ba dang // dkar ba 'am ser ba 'am sna tshogs kyi/
141b7: dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur pa'i tshe// dgongs 'gyur 'khor lo'i spyan 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje pad mos gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi
141b8: rgyud de/ mkha' la rin chen 'dra ba dang // gser la sogs par 'dra bar ni// gang tshe mkha' mthong mkha' yi mig/ de ni 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs

142a1: thams cad kyi spyan gyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi las dam pa'i
142a2: dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// chos kyi dkyil 'khor tshul du ni// 'dod chags bde ba rnam smin phyir//
142a3: gtso bo thams cad mchod byas pa// sangs rgyas dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam pa'i dngos grub
142a4: kyi rgyud de/ 'dod chags dag ces sgom byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas na// rdo rje 'dod pa'i gzi can mnyam// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje bzhed pas
142a5: gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud do// khro ba bdag ces sgo 'byed cing // gsang ba'i mchod pa rab byas pa// khams gsum rnam rgyal 'dra ba yi//
142a6: dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni chos kyi rigs kyi mgala'i dngos grub kyi chung de// nang du song ba'i yid kyis ni/
142a7: 'dod pa dam par sgom byed cing // dbyangs dang ldan pa'i yi ge yis// sangs rgyas mngon par mchod na ni// dngos grub myur du thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzis
142a8: kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rdo rje snying por mnyam bzhag la// bas pa pa g.yos pas bcad nas ni// phyag la rtag tu brtson byas na// dbang

142b1: bskur ba ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje dbang rin po ches gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi las dam pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen
142b2: po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gi gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi dam tshi ge gsang ba'i
142b3: dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'dod la sogs pa'i bde ba kun// rtag tu bdag gi snying la gnas// e ma'o sems can don rnams la// skyong bar gyur pa gang bshad rmad// 'di ni las kyi dam tshig
142b4: ste/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting 'dzin du// bsgoms nas sangs rgyas mchod na ni// dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni de
142b5: bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dmatshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi chud de/ / rdo rje sems dbu'i ting 'dzin gnas// sems can kun la bde sbyin pa'i// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag
142b6: yin te/ / mchong na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so// des nin rdo rje rigs kyi dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud ngo // sems can kun la phan byed pa'i//
142b7: kun bzang khro bo bdag yin te// rdo rje hUM gi rnal 'byor gyis// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rje gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi sa kyi sa tshig/
142b8: gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// bde ba thams cad rab sbyin pa'i// kun bzang 'dod pa bdag yin te// bdag nyid 'gro 'dul srul gnas la// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes ba

143a1: ldan 'das padad+ma mo chags pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las dam tshig gsang ba'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sems can kun la don chen sbyin// kun bzang rgyal po bdag
143a2: yin te/ / don kun 'grub pa'i gzugs kyis ni// mchod na dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi las kyi dam tshig gsang
143a3: ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyis kyis dam pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la
143a4: 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ / rang gi ting nger 'dzin pa yis// g.yas pa'i 'dzub mos mdud nas ni// go char bcings te spyi bor gzhag/ shin du yang ni
143a5: bsrungs par 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i las kyi rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rtsig pa la ni ldan 'dra ba/
143a6: ri mir bris nas mtshan bsgreng ste// mnyes na bud med gang bsams pa// de ni 'di yi dbang du 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi las
143a7: kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sa la gnod sbyin gdong bris te// de yi mig gi phyogs su ni// 'dzub mo'i sen mo btsugs na yang // bud med mchog ni 'dren par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan rdo rje
143a8: sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// lag pa gnyis su pad mo blangs// 'dod chags dag palta byed cing // rdo rje lta bas bud med de// bltas

143b1: na yang ni dga' bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan pad mo 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyi chos nyid kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje rin chen ting 'dzin gnas// lag pa gnyis
143b2: kyis nor bu gzung / / hUM zhes bya ba'i tshul gyis ni// bud mad kun la 'dud byed do// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM gis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyil yis sa kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do//
143b3: nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi
143b4: dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ / mchod pa'i las kyi cho gar sbyar// gang dang gang gi dgos bsams pa// de dang de ni gsol btab ste// mkhas pas phyag rgya bsgrub par bya zhes bcom ldan la rdonas
143b5: kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// gsang ba'i mchod pa cho gar sbyar// dgos pa
143b6: gang zhig smras pa de/ / myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni rdo rje'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// khro bo'i
143b7: ting 'dzin zhugs nas kyang / / rigs kyi gsang ba'i mchod chen byas// mkhas pas cung zad gang bsams pa// de ni myur du dngos grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje khro bos gsungs so//
143b8: de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// 'jig rten dbang po'i ting 'dzin gyis// yid kyis mchod pa byas nas kyang // mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa/

144a1: de yi dngos grub thams cad thob ces bcom ldan 'das pad mo 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rdo rje snying po'i ting
144a2: 'dzin gyis/ / bdug pa la sogs mchod byas la// mkhas pas dgos pa gang bsams pa// de kun skad cig nyid 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so// rigs
144a3: thams cad kyi las kyi dgos pa'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di
144a4: gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rjes phra mo'i tshul gyis ni// sangs
144a5: rgyas phyag rgya rab bsgrubs pas/ / dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs
144a6: pa'i rigs kyi sems dpa'i byin gyi rlabs kyi rnal 'byor gyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ kun gyi bdag nyid sems dpa' ni// bdag gi lus la gnas pa ste/ sems dpa' bdag ces byin
144a7: rlabs la/ / bdag ces bya ba'i nga rgyal gyis// bsgoms na 'grub par 'gyur ro zhes// bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par 'dus pa'i
144a8: rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi rdo rje'i byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud do// sems dpa' ji bzhin phyag rgya bzhin// phyag rgya ji bzhin bdag de

144b1: bzhin/ / cho ga 'di yi tshul gyis ni// phyag rgya thams cad bsgrubs par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi chos kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor
144b2: gyi rgyud de/ chos kyi phyag rgya'i tshul gyis ni// rdo rje phra mo bsgoms byas la// ngag gi phyag rgyas de dag kun// sems dpa' chen po'i ting nge 'dzin ces bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa kun tu spyan ras
144b3: gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu rigs kyi las kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i rnal 'byor gyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas kun la dbang bskur dang // mchod dang dam tshig dngos grub
144b4: rnams/ / bcom ldan 'das zhes bsgoms nas kyang // rdo rje las rnams bsgrub par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje las kyis gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi phyag rgya sgom pa'i dngos grub kyi
144b5: rgyud do/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor
144b6: los bsgyur ba phyag na rdo rje la legs so zhes pa byin no/ / rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdorje
144b7: sems dpa' khyod legs so/ / rdo rje rin chen khyod legs so// rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod legs so// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa las brtag pa
144b8: thams cad kyi gsang ba'i rgyud phyi ma'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa// // bam po dgu pa// den byang chu sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes

145a1: tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ / lta ba ngan cing chags bral la// gsang ba 'di ni mi rigs te// sems can kun la phani don du// de bzhin cho ga bshad par bya// de nas yang byang chub
145a2: sems dpa' phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yod byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs kyi yod
145a3: byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud de/ de la 'di ni snying po'i yod byad dang cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud yin te// dkyil 'khor chen po mthong nas// bdug pa dang / mar me dang / me tog dang / dri'i phyag rgya rnams
145a4: kyis mchod pa byas te/ de nas rdo rje tshig gis bzlas pa brtsam par bya'o// de la 'di ni bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa bcud de/ zla ba bzhir gnas ji bzhin par 'dug ste/ dus bzhir bdug
145a5: pa la sogs pas cho ga bzhin du mchod nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi theg pa chen po mngon par rtogs pa'i mtshan gyi rtsa brgyad pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la stod de/ phyag rgya bzhis phyag bya ba'i tshul gyis phyag byas la sngags 'dri bzhis bdagagra /
145a6: gis lus dbul zhing mchod pa bya'o// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pArba u ba s+than sa Ata ma nA ni ra ya tha ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra satwa
145a7: tiSh+Tha sa nA/ / oM sarba ta thA ga tA pU dza a b+hi ShAM ka ya a ta ma na ni ra ya tha ya mi sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra ra d+ha a b+hi Shany+tsi me// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU dza pra ba ta na ya Ata ma na nir ya tha ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra d+harma prag
145a8: yam/ oM sarba ta thAg ta pU dza/ rmen mr-i ta man ni ra ya tha ya mi/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karma ku ru maM/ de nas 'dod pa'i yon tan thams cad la chags pa dang ma bral la kha zas kun dang 'dod pa kun la nye bar spyong

145b1: c ing bdag nyid snying po'i don du sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan mdun du tshig tsam gyis kyang bsgoms la ci dga' bar byed cing rdo rje cheg gis lan brgya rtsa bzlas na myur bar dngos grub tu 'gyur ro nas bcom ldan
145b2: 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / ci ste bla na med pa'i dngos grub 'dod na ni de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni dbus na bzhugs// de'i sems dpa' chen po bzhi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul du/
145b3: kha dog dang rgyan rnams ci dga' bar bya ste bri zhing sems dpa' chen po rnams zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs la rigs kyi lha mo rnams grwa rnams su bri'o// de nas ri mo'i sku gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher
145b4: byas la 'dzub bya ba'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas mthar mchod pa rgya cher byas la mtshan thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa
145b5: thams cad kyi de kho na nyid la sogs pa'i dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// yang na phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na ni des de bzhin gshegs
145b6: pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la ri mo'i sku gzugs kyi phyag rgya'i spyan sngar ci dga' ba bzhin du ji lta ba bzhin bcing zhing bkrol te rdo rje'i tshig 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / de
145b7: nas mthar mtshan thog thag ngal mi bso bar cung zad tsam zhig phyag rgya bkrol te/ / ji lta ba bzhin bcings nas bzlas brjod bya'o// de nas phyag rgya 'bar zhing 'bab la 'phar zhing nyung bar smra bar 'gyur ro/
145b8: de nas phyag rgya bcings bzhin du nam mkha' la lding bar 'gyur ro// gzugs ci dga' ba dang // mi snang ba dang las thams cad kyang byed par 'gyur ro// bcings ma thag tu phyag rgya thams cad kyis kyang

146a1: las thams cad ji lta ba bzhin byed par 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// yang na ting nge 'dzin bsgrub par 'dod na ni des rdo rje phra mo nas brtsams te/ ting
146a2: 'dzin de la gang la dga' ba'i snying po'i rnal 'byor gyi tshul du zla ba bzhi'i bar du bsgoms la/ / de nas mthar mtshan thog thag dkyil mo dkrung mo zhig par snyoms par bzhugs te 'jug par bya'o// de
146a3: nas namasangs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa'i dngos grub thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro/ / de nas ji lta bu 'dod pa de lta bu thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems
146a4: dpas gsungs so/ / ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlas zhing zla ba gcig gi bar du bsgrub la// de nas mthar mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad kyi
146a5: dngos grub tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / ci ste las shig bya bar 'dod na yang lan cig brjod pa tsam gyis bdag dang gzhan dang grong dang grong khyer rnams go cha bcings
146a6: la sogs pas bsrungs par 'gyur ro/ / dbab pa yang bya ste tsan dan dri zhim pos gdon gyis zin pa dang / gdon gyis ma zin pa rnams rdo rje dang / lcags kyu dang / lag pa dang / mda' thogs pa dang /
146a7: rin po che dang / nyi ma dang / rgyal mtshan dang / so'i phreng ba dang / pad mo dang / ral gri dang / 'khor lo dang / lce dang rdo rje rgya gram dang / go cha dang / se da/ kun gyi/ phyag rgya la sogs pa dngos po thams
146a8: cad la lan cig brjod pas 'bebs par byed do/ / sgyu ma'i las kyang byed de/ rma bya'i mjug sgo'i nang du rdo rje bcug ste bcings la/ de nas rma bya'i mjug sgo de sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgyas mnanal de

146b1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems dpa' rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya babs kyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas rma bya'i mjug sgo las gzugs sna tshogs pa la sogs par snang bar 'gyur te// de phyin cing rma bya'i
146b2: mjug sgros rang gi lus la cho ga bzhin du gzugs thams cad kyang ston te/ mjug sgro de nyid lan cig bzlas te bskor bas kyang / bdag nyid las gzugs thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro// mjug sgrode
146b3: nyid kyis 'jig rten pa'i sgyu ma'i las rnams kyang ston/ / sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi gzugs brnyan yang ston// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na de bzhin gsheg
146b4: pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas pa rnams kyis/ / bdud sde dang bcas pa rnams 'dul ba la sogs pa rnams rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par rol pa la sogs pa mdzad pa rnams kyang ston pa nas
146b5: bdag nyid las rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs kyang ston pa'i bar du'o/ / ci ste dbang du byed par 'dod na yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sems
146b6: ma rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la phyag rgya de 'bar bar gyur gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas de phyin chad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mnyes par byed cing dbang du
146b7: byed na sems dpa' gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/ / ci ste 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dngos grub bsgrub par 'dod na yang des dang po kho nar de bzhin du bzlos zhing zla ba gcig tu brgyad
146b8: stong bzlas la de nas mthar phyag rgya bcings te de bzhin du mtshan thog thag phyag rgya 'bar gyi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ / de phyin cad phyag rgya bcings pa tsam gyis 'jig rten gyi dngos grub gang yang rung ba

147a1: gcig tu 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// de nas rdo rje rigs kyi
147a2: byang dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ / de la dang por ni sngar bsnyen pa bya ste/ de ltar ci 'dod pa bzhin du yi ge 'bru 'bum bzlas par bya'o// de'i mthar mtshan thag thag tu bzlas pa byas
147a3: la de phyin chad sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / chad pas gcad par nus par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// 'on te bsgrub par 'dod
147a4: na yang / des ji lta ba bzhin du ri mo'i sku gzugs bris la/ des de bzhin du mchod pa byas nas zla ba gcig tu 'dod pa kun la longs spyod cing ci dga' ba bzhin du byas nas brgya stong du
147a5: bzlas par dras bzhir rdo rje'i tshig gis zlos zhing zla ba'i mthar phyin pa dang / ri mo'i gzugs la mchod pa rgya cher byas nas rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i phyag rgya chen po la phyag rgya bcings par
147a6: las hUM zhes bya ba'i sgra byung gi bar du bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas nam langs pa dang / lha rnams kyi dbang po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'khor dang bcas pa rnams mdun du gnas
147a7: nas bka' nod par gyur to/ / de nas rigs 'dzin gyis 'di skad du bsgo bar bya'o// gang gi tshe ngas khyod tshur shog 'di byos shig ces bsgo ba de'i tshe na khyod 'dir 'ongs la nga'i
147a8: bka' bzhin byos shig/ de phyin chad 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag por 'gyur te// yud tsam gyis kyang sa gsum pa thams cad la ci dkar bka' stsol cing

147b1: bskor te slar 'ongs nas kyang phan gdags pa dang / chad pas gcad pa rnams byed cing lha rdzas kyi 'jig rten gsum gyis longs spyod la nye bar spyad nas ji ltar dga' ba bzhin du byed cing lha thams
147b2: c ad kying dang po'i bud med lalogs pa pang med mas sadas gru bar byas nas nye bar spyod kyang de la su gang gis byas kyang gnod par byed nus pa med de hU~M zhes bya bas lha la sogs pa ma rungs pa thams cad gnon cing
147b3: de nas bskal pa chung ngu'i stong gi bar du 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/ / zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsung so// ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzab byas la zlas pa'i
147b4: mthar rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i dam tshig gi phyag rgya bcings la/ / mtshan thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas na ma langs pa dang phyag rgya 'grub par 'gyur ro// de nas hUM zhes bya ba dang ldan par ji lta ba'i
147b5: cho ga bzhin du phyag rgya bcings na nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / gzugs rnams ston pa dang / mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / sgyu ma rnams ston pa dang / thams cad la dbab pa dang / dgug pa dang / dbang
147b6: tu bya ba dang / thams cad kyi dga' ba bskyed par bya ba dang / rin po che thams cad 'brog pa dang / 'od zer 'bar ba chen po bstan pa dang / rin po che'i chang 'bebs par bstan pa dang / gang mo
147b7: cher bgad pa dang / sems can thams cad sbyang ba dang / gcad pa dang / dbye ba dang / dus kyis 'khor los sgyur ba dang / de nya ba bzhin pa'i de kho na nyid brjod pa dang / las thams cad la 'jug
147b8: padang dgag pa dang / sdigs pa dang / bsad pa dang / sems can thams cad phyug rgyas gdab pa dang / 'dod pa'i dga' ba la 'jug pa dang / dbang gyur ba dang / dngos po thams cad

148a1: gru len du gzhug pa dang / gar byed du gzhug pa dang / dgugs pa dang / gzhug pa dang / bcing ba dang / dbab pa la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
148a2: pas gsungs so/ / ci ste rdo rje phra mo bsgrub par 'dod na yang des rdo rje hUM zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin du bsgom zhing de bzhin du bzlas pa'i tshul gyis zla ba gcig tu bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas mthar ting 'dzin de nyid kyis
148a3: mtshan ga zhi/ / thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang mngon par shes pa lngar gyur nas sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa dang / tshar gcad pa nus par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin
148a4: pas gsungs so/ / ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na de bzhin du zlos zhing zla ba gcig tu bsgrubs pa de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro//
148a5: zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de nas las rnams byed par 'dod na yang lan cig brjod de yid kyis bsams pas bsrung ba la sogs pa las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro//
148a6: rdo rje rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas pad mo rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te// de la dang por 'bum bzlas pa byas na bsnyen pa byas par 'gyur ro// de nas
148a7: b sgrub par bya ste ras la bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul ba la sogs pa bris la de'i phyogs thams cad du dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du sems dpa' chen po bzhi bris la grwa rnams su lha mo rnams
148a8: bri'o/ / de nas bzlas pa'i cho ga de bzhin du rgyas par byas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o// de nas bcom ldan 'das 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byon te dus ji bzhin par

148b1: dam pa'i skabs 'byed par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / ci ste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang des de bzhin du pad mo rdo rje ma'i phyag rgya bcings la stong phrag brgyad tshang bar
148b2: brjod pa'i bar du dus bzhir bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu phyag rgya bcings te bzlas pa byas la nam langs pa dang dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de nas phyag rgya bcings pas ji lta ba
148b3: bzhin 'gro ba thams cad 'dul bar byed do zhes bcom ldan 'das kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so/ / ci ste ting nge 'dzin gyi tshul du bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du zla ba'i mthar mtshan
148b4: gcig thog thag tu ji ltar dga' ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas nam langs pa dang ting nge 'dzin thams cad mngon sum du 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje chos kyis gsung so//
148b5: ci ste las bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du bzlas la zla ba'i mthar mtshan thog thag du bzlas par bya'o// de nas las thams cad nus par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// pad
148b6: ma'i rigs kyi yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho/ / // de nas nor bu rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la rnam bzhi byas la
148b7: 'bum bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas de bzhin du ras la bcom ldan 'das don thams cad grub pa'i dkyil 'khor bzhi'i tshul du bris la// de nas de bzhin du mchod pa byas te de bzhin du bsgrub pa zla ba'i
148b8: mthar mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas nam langs pa dang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bang bskur ba'i rin po che byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i nga

149a1: babyod nas dbang bskur brdzun pa mdzad/ / dbang bsgyur ba des snang gsum rgyagang can pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams dang rig 'dzin kyi'akhor las snang bar 'gyur shes bcom ldan
149a2: 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / ci saste phyag rgya bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du chos kyi rdo rje ma'i tshul rdo rje rin po che'i mu khres de// ba bzhin du bsgrubs ni bsam pa thams cad kyi las byed
149a3: par 'gyur ro nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs sa/ / ci ste nor bra ye shes bsgrub par 'dod na yang de bzhin du rin po che 'byung ba'i ting nge 'dzin rim pa bzhin du bsgom pa byas te dngos kyi
149a4: m ed pa'i nam mkha' las rin po che ji ltar 'byung ba rin po che las byang chub sems dpa'i sku ji ltar 'byung zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'di dus bzhir bsgoms la ji ltar gong du smos pa bzhin du bzlas
149a5: bar bya'o/ / de nas zla ba'i mthar ting nge 'dzin de nyid kyis mtshan gcig thog thag tu bzlas pa bya'o// de nas nam 'angs pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byon nas ci dgas bzhin du dbang grangs thunanas
149a6: bcom ldan 'das rnam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ / de nas las sgrub pa bshad de// de bzhin du bzlas 'azla ba'i mthar mtshan gcig thog thag bzlas par bya'o// de nas nam langs pa dang / bcom ldan
149a7: 'das nam mkha'i snying pos don thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/ / de nas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// nor bu rigs kyi nye bar spyod pa'i cho ga
149a8: rnaMs pa rdzogs s+ho/ / de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrub pa'i yo khyod dang chog rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ de la dang por snying po thams cad kyi yo byad dang tshig rgyas pa bshad do// snying po bsgrub par

149b1: 'dod na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi grub par gyur cig ces brjod la snying po ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub pa'i tshig bya'o/ / ngal 'din phyag rgya'i yo byad dang tshogs phyag rgya thams cad bdag la dga'
149b2: par gyur cig ces smras la dam tshig gi phyag chubacings te ci dga' bar ci nus kyis bzlas par bya'o/ / de nas ci lci ba bzhin du dngos grub tu 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni sngags thams cad kyis yo byang dang chog rgyas
149b3: bsde smos pa med pa'i che ga grub par gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin bdag la skye bar gyur cig ces smras la sngags ci dga' bar bzlas pa byas te 'di ni dngos grub bo// de la
149b4: 'di ni rig pa'i yo byad dang cho ga rgyas pa ste/ / sems can 'di dag thams cad ni ma rig pas mdongs par gyur/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad ni rig pa rtogs shing sdom par gyur to// zhes
149b5: spras la rig pa ci dga' bar bzlas shing bsgrub par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so/ / de nas snying po dang / sngags dang / phyag rgya dang / rig pa thams
149b6: cad ci ltar bsgom pa nyid du rdo rje bzlas pa'i tshig rgyas pa ni 'di yin te/ / sems dpa' gang gi snying po dang / phyag rgya dang / gsang sngags dang / rig pa rnams bzlas pa'i don du bsgrub par bya ba de ni bdag
149b7: gam sems dpar bsgoms na bsgrub par byab 'grub par 'gyur ro nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bzlas pa'i cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// de nas
149b8: rigs thams cad kyi thun mong du bsgrubs pa'i tshig rgyas pa ni 'di lta ste/ de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi rigs kyi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nor 'grub pa'i dngos grub dang / rdzu 'phrul gyi

150a1: dngos thub dang / rig 'dzin nyid du 'grub pa dang / dngos grub chen po rnams so// de la nor 'grub pa ni 'di yin te// gang nag ter yod par degs pa der phyag chubacings la rang gi ting nge 'dzin gyis gter gyi
150a2: gnas der rdo rje 'dzin gyis gter gyi gnas der rdo rje bltabs blta ba na ci ste rdo rje lta bu yang bar mthong na de na gter yod par shes par bya'o/ / de nas rdo rje lcags sgrogs gi dam tshig gi phyag rgyab cing gi/ bsgos la ji ltar
150a3: dga' ba bzhin du blangs na rtsod pa med par thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya gang sgrub par byed na badz+ra sad
150a4: d+hi zhes brjod par bya'o/ / rdzu 'phrul gyi dngos grub ni rnam pa bzhi yod de// de ni 'di ltar chu'i steng nas par 'gro zhing 'dug pa la sogs pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa la sogs pa thams cad kyi gzugs ston pa
150a5: dang / ji srid du dga' ba de mi snang bar 'gyur ba dang / nam mkha' la 'gro ba dang / dpag tshad steng gi steng du lding ba dang / 'og tu 'gro zhing 'ong ba dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong du ci dga' bar song la
150a6: bskor te slar 'ong ba dang / dpag tshad stong kho khor yug gi sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa shes pa dang / dngos po thams cad mig gis mthong zhing na bas thos pa dang / phyogs thams cad du dpag tshad stong
150a7: khor yug na gnas pa'i bud med thams cad ci dga' bar pang du blangs te 'dug pa dang / gser dang / nor bu dang / mu tig la sogs pa'i dbyig thams cad dang / nor thams cad phrogs nas kyang sus kyang
150a8: rlung zad kyang nal mi nus te dag gi rdo rjes kyang mi thub par 'gyur na gzhan gyis lha blas kyang cing dgos/ skyes bu snang phrag bcu ba sdoms pa'i sgribs dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu nad med pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag

150b1: tu 'dod pa thams cad longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / rtag tu dar la bab cing lha'i gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje sems dpa' dang bcas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rdo rje'i dngos grub bla na
150b2: med pas mchod pa byed cing lo stong phrag bcu bzhi'i bar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje dngos grub kyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub
150b3: 'grub pa yin te/ phyag rgya sgrub pa na rdo rje rig 'dzin ces brjod la 'grub pa dang rdo rje rig 'dzin gyis 'khor los sgyur bar 'gyur te/ 'dod pa thams cad la longs spyod pa dang ldan pa dang / sangs rgyas kyi zhing
150b4: thams cad du skad cig gisi bskur te/ slar 'ong zhing bde ba thams cad la yongs su spyad pa dang / lo bcwa brgyad pa'i na tshod dang ldan pa dang / sgra 'khyil ba dang ldan pa dang / rdo rje chen po'i rig 'dzin du gyur
150b5: n as de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang rdo rje sems dpa' thams cad mtho dri zhing bskal pa chen po'i bar du gnas par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rig
150b6: 'dzin gyis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni dngos grub chen po 'grub pa yin te/ bdag nyid phyag rgya'i snying po don du bdag nyid kyis phyag rgya bsgrubs na sems dpa'i gzugs su gyur nas skad cig gcig gis
150b7: kyang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gzugs sna tshogs kyis bya ba sna tshogs byed pa dang / de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje sems dpang bcas pa thams cad mthong nas rnam pa'i mchog
150b8: t hams cad dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pas yang dag par mchod nas sems can ma lus shing lus pa med pa rnams kyi don byas nas slar 'ongs te 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rnam

151a1: pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'dod pa thams cad dang / bde ba dang / yid bde ba thams cad la spyod cing rdo rje sems dpa' dang mnyam pa'i bya nub sems dpa' semam da' chen por gyur nas tshe'i tshad ma lus shing
151a2: lus pa med pa'i bskal pa chen po'i tshad du 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i thabs kyi dngos grub chen pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar 'jig rten gsum
151a3: rnam par rgyal ba'i dngos grub dang / dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub dang / dngos grub dam pa rnams so// de la 'di ni 'jig rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas/
151a4: dngos grub yin te/ khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i phyag rgya bcings la dbang phyug chen po rkang pa g.yon pas mnan te bsgrub par bya'o// de nas gzugs de skad 'byin pa dang hUM zhes bya ba brjod par bya'o//
151a5: hUM zhes brjod pa tsam gyis dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po 'khor dang bcas pa rnams sgrub pa'i mdun du bka' nyan cing dbang du 'gyur ro// de phyin chad 'jig rten
151a6: g sum po thams cad kyi bdag po rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur te nam mkha' la 'gro zhing 'jig rten gsum po 'khor lo thams cad kun du bskor te slar 'ongs nas lha mo rungs pa la sogs pa sems can thams
151a7: cad hUM zhes bya bas 'dral bar byed do/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hU~M zhes bya ba'i gzugs dang ldan pas 'jig rten gsum po thams cad la bka' stsol cing rdo rje sems dpar bcas pa'i de bzhin
151a8: gshegs pa thams cad mthong nas mnyes par byed cing lo stong du 'tsho bar byed par bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes byed pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni dbang thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ phyag rgya bsgrub pa na de

151b1: bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang bskur ba ni rin po che'i dam tshig gi phyag rgyas dang por bdag nyid dbang bskur la bsgrub par bya ste/ de nas grub pa dang dbang rnam pa bzhir 'gyur te/ rdo rje'i dbang dang / rin po
151b2: 'i dbang dang / chos kyi dbang dang / las kyi dbang rnams so// de la rdo rje'i dbang thob na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur ro// rin po che'i dbang thob na rin po che thams cad kyi bdug por
151b3: 'gyur ro/ / chos kyi dbang gis ni chos thams cad kyi rgyal por 'gyur ro// las kyi dbang gis ni 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs
151b4: pa thams cad kyi dbang gis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub ste/ de yang 'di ltar rtag tu gsang ba'i mchod pa rnams kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad pa mchod pa byas
151b5: la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bde ba dang yid bde ba thams cad kyi gsungs
151b6: so/ / de la 'di ni dngos grub dam pa ste/ de yang ji ltar rdo rje 'dzin pa dang bdag mnyam mo zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so// de la 'di dag ni pad mo rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de ni 'di ltar mnyes
151b7: par bya ba dang / dbang du bya ba dang / bsrung ba dang / pad mo'i dngos grub rnams so// de la mnyes par bya ba'i dngos grub ni 'di yin te/ ji ltar pad mo 'dod pa bsgoms na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad
151b8: la sogs pa sems can thams cad mnyes par byed nus par 'gyur ro/ / bdag nyid 'jig rten dbang phyug rjes su dran par byas na sems can thams cad dbang du byed nus par 'gyur ro// byams pas

152a1: 'gengs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 'gro ba thams cad bsrung ba dang / sba ba dang / bskyab nus par 'gyur ro// bdag nyid pad mo'i ting nge 'dzin du zhugs la pad mo lag par blangs te bsgrubs na 'jig
152a2: rkyen dbang phyug gi gzugs dang ldan pa dang / rnam pa'i mchog thams cad dang ldan zhing lo stong phrag bzhir 'tsho bar 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pad mos gsungs
152a3: so/ / de la 'di dag ni nor bu rigs kyi dngos grub rnams te/ de yang 'di ltar rigs thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub dang / gzi brjid chen po dang / bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa dang /
152a4: rin po che'i dngos grub rnams so// de la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbang gi dngos grub ni 'di lta ste/ nyid kyis dbang dbul ba dang / mar me dpral ba dang / ci nus kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin
152a5: pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dang / rin po che bsgrub pa'i dngos grub 'di dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod na ring po mi thogs par 'grub par 'gyur ro// zhes bcom ldan
152a6: 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rin po ches gsungs so/ / rigs thams cad kyi thun mong ba'i dngos grub kyi cho ga rgyas pa rdzogs s+ho// / de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi thabs kyi dngos
152a7: grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das thog ma dang tha ma med pa'i sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba ji lta bar/
152a8: de 'dra bar ni dngos grub 'dod// de yi thabs ni phyag rgya ste// dngos grub chen po kun sbyin no// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ 'jig rten 'dul ba chags bral min// phyag rgya'i dngos grub

152b1: chags las skyes/ / de yi thabs ni bsgom pa ste/ dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi thabs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bden las 'jig rten 'di nyams pas// sngags kyi dngos grub
152b2: thob mi 'gyur/ / spros pa med pa'i thabs kyis ni// dngos grub kun gyi mchog tu 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ ma rig mun chags 'di la ni// rig pa'i dngos grub yod min te//
152b3: de yi thabs ni rgya che bas// dngos grub kun gyi mchog thob bo// brtag pa thams cad kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom
152b4: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs so/ / de la dang po kho nar ni snying po thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa rnam bzhi byas nas ni/ bsod nams chen po
152b5: thob 'gyur te/ / bsod nams med kyang sangs rgyas mchod// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med/ de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ dam tshig gsang ba bsrung na ni// bsod nams
152b6: chen po thob 'gyur te/ / bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni// dam tshig bsrungs na myur du 'grub// de la 'di ni sngags kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ sangs rgyas mtshan la sogs brjod na//
152b7: bsod nams chen po thob 'gyur te// bsod nams med kyang myur bar ni// chos sbyin pas na dngos grub thob// de la 'di ni rig pa'i bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ bsod nams nang na sbyin pa
152b8: mchog/ byin na bsod nams thob 'gyur te// sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin rdzogs na// myur du sangs rgyas nyid du 'grub// brtag pa thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud do// de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi

153a1: shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsungs so/ / de la dang po kho nar snying po shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ yi ge a la 'jug/
153a2: byed cing // yi ge thams cad rnam bsgoms la// ra gi gas / na du/ brnye yo thob par rdzung shes bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jam pa'i dpal gyis gsungs so// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i shes
153a3: rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ shes rab nges 'bigs zhes bya ba// ting nge 'dzin ces grags pa ste// des ni phyag rgya myur 'grub par// bsgoms na myur du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das shes rab ma
153a4: gis gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni sngags kyi shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ shes rab sgra yi rjes 'brang ba// ting 'dzin tshig ni rab spros pa// de bsgoms na ni myur ba yang // sngags kyi dngos grub thob par
153a5: 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje blos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rig pa'i shes rab kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de// rig dang sngags dang khyad par du// khyad par yod pa ma yin te// shes rab bsgoms na myur bar ni//
153a6: nges par dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi shes rab kyi ye shes kyis gsungs so// btag pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi tshig
153a7: rgyas pa'i rgyud do/ / de nas brtag pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud bshad par bya'o zhes bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes gsungs so// de la dang po kho nar snying po thams cad tshogs kyi dngos grub
153a8: kyi rgyud de/ mchod pa thams cad rab byas na/ dge ba yi ni chos rnams kyi// tshogs ni rnam par 'phel 'gyur te// de nas tshogs ni 'grub par 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud

153b1: de/ / 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang // dkyil 'khor mang por bris pa'i phyir/ tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud de/
153b2: rjes su yi rang la sogs tshul// de bzhin dam pa'i chos glags dang // bzlas pa mang po byas nas ni// nges par sngags kyi dngos grub 'thob// de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi chud de/ ma rig rab
153b3: tu spangs pa dang / sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul phyir// tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang // myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// brtag pa thams cad kyi tshogs kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud rdzogs s+ho//
153b4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na// de nyid bcom ldan
153b5: sems dpa' ste/ / thams cad sems de nyid bdag po// sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje// sems dpa' rang byung brtan pa ste// sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'// rdo rje snying khar rab bsgoms
153b6: na/ / rdo rje sems dpa' zhes grags te// 'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyi ni// ye shes tshul te mnyam pa med// snying la sna tshogs byung nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs
153b7: 'gyur te/ / khams kun gyi ni rdul grangs su// de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin// rdo rje'i sku ni de dag las// rdo rje sems dpang yang dag 'gyur// sems dpa' dang po de nyid las/ mtshan ma thams cad yang dag
153b8: 'byung / / mtshan ma las ni sems dpa' che// de las tshul 'di thams cad 'byung // gang gis 'di ni thos 'gyur la// da cing 'dzin byang snying khar yang // rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms nas ni// de dag

154a1: myur du dngos grub 'thob ces bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpa' gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub
154a2: sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'dig sung / / de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi brtag pa thams cad 'byung ba'i ye shes
154a3: kyi rgyud yin te/ / sangs rgyas rnams kyi ye shes ni// rtag tu rnam min tog las byung // mi rtog pa yi ye shes las// de phyir rtag pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rtog pa
154a4: 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ mi tog gang la rtog nyid du// brtags pas tog las byung ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni rdo rjes rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung
154a5: ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ cho ga bzhin du ri mor bris// rtog pa grub sbyin zhes brtags pa// rtog dang bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis// de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung
154a6: ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ rtog pa la ni 'dod chags 'byung // dge ba yau ni chos rnams kyi// tshogs na rnam par 'phel 'gyur te// de nas tshogs kyi 'grub par 'gyur// de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i tshogs kyi dngos
154a7: thub kyi rgyud de/ 'khor lo mang por zhugs pa dang // dkyil 'khor mang po bris pa'i phyir// tshogs rdzogs pas na phyag rgya rnams// dngos grub chen po thob par 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi tshogs kyi
154a8: dngos grub kyi rgyud de/ rjes su yi rang la sogs tshul// de bzhin dam pa'i chos klags dang // bzlas pa mang po byas na ni// nges par sngags ni dngos grub 'gyur// de la 'di ni rig pa'i tshogs kyi dngos grub tu

154b1: rgyud de/ ma rig rab tu spangs pa dang // sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin tshul las// tshogs ni yongs su rdzogs nas kyang // myur du dngos grub thob par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho//
154b2: de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rigs thams cad kyi mtshan ma 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi dngos grub kyi rgyud 'di gsungs so// de la ji ltar rdo rje 'byung zhe na/ de nyid bcom ldan sems
154b3: dpa' ste/ / thams cad sems de nyid bdag po// sgra dang gsung thugs rdo rje ni// sems dpa' brtan pa rang byung gi/ sems dpa' kun gyi mchog sems dpa'// rdo rje snying khar rab bsgoms na// rdo rje sems dpal
154b4: zhes grags te/ / 'di la rdo rje rab tu gnas// de nyid sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni// ye shes tshul te mnyam med 'od// snying las sna tshogs byung nas ni// sna tshogs pa yi gzugs gyur te/ khams gsum kun
154b5: gyi rdul snyed du/ / de dag nyid ni rgyal ba yin// rdo rje sku ni de rnams las// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag 'gyur// sems dpa' dang po de nyid las// mtshan ma thams cad yang dag 'byung // mtshan ma las
154b6: ni sems dpa' che/ / de las tshul 'dithams cad 'byung // gang gis 'di ni thos gyur la// dad cing 'dzin byed snying khar yang // rtag tu dga' bas bsgoms na ni// da ni myur du grub pa thob ces bcom ldan 'das
154b7: rdo rje sems dngas gsungs so/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes rtog pa thams
154b8: cad 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi cho ga rgyas pa'i rgyud 'di gsungs so/ / de la dang po kho nar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud 'di yin te// sangs rgyas rnams kyi rtog med

155a1: ba'i/ / ye shes rtag pa nyid gyur pa'i// mi rtog pa yi ye shes las// brtags pas rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud
155a2: de/ mi rtog gang la rtog bdag nyid// brtags pa rtog pa byung ba ni// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che/ de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do// de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/
155a3: ga bzhin du ri mo bris// rtog pa grub sbyin zhes rtog pa// rtog las bral ba'i bdag nyid kyis// de phyir rtog pa zhes gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad me'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// rtog pa las ni
155a4: 'dod chags 'byung / / pad mo la ni de gnas te// de phyir rtog la gnas pa ni// grub pa nyid du de 'gyur ro// de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de// rtog pa med pa'i nor bu ni//
155a5: mthu yis shin tu mchog tu 'gyur// de ltar rnam par mi rtog pas// lha rdzas dngos grub 'byung bar 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams cad kyi rtog pa 'byung ba'i rgyud
155a6: do/ / de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ yid kyi 'dod pa'i cho ga yis/ yid kyis 'dod pa grub 'gyur te/ ting 'dzin bsgrub pa snying la gnas/ de phyir snying po zhes brjod do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi phyag rgya
155a7: 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ ji ltar rgyal po'i phyag rgya mchog/ khrims ni 'da' ga mi byed bzhin// bdag nyid chen po gzugs brnyan gyis// mtshan ma phyag rgya zhes par grags// de nas rtog pa thams cad
155a8: kyi sngags 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud de/ / 'da' bar bya ba ma yin zhing // dbye bar dka' la gsang ba nyid// gsang ba grub phyir brjod pas na// de yi phyir na sngags zhes brjod// de nas rig pa 'byung ba'i ye

155b1: shes kyi rgyud de/ ma rig pa ni gzhom pa dang // dag gi rig mchog 'grub pa'i phyir// rtogs shing rig pa'i dngos grub ste// de phyir rtog pa zhes brjod do zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje 'dzin pas gsungs so//
155b2: rtog pa thams cad kyi snying po la sogs pa 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rgyud do// de nas rtog pa thams cad kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud de/ de la dang po kho nar snying po'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud yin te/ snying po bzlas te/
155b3: bdag gam ni// gzhan yang rung ste byung ba na// 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur gang gis ni// mthong zhing thos 'gyur shes par bya/ de la 'di ni phyag rgya'i ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ bdag gi cho ga ji bzhin
155b4: du/ / gang yang rung ba'i phyag rgya bcings// 'jig rten pa la bltas ni ni// gong ma bzhin du kun shes 'gyur// de la 'di ni sngags kyi ye shes 'byung ba'i rgyud yin te/ lan cig tsam yang sngags brjod na//
155b5: 'das dang 'byung dang byung gang yin// rang gi lce la smras 'gyur ba// de dag thams cad bden par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni
155b6: rig pa'i ye shes skye ba'i rgyud de/ rig pa lan cig brjod na ni// byung dang 'byung dang 'byung 'gyur rnams// ji ltar rdo rje'i bka' bzhin du// yid kyis de ni shes par 'gyur// rtog pa thams cad
155b7: kyi ye shes skye ba'i cho ga rgyas pa'i rlung rdzogs s+ho/ / de nas rigs thams cad kyi thun mong gi gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin no// de la 'di ni de bani/
155b8: gshegs po'i rigs kyi sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te// ji ltar de ltar 'dug nas kyang / skyil mo krung bcas bsgrub bya ste// ji ltar ri mo'i tshul byas nas// sems dpa' chen po grub par

156a1: 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya sgrub pa yin te// ji ltar ri lo'i tshul du ni// brkyang bskum tshul du rab tu gnas/
156a2: shin du khros nas bsgrub byas na// the tshom med par 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud yin te/
156a3: rdo rje dkyil mo dkrung bcas la// lag gnyis rdo rje bcings nas kyang // ting nge 'dzin gyi skur gyur la// pad mo 'byung ba bsgrub par bya zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo sems dpas gsungs so// de la 'di ni
156a4: nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sku'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa yin te/ / ji ltar 'dug gam nyal ba 'am// 'chag kyang rung ste de ltar ni// rdo rje rin chen dbang bskur na// the tsom med par 'grub par 'gyur zhes
156a5: bcom ldan 'das rdo rje snying pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ lce rtse shin tu mi bskul zhing // so dang mchu gnyis sbyar nas ni//
156a6: rtag pa thams cad bsgrub bya zhing // sgra bral rdo rje'i tshig yin no zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje gsung gis gsungs so// de la 'do ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ hUM zhes bya
156a7: bA 'brug sbar bsgrags/ / khro bo'i dag ni zab cing bstan// rdo rje chen po khro bo'i gsal// rdo rje khro bo'i gsung 'grub bo// zhes bcom ldan 'das rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsung so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs
156a8: kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ / dbugs mi 'byin ltar dbugs 'byin cing // phra ba'i tshig ni shin du gsal// ting 'dzin ye shes snying po yis// zlos pa po rnams grub par 'gyur zhes

156b1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes kyi snying pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i gsung gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ shin du yongs su gsal tshig
156b2: gis/ / rtag tu bdud la brtson byed cing // tshul 'di bzlas par gyur na ni// myur du thams cad 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rjes gsungs so// de la 'di ni de
156b3: bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rtag tu 'dod pa bcom ldan 'das// sems can thams cad bde sbyin pas// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag nyid du// bsgoms na myur
156b4: du 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das 'dod pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ sems can kun la phan pa dang // ma rungs pa rnams gdul ba dang //
156b5: sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung ba'i phyir// khro bo dngos grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje hUM zhes bya bas gsungs so// de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gsang pa'i/
156b6: sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar pad mo rab chags la// bsgos pa'i skyon gyis mi gos pa/ de ltar bdag gis tshogs skyon yang // srid na chags pa de 'grub 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das pad mo
156b7: bzhad pas gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i sems kyi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ nam zhig sems can thams cad kyi/ dgos pa'i don ni kun sgrub cing // rin chen char ni 'bebs
156b8: 'gyur zhes/ / grub na mur bar de 'grub bo zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so// de la 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya sgrub pa'i rgyud de/ ji ltar

157a1: yangasasas 'dug pa / / 28 dang med gyur// lagu pa gan pas b+ha/ d+hamachog/ mas pa bye na 'thu pa 'du sa btsam ldan sa ng+gA ga zugs pagam
157a2: gsang ba phyag rgya rdo rjes gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rdo rje rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ de lta de ltar gnas nas kyang // ji lta ji ltar byed kyang rung // rdo rje khro bo 'dzub mo bcings// gos
157a3: kyis g.yogs na 'grub par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i rgyal pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni pad mo'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de//
157a4: lag pa g.yon pas pad mo yi// khu tshur bcings te sbas nas ni// ji gar myur dra pad mo yi// dngos grub kyang ni thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos gsungs
157a5: so/ / de la 'di ni nor bu'i rigs kyi gsang ba'i rdo rje phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ g.yon pa'i rin chen khu tshur ni// bcings te dam pa'i lag g.yogs la// ci dga' bar ni rim 'gror byed// rin chen dngos
157a6: grub thob par 'gyur zhes bcom ldan 'das nam mkha'i snying pos gsungs so/ / de la 'di ni rigs thams cad kyi gsang ba'i thun mong gi phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud de/ rang gi sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis/
157a7: phyag rgya chen po'i rdul du ni// rdo rje dag dang rdo rje'i lha// ring por mi thogs mchog 'grub po zhes bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rdo rje sems dpas gsungs so// rigs thams
157a8: cad kyi gsang ba'i sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje'i phyag rgya bsgrub pa'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho/ / / de nas bcom ldan 'das phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so//

157b1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rtog pa 'inani byin gyis brlab par mkhyen par mdzad du gsol// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas yang legs so zhes bya ba
157b2: 'di byin no/ / rdo rje'i theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen
157b3: khyod legs so/ / rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// ji ba ni khyod shes so// de shi shegs pa thas da ci na nyid bsdus pa las rgyu thams da kyi phyim phyi ma'i rgyud rdzogs s+ho// // de nas byang chub sems dpa' mas pa len phyi /
157b4: stan las langs te/ bcom ldan 'das la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab bo// rdo rje dbyings kyi sems dpa'i tshe// sems can don mchog bdag nyid can// shAkya'i rgyal po ye shes che// rdo rje
157b5: bdag nyid khyod phyag 'tshal/ / sems dpa' 'byung ba de nyid don// sems can rgyu ste tshul chen po// sems can don chen dgos pa'i don// sems dpa' sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// sangs rgyas
157b6: chos ni chos chen po/ / chos kyi 'khor lor bskor ba// smra ba chen po ba rig mchog/ sems dpa' chen po khyod phyag 'tshal// las chen bsrung ba chen po ste// las rnams thams cad rab bsgrub pa//
157b7: bdag nyid chen po 'gro spyod mchog/ sems dpa' rgyud khyod phyag 'tshal lo// pha rol phyin pa kun brnyes pa// kun mkhyen ye shes mkhyen pa po// sems dpa' kun te thabs chen po// shes rab chen po
157b8: khyod phyag 'tshal/ / thugs rje chen po mchog gi mchog/ thugs rje thugs rje'i bdag nyid can// thams cad gtong ba byams pa che// kun mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// shAkya med ge shAkya che// shAkya shAkya thub

158a1: pa che/ / 'dul ba chen po khyab pa po// 'gro don 'dul mchog khyod phyag 'tshal// chos kyi dbyings dang mnyam brnyes pa// chos dbyings de bzhin gshegs pa ste// rdo rje mgon po mgon chen po// sems
158a2: can tshogs ni khyod phyag 'tshal/ / 'od chen snang ba chen po ste// brtson 'grus chen po stobs chen po// dpa' bo chen po rab dpa' mchog/ bde spyod dpa' bo khyod phyag 'tshal// tshangs pa rang 'byung bcom ldan
158a3: 'das/ / shAkya dpa' bo thub pa che// kun bdag thub pa dag pa yi// chos rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// nam mkha'i mu ste sku yi mchog/ sku gsum sku min sgom pa po// kun gyi sku ste sku che ba// rdo rje'i sku khyod phyag
158a4: 'tshal lo/ / gsung min gsung ste gsung gi mchog/ gsung gsum gsung min ston pa po// gsung kun shin du gsung che ba// rdo rje'i gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// sems min sems te sems kyi mchog
158a5: sems gsum sems min ston pa po/ / thams cad sems te sems che ba// rdo rje sems khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdor min rdo rje rdo rje'i mchog/ rdo rje gsum pa rdor min sbyong // rdo rje thams cad rdo rje che// rdo rje
158a6: rdo rje khyod phyag 'tshal/ / kun khyab srid pa'i rtse mo mchog/ bde gshegs bdag po rgyal ba ni// khams gsum pa yi rgyal po che// snang mdzad khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'di dag ni// gang gis
158a7: skad cig nyan byed dam/ / klogag ma yang na bsgom pa'ang rung // kun gyis sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// mgon po khyod la gsol pa ni// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje chen po bskyed nas kyang / chos
158a8: kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bdag pos bka' stsal ba'i tshig gsan nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bos nas

158b1: 'dri skad ces gsungs so/ / bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rnams yang gcig tu 'dra bar mdzad par gsol// de nas yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas tshigs su bcad
158b2: 'di gsungs so/ / rtag par 'jig rten thams cad d+ha// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag du sangs rgyas kyi zhing
158b3: thams cad dang / 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can thams cad kyi mdun du rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor kun du khyab par byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa/
158b4: shAkya thub pas chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to// de nas pa byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la/
158b5: phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// rdo rje'i 'khor lo rab tu skor// de nas 'di gsung ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul phra mo thams cad ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor
158b6: rnams su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje dbyings kyis rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i rdo rje'i 'khor lo thams cad rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'jig
158b7: rten gsum las rnam par rgyal bas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ / rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul ba sna tshogs pa'i// khro bo'i
158b8: 'khor lo rab tu skor/ / de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi ma sa na ji snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten gsum las

159a1: rnam par rgyal bas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi khro bo'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gyur to/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa kun du spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos tshig
159a2: su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/ / rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul bar sna tshogs pa'i// pad mo'i 'khor lo rab tu skor// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu
159a3: de bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo rje snyed pa'i dkyil 'khor rnams su/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi rgyal pos pad mo'i 'khor lo rab tu sbyor bar gyur to//
159a4: de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa nam mkha'i snying pos tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// rtag par 'jig rten thams cad du// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// ji ltar 'dul bar
159a5: sna tshogs pa'i/ / nor bu'i 'khor lo rab tu bskor/ de nas de'i tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad khongs su gtogs pa'i sems can phra ba 'am sbom pa yang rung // de dag thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs
159a6: pa thams cad ri rab ri'i rgyal po rtse mo rdo rje dang / nor bu dang rin po che las byas pa'i khang bu brtsegs par de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gdan la bzhugs nas rdo rje dbyings la sogs pa'i 'khor lo
159a7: thams cad rab tu bskor bar phyogs kun nas mthong ngo / / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// mi yi nang du babs nas kyang // dgos phyir sems
159a8: can kun gyi don/ / rdo rje'i 'khor lo mchog bskor zhing // mgon po rab tu bsgrub par mdzod// de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis de bzhin gshegs pa la bos nas 'di skad ces gsungs so// bcom ldan 'das

159b1: de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yang gcig tu 'du ba mdzad du gsol/ / de nas yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs
159b2: su zhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par snang mdzad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rjer bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas phyag
159b3: na rdo rje la 'di skad ces gsungs so/ / rigs kyi bu khyod kyang nga'i thugs dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // rigs thams cad dang // dkyil 'khor thams cad dang // de bzhin gshegs pa thams
159b4: cad kyi thugs su zhugs shig/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rjes de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snang bas tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// 'dor na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi//
159b5: sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje ni// zhugs nas sems can thams cad la// phan pa'i phyir ni bsgrub par bya// de nas 'di gsungs ma thag tu 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam
159b6: p a'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyed bzhugs pa rnams las de bzhin gshegs pa re res kyang 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin du phra mo dang mnyam pa'i sku
159b7: 'phro ba mdzad pa rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi thugs su zhugs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang // bcom ldan 'das
159b8: rnam par snang mdzad kyi su thams cad dang / / gsung thams cad 'jug pa'i gnas dang // sems kyi rgyud 'byung ba thams cad dang // rdo rje'i tshul thams cad dang // yan lag dang / nying lag thams cad dang /

160a1: gnas thams cad dang / mtshan thams cad dang / dab byad bzang po thams cad dang / baspu'i khung bu thams cad dang / rdul shin du phra mo snyed kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang / thugs rnams su zhugs nas
160a2: bzhugs so/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas ring por ma lon bzhig na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang gsung dang thugs rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa thams
160a3: c ad du bdag nyid gyur par mkhyen nas ri rab ri'i rtse mo nas snying por byang chub pa gang na bder gshegs nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi byang chub kyi shing drung du 'jig rten pa dang 'thun par bya ba'i phyirarna
160a4: blangs nas ched du brjod pa 'di ched du brjod do/ / e ma sems can bstan pa yi// sems can don ni bdag don mchog/ gang phyir gdul dbang brtan pa rnams// mu stegs lta bas gnas par mdzad//
160a5: mdor na mi 'dul 'jig rten pa// lta ba ngan pas mdongs pa rnams// ye shes snang bas dag bya'i phyir// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyis bcom ldan
160a6: 'das la de kho na nyid mi shes pas 'di skad du kye dge sbyong ji byang chub kyi phyir 'di lta bu'i sdug bsngal drag cing mi dpa' yod pa mad dam zhes gsol to/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rtsa de bting ste steng du
160a7: bzhugs nas lha rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/ / grogs po rnams kho bos byang chub thob par bsgrubs shig/ de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don
160a8: ma rtogs nas lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin gang na ba der dong nas ched du lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin la de ltar gyur pa 'di brjod do/ / de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams

160b1: kyi tshogs kyis bskor te/ gzugs na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po la de ltar gyur pa 'di dag brjod do// de nas tshangs pa chen po 'dod pa na spyod pa dang / gzugs na spyod pa'i lha thams cad dang /
160b2: lhan cig tu 'jig rten gsum po thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la de ltar gyur pa rnams brjod do// de nas 'jig rten gsum po mtha' dag gi bdag po dbang phyug chen pas lha rnams kyi bdag pa
160b3: mthub che la sogs pa la 'di skad ces smras so/ / grogs po rnams de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'jig rten dang 'thun par mdzad cing yang bla na med par yang dag
160b4: par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ston gyis 'di ltar 'jig rten na de bzhin gshegs pa ma yin nas snyam du shes par mi byed cing lha nyid las de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur gyis/ / lha de dag nyid du bsgrub par bya
160b5: ba'i/ / de bzhin gshegs pa nyid du ni ma yin no// de legs kyis der mchod pa la 'dod par sgrub bo// de nas lha thams cad kyi bdag po dbang phyug chen po la sogs pa snying po byang chub gangan pa dang / bcom
160b6: ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying por byang chub par bzhugs pa gangan ba der dong nas ched du bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/ / bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces
160b7: gsol to/ / bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la thugs brtse bar dgongs te rin gyi gdan 'di las bzhengs la/ lha rdzas kyi gdan la bzhugs te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par
160b8: rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mdzad du gsol/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bdag po de dag la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams kho bo la bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub

161a1: sbyin par bsgrubs shig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to// bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis byang chub stsol bar mi nus so ci ste bdag cag gis nus par gyur na bdag cag nyid
161a2: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas par 'gyur ro/ / de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid gsal bar mdzad cing yang tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// de ni gzugs min gzugs min
161a3: min/ / bden min brdzun min gtsang ba yi// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes 'di// rtogs na rgyal ba nyid du 'gyur// de nas lha'i dbang po de dag gis cung zad cig cang mi smra bar gnas par gyur to//
161a4: de nas bcom ldan 'das rtswa yi gdan las bzhengs te lha de rnams la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to// grogs po rnams sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'di lta bu rtogs par bya ba bsgrubs shig/ de dag gis
161a5: gsol pa/ ma ldan nas dag gni rngo mi thog go// de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de nyid la bzhugs bzhin du tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so// yid kyis rab tu rtogs pas na// byang chub sems ni brtan par
161a6: byos/ / sems dpa' rdo rje brtan byas la// sangs rgyas su ni bdag bsgoms shig/ de nas de dag gis 'di skad du de lta bu legs so zhes bya ba thams cad kyis smras nas dong ngo de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis mtshan mo de'i
161a7: tho rangs 'jig rten dang mthun par bya ba'i phyir/ / bdud sde dang bcas pa pham par byas nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can gyi khams ma lus
161a8: shing lus pa med pa thams cad la phan par mdzad pa 'phags pa phyag na rdo rje rang gi thugs la zhugs pa la mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'dis mngon par bstod do/ / rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// theg pa chen

161b1: po bdag nyid che/ / sdang ba che zhing dag pa che// mgon chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal po rdo rje che// rdo rje de bzhin gshegs pa kun// sems dpa' chen po brtson 'grus che// thabs chen khyod la phyag 'tshal lo//
161b2: rdo rje 'dod pa dag pa che// kun gyi bde ba bde ba che// bde mchog thog ma tha ma med// bzhed chen khyod la phyag 'tshalo// rdo rje legs pa dgyes pa che// legs zhes bya ba rab mnyes pa// mnyes pa che zhing dgyes pa che/
161b3: rab dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// dbang bskur bzang po bdag po che// rin chen thams cad mdzes pa che// rnam rgyal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje'i gzi brjid gzi brjid che// 'od chen lham
161b4: pachen po ste/ / rgyal ba'i 'od de 'bar ba che// sangs rgyas 'od khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rgyal mtshan dpal che ba// rgyal mtshan che bas nor rab gtong // nam mkha'i rgyal mtshan yu che ba// gtong ba'i rgyal mtshan khyod phyag
161b5: 'tshal/ / rdo rje bzhad pa bzhad pa che// dgyes pa che zhing rab dgyes pa// dgyes pa'i shugs kyis rol cing dgyes// chos dgyes khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje chos ni chos che ba// sems dpa'i chos ni rab sbyong ba/
161b6: sangs rgyas chos te chos rab mchog/ 'dod chos khyod la phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje rnon po ral gri che// shes rab ye shes blo gros che// sdig gcod ral gri chen po ste// sangs rgyas mtshon khyod phyag 'tshal lo//
161b7: rdo rje rgyu ste 'khor le tshe// sangs rgyas 'khor lo gter chen po// dkyil 'khor kun te chos kyi mchog/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje gsung ba gsung brtse// spros med yi ge chen po ste// yi
161b8: med pa bzlas pa che/ / sangs rgyas gsung khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las te las rab mchog/ las chen las rab byed pa ste// gsang ba'i mchod pa mchod pa che// sangs rgyas mchod khyod phyag 'tshal lo//

162a1: rdo rje bsrung bgo cha che// go cha'i mchog ste bstan pa che// srung ba che zhing snying po che// sangs rgyas brtson 'grus phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje gnod sbyin khro bo che// ma rungs thams cad skrag byed pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi
162a2: thabs chen te/ / srung ba mchog khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje bsdams pa phyag rgya che// dam tshig chen po bcing ba che// khu tshur chen po phyag rgya che// rdo rje khu tshur khyod phyag 'tshal// de bzhin gshegs pa phyag bya zhing //
162a3: brjod de mchod de sti stang bya// gang phyir thog ma tha ma med// byang chub sems ni khyod yin te// khyod la brten nas rgyal ba dang // dpa' bo byang chub sems dpa' kun// byung zhing yang dag 'byung 'gyur bas// sangs rgyas
162a4: byang chub mchog gi rgyu/ / rdo rje sems dpa' khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje rin chen khyod phyag 'tshal// rdo rje chos khyod phyag 'tshal lo// rdo rje las ni khyod phyag 'tshal// yang dag par ni phyag 'tshal zhing // mtshan mchog gis/
162a5: ni khyod bstod pa'i// bsod nams gang yin de kun kyang // sangs rgyas byang chub thob par shog/ mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// rab dad pas ni lan cig tsam// gang gis legs par brjod pa ni// kun kyang sangs
162a6: rgyas nyid du 'gyur zhes sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs so/ / de nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gcig tu 'dus te/ gsung gcig tu legs so zhes
162a7: byab byin no/ / rdo rje theg pa bla na med// de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyis gsang // theg pa chen po mngon 'dus pa'i// mdo 'di legs par bshad pas na// rdo rje sems dpa' khyod legs so// rdo rje rin chen khyod legs
162a8: so/ / rdo rje chos ni khyod legs so// rdo rje las ni khyod kyang legs// bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa// de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'phags pa byang chub sems dpa' bcas pa rang gi thugs la zhugs pa thams cad kyis

162b1: shing mnyes nas bcom ldan 'das rdo rje sems dpas gsung ba la mngon par dgyes par gyur to/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi de kho na nyid bsdus pa zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mgo chud nye bar brdzung dang bcas pa rdzogs s+ho// 6/ rlung di//
162b2: lasu lang Sh+Te bad+hA pa l+la dag kyil rgya ba rin nga po rgyu ga she sud dpa nga srung yang ga grus ga sungs so/ ga nga/ badz+rag pa ba ga po ta da / yo na du/ gas pa thor na da krol// ma
162b3: dubazang po la phyag 'tshal lo/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo// de bzhin gshegs pa nam par snang ma dad la phyag 'tshalalo// de nas rgyal po rdo rje chang// kun mchog srid pa'i dbang phyug gis// 'khor lo de ni brtags byas nas// rnal 'byor can ni mi gsung bzhugs/
162b4: mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun// ma lus grub pa'i skyes mchog gis// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsal 'dabs// rnal 'byor tshul chen sgrub byed cing // cha ga sna tshogs yang dag
162b5: 'byung / / rigs kyi dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba'i// 'khor lo mchog ni bshad du gsol// mgon po khyod ni skal chen te// khyod ni bya ba don sems byed// gsang ba mkhyen cing dgongs bshad mkhyen// rnal 'byor rig
162b6: bas mchog gyur gsungs/ / de nyid rjes kyi de nyid ldan// rnal 'byor bdag nyid rnal 'byor che// rdo rje chen po byang chub sems// gsungs shig gsungs shig tshul chen po// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ste//
162b7: rdo rje rnal 'byor sna tshogs bdag/ gsang ba'i snying po dkyil 'khor che// chos kyi tshul ni sgrub byed pa// rtogs pa med pa'i chos rnams kyi// chos kyi don 'di ci yin brjod// 'dir ni rtog pa ji lta bu// sgrub pa'i
162b8: don ni ji ltar lags/ / ci phyir 'di ni rgyud phyi ma// rgyud don ci yin brjod par bgyi// ci phyir klud dang phyi me lags// rgyud kyi don ni ji ltar byung // rdo rje 'chang drag pa di ci zhig/ drag po'i don ni ji ltar

163a1: byung / / rdo rje zhi ba 'di ci zhig/ ci yi phyir na zhi bar brjod// phyag na rdo rnga ci yi phyir// rdo rje gtum po'ang ci zhig lags// Na yi phyir na gtum por brjod// de rje rdo rje zhes gsungs pa// ci phyir rdo rjer brjod par/
163a2: bgyi// rdo rje 'chang zhes gsungs 'di ci// de yi rdo rje ji lta bu// rdo rje 'chang ba rnams ni du// rdo rje rigs kun gang gi lags// chen po gnas gang shig na gnas// rigs ni rnam pa du yin brjod// ci yi phyir na
163a3: rigs su brjod/ / rigs bdag rang bzhin 'di ci zhig/ ci yi phyir ni sems dpar brjod// rdzogs pa'i byang chub rnam pa du// ci phyir rdo rje sems dpa' lags// rdo rje rgyal po ci yin brjod// rdo rje chags pa 'di
163a4: don ci/ / rdo rje legs pa ci yin brjod// rdo rje rin chen ci yi phyir// rdo rje gzi brjid ci yin brjod// rdo rje rgyal mtshan bzhad pa che// gsungs shig ci yin brjod pa gsungs// ci yi phyir na rdo rje chos// rdo rje rnonas
163a5: ci yin brjod/ / rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che// rdo rje smra ba ci yin brjod// rdo rje las dang gnod sbyin che// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// rdo rje bsrung ba khu tshur che// gsungs shig ci yin brjod par gsungs// sems dpa'
163a6: 'di rnams gang las byung / / de bzhin pha dang ma ni gang // dang po gang zhig gleng gzhi gang // dmigs pa'i rkyen ni gang zhig lags// gsang ba 'di ni gang las byung // khyab bdag 'di rnams gang nas byung // thog
163a7: mtha ma med 'di ci/ / gsang ba'i dbang phyug chen pos gsungs// rab tu dga' nyid rab bzang nyid// rdo rje snying bdag ji lta bu// ci yi phyir na kun du bzang // de bzhin rdo rje rdo rje 'chang // dang po'i rigs ni
163a8: ji ltar byung / / chos kun skye ba med pa dang // 'byung ba ji ltar rung bar 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i ci yin brjod// ci phyir sangs rgyas brjod par bya// de bzhin gshegs pa ci yin brjod// bcom ldan

163b1: 'das bcom ci yin brjod/ / de bzhin ston pa'i ston pa ci// ci yi phyir na ye shes brjod// shes rab ye shes ci yin brjod// ci phyir shes rab brjod par bya// de bzhin shes rab pha rol phyin// tshul ni ci zhig ting 'dzin gang //
163b2: bsam gtan nal 'byor rnal 'acoM // sri gas ma 'jig rten gsu mngon ci// Ni li byi yang khams gsus pa// 'khor ba'i don ni ci zhig yin// s+yA / 'das pa 'a tu yin brjod// rtag dang 'dzi
163b3: dang de bzhin dag / theg pa chen po ci yin brjod// nam mtha' yang ni ci yi phyir// pa nyid kyang ni ci yin brjod// 'drung bachen po gang las byung // 'gog pa tso zhig gang gis byed// ci mi phyir na byug d+hA brjod/
163b4: phyi sngags su brjod par bya// ci yi phyir na rig sngags brjod// de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams// phyag rgya yi ni mtshan nyid gsungs// sngags kyi mtshan nyid brjod par bya// rig sngags kyi ni mtshan nyid
163b5: gsungs/ / de bzhin kho nar gzungs sngags rnams// rtsa ba'i phyag rgya'i gnas ni gang // ji ltar bcing pa thub chen po// phyag rgya dag ni 'ching ba ni// ji ltar rdo rje can kun mnyes// rig sngags ji ltar bzlas par bgyi//
163b6: thub pa chen po de gsungs shig/ rig sngags dang ni zlos pa na// ji ltar yid kyis rdo rje bzlas// dri ba'i tshogs mdor bstan pa'o// oM ni ci zhig yin par bshad// yi ge dU ni ci yin brjod// ci yi phyir na yi ge phaT/
163b7: swA hA zhes pa ci yin brjod// mchod par ci phyir brjod par bya// de bzhin dam tshig shes nyid kyang // ci yi phyir na dkyil 'khor yin// dkyil 'khor cho ga ji lta bu// dkyil 'khor dang por zhugs pa yi// skyes pa
163b8: yang na bud med kyis/ / bya ba gang zhig bya ba ni// gsungs shig gsang ba'i dbang phyug che// thub pa'i dkyil 'khor zhugs pa la// sdom pa ji ltar sbyin par bgyi// de yi srog gi phyir yang ni// dor bar mi bya gang zhig/

164a1: lags// brus kyi las ni ji ltar bya// de bzhin kho nar phyogs bcing ba// bgegs rnams bcing ba dang bcas pa'i// log 'dren ji ltar bskrad par bgyi// dga' ba chen po ji lta bur// rab tu gus bcas phyag dag
164a2: bgyi/ / spos dang me tog de bzhin du// mar me mchod sogs ji ltar lags// dkyil 'khor brtag pa ji lta bur// gzhug pa yang ni ji ltar lags// dam tshig ci zhig yin par bshad// rdo rje slob ma'i cho ga gang// sngon
164a3: du bsnyen pa ji ltar bgyi/ / sgrub pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ji lta bu// snyoms 'jug ji lta bu zhig lags// mdun du dgug pa'i don ni ji ltar lags// 'dir ni rjes su chags pa'ang rdzi/
164a4: bya// bcang par bya ba'i las ni ji lta bu// 'dren pa rnams ni mnyes par ji ltar 'gyur// ji ltar 'dir ni gshegs su gsol ba lags// dkyil 'khor mchog ni ji ltar gdeg par bgyi// 'gro ba'i bya ba yang ni ji
