187a6: dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis brlab// rdo rje spyan gyi phyag rgya yis// pad ma'i mig can dag gis blta// dkyil 'khor bar dang tha ma ru// sbyin bsreg las ni yang dag brgyan/ sbyi zhin pa na sbyin meg yin
187a7: rnam par sbyar/ / rig pa'i dngos grub chog la// sbyin bsreg las ni yang dag brtsam// de bzhin sngags dang phyag rgya tshogs// de 'dra'i sngags dang phyag rgya'ang min// sngon la bgegs rnams gzhom
187a8: par bya/ / de nas sbyin bsreg yang dag brtsam// de 'og gsang ba'i mchod chen gyi// dkyil 'khor kun du bri bar bya// sbyin bsreg rnam pa lnga ru bshad// yang na bcu drug dag tu 'gyur// rang rang gi ni tshe

187b1: ga bzhin/ / sbyin bsreg las ni yang dag brtsam// dgongs pa'i gang zhig bsgrub pa'i phyir// gang zhig mchod pa yang dag brtsam// gal te mi nus skal chen gyis// bza' ba dag ni rab tu bya// dri dang bcas pa dang /
187b2: sbyar ba'i// yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya// 'di ltar rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byin gyis rlob pa mdzad par 'gyur// bgegs rnams nges 'joms nga yi ni// slob dpon gyi ni las bzang po// bgegs rnams
187b3: zlog par byed pa'i mchog/ bcing ba dam pa bshad par bya// rtag tu rdo rje khro bo dang // rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag bya zhing // rdo rje lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dgugs par bya// rdo rje zhags
187b4: pa'i phyag rgya yis/ / bgegs rnams thams cad drang bar bya// rdo rje las kyi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad kun du dgug/ sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig/ sems can rnam par 'tshe ba'ang med//
187b5: rang gi rnam rtog las byung bgegs// ma rig las byung mi dge bzhin// rdo rje lcags sgrog phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bcing bar bya// rdo rje ra ba'i phyag rgya yis// thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin bya//
187b6: rdo rje gnod sbyin phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzir bar bya// rdo rje lug rgyud phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bkri bar bya// rdo rje dbab pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams
187b7: cad kun du dbab/ / rdo rje brdab pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad brdab par bya// rdo rje 'bar ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sbar bar bya// rdo rje ral gri'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs
187b8: rnams thams cad gcod par bya/ / rdo rje cod pan phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad brdung bar bya// rdo rje 'khor lo'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje 'khrul 'khor

188a1: A/ / byag / rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad btsir bar bya// rdo rje kha T+wA~M phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gtub par bya// rdo rje mdung thung phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par
188a2: rdo rje sreg byed phyag rgya yis/ / bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par bya// rdo rje 'khor byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bskor bar bya// rdo rje srad bu'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams
188a3: thams cad bskyod par bya/ / rdo rje zlog byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rnam par brla ka/ rdo rje 'joms byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhom par bya// rdo rje 'jigs byed
188a4: phyag rgya yis/ / bgegs rnams thams cad 'jig par byed// rdo rje za byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bza' bar bya// rdo rje 'cha' byad phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bca'
188a5: bar bya/ / rdo rje dral ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgekas rnams thams cad dral bar bya// rdo rje skyel byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsgyel bar bya// rdo rje slong ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams
188a6: thams cad bslang bar bya/ / rdo rje gsod pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gsad par bya// rdo rje 'tsho byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad 'tsho bar bya// rdo rje sgrub pa'i phyag rgya
188a7: yis bgegs rnams thams cad yang dag bsgrub/ / rdo rje rgyas 'debs phyag rgya yis// gdug pa thams cad rgyas gdab bya// rdo rje rlung gi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad rlung la bskur/
188a8: rdo rje chu yi phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad tshul g.yeng // rdo rje ma ni rab rno bas// bgegs rnams thams cad bsreg par ba// rdo rje brgyal byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad

188b1: brgyal bar byed/ / rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad sbyin bsreg bya// rdo rje bsdu ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzung bar bya// rdo rje mche ba'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs
188b2: rnams thams cad sos gdab bya/ / rdo rje 'bigs pa'i phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad dbug par bya// rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad gzhig par bya// rdo rje
188b3: bka' bzhin byed pa yis/ / bkug nas bka' la dgod par bya// rdo rje sdigs 'dzub phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams cad bsdigs par bya// rdo rje 'gas byed phyag rgya yis// bgegs rnams thams
188b4: cad dgas par bya/ / rdo rje hU~M mdzad phyag rgya yis// bgegs kyi rigs kun gzhom par bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin bzod dka' dang // rdo rje me ltar 'bar ba dang // rdo rje 'jigs byed phyag rgya yis// rdo rje rkang pas
188b5: bsnun par bya/ / bgegs 'joms pa yi phyag rgya yis// de nas steng gi bgegs gzhom bya// mchog tu gsang ba dam pa'i mchog/ rdo rje chen po'i gsang rgyud las// rdo rje khro bo'i snyoms 'jug bya//
188b6: brgya dang rtsa bcu lhag pa dang // rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni// rgyas pa du ni yongs su bstan// bgegs la sogs pa gdug pa kun// chad pa gcad phyi rab tu sa pa yis// dkyil 'khor chen po
188b7: bsgrub bya'i phyir/ / sbyin bsreg las ni yang dag brtsam// rnam pa brgyad dang rtsa bcu lhag/ rdo rje slob dpon gsang ba ni// 'di ni gsang ba'i rgyud chen po// rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// gsang ba'i
188b8: sbyin bsreg cho gar bcas/ / gzhan yang dang po rab bshad bya// rnal 'byor chen po gsang ba'i las// sbyin bsreg las ni rgyan mi gcad// las rnams thams cad btus pa yis// gsang brgyud

189a1: chen 'di ru ni/ / sbyin bsreg rnam pa nyi shu yis// thams cad bsdus par 'gyur ba yin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa dang // mngon spyod kyi ni las dang ni// tshe spel ba dang dgug pa dang // nor dang 'bru
189a2: ni 'phel ba dang / / bsrung dang bsrung ba min dang bgegs// sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom dang // bcing dang gsad dang drag po dang // chags dang rjes su bcom pa dang // dbang du bya dang gzugs bzang
189a3: nyid/ 'dod dgu'i gzugs su snang ba dang // mkha' la 'gro dang dngos grub kyi// rdzas ni grub par bya ba la/ bsgrub pa'i dkyil 'khor byed pa yi// rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya// de lta bu yi rnam pa yi// sbyin
189a4: bsreg bzang po nyi shur bshad/ / ji ltar sbyin bsreg tshe ga bzhin// sngon du zab bung bya ba yin// grub bzhi la ni rgyas pa ste// zlum po la ni zhi ba'o// gang zhig 'gugs par byed pa yi// rdo rje'i rnam par yang dag
189a5: bya/ / de bzhin pad ma'i rnam pa gzhan// mngon spyod la ni grugasum ste// sdig pa thams cad rab gzhom phyir// zlum po rta babs ldan pa yin// rin chen rnam pa rigs rgyas la// tshe 'phel ba dang 'grib pa
189a6: dang / / shin du dag phyir phyag rgya'i dbyibs// bsrung la go cha lta bu yin// bcing ba la ni 'obs kyis bskor// gsad la mche ba dang ldan pa'i// ci 'dod gzugs la gang yang rung // mi snang ba la gzhu dang ldan//
189a7: phyogs dang mkha' 'phur la lcags kyu// bka' byed phyag rgya bsgrub pa dang // dkyil 'khor chen po bsgrub pa la// 'khor lo 'am ni gru bzhi'o// rdzas dang sman ni 'grub pa la// thab khung bud med yan
189a8: lag mtshungs/ / yang nathun mong dngos grub kyi// dkyil 'khor yang dag bri bar bya// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji lta ba// sbyin bsreg thab khung de mtshungs 'gyur// rig 'dzin dngos grub bzang ldan

189b1: zhig thams cad phran tshags de ltar 'gyur/ / 'khor lo sogs la cung zad mthapa// sbyin pasreg thab khung ba bar bya// kha khrung nyi ga// dkyil 'khor chog thams cad la// thab khung gang zhig mthong tsam gyis//
189b2: sdig pa kun las grol bar 'gyur// thab khung bstan pa bshad par bya// sngon du thig ni gdab bya zhing // tshon gyis sa phyogs legs par bri// gru bzhir thig brgyad ces bya ba// dbus kyi 'khor lo dpung bar bya/
189b3: gru bzhi'i cha ni mnyam pa ste// legs par bgos shing legs bris pa// rta babs bzhi dang yang dag ldan// sgo khyud rnams kyis legs par spras// sgo bzhi dag dang yang dag ldan// sgo ni cha brgyad ldan par
189b4: bya/ dra ba zla ba phyed pas spras// rdo rje sgo khyud rdo rjer ldan// pad ma'i nags kyi lcug ma dang // phreng ba rab tu 'khor ba dang // spyi thugs phyag rgya chen po dang // shar gyi phyogs kyi cha ru bri// rtse gsum zla ba phyed pa dang //
189b5: ral gyi khyu mchog mdzes rgyal mtshan// 'od bcas bde ba phyag rgya che// lce yi phyogs su bri bar bya// 'khor lo dung dang dbyug to dang // rta babs glang po dang ni phag/ phyag rgya nub tu bri bar bya// mdung thung dril
189b6: thub dan dang / / rma bya de bzhin ram+b+has dang // khyim bya 'thab mo la phyogs pa// byang gi phyogs su bre bar bya// de yi dam tshig 'khor lo la// sangs rgyas phyag rgya yang dag za// dbus kyi gnas su cod pardes/
189b7: phyi rol rdo rjes nye bar spras// rdo rje 'bar ba 'bar ba yi// rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru// lho ru nor bu sna tshogs pa// nub tu pad ma rdo rje'o// byung du rdo rje hUM mdzad de// gdug pa thams cad 'joms mdzad
189b8: ba'o/ / sangs rgyas rdo rje thabs chen rnams// phyi rol phyag rgya bcu drug tu// thab khung bskos pa gang yin pa// de yi bla ra rnam par bsgom// me tog shing dang spos sogs kyis// ji bzhin du ni dkyil 'khor mchod/

190a1: dang nyid khrus byas yan lag zugs// mtshags gas dang can ldan pa// rgyan rnams kun gyis rab tu smras// de dag bzang pos dbang bsgyur 'gyur// nga ni pad 'dzin rgyal ba ste// thor rdzaH dbyas na
190a2: bzhin gshegs/ / yang na rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// rdo rje sems dpa' dbang bskur ldan// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// dpung pa dam du bsdams byas te// mtshan ma 'greng bar rab gyur nas// sbyin bsreg
190a3: las ni yang dag brtsam/ / e ma'o bde ba bde chen po// 'dod chags bde ba blan med// rdo rje sems dpa' 'dod chags che// 'jig rten dbang phyug bdag grub mdzod// 'dod chags bde ba rjes dran nas/
190a4: 'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya// bud med khams ni bkug nas su// 'khrig pa bdun ni spang bar bya// mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas// dbang po nye bar zhi byas te// 'dod chags rjes dran
190a5: gyur nas ni/ / sbyin bsreg las ni yang dag brtsam// mtshan ma phyag mtshan zhes brjod de// langs pa lhag par bya ba yin// rdo rje can gyi phyag mtshan las// mkhas pas lhag par bcad par bya// rdo rje can
190a6: dang byang sems kyi/ / byang chub sems ni brtan pa dang // pha rol phyin pa drug gi mtshan// brtse bas rjes chags dngos grub ster// shes rab thabs la dga' ba bstan// rtag tu bsten par bya ba yin//
190a7: mtshan ma langs par rab gyur nas// lhag par yang ni bsten par bya// mngon 'dod rig ma sdug gang yin// de la rnal 'byor pas bya'o// lhag pas phyag rgya che gyur nas// dpung pa dam du bsdum
190a8: par bya/ / rab tu dga' ba mang po gang // de ni rab dga'is ru 'dod// gang la chags par rab brtags pa// yang dang yang du dran par bya// brtse dang byam pas yang dag blugs// khrel yod pa yi gos kyis

190b1: dgag/ / tshul khrims brtul zhugs yang dag byugs// byang chub kyi ni sems kyis brgyan// de 'dra'i brtul zhugs ldan pa yi// tshod rtsi chen po bsten par bya// gzhan yang phyi yi yan lag dag/ gang phyir
190b2: rdo rje can gyis 'dzin/ / sbyin bsreg las kyi cho ga bzhin// shar du kha ltas sbyin bsreg bya// ci skad gzhung las gsungs pa bzhin// rdo rje slob dpon gyis de bya// zhi la sangs rgyas byang chub mchog/ rgyas
190b3: la rdo rje rin chen gyis/ / rdo rje'i khro bo mngon spyod la// lcags kyu yis ni 'gugs par bshad// bcud kyis len la rdo rje'i sman// tshe 'phel de bzhin mi g.yo ba'i// rdo rje sman gyi rgya chen dang // rdo rje'i rtse
190b4: mo nor 'phel la/ / bsrung la 'khor lo tshe ga ste// bzlog pa la ni rdo rje gzungs// g.yon pa lcags sgrog phyag rgya ches// sdig pa gzhom par bya bar bshad// bcing la rdo rje bcing ba ste// gsod la rdo rje
190b5: gsod byed do/ / chags la rdo rje chags pa yis// rjes su bstan pa la yang bshad// dbang la rdo rje dbang gis so// ci 'dod gzugs la sna tshogs te// mkha' la 'gro ba'i dngos grub la/ rdo rje'i
190b6: dngos grub rnam 'phrul gyis/ pad ma'i sman gyi phyag rgya ches// rjes grub pa yi bde mchog yin// dkyil 'khor rdzogs pa'i grub pa la// rdo rje dkyil 'khor phyag rgya yis// rig pa kun bdag rgyal
190b7: po yi/ / phyag rgya'i mchog de yongs su gzung // dngos grub thams cad sgrub pa la// pad ma chen po'i sman mchog gis// lag pa g.yon pas phyag rgyab cing // g.yas pa yis ni sbyin bsreg bya/
190b8: rdo rje sna tshogs phyag rgya yis// sbyin bsreg las la rgyas gdab bya// g.yon pa hUM ldan sdigs 'dzub ste// g.yas pa mche ba gtsigs pa ste// mngon spyod kyi ni phyag rgya yis// rus pa'i phye mas

191a1: phyogs rnams bcing / / oM su~M ba ni sr-i b+ha ni hU~M/ gr-ih+Na grih+Na hUM// grih+NA pa ya grid pa ya hUM/ a na ya ho b+ha ga bAn bi dA rA dza hU~M phaT// g.yon bcos 'chad dang ldan zhing // g.yas pa yis ni sbyin
191a2: bsreg bya/ sangs rgyas chos ni snyoms 'jug pas// til bsregs pa sa ni sdig pa bsregs// oM sarba pA baM d+ha ha na badz+ra ye sA tra// lag pa g.yon pa rin chen gyur// g.yas pa yis ni sbyin bsreg bya//
191a3: 'bru bdun yang na rin chen nas// yo byad kun gyis mnyes par bya// oM mi Ni rad na kra ma ka ye swA hA// shin tu mnyam par gzhag pas ni// mngar bas me ni rab sbar te// rnal 'byor pas ni 'brus
191a4: bsregs na/ / khyim ni nges par rgyas par 'gyur// oM badz+ra pusta ye swA hA/ shin du mngar ba'i bud shing gis// me ni rab tu sbar byas te// ku sha'i myu gu til bcas pas// sbyin bsreg byas na bsrung don mchog/
191a5: oM badz+ra a pra ti ha da badz+ra swA hA/ yam shing mngar bo nyid dang ni// de bzhin dur ba'i myu gu dag/ mar sbags rdo rje'i phyag rgyas yis// bsregs ni tshe 'phel byed pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra a yu She swA hA/
191a6: bud shing cha ba rnams kyi ni// rdo rje khro bdag ting 'dzin gyis// thab khung du ni me sbar to// tsher ma rnams kyis dgug par bya// oM badz+rA a kar sha ya swA hA/ de bzhin sna tshogs thams cad kyis// mkhas
191a7: pa yis ni me sbar te/ / rtag tu chu skyes sbyin bsreg byas// rdo rje 'ching bar 'gyur ba yin// oM badz+ra ban d+ha ya baM/ de bzhin sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// mkhas pa su yam shing bsreg bya zhing // 'bras bu kha
191a8: ba'i sbyin bsreg byas/ / skad cig gis ni gsod par 'gyur// oM badz+ra ma ra na ya hUM/ de bzhin pa la sha dmar po// bsregs na dbang du byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra ra ga na ye hrIHsha bas pas ni sbyin

191b1: bsreg byas/ de bzhin chags par byed pa'i mchog/ oM bad+hU sha~M kar ya swA hA/ khros pas 'dod pa'i 'bras bsregs na// ci 'dod gzugs ni zab par 'gyur// oM badz+raka ma dra ba r+d+ha swA / !/
191b2: badz+ra kha ra tsi ri ni swA hA/ bung shing ro ni kha ba yis// shin du khros pas me s+pha re te// khros pas rdo rje me tog bsregs// rdo rje bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// hUM badz+ra shing ka re ye swA hA/ oM R+R-i te ba
191b3: ka ra ya swA hA/ dngos grub kun gyi cho ga bzhin// mkhas pas nyungs dkar sbyin bsreg bya// yungs dkar shin du bkra shis pas// dngos grub sbyin bsreg mchog yin no// oM surba sidi d+ha ye swA
191b4: hA/ rig pa 'dzin pa grub bya'i phyir// mkhas pas swa sti kA bsreg bya// grub po'i dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// sbyin bsreg rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor du// oM sid d+ha sid d+ha ye swA hA/ oM da la a ti bi ta
191b5: ye swA hA/ maN Da la a ti ba ta ye swA hA/ oM g+huHswA hA/ oM b+hu ba tA hA/ oM swa swA hA/ oM b+hur burba sa AH/ oM swasti swA hA/ oM swa ste nAHswA hA/ oM sid d+hi pra b+ha ta ye swA hA/ oM sarba duHkha u pa sha ma ne swA hA/
191b6: oM badz+re sidad+ha ye swA hA/ oM kar+ya kar ni bus shan ti ke swA hA/ yi ge phaT ni mngon spyod la// yi ge dza yis 'gugs par 'gyur// yi ge baM ni bcing la sbyar// dbang du b+ha la yi ge shrI// yi ge hUM na
191b7: sngags la sbyar/ / gseng ba la yang yi ge hUM// tsa ni bsrung ba bzang po la// yi ge suM ni bzlog pa la// shrIs ni sna tshags gzugs bsgrub bya// oM ni mi snang bstan pa la// ton chags dang dgug pa la//
191b8: u ni gsang ba'i dag pa 'dzin// mngon spyod ldan la yi ge hU~M// hU~M ni rdzu 'phrul sgrub byed pa// lha mo chen po sgrub la A// oM ni kun la nges par sbyar// yam shing ser po rgyas pa la// zhi ba la ni dkar/

192a1: bal dbang dbyab dam poH// nag pa mngon stod las la'o// bamar gyis byugs paste// rgyas pa lan 'am bcas// dbang du bral lan mar la// chab dang bam mngon sdud la/
192a2: dbye ba rgya chen dag gis ni// sbyin bsreg las rnams shes par bya// de nyid sbyin bsreg nyi shu 'di// rdo rje 'chang gis gsang ba yin// de kho na nyi shu pa zhes bya ba sbyin bsreg gi gsang ba'o//
192a3: de nas dngos grub thabs chen po// thams cad 'grub 'dod dkyil 'khor du// grub pa'i sbyor ba'i cho ga yis// dngos grub tshogs kyi sbyor ldan zhing // rdo rje yi ni slob dpon che// brtan bcas rigs su
192a4: yang dag skyes/ / theg pa chen por yang dag gnas// bskal pa grangs med mthar thug par// chos kyi shing rta che la zhon// shes rab thabs dang yang dag ldan// sems can kun gyi don la brtson// sangs rgyas
192a5: kun gyis yongs su bzung / / slob dpon chen po'i tshul la gnas// mchog tu sa yi mthar phyin pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi rigs su kyis// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub che// bgegs rnams thams cad bsal
192a6: nas ni/ / dkyil 'khor gnas su yang dag ldan// sbyin bsreg cho ga byas nas kyang // chos sbyin chen po yang dag brtsam// dam chos snying po bcud las byung // sangs rgyas mchod pa bla med pa// byang chub sems
192a7: dpa'i rnam par 'phrul/ / shes rab thabs kyi tshul thob byed// rgyal chen shes rab chen po dang // thabs kyis mad 'byung chos nyid do// bram ze bzhin du rigs mchog skyes// byang chub sems dpa'i gsang
192a8: chen 'dzin/ / gal ti nus na skal chen gyis// gang tshe mchod pa rtsom pa nas// ji srid byin par gyur gyi bar// bza' ba dag ni mi bya'o// ngi dang bcas pa'i legs sbyar ba'i// yang na dkar gsum bza' bar bya//

192b1: gad phyir rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// byin gyis rlab pa mdzad par 'gyur// ci ste bzod ldan nyin mtshan du// bza' ba dag ni mi bya ste// gang phyir chos kyi rang bzhin zas// tshim par 'gyur bar the tshom med/ dkyil 'khor
192b2: dag ni dag byas shing / / dri rnams kun gyis mngon 'dus byas// sngags kyis bsangs pa'i chu yis ni// thams cad kun nas chag chag gdab// gang tshe mchod par byed pa na// phyogs rnams kun gyi phyag bya zhing //
192b3: bshags dang gsol ba gdab nyid dang // mchod pa'i sprin dang rjes yi rang // bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i// las rnams rim bzhin byas nas ni// dkyil 'khor chen po mnyam dbus su// sems dpa'i
192b4: dkyil dkrung bca' bar bya/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad bsdus pa yi// dkyil dkrung rnam pa bcu ru bshad// gsang chen de nyid mchog 'di ni// dkyil 'khor thams cad mchod pa'o// dpal dang bkra shis
192b5: sdigs 'dzub byed/ / de bzhin g.yas kyi byed dkrung nyid// phyi rol brgyad dang bzhugs pa'o// de bzhin rin chen rang bzhin te// de dag bcu ru rang bzhin bshad// dkyil dkrung brgya dang bcu lhag pa// gsang ba'i rgyud
192b6: kyi gsang ba yi/ / rgyud de las ni rab tu bshad// sems dpa'i dkyil mo dkrung bcas te// sangs rgyas la dmigs sems kyis ni// rgyu dang mi rgyu 'jig rten gsum// byams pa chen po rjes dran nas// dang
192b7: polo sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin mchog/ rnal 'byor pas ni snyoms 'jug bya// de nas dkyil 'khor rgyal po mchog/ de nas yang ni las rgyal po// ting 'dzin lhag pa'i bzang po nas// bcu phrag gcig lhag
192b8: brgya ru bshad/ las thams cad pa gsum du brjod// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// ting 'dzin sbyor ba med par ni// dkyil 'khor brtan par mi 'gyur ro// dkyil 'khor sbyor ba med par ni// dngos grub

193a1: nyid ni 'byung mi 'gyur/ / de bas rtag tu 'bad pas ni// ting 'dzin dngos grub dkyil 'khor bya// gal te mchog tu gsang pa ni// bla med theg pa'i gsang 'dod na// ting 'dzin gsum gyi spyod yul ni/
193a2: de nas yang dag bshad par bya// de nas byung sems rnam 'phrul du// sos ska bos mi nus so// de rnams kyin ti 'dzin mchog/ sems nyid kyis ni yang dag bya// dang po'i skad pas pa gdu bzhin//
193a3: sangs rgyas kyis ni rnam 'phrul bshad// blo ldan byang sems ting 'dzin gyis// bdag nyid rdzu 'phrul chen por bsam// dka' thub sna tshogs drag po ni// bdag gis byas par bsam par bya// 'og min zhes
193a4: bya gnas yin pa/ / lha yi gnas ni bsam par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus pa yis// dag pa'i 'dus pa rnam par bsam// dang por sangs rgyas phyag byas nas// de nas thub rnams la de bzhin// bka'
193a5: mnos ji skad bstan pa yi/ / slar yang dkyil dkrung bca' bar bya// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// kun du dga' byed bsam par bya// mtshan nyid thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i// bdag nyid sangs rgyas
193a6: sku dang ni/ / sangs rgyas kun gyis dbang bskur ba// lnga ni bdag nyid la bsam bya// rdo rje'i gnas su 'dug bya zhing // rtse mo mthon por bsam par bya// dang po sbyor ba zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to//
193a7: rdo rje shar du 'dug bya zhing // sangs rgyas 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang spro// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sprul// rgyal po dang bcas rigs dkyil 'khor// sgo srungs
193a8: sgeg mo las sogs dang / / lha mo dang bcas phyag rgya yis// sbyor bas rdo rje can dbang bskur// rdo rje'i las su yang dag bya'o// bdag nyid kyis ni mkha' dbyings su// sangs rgyas thams cad mos byas te/

193b1: kyi 9// nga nga dgaH/ la ma/ la shA/ pa nA// sa rnas sa da k+Shak+Sha k+sha paSh+TA
193b2: gzugaH/ sgrub pa dang ni dbang dra ba// b+ha ba 'di ni mchog yin no// rang gi rigs ga dkyil 'khor du// gnas de lhag par mos par bya// 'khor lo ji bzhin bkod rje snron// b+hag r+b+ha rje bzhin dbang byas
193b3: pa'o/ / las kyi rgyal po mchog ces bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin to// rang nyid khrus byas yan lag zugs// rgyan dang gos ni sna tshogs ldan// dpung rgyan gdab pa nyid dang ni// de bzhin sor gdub dang rgyan bcas// gis
193b4: skud mu tig dang ldan pa'i/ / lag pa rkang pa de nas ste// lus kun rnam par brgyan 'gyur ba// de bzhin ko shwa'i ris lhag pa'i// gos dag bzang po bgos zhing bsang // yang na tshes gos 'dzin pa ste// sangs
193b5: rgyas phyag rgya rgyal mtshan bzhin/ / gal te skra bregs dge slong de// ring zhing 'khyil la mdog sngo pa'i// sgra ni sngon po bcing bar bya// yang na rang gi mgo la skyes// bdag nyid rdo rje sems dpa' 'am// yang na rdo rje/
193b6: las su bya// rnal 'byor rang bzhin gsang med par// dngos grub bzang po thob mi 'gyur// dkyil 'khor dbus su mnyam pa ru// ci rigs par ni 'dug nas su// shar du kha bltas langs nas ni// khengs
193b7: pa med cing ma 'khrul bar/ / rdo rje snyoms par yongs su bskor// mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya// bstod pa byas nas rang bdag nyid// dngos grub sbyor ba yang dag bya// snying
193b8: chen po sbyor ba yis/ / bdag gis drang srong bskul bar bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' che// don yod dbang phyug dam pas// theg pa che mchog skyes pa'i mchog/ byang chub sems dpa' bdag grub mo //

194a1: sems dpa' dun po zabs chen pa// rdo rdzal par lam chad pan// dngas zlab can btu 'phrul pa// dza rjes pas dpa' bdag d+hA yadzang // dzarnga mang na yang dgag nga // rtags rnams can dum dag
194a2: la la gas pa ga / sa nga A m+b+haT+Ta// da rdzu / d+d+ha gnan sa / ng+gA
194a3: can rjemams dpa' ste/ / de nyid phyag rgya yangs su gzang // yangs nas tshig ni brjod par bya// bdag ni de rjesems dpa' ste// dkyil la bar chen por bsgrub pa// rdo rje las sogs kun gshegs shig/
194a4: bdag ni rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje sems dpar bdag grub mdzod// tshon chen la bsgyur dri ldan pa'i// srang bu lhag pa grims par bsgral// rdo rje srad bu phyag rgya ches// dkyil 'khor chen po theg pa dab bya// 'khor la
194a5: ji bzhin bkod ji zhi/ / ji bzhin gzhung gi rjes 'brangs nas// dkyil 'khor 'khor lo ji bzhin bri// rdo rje'i thig ni yongs su gang ba// de nas da yi rang rag gsang // 'khor lo chen po rab tu sgrub// dkyil 'khor
194a6: can pa' 'a bar la ni/ / rims bzhin du bshad par bya// bzhi pa la sgo bzhig// babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa'i// ga pa k+shi nga na yang dag ldan// da dang phreng bas na par bca// rnams kyi
194a7: tsani thams cad dang / / sgra yaM sgo khrud mtshams su ni// rdo rje rin chen rnams kyis spras// phyi yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// de yi nang gi rim pa ni// 'khor lo / khur bri ba drug// rdo rje phreng bas yongs su
194a8: bskor/ / ba brgyad kyis nye bar mdzes// rdo rje ka ba'i mdun gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// ji ltar phyi dang nang gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor re re rnam par dbye// dkyil 'khor

194b1: nidabus nyid bya/ dkyil 'khor lnga bris gang yin de// kab mchog ni brgyad kyis spras// dkyil 'khor bzhi pa yin par bshad// dbus kyi shin du dbus song nas// mos 'dzin rgyal po chen po ste/
194b2: rnam par snang mdzad khyab bang dag ni// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du// dkyil 'khor rnams kyi dbus su ni// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi po yang //
194b3: go rims bzhin du yang dag bri// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mdun rtsab rten gnas pa yin// rdo rje lcags kyu ga yas phyogs sa// nub kyi phyogs su bdud 'joms pa// rdo rje legs pa rgyal po
194b4: re/ / chos 'dzin chen po dbang dang ldan// chos 'dzin pa ni byang du ste// mdun du rdo rje bsnyems tshul lo// de la de yi snying po gsang // shin du rtogs par byed pa'i mchog/ sdug bsngal kun las rab
194b5: grol byed/ / byang chub sems ni rab bskul ba// hU dza hos/ shar phyogs cha yi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// dkyil 'khor de yi dbus de ru// mi bskyod pa ni dgod par bya//
194b6: rdo rje shugs kyi snying pa ni// the tshom gcod pa sngon 'gro can// tshogs sngon 'gro ba bzang po ste// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms byed// oM be ka kra ma ho// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsang ba che// thub pa skyes
194b7: mchog mi bskyod pa/ / glang po phyag rgyal gnas shing // zha ba'i phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// de la snying po 'di yin te// hA/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad tu// rdo rje mchog rnams dgod pa ni// rgan rnams
194b8: thams cad kyis spras shing / / khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal ba che// rdo rje lcags kyu bstan pa che// rdo rje 'dod chags bdud chen po// rdo rje legs pa rdzu 'phrul mo// rdo rje rin

195a1: chen dgod par bya/ / rdo rje chags pa gang bshad pa// rdo rje chos ni dgod par bya// rdo rje legs par gang bshad pa// rdo rje las ni yongs su gzung // dam tshig rnam pa bzhi po ni// 'khor los sgyur
195a2: bdagod par bya/ / thams cad sangs rgyas cod pan ldan// 'khor los sgyur bar dbang bskur ba// rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las// pad ma sna tshogs dga' chen po// bcom ldan rnam par snang mdzad kyi//
195a3: byang chub mchog de yang dag gzung // yan lag 'gyur ba lhag ma rnams// rdo rje sems dpa' la sogs dgod// de nas sangs rgyas rigs bzhag ste// rdo rje'i rigs kyi snying po la// phyag rgya dang ni snying
195a4: po bshad/ / rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung // hUM dza ho swa/ yi ge dza sogs bshad pa la// yi ge o ni yang dag dgod// ho d+ha chos dbyings yi ge a// yi ge swa ni yongs su bsgyur// rdo rje shugs kyis lhor song
195a5: nas/ / rin chen 'byung ldan dkyil 'khor lo// bcom ldan mchog ni yongs su 'dzin// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad tu// rdo rje rin chen la sogs bri// rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang //
195a6: rin chen so yi rgyan bcas pa// de la rnams kyi snying po ni// oM aHtra ha/ nub kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su// de yi dbus su rdo rje chos// 'od dpag med ni dgod par
195a7: bya'o/ / de yi snying po ni hrIH// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad tu// rdo rje pad ma la sogs bri// pad ma rnon po de bzhin rgyu// sgrub pad ma phyag rgya bcas// de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni// hrIHdaM mer//
195a8: rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// byang gi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// bcom ldan 'das ni don yod grub// sangs rgyas nyid ni dgod par bya// de yi snying po ni kaM/ de yi phyogs rnams thams cad tu/

195b1: rdordurdul las sogs pa bri// thams cad bsrung ba gnod sbyin che// las dang 'a chung shin du brtan// de la 'di rnams kyi snying po ni// kah+Na thA ga/ dbus kyi 'khrur lnga'i tha bzhi dra// lA mo bzhin yang dag kra/
195b2: rdo rje rin chen de bzhin las// pad ma lha mo bzhi ru bshad// de la de rnams kyi snying po ni// oM a hrI aM// thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po las cha dang po'i dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs s+ho//
195b3: dkyil 'khor dbus ma rdzogs nas ni// phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bri// phyag rgya de ni byin brlab pa// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung // byang chub mchog tu dbus nas mchog/ shis pa shar gyi phyag rgya ste// lce yi/
195b4: phyogs su mchog sbyin no// nub tu chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin// byang du mi 'jigs sbyin zhes pa// don yod grub pas yongs su gzung // phyag rgya lhag ma phyag mtshan bcas// de nas rdo rje sems tshogs bri// dkyil
195b5: 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las rdo rje 'khor lo chen po'i dbus kyi cha zhes bya ba rdzogs s+ho/ / // rdo rje shugs kyis song nas su// shar phyogs kyi ni dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje rigs chen
195b6: nyams dga' ba'i/ / dkyil 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri// ka ba brgyad ni rdo rje che// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rnam par brgyan// dkyil 'khor bzhi dang ldan pa yi// rdo rje'i 'khor lo yongs su dgod// de yi shar gyi
195b7: dbus su ni/ / sangs rgyas gzugs can yang dag bri// ud pal sngon po 'od chen ldan// khros bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// drag po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab// rdo rje to don tor 'dzin// khro bo rdo rje'i
195b8: lta ba 'dzin/ / gtum pa thams cad rab 'dul byed// sangs rgyas mdun du rdo rje 'dzin// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// de bzhin 'bar dbus pad ma dang // de bzhin rin chen sna tshogs mtshan// de nyid

196a1: shar gyi 'khor lo che/ / shar gyi cha ru song nas ni// de yi dkyil 'khor dbus bu ni// rdo rje du mdzad yang dag bri// zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// phyag rngu brgyad ni yongs su 'dzin// mche bdag/
196a2: ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bcas bzhin ni 'dzum ldan pa'i// lcags kyu rdo rje lcags sgrog dang // zhags pa phyag rgya bzhi ru bshad// mda' dang gzhu ni gnyis su 'dzin// gnyis ni yi ge hUM gis bsdus// des
196a3: ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis/ / dbang phyug chen po mnan par bya// g.yas pas lha mo u ma ye// nu ma'i bar du mnan pa ste// g.yon brkyang ba yis legs par gnas// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab 'di ldan//
196a4: sku mdog sngon po drag bste// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya// thams cad khro ba'i 'bar bas khyab// mche bdag ni cung zad gtsis/
196a5: khro bo sems dpa' khri rdo rje// de bzhin khro bo chags pa ste// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor bskor bar bya// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// khro bo'i rgyal po g.yas phyogs su// khro bo'i bdag nyid chen pos bso/
196a6: dbus su khro bo khro gnyer can// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo'i dbang bskur ldan// thams cad bri zhing yang dag dgod// khro gnyer can gyi dkyil 'khor mchog/ de yi phyogs rnams
196a7: thams cad du/ / rin chen khro bo dgod par bya// khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang // khro bo bzhad pa shin du byung // dkyil 'khor dam pa gsum pa ru// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// khro ba'i bdag nyid
196a8: chen por bskor/ / rdo rje'i sngoni yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad rtsa// pad ma'i khro bo dgod par bya// chos dang non pa de bzhin rgya// bzhad pa khro bo rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas

196b1: ri las kyi rigs mchog chen po la/ / las kyi rgyal ba bdag nyid cha// rdorje dbab pa yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// las kyi khro ba la sogs bri// las kyi gnang sbyin glen pa dang // bcu
196b2: ba'i rdzu 'phrul khu tshur ne/ / dkyil 'khor lnga po kun du bri// de ni rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// dkyil 'khor chen po che zhes bya// gsang ba de nyid tshegs kyi bdag/ de nas kun gyi snying po ni// rdo rje rigs kun nyim
196b3: dga' ba'i/ / yi ga tu ni 'dir brjod do// drag po ha ha zhes sgrogs hUM// hUM hUM zhes sgrogs 'jigs par byed// de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal po ni// rdo rje'i gsang ba legs 'dus bya// 'khor lo dkyil 'khor ka/
196b4: narnams su// lha mo bzhin yang dag bri// khro ba'i sems ma rin chen dang // pad ma dang ni las shes bya// kun nas mtshams rnams ngag tu ni// phyag rgya dam bcas de dag gzung // dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal
196b5: po las cha gnyis pa rdzogs so/ / shar phyogs kyi cha'i dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// / dbus kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yi// ka ba'i phyi rol dkyil 'khor du// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu// gar ma lha mo
196b6: phyag rgya bcas/ / shar gyi rdo rje rigs nyid la// phyi rol gnas su de bzhin nyid// nyi ma la bskyed bzhi po ni// rdo rje lha mos yongs su bzung // rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba// yi ge hUM ni kun du dgod//
196b7: bzhin sangs rgyas rigs rgyal po// yi ge hUM ni 'dir brjod do// phyag rgya rang gi yan lag 'gyur// rdo rje'i phyag rgya yongs su gzung // phyag rgya thams cad rab sbyor bas// de dag gsang zhing mchog gsang bshad//
196b8: dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rdo rje rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // lho yi rin chen dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis sor nas

197a1: kyang / nga ru phun tshegs dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo lnga po dgod par bya// de yi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// rin chen chen po tA la bcibs// sangs rgyas
197a2: nyi ba de bzhin gshegs 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku/ / 'od zer phreng bas kun du khyab// rin chen phreng ba mchog 'dzin pa'i// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis brgyan pa// so yi phreng ba rab bzhad cing //
197a3: so yi phreng ba'i phyag rgyar ldan// the bo'i rtse mo rgyal mtshan 'dzin// nyi ma'i dbus na sangs rgyas che// zla ba lta bu'i bdud rtsi'i sku// rdo rje rin chen skal ba che// rdo rje nyi ma'i rigs mchog go// de yi phyogs
197a4: nams thams cad tu/ / rin chen sems dpa' yang dag ldan// rin chen sems dpa' pad ma dang // de bzhin rdo rje las nyid do// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// 'khor los sgyur bas rnam
197a5: par brgyan/ / rin chen chen po rigs las byung // nor bu'i rdo rje nyi ma 'dzin// de nas snying po ni traM/ lho yi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// de yi dbus su sems dpa' ma//
197a6: nor bu'i 'od can yang dag bri// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// sangs rgyas rdo rje'i dbang bskur ldan// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen de bzhin yang dag bri// rin chen sems
197a7: dpa' de bzhin chags/ / rgyal po legs pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje rin chen sogs phyag rgya// rang gi phyag rgya phyag mtshan phrag/ rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // lho yi gnas kyi steng 'dug nas// rin
197a8: chen rigs chen bzang po la/ / rdo rje rin chen bzang po bri// rin chen bzhi yi dbang bskur ldan// sangs rgyas spyi bo 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// rin chen phreng ba'i dab

197b1: bskur ldan/ / de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// sems dpa' bzhi ni yang dag bri// rin chen rgyal po rgyal mtshan dang // bzhad dang rin chen rgyal po che// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // nub kyi rdo rje dkyil
197b2: 'khor la/ / pad ma rin chen bdag nyid che// rin chen phreng bas dbang bskur 'di// rin chen pad ma'i mchog 'dzin pa// sangs rgyas dbu rgyan sems dpa' che// rin chen zhi ba yongs su 'dzin// zur mag
197b3: 'dod chags chags pa'i spyan/ / skyes bu 'dul ba la gzigs pa// pad ma 'dzin pa'i rgyal po che// 'jig rten dbang phyug tshe dpag med// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen pad ma yang dag bri//
197b4: rin chen pad ma de bzhin no// de bzhin rgyu dang smra ba 'dzin// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang gi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor la// rin chen las chen rgyal ba ni// bdag nyid chen pos yang dag bri// bcom ldan
197b5: thub pa'i dbang po don yod grub/ / las kun 'dzin pas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa'i// rdo rje las te rgyal po mdzod 'dzin pa// 'khor los sgyur ba'i gtso bo mchog dam pa// sangs rgyas dbu rgyan las rnams
197b6: bzhi dang ldan/ / rgyan rnams kun gyis yan lag legs par brgyan// las kyi rin chen dam pas rgyas gdab cing // rin chen dkyil 'khor tshogs chen mchog gyur pa'i// de yi phyogs rnams
197b7: thams cad ru/ / las kyi rin chen yang dag bri// las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang // de yi bsdu ba'i khu tshur 'dzin// de nas kun gyi snying po ni// dzA rin chen rigs chen rnal 'byor pa// yog tA na brjod par bya/
197b8: tsi rigs par ni rang nyid kyi// phyag rgya phyag mtshan yang dag bri// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las rkang pa gsum pa rdzogs so// lho grogs cha'i dkyil 'khor ya

198a1: rdzogs so/ / de nyid kyi ni grwa bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// phyi yi dkyil 'khor mdun gnas su// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// sems ma'i rin chen de bzhin chos// las ma 'khor lo'i dkyil//
198a2: 'khor du// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu// gar ma rnam par sgeg ma yi// nor bu rigs chen bzang po ni// rin chen phyag rgyas kun khyab la// phyag mchog rang gi phyag rgyas mtshon// 'od zer phreng bas khyab 'od ldan//
198a3: rin chen rdo rjes dbang bskur ba// rang rang phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// rin chen mtshon cha sna tshogs thogs// rin chen las byung rin chen ldan// rin chen rang bzhin khang par gnas// spos dang rin chen me tog
198a4: bcas/ / rin chen mchog chen la gnas shing // lus la rin chen gos gyon pa// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las nor bu'i rigs/
198a5: chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so// // rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // nub kyi pad ma'i dkyil 'khor la// pad ma'i rigs chen bzang po ni// dga' ba chen pos yang dag bri// de yi nub kyi dkyil 'khor la// dkyil
198a6: 'khor lnga ni yang dag bri/ / dbus kyi lte ba'i 'khor lo la// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// pad ma bzang po mdab ma brgyad// mdab ma brgyad pa yid 'ong pa// chos dbyings brtan pa'i rnal 'byor
198a7: can/ pad ma'i phreng bas rnam par mdzes// de yi dbus su rgyal po che// sna tshogs gzugs can rang bzhin mchog/ sangs rgyas shes rab thabs ldan pa// chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 'dzin// pad ma gcig
198a8: po de gnas shing / / de yi dkyil 'khor la brten pa// pad ma'i sems dpa' bzhi po bri// 'khor los sgyur ba 'jigs pa med// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// sangs rgyas pad ma dbang bskur ldan// rdo rje

198b1: bdapa las sogs bri/ / pad ma'i sems dpa' 'jigs pa med// kun kyang sangs rgyas rjod pan ldan// rdzas kyi phyung bas dbang bskur bas// pad ma'i phyag mtshan mtshon rna bsdams// sangs rgyas
198b2: 'phrul pas rnam par rol/ / pad ma'i sems dang de bzhin rgyal// rin chen chos ni tshul chen po// dam tshig mchog rnams bzhi pa ni// rim pa bzhin du yang dag bri// nub kyi shar gyi dkyil 'khor du/
198b3: rdo rje'i shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dbus su rgyal po che// sna tshogs 'khor lo dgod par bya// chos kyi snying po rab tu gnas// pad ma 'dab ma brgyad la brten// pad ma'i ge sar dbus su ni//
198b4: sna tshogs gzugs can dgod par bya// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis spras pa// gzugs bzang ldan pa'i sku mnga' ba// sangs rgyas lnga yi dbang bskur ldan/ spyan gsum phyag ni brgyad pa ste// thor
198b5: tshugs tshangs pa dpral bar dbang / / me tog mtshon cha smin mtshams su// mig la nyi ma zla ba dgod// tha skar gzhon nu rna ba la// khyab 'jug sna yi rtse mo ste// mche ba nag po gsus po che// lce la
198b6: dbyangs can ma yin te/ / gsung dbyangs la ni dbyangs chen ma// ku mu ta drang pad phreng can// kha dang 'gram pa dag la gnas// spyan la shes rab pha rol phyin// gdong gi phyed ni sprul par byed//
198b7: zag pa g.yas par seng ges// g.yon pa brag na yang dag gnas// sA yi bu gu gnyis la ni// rgya mtsho nye bar gdung ba dag/ dga' bo nye dga' dpung pa la// stob la ni rgya mchog nas// 2dra
198b8: g.yas pal dpung chen gnas/ / tshogs kyi dbang phyug dpung pa la// lha chen dbang phyug chen po ni// mtshan ma'i steng gi sgo na gnas// dpal be'u snying kha la gnas te// lhag pa lha mo chen po

199a1: dpal/ / 'gag kha ya skA dra ni// gshin rje'i rgyal po rnam par brten// rjod dang 'jigs byed lha mo che// pus po la ni yang dag gnas// rkang pa'i sor mo bcul ni// ba mo btsun kun du gnas// drag pa
199a2: rje nga gnas pa nyid/ / chu sa lha mo rgyab na gnas// dpyid dang sos ka dbyar dang ni// stor dang dgun dang dgun slad lha// g.yas pa dang ni g.yon pa yi// rkang pa dag la yang dag gnas// 'og ga 'khor la rtsibs
199a3: stong la/ drag po'i phung po 'ching ba dang // sgrag can thag bzangs ris snang byed// lha ma yin rnams kun du gnas// lag pa bcu yi thal mo la// pha rol phyin pa bcu dag gnas// mngon par 'dod pa nyid dag gi/
199a4: chen la sogs 'di dag bri// zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste// zhal re zhing ni spyan gsum pa'i// gos dang gzugs ni bzang por ldan// de 'dra'i rang bzhin thub pa dgod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du//
199a5: pad ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri// pad ma'i sems dpa' lcags kyu dang // mda' dang pad ma legs par smin// nub kyi lho ya phyogs mchog tu// pad ma'i shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dbus su sems
199a6: dpa' ma/ na ngan pad ma yang dag bri// zhal ni bcu gnyis ldan pa nyid// phyag bcu gnyis dang ldan pa'i mchog/ rin chen pad mar yang dag bzhugs// rin chen las ni 'byung bar 'dod// de yi phyogs rnams tham
199a7: cad du/ pad pa'i rin chen dri sogs bri// khro gnyer nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan dang // de bzhin zhal ni bcu gcig pa// nub kyi phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dbus su sems dpa' /
199a8: 'od dpag med ni dgod par bya// pad ma chen po rab ster ba// pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug gtso// spyan dang phyag ni stong par ldan// phyag rgya mtshor cha thams cad bcad// zhal bcu gnyis pa bzang po ste// pad ma'i

199b1: me yang dag ldan/ pha rol byin pa bcu dang ldan// tshogs kyi dbus na rnam par rol// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad ma'i sems dpa' yang dag bri// sgrol ma gzhon nu'i mthu can dang // mgrin sngon
199b2: tshangs pa'i mdog las byung / / nub kyi byang gi cha ru ni// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dbus su sems dpa' che// pad ma la sogs dgod par bya// zhal drug phyag ni bcu gnyis pa'i// phyag rgya
199b3: mtshon ra 'dzin pa'i mchog/ chen po sna tshogs rab ster bas// pad ma las ni yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad dra// pad ma gar gyi dbang phyug rgyal// dkyil 'khor gyi ni mdun gnas pa// pad
199b4: ma'i srin po gnod sbyin dang / / pad ma'i khu tshur yang dag bri// g.yas dang g.yon dang rgyab dang ni// mdun nyid kyi ni dkyil 'khor ro// de nas snying po ni ha// sangs rgyas kyi snying po brihrI ste// thams cad kyi snying po
199b5: yin no/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes bya ba las rkang pa bzhi pa rdzogs so// // pad ma'i rigs kyi tshogs dag gi/ dkyil 'khor yongs su
199b6: rdzogs nas ni/ / de yi 'khor lo'i grwa bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// pad pa'i sems dpa'i rin chen dang // las dang chos ma yang dag bri// sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu// gar ma 'di ni yang dag bri// dkyi
199b7: 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las pad ma'i rigs chen po zhes bya ba rdzogs so/ / byang gi las kyi dkyil 'khor du// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dkyil 'khor rgyal par//
199b8: 'khor lo lnga lnga dgod par bya// de yi dbus su las chen po// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// chos 'dzin pa yi rgyal po che// nam mkha' lding gi gdan la bzhugs// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du/

200a1: las kyi phyag rgya yang dag bri// las kyi sems dpa' rin chen dang // de bzhin las dang chos nyid do// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas ni// byang gi shar gyi dkyil 'khor la// mi bskyod pa ni sangs rgyas che/
200a2: rdo rje las ni dgod par bya// de yi mchod pa mtshon cha bcas// de yi phyag rgya bcas pa bzung // las chen 'dzin pa bzang po ste// sangs rgyas mdzad pa yang dag ldan// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad da// las
200a3: kyi sems dpa' yang dag bri/ / sems dpa' chags pa'i rgyal po che// legs pa de bzhin las nyid do// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang gi lho yi cha ru ni// rin chen ting 'dzin rgyal po che// rin chen las ni
200a4: yang dag bri/ / rin chen char ni rab 'bebs shing // sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu 'joms// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rin chen las ni yang dag bri// sems dpa'i gzi brjid rgyal mtshan dang //
200a5: las dang bzhad pa rnam skyong ba// las kyi rin chen bzang po la// rin chen dkyil 'khor yang dag ldan// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang gi nub kyi cha ru ni// pad ma'i las kyi sems dpa' che//
200a6: dkyil 'khor dbus su yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// pad ma'i las ni yang dag bri// pad ma rnon po de bzhin rgyu// de bzhin smra ba las yin no// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang gi byang
200a7: phyogs dkyil 'khor la/ / las chen 'dzin pa dbang ldan pa// las kyi rgyal po yang dag bri// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad rtsa// las kyi sems dpa' dgod par bya// las kyi srin po gnod sbyin dang // de
200a8: bzhin bsdu ba'i khu tshur nyid/ / de nas snying po ni aHsangs rgyas kyi snying po ni a ste// thams cad kyi snying po yin no// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes

200b1: bya ba las nang pa lnga brdugs sa/ / nga gang dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs pa// byang du 'i sar regs byas te// las kyang thal 'khar rdzogs nas// dal 'a khar la 'grub sa ma/ sbrum sha
200b2: par bya/ / sngar gyi dam tshig bzhi po ni// thams cad sum nu rtsa gsum yin// dbus ma zhes bya sum cu gsum// shar gyi phyogs na sum cu gsum// de bzhin nub kyi phyogs cha'o// byang dang l+h+wa
200b3: de bzhin no/ / dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba las las kyi rigs shes bya ba rdzogs so// / dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo thams cad kyang rdzogs so//
200b4: brgya drug cu rtsa lnga'o// / de nas dkyil 'khor 'khor lo mchog/ thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che// 'khor lo chen po'i grwa bzhi ru// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya// 'khor lo sbyor chen shar lho ru//
200b5: zla ba'i gzugs su dgod par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' dgod par bya// 'dzum zhing zla ba'i mdog can te// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar// sems dpa' dkyil dkrung
200b6: yang dag bzhugs/ / rdo rje bsnyems tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/ phyag g.yas pa na rdo rje bsnams// de bzhin g.yon na dril bu bsnams// mnyam par bzhag pa'i sems dpa' che// sems can kun gyi
200b7: don sems pa/ / de yi pad ma yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// gsang ba lnga ni yang dag bstan// dang po dang ni gnyis pa ni// g.yas kyi phyogs na yang dag
200b8: gnas/ / gsum pa dang ni bzhi pa ni// g.yon logs na ni rab tu gnas// lha mo rdo rje ca co sgrogs// dbus khyud rang gi lha mo de// de yi glon mgo sgyur zhing // 'dzum bcas kun du lta ba ste// bcom ldan 'das

201a1: kyi phyag la 'jus/ / chu srin gyi ni rgyal mtshan bsgreng // de yi glon bshad bcas zhing // rdeg byed skye dgu' bdag mo yi// rdo rje ca co'i sgra sgrogs dang // de bzhin rdo rje don yod dga'// lha mo rdo rje 'dod dbang phyus
201a2: gzi brjid dga' ba'i rdo rje ma/ / lho dang nub kyi mtshams su ni// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // de yi dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad ma chen po dgod par bya// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// pad ma'i
201a3: sems dpa' dgod par bya/ / zhal bzhi phyag ni brgyad pa ste// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor 'od bcas pa// de yi pad mar yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa// pad ma'i rigs can las byung ba//
201a4: lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// kun nas gsang ba'i lha mo yi// de nas ming ni rab bshad pa// rdo rje dpal dang rdo rje dkar// rdo rje sgron ma rdo rje can// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // nub byang mtshams kyi dkyil
201a5: 'khor du/ / nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor bris nas ni// rdo rje nyi ma yang dag ldan// nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rin chen sems dpa' dgod par bya// sngon mar gyi ni 'od kyis khyab// rgyan rnams thams cad kyis
201a6: brgyan pa'i/ / de yi pad ma yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil 'khor la brten pa// rin chen rigs chen las byung ba'i// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag bri// nam mkha' las byung mkha' rdo rje// nam mkha'i mdog can skye dgu'i
201a7: bdag/ rin chen dpal ldan lha mo che// rin chen dang bcas rigs mdzes ma// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // byang shar mtshams kyi 'khor lo la// de bzhin uta pal sngon po'i gdab// dkyil 'khor yang
201a8: dag bri bar bya/ / uta pal sngon po de dbus su// las rnams 'dzin pa chen po'i mchog/ sangs rgyas kun las sogs bshad pa// rdo rje'i las ni dgod par bya// de yi pad mar yang dag gnas// de 'od dkyil

201b1: 'khor la brten cing / / las kyi rigs can las byung ba'i// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag zi// las kyi rdo rje rin chen ma// las mchos ma dpal ldan che// ji ltar sngon du rdo rje'i rigs// de bzhin dkyil 'khor thams cad
201b2: la/ / de nyid pho nya mo ru gnas// de nyid lha mor yang dag gnas// de nyid sgeg mo rnam sgeg sogs// phyag rgya'i rgya mtsho gzhan yang byed// ser mo dmar mo nyi ma mtshungs// uta bal sngon po'i mdab 'drar 'gyur// bsnams
201b3: bcas zhi ba'i dbang bskur ldan/ / rang gi phyag rgya yongs su 'dzin// de nas snying po ni hU~M hrI oM AHdkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gas pa zhes bya ba las rkang pa
201b4: drug pa rdzogs so/ / // mtshams rnams kyi dkyil 'khor yang rdzogs so// / brgya dang brgyad bcu rtsa lngar ldan// 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs nas kyang // de yi mtshams kyi logs rnams su// lha bzhi dag ni yang
201b5: dag bri/ shar du rdo rje chen pos// rdo rje ma ltar 'bar bya'o// rdo rje rigs chen mtshan maste// 'bar ba'i phreng ba rab 'jigs pa'i lho ru rin chen phran tshogs pa// chu lha rin chen chu srin rnams// rin can gas
201b6: mtshan mam+b+ha/ sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas brjod// nub tus lha bri bar bya// rtsal ldan skyes bu zhes bya yi// dkyil 'khor chen po 'dzin byed cing // pad ma'i rigs kyi mtshan mda' yan khyang du rlung
201b7: gi skyes zin/ / rlung gi shugs kyis gos 'chang zhing // de bzhin las kyi rigs 'dzin ma// g.yo zhing rtsal ldan bri bar bya// brgya dang brgyad bcu rtsa dgu ru// dbus kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bsgrug//
201b8: kyi tshul gyi grub chen po// thar pa'i rang bzhin grong khyer che// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po las 'khor lo chen po'i dkyil 'khor gsang ba zhes bya ba rdzogs so// thun mong

202a1: mchog tu gsang ba yi/ / rdo rje rig pa 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rang rigs 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor ni// phyogs gcig tu ni bshad par bya// dkyil 'khor kun gyi dbus su ni// thub pa'i dbang
202a2: phyug rnam snang mdzad/ / seng ge pad ma'i gdan la bzhugs// de ni byang chub mchog 'dzin pa// mi bskyod pa ni glang chen bcibs// rin chen dbang ni rta la bcibs// bcom ldan tshe dpag med pa ni// rma bya'i khril
202a3: yang dag bzhugs/ / don yod grub pa bla na med// mkha' lding dbang po yang dag bzhugs// 'di rnams kyi ni bzhon par bshad// rigs mchog kun gyi dbye ba'o// mi bskyod pa yis gnon te// de bzhin rin
202a4: chen dbang mchog sbyin/ / tshe dpag med kyi ting 'dzin sbyin// don yod grub pa'i mi 'jigs sbyin// sngon po ser po de bzhin dmar// kha dog ljang khu las 'dzin pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs yid 'o/
202a5: sku mdog dkar po rab tu bsgrags// de bzhin rdo rje rin chen la// rdo rje phreng bas rdo rje mtshan// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sbyor 'byung ba// rdo rje'i ri mo yang dag bri// pad ma'i rigs chen bzang po la// pad
202a6: ma'i phreng bas pad ma mtshan/ / pad ma'i dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba// pad ma'i srad bus thig gdab bya// rin chen rigs can bzang po la// rin chen bred pas rin chen mtshan// rin chen
202a7: dkyil 'khor sbyor byung ba/ / rin chen ri mo rnam par mdzes// las kyi rigs la sna tshogs bshad// de bzhin sangs rgyas rigs mchog la// 'on kyang rdo rje khyad par gyis// rdo rje dkyil 'khor sbyor byung
202a8: ba'i/ rdo rje shar gyi phyogs cha ru// lho ru rin chen dkyil 'khor te// nub tu padam yang dag bshad// byang du las ni yang dag sbyor// rdo rje can kun khro gnyer can// rin chen tshogs ni rab bshad pa// das

202b1: chen mongs pon/ / drag po na pa las 'dzin pa// dkyil 'khor chen po'i 'khor lo ru// 'khor la chen po yang dag bri// de nas phyi rol 'khor lo sogs// chog 'di kun de dang 'dra// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po gsang /
202b2: bachen po mchog tu gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po las gas ba zhes bya ba rkang pa bdun pa rdzogs so// las kyi rnal 'byor las byung ba rdzogs so// // nang gi dkyil 'khor rdzogs nas ni// tshon rtsi lngas ni dgang
202b3: bar bya'o/ / thig dang ri mo thams cad ni// tshon rtsi kun gyis rab tu dkang // dang po nas ni za ma ru// phyi rol dkyil 'khor kun du bri// mnyam zhing kun du cha mnyam pas// gru bzhi ru ni rab tu brtag/ zur bzhi pa la mo//
202b4: bzhi po// rta babs bzhis ni mdzes byas pa// ka ba brgyad dang yang dag ldan// yid du 'ong zhing legs par phye// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang phreng bas rnam par brgyan// rdo rje rin chen srad bu yis// phyi rol dkyil
202b5: 'khor thig gar ba bya/ / kha khyer gyis ni yongs sa bskor// rdo rje kha khyer mdzes byas la// zla ba phyed pa'i lcug mas khyab// rdo rje phreng bzhi tshogs dang ldan// dra ba dra ba byed pas spras// zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes//
202b6: g.yer ka'i dra ba yang dag ldan// kha dog sna tshogs rnam par brgyan// de dang dbus kyi bar thig la// byang chub sems rnams yang dag bri// bskal pa bzang po stong dag ni// 'das pa'i rdzu 'phrul chen po rnams// shar du
202b7: thams cad rdo rje mtshan/ / lho tsho na chen phyag mtshan bsnams// nub du pad ma rdo rje sogs// byang du las kyi rdo rje bsnams// rdzu 'phrul chen po'i lha gang dag/ phyi rol thig la yang dag bri// drag po la sogs lha chen
202b8: rnams/ / snam bu las ni lus byed byung // dbang phyug chen po tshangs pa che// khyab 'jug g.yung drung gzhon nu ni// rigs bcas dpung dang bcas rgyal po// shar gyi dkyil 'khor yang dag bri// 'khyil ba'i 'od can

203a1: 6/ / gtum po dang / ser mya rdo rjeser sgra rnams// rigs bcas 'khor lo yang dag ldan// s+tha yi phyogs su yang dgra bres// myos pa phreng ldan rgyal nyid pa// rnam par rgyal dang skyel byed rnams// rigs pacas
203a2: dpung dang yang dag ldan/ nub kyi cha ru yang dag bre// kashegs can ma dang rlung // rdo rje 'jigs byed la sogs rnams// nub kyi cha las 'og tu ni// byang gi cha ru yang dag bri// de bzhin
203a3: dbyang dang bdag por bcas/ / ma mo 'jig rten rab grags dang // gtso bo 'khor lo rnam rol pa// lha min la sogs rdzu 'phrul che// phyi rol 'khor lo'i rigs su bshad// rgyad chen gsang ba zhes bya las//
203a4: stong phrag bcu ru bshad pa rnams ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri// phyi yi dkyil 'khor gnas zur du// dkyil 'khor bzhi ni bri bar bya// me tog spos la sogs ldan pa// mched pa'i lha mo yang dag bri// ji ltar
203a5: nus shing bri ba dang / ji ltar mdzes shing rjes su mthun// ji ltar rang gi rigs bshad pa// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po dkyil 'khor chen po gsang zhing mchog tu gsang ba zhes
203a6: bya ba las phyi rol gyi dkyil 'khor mchog tu mdzes pa zhes bya ba rkang pa brgyad pa rdzogs so/ / // de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po ma lus pa rdzogs so// / de nas de bzhin gshegs pa
203a7: thams cad kyi gsang pa'i dkyil 'khor 'di la sangs rgyas kyi byang chub ma lus pa dgug pa 'di 'byung / / 'di lta/ byang chub kyi sems dang / pha rol du phyin pa drug dgug pa nyid dang / byer mi ldog pa'i sa lathas
203a8: la mkhas pa chen po 'jug par byed pa nyid dang / / don thams cad la mngon du phyogs pa dang // mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa dang // byang chub chen po'i tshogs bsags pa dang // sems can gyi ngan la mi slu ba dang /

203b1: theg pa chen po 'di las theg pa gzhan la 'dod pa mi skyed cing 'gyur ba med par 'ching ba nyid dang / thabs dang / shes rab dang / ting nge 'dzin dang / gzungs dang / spyod pa dang // sangs rgyas kyi chos bla na med pa sdud par byed pa'i
203b2: sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chen po nyid la yang dag par byed pa nyid do/ / de la shar gyi sgor rdo rje lcags kyu chen po zhes bya ba rdo rje 'dzin dgod par bya'o// lho ru ni rdo rje zhags pa zhes bya ba dang / nub tu rdo rje lcags sgrogs ces bya ba
203b3: dang / byang du rdo rje dril bu zhes bya ba'i rdo rje 'dzin pa chen po dgod par bya'o// dkyil 'khor thams cad kyi rgyal po'i dkyil 'khor chen po gsang ba zhes bya ba las byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshul ched du brjod pa las
203b4: rab tu 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor chen po rdzogs so/ / / de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor lo yin no// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul thob byed// dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs nas ni// dam tshig ma chog
203b5: rkyen sems dpa' yis/ / bskor ba dag ni lan gsum bya// ma lus gsang ba blta bya zhing // kun du tshogs nas dga' bar bya// gsang ba chad na dag bya zhing // lhag ma rnam par spyad par bya// de nas rdo rje sems
203b6: yi/ mAr du phyag rgya che bstan bya// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan gcig tun brjod par bya// 'khor lo zur ni yang dgra gnas// rdo rje lha mo spyan drang bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sangs rgyas/
203b7: mchod rten spyan drang ba// sgo yi dbus na gang gnas pa// sgo bsrungs rnams ni spyan drang bya// phyi rol dkyil 'khor la gnas pa'i// sems dpa' chen po spyan drang bya// de nas sgo rnams thams cad tu// lcags kyul
203b8: sogs las byas te/ / phyag rgya bzhi ni yang dag bcing // brgya dang rtsa brgyad dag bya ba// rdo rje lcags kyu kun du dgug/ rdo rje zhags pas bzhugs par bya// rdo rje lcags sgrogs kun du bcing / rdo rje dril bus dbab par

204a1: bya/ sgo'i bya ba'o// de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// rdo rje dbye ba'i phyag rgya yis// sgo rnams thams cad dbye bar bya// sgo srung ba ru dmigs nas ni// sgo rnams dbye
204a2: bar bya ba yin/ / rdo rje sdigs 'dzub phyag rgya yis// gdug pa thams cad bsdigs par bya// gang tshe mchod pa yang dag rtsom// ji srid dus kyis rdzogs 'gyur ba// grA ni thams cad dag tu ni// bdug spos rnams ni
204a3: gtul bar bya/ / sngon du sgo yi las byas te// de nas mchod pa yang dag bya// dang por me tog shing la sogs// spos dang mar me phyag rgyar bcas// mtshams kyi dus las sngon du ni// bum pa rdo rje spyan drang bya// rdo rje
204a4: bum pa'i phyag rgya yis/ / ci nus par ni spyan drang bya// bum pa shin du bzang po gcig/ rin chen sna bdun las byas mdzes// yang na rin chen dang bsres pa'i// rdo rje dri yi chu ldan bya// rdo rje chu yi sngags dang ni// rdo rje phyag
204a5: rgya chu gtsang ma/ / stong dang rtsa brgyad bzlas byas na// rdo rje'i bdud rtsi'i chu ru 'gyur// bum pa'i sngags ni oM badz+ra u ta ka hUM// me tog gi sngags ni oM badz+ra puSh+pe hUM/ mar me'i sngags ni oM badz+ra a lo ke hUM/ dri'i
204a6: sngags ni oM badz+ra gan d+he hUM/ bdug spos kyi sngags ni oM badz+ra d+hU pe hUM/ spos dang me tog la sogs pa// thams cad phyag rgya ldan par bya// rdo rje phyag rgya bzung byas nas// rdo rje'i sngags kyis rab tu sbyor// dgongs
204a7: ka'i dus nas brtsams nas ni/ / khrus kyi cho ga yang dag bya// lus la dri yis byugs pa dang // rgyan rnams kun gyis legs par brgyan// rdo rje'i shugs kyi sngags dang ni// rdo rje'i shugs kyi phyag rgya yis// 'byung
204a8: ba dang ni 'jug pa yi/ / rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur// sman ma rdo rje ri mo mtshan// sangs rgyas phyag rgyal sogs tshogs// sems dpa' thams cad 'gom byas kyang // rdo rje'i rnal 'byor nyes mi 'gyur/ der

204b1: ni 'gyod pa med par 'gyur/ / rdo rje dril bu dkrol ba yis// cho ga chad ngam lhag kyang rung // 'grub 'gyur nyes par mi 'gyur ro// gal te de ni cho gar ldan// kun du 'jigs par mi bya'o// grub pa'i rnal 'byor go cha yis//
204b2: sangs rgyas skyon du 'dzin mi mdzad// rdo rje sems dpa' phyag rgya ches// dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya'o// zhugs nas dkyil 'khor dbus su ni// rdo rje dag ni dgug par bya// rdo rje lcags kyub kug
204b3: bcings nas/ / sor mo yis ni dgug par bya// de nyid rdo rje lcags kyu yis// rgyud las dgug pa nyid du gsungs// de bzhin rdo rje rigs chen la// rdo rje ljags kyu yang dag bcing // rin chen lcags kyu'i sbyor
204b4: ba yis/ / rin po che ni dgug par bya// pad ma lcags kyu'i phyag rgya ni// pad ma'i rigs chen dag la bshad// las kyi lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// las kyi rigs chen dgug par bya// rdo rje chen po'i lcags
204b5: klu bcing / / sangs rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya// dkyil 'khor lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor thams cad spyan drang bya// phyi rol rdo rje lcags kyu bcing // phyi rol rdo rje rigs spyan drang // bkra shis rdo rje'i
204b6: lcags kyu yis/ / byang chub sems dpa' spyan drang bya// byang mchog lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// dkyil 'khor ba rnams spyan drang bya// rin chen lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// rdo rje 'dzin pa spyan drang bya// snying po'i
204b7: lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis/ / phyag na rdo rje spyan drang bya// rdo rje lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis// kun la nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas// bsnyems tshul sngags kyi phyag rgya yis// rnam snang yang dag spyan drang bya// sangs rgyas
204b8: lcags kyu'i sbyor ba yis/ / de bzhin kho nar sangs rgyas rnams// dam tshig lcags kyu'i phyag rgya yis// dam tshig sems dpa' spyan drang bya// dgug pa'i sbyor ba byas nas ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad gdon par bya// mtshan

205a1: brgya rtsa brgyad rdzogs nas ni/ mchod pa'i sprin rnams yang dag bsgrub// bdag nyid dbul ba la sogs pa'i// ji skad bshad pa'i brtul zhugs spyad// bshags dang gsol gdab mchod pa dang // bdag
205a2: nyid dbul ba la sogs rnams/ / bdag gi bya ba rdzogs nas ni// phyag rgya bcing ba yang dag brtsam// brgya'am yang na stong dag gam// brgya phrag brgya ni bsdus pa yis// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni bcing byas nas/
205a3: dkyil 'khor dag ni 'grub par 'gyur// de nas dkyil 'khor las byas te// ji srid bya reng shar gyur pa// de srid phyag rgya yang dag bcing // nges par dngos grub ster bar byed// de nas langs te phyag rgya bcas//
205a4: dkyil 'khor phyi rol byur nas ni// gdug pa la sogs kun bsdigs te// dkyil 'khor mchod phyir 'jug par bya// rang gi khrus byas lus dris byugs// ji ltar 'tsham pa'i rgyan gos ldan// shin du mdzes
205a5: pa'i gos gyon zhing / / phreng ldan kha ni dri zhim pas// rdo rje gar gyi sbyor ba yis// me tog spyi bor gzhag byas te// rol pa'i rdo rje dga' ba yis// zhugs nas mgon la rab btud cing // de nyid 'dod chags rjes chag
205a6: dang / / de nyid bskal ba'i phyag rgya yis// dngos grub thams cad rab bstar ba// sangs rgyas kun ni bskul bar bya// skyon dang bral zhing rtag pa ste// 'dod chags kun la rjes chags pa// mchod 'os chen po rgyal po
205a7: bcom ldan de nyid bdag grub mdzod/ / de nas dam tshig mchog gi ni// phyag rgya chog bzhin bcings nas// rdo rje slob dpon zhugs nas ni// lcags sgrog phyagaH yang dgab cing // de nas rdo rje slob dpon
205a8: gyis/ / de nyid rdo rje lcags grub cing // steng dus gol brdabs pa yis// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdu bar bya// sangs rgyas bsdu pi'i sngags ni dzadzadzaHshar gyi sgo ru yi ge dzaHde bzhin lho ru yi ge hUM/

205b1: nub tu sngags srog can po ga/ byang du kun du dbab ga.a rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor thams cad la// las 'di dag ni yang dag bshad // las ni kun du rdzogs byas nas// de bzhin mtshar mthong 'gyur ba/
205b2: 'phrul chen po rmad 'brung che// sna tshogs brgya dang rtswa bcu ste// cho 'phrul rmad 'byung chen po rnams// rdo rje slob dpon gyis mthong 'gyur// dngos grub bdag nyid chen po kun// dkyil 'khor kun du 'ong bar 'gyur//
205b3: rdo rje can dang byang chub sems// de bzhin rigs ni rnam lnga dang // rdo rje dbyings ni bdag nyid che// bcom ldan mchog kyang gshegs par 'gyur// rdo rje sems sogs sangs rgyas sras// ngo mtshar slob
205b4: dpon gyis mthong 'gyur/ / mchod pa dang ni gtong ma nyid// ji bzhin chog bcas par 'gyur// de bzhin rdzu 'phrul dngos grub dag/ mthong nas dkyil 'khor bya ba yi// ji ltar bkod pa 'khor lo dang //
205b5: ji ltar yo byang zad pa dang // ji ltar rtul zhugs spyad pa bzhin// de bzhin dngos grub thob par 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' mthu chen dang // sangs rgyas yang dag mthong bar 'gyur//
205b6: ji ltar 'khor lo chen po byon// 'di ni ngo mtshar mchog yin no// ji ltar de rnams bzhugs pa bzhin// de bzhin 'khor lo yongs su gzung // ye shes bzang por khyab pa yi// ma 'byung dam pa
205b7: thob par 'gyur/ / dkyil 'khor rmad 'byung thams cad ni// sa dag btol nas mthong bar 'gyur// yang na dkyil 'khor bar snang gi/ nam mkha' la gnas mthong bar 'gyur// yang na sangs rgyas kun gang
205b8: ba'i/ / sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'gyur// yang na phyogs rnams thams cad tu// sangs rgyas sku ni rab mthong 'gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs bzhin du// rdo rje can gyis bdag nyid mthong // yang na gsang pa lnga

206a1: zhes pa'i/ / yang na sangs rgyas mkhas pa'i mchog/ yang na dkyil 'khor gnas de ni// stong phrag gsum ni yongs su bzung // yang na rdo rje sems gcig po// dkyil 'khor bdag po zhes bshad de//
206a2: de yi mtshan mo nyin mo mthong // nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun khyab pa'i// yang na nyi ma 'char ba ste// yang na zla ba'i dkyil 'khor ro// dag pa'i zhing ni mthong nas su// sangs rgyas rol pa mthong bar 'gyur// 'dus pa
206a3: shin du dag pa yi/ / dbang bskur ba ni mthong bar 'gyur// mad 'byung sna tshogs shes bya ba// rnam 'phrul ngo mtshar 'di mthong 'gyur// rdo rje slob dpon skal chen gyis// dkyil 'khor mchod pa sna tshogs 'gyur//
206a4: yo byad tshogs par gyur kyang ni// gang zhig bsgribs par gyur pa yis// de bzhin ngo mtshar nyid mi mthong // rnal 'byor gzhan ni yang dag rtsom// phyag rgya thams cad bcings nas ni// sdig pa dral ba yang dag
206a5: bya/ / rmad byung sna tshogs 'di lta ste// la lar zhugs pa tsam gyis ni// 'grub pa nyid tu gdon mi za// dang po thun la 'grub par 'gyur// de bzhin la lar mtshan phyed na// gsum pa'ang skya reng 'char na 'grub//
206a6: de bzhin la lar nyi shar na// de ma thag tu mngon 'dod pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub mchog 'grub 'gyur// skal ldan thar par 'dod 'gyur na// sa ni dang por 'dod pa ste// rab tu dga' ba'i sa thob nas// gang
206a7: gis gnas med 'gro ba'o/ / yang na rig pa 'dzin nyid dam// de bzhin rdo rje nyid du 'gyur// ji ltar mngon par 'dod par 'grub// sangs rgyas byang chub yongs su 'dzin// mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang // de
206a8: bzhin sdig pa kun byed pas/ / gang tshe la na bdun byas nas ni// bsgrub pa rnal 'byor 'grub par 'gyur// 'byung ba bzhi las gzugs can min// nam mkha'i gzugs su rtag tu 'gyur// chos kyi dbyings su 'gyur/

206b1: pa nyid/ rdo rje'i bka' ni gzhan du min// gang dag lan bdun bsgrubs na ni// sdig pa dge ba nyid 'gyur zhing // nyes par byas pa bsod nams tshogs// gzhan du 'grub par mi 'gyur te// dad pa med par gnas pa dang //
206b2: gang tshe the tshom za 'gyur ba// de ni rnal 'byor nyams par 'gyur// byang chub sems ni yongs ma bzung // sngon du bsnyen pa nyams 'gyur te// rtag tu brtul zhugs nyams par 'gyur// de 'dra la sogs bgegs
206b3: mang dang / / nga rgyal 'di dag rnam par spangs// sdom pa yongs su ma bzung zhing // rnal 'byor de nyid tshul shes min// rdo rje slob dpon mi brtan 'gyur// 'grub pa nyid du mi 'gyur ro// de bas 'bad pa thams cad
206b4: kyis/ / gal te rdo rje slob dpon 'gyur// mkhas shing sdom pa blangs pa dang // byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung // gang tshe 'tshe ba don yod cing // gal te skye ba 'bras bcas 'dod// 'bad pas thams cad nyid kyis
206b5: minirnal 'byor chen po yang dag brtsam/ byang chub sems dang ldan gyur nas// rig pa'i sdom pa 'dzin pa yi// de nas rnal 'byor yang dag brtsam// sangs rgyas byang chub rab 'grub 'gyur// yang zhus pa/ rig
206b6: pa'i rgyud ni rab bsgyur phyir/ / sdom pa ji ltar blang bar bgyi// ji ltar dam tshig bzung bar bgyi// dam tshig nyams pa ji lta bu// sems can kun gyi don pa'i phyir// byangasams yang dag bskyed nas ni/ 9/
206b7: pa / phyu ga/ na sa / sa
206b8: pa bas/ / slob dpon khyod ni dgongs su gsol// byang chub sems dpa'i tshul bstan pa// mgon po chen po bdag 'tshal lo// dmatshig de nyid bul du gsol// sdom pa rnams kyang bdag la stsol// gtsa

207a1: la sdom pa stsol/ / slob dpon gyis ni nye bar btag/ rnam pa kun du dri bar bya// dam tshig brjod bya gang nag ni// snod tu rung bde gtsug bya// budang sleb ma ma yin min// snod dang ldan la sbyin par bya/ gas
207a2: te snod dang ldan par shes/ / srog dang bdog pa kun sbyin bya// sngon du dkyil 'khor rab 'jug cing // cho ga bzhin du bcug nas ni// de nas me tog bcas thal mo// lus btud dga' ba che rnams kyis// bshags
207a3: pa dang ni gsol ba gangag/ rjes su yid rang kun du bya// rgyud dbang gsang ba las gsungs bzhin// mchod pa dang bcas yongs su bsngo// phyogs rnams kun du phyag bya zhing // sdom pa chen po blang bar bya// slob dpon
207a4: la ni rab tu brjod/ / gtso bo bdag la sdom pa gsol// thub pa'i nyi ma ma lus pa'i// sangs rgyas bdag la dgongs su gsol// bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba 'di// slob dpon dbang du gnas pa la// sangs rgyas
207a5: rol mo las byung ba/ / mi ldog 'khor lo'i 'byor par ldan// thar pa chen po'i grong khyer mchog/ gsang ba chen por 'jug par bgyi// gsang ba'i rigs mtho thams cad du// slob dpon chen po bdag 'jug mdzod
207a6: mi ldog pa yi dbang bskur ba/ / skal ba chen po bdag la stsol// mtshan rnams kun gyis rgyas btab cing // dpe byad rnams dang yang dag ldan// sangs rgyas sku ni yid 'ong ba// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol//
207a7: dbang bskur ba ni rmad 'byung che// sems can kun gyi don bgyid phyir// bdag ni rtag tu slob dpon gyur// slob dpon chen po bdag la gsol// gsang ba'i rigs las byung ba yi// rdo rje'i rigs bcas 'khor
207a8: loste/ / ta babs bcas par yang dag ldan// slob dpon gyur par shes par bya// bdag nyid nye bar zhi ba nyid// byang chub sems ni yongs su gzung // gsang ba yi ni 'khor lo ru// sdom pa dang bcas 'jug par

207b1: bgyi/ / de nas slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste// gsang ba'i chen po rigs dag pa// gsang ba yongs su 'dzin par ni// bdag nyid chen po khyed 'dod dam// des kyang 'tshal zhes brjod par bya/ yang /
207b2: slob dpon gyis 'di skad ces brjod par bya ste// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song // 'di ni sangs rgyas rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig brtan par 'gyur ba'o/
207b3: dril bu'i phyag rgya yang // blo chen gyis ni gzung bar gyis// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// shes rab dril bu zhes bshad do// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bya// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// 'di ni
207b4: rje'i rigs dag pa'i/ / sdom padam tshig yin par gsangs// rin chen rigs mchog chen po la// nyin dang mtshan ma lan gsum du// bang zing mi 'jigs chos dang byams// sbyin pa rnam pani nag ma sbyin/
207b5: phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam chos khyod kyis gzung bar bya// 'di ni pad ma'i rigs dag pa'i// dam tshig sdom pa yin par gsungs// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams cad
207b6: ldan par ni/ yang dag nyid tu gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bya// de las gzhan pa bcu bzhi ni// phas pham par ni rab tu bshad// spang zhing dor bar mi bya ste// rtsa ba'i ltung ba zhes bshad do//
207b7: nyin dang mtshan mo lan gsum dra// nyin re zhing ni bzla bar byed// gang tshe nyams 'gyur rnal 'byor pa// kha na mthe sbom por 'gyur// khyod kyis srog chags gsad mi bya// ma byin par yang mi blang ngo // 'dod
207b8: pa log par mi spyad cing / / brdzun du smra bar mi bya'o// phu ro khrol kun gyi rtsa ba ni// chang ni rnam par spang bar bya// sems can gdul phyir ma rtogs pa// bya ba ma yin thams cad spang // dam pa nye bar

208a1: bsten bya zhing / / rnal 'byor pa rnams bsnyen bkur bya// lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang // ngag gi rnam pa bzhi rnams dang // yid kyi rnam pa gsum dag ni// ci nus par ni rjes su skyongs// theg pa dman
208a2: la 'dod mi bya/ / sems can don la rgyab phyogs min// 'khor ba dag kyang spang mi bya// rtag tu mya ngan 'das mi chags// lha dang lha min gsang ba min// khyod kyis brnyas par mi bya zhing // phyag rgya bzhon pa mtshon cha
208a3: dang / mtshan ma bgom par mi bya'o// 'di dag dam tshig yin par bshad// khyod kyis rtag tu bsrung bar bya// rjes 'thun sdom pa rgya cher ni// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// de nyid kyis kyang brjod
208a4: par bya/ 'dir ni slob dpon bdag la gson// gtso bo ji ltar bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal// ji ltar dus gsum mgon po rnams// byang chub tu ni nges mdzad pa'i// byang chub sem
208a5: ni dran me/ / dam pa bdag gis bskyed par bgyi// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor sdom pa la// tshul khrims kyis ni bslab pa dang // dge ba'i chos ni bsdud pa dang // sems can don byed tshul khrims gsum//
208a6: bdag gis brtan por gzung bar baH// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun te// bla na med pa'i dkon mchog gsum// deng nas brtsams te gzung bar bgyi// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po la// rdo rje dril bu
208a7: phyag rgya yang / / yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// slob dpon dag kyang gzung bar bgyi// rig chen rigs mchog chen po yi// dam tshig yid du 'ong ba la// nyin re zhing ni dus drug tu// sbyin pa rnam bzhi rab
208a8: du sbyin/ byang chub chen po las byung ba// pad ma'i rigs chen dag pa la// phyi nang gsang ba'i theg pa gsum// dam pa'i chos ni gzung bar bgyi// las kyi rigs mchog chen po la// sdom pa thams

208b1: cad ldan par ni/ yang dag nyid du gzung bar bgyi// mchod pa'i las kyang ci nus bgyi// byang chub sems ni bla med pa// dam pa bdag gis bskyed bgyis nas// sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// bdag
208b2: gis sdom pa ma lus gzung / / ma grol ba ni grol bar bgyi// margal ba ni bsgral par bgyi// dbugs ma phyin pa dbugs dbyung zhing // sems can mya ngan 'das la dgod// de nas rdo rje slob dpon gyis//
208b3: cho ga ji bzhin dbang bskur bya// rdo rje slob dpon dbang bskur ba// gsang ba'i rgyud las rab tu bshad// de lta bu yi cho ga yis// rtag pa nyid tu spyod pa na// slob dpon rdo rje 'chang chen du// 'di ni 'gyur
208b4: ba the tshom med/ rdo rje slob dpon gyi las rdzogs so// // de nas slob ma gzhug pa'i las// yang dag nyid du bshad par bya// slob ma rdo rje slob dpon gyis// ji bzhin gsang ba chen por gzhug/
208b5: snod dang sdod min brtag pa nyid// bdag nyid chen pos mi bya'o// 'di ni mthong ba tsam gyis kyang // sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'dod// gal te de ni snod min na// de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya//
208b6: yang na gang zhig don gnyer 'gyur// de la ji ltar bde ba nyid// ci ste gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur// mkhas pas zhugs pa sbyin par bya// grang phyir mthong ba tsam gyis ni// thams cad 'grub
208b7: par gdon mi za/ / 'on kyang gang zhig 'dug par 'gyur// de la las ni bya ba min// gzhug pa tsam zhig sbyin bya'o// rnam pa thams cad nyid mi bya// dga' zhing dad dang ldan gyur na/ snod du rung
208b8: ba brtag par bya/ gsum la skyabs 'gro sngon song ba'o// de la gzhug pa sbyin par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya che// rdo rje slob ma la sbyin bya// rdo rje sems dpa' sems dpa' ches// sbyor

209a1: bzhin su yin brjod par bya/ / dkar po dmar po dang ldan pa'i// gos kyis mig ni bka' gyur dang // rdo rje 'jug byed phyag rgya yis// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// de nas sgo yi las bya ste//
209a2: stosngon la rdo rje lcags kyu yis// rdo rje lcags kyu dgug bya zhing // yi ge dza ni brjod par bya// badz+ra saM ku sha dza rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// rdo rje zhags pas gzhug par bya// lho yi sgor na
209a3: sbyor bya zhing / / yi ge hU~M ni brjod par bya// hUM badz+ra pA sha hUM/ rdo rje zhags pas bcug nas ni// lcags sgrog ldan pas bcing bar bya// nub kyi sgo ru bcings nas ni// yi ge ba ni brjod par bya// badz+ra s+phoTabaM/
209a4: rdo rje lcags kyus yang dag dgug/ rdo rje zhags pas gzhug bya zhing // rdo rje lcags sgrogs gis bcing bya// rdo rje dril bus yang dag dbab// badz+ra g+haN Da a rdo rje gzhug pa'i phyag rgya yis// dkyil 'khor
209a5: mchod phyir gzhug par bya/ / dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis// rdo rje'i ye shes yang dag dbab// sa ma ya s+t+wa~M/ dam tshig phyag rgya chen po yis// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya// dam tshig bdag nyid chen po
209a6: yis/ / sangs rgyas ye shes dbab par bya// sa ma ya hUM/ de nas mchod pa phyag rgyar bcas// spos dang me tog la sogs tshogs// phyag rgya dag ni thams cad bya// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab bskul bya// de nas
209a7: cho ga ji bzhin du/ / rdo rje slob ma mna' bsgag bya// badz+ra u da ka/ rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur bas// ji ltar 'dod pas dbang bskur bya// badz+ra a be she ka/ rdo rje ye shes bla na med// de nas de la dbab pa sbyin//
209a8: badz+ra a pe sha a a/ bcu/ nyi shu/ sum bcu// bzhi bcu/ lnga bcu/ drug bcu/ bdun bcu/ brgyad bcu/ dgu bcu/ brgya/ rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// thams cad du ni yang dag dbab// de nas gdong

209b1: g.yogs 'grol bar bya/ / rdo rje'i mig ni bla na med// badz+ra aka/ rdo rje'i rigs ni skal ldan gyi// dkyil 'khor ltos shig zhes brjod bya// badz+ra pa shA ho// de nas de la bum pa bzang // rdo rje slob dpon gyis dpa
209b2: bskur/ / gang ming bzung ba tsam gyis ni// sdig pa kun las rnam grol 'gyur// oM badz+ra a b+hi Shiny+tsa// snod ni yang dag brtag bya zhing // de yi ye shes yongs su spyad// gal te snod du rung shes na// rnam par dbye bar
209b3: dga' bar bya/ / he badz+ra nA ma/ lnga cho ga bcu/ gzungs nyi shu/ chu sum bcu/ rdo rje bzhi bcu// rin chen lnga bcu/ pheg rdob drug bcu// kha sbyar bdun bcu/ bzhad pa brgyad bcu/ dag pa dgu bcu// sems pa brgya
209b4: sangs rgyas stong / / las nyis stong // gzugs sum stong // rnal 'byor bzhi stong // 'dzin pa lnga stong // gzugs drug stong / kha dog bdun stong / dbyibs brgyad stong / mtshan ma dgu stong / tshig 'bum/ a
209b5: 'bum phrag gcig ni yongs rdzogs nas/ / 'khor lo'i mtshan nyid yang dag ldan// gsang ba yi ni spyod yul gzhan// de nas las ni rab bshad bya// slob ma'i cho ga dang ming gi dam tshig rdzogs so//
209b6: ye shes dag pa bdag nyid che// de nas gsang ba rab bshad bya// gang gis cho ga thams cad kyis// 'khor lo chen po brtan 'gyur ba// sangs rgyas sems dpa' sems dpa' nyid// sa yi mtshan nyid yang dag
209b7: ldan/ / gsang ba'i dam bcas yid rang bzhin// de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs dag pa// rdo rje'i sku dang gsung dang thugs// ye shes dag pa rdzu 'phrul che// rdo rje'i thugs 'dzin gyur nas ni// mtshan nyid dag ni yang dag
209b8: brtag/ rnal 'byor dpe byad don ldan bya// mtshan nyid rjes su brtag pa bya// rdo rje'i thugs kyi rjes sbyor bas// ye shes dag pa yang dag gzung // mchog tu gsang ba dam pa mchog/ ye shes bzhags pa kun du

210a1: bshad/ / de nas ye shes dam pa yis// 'jig rten 'das pa rab gzhug bya// mtshan nyid chen po dang ldan pa'i// rtogs pa'i sa la yang dag rten// rnal 'byor pa yi spyod yul mchog/ rdo rje chos ni yid 'ong pa'o// thim
210a2: dang chos sgra zhes bya dang / / bsdigs dang 'od zer lnga pa dang // klog dang chu zla zhes bya bas// sangs rgyas ye shes yang dag 'thob// chu yi zla ba bzang po yis// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sbyang bar bya// nyi ma lnga dang yang dag ldan
210a3: rigs chos mar ma nyes bya ba/ / nyon mongs gnod pa 'joms byed pa// e pa'o gsang ba chen por bshad// gsang ba zhes bya rdo 'od 'byung // gzhan yang thab byed par 'dod// pho nya'i dkyil 'khor kha T+wA~M ga/ bci
210a4: brtse gsum sbyor las byung / / lcags kyu shin du 'bar ba dang // gtum po rdo rje can gyis tshogs// rtog pa'i gnas ni yongs 'gyur ba// thob byed rdo rje chen por 'dod // kun gyi gong ma'i 'og ma yis// nyi cho
210a5: de spang bar bya/ / mchog thagasang ba rdzogs so// de nas mchog tu gsang ba rgya re ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul can zab pa/ tshul rgya che ba mkhas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i yul las kyi tshogs ston pa/
210a6: dga' ba chen po'i bkod pas kun khyab pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba la sogs pa rnams kyi chos kyi mdzod 'byung ba rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po 'di las
210a7: phyag rgya chen po'i rgyud mchog ces bya ba 'byung ste/ gsang ba mchog tu rgya che ba// bsam gyis mi khyab las rnams ston// rol pa'i 'khor lo chen po du// chos kyi mdzad ni 'dzin par bya// re shig dang por
210a8: las kyi tshogs bstan par bya ste/ 'di lta ste hUM/ 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor gzung ba yi// sbyor thabs yi ge hUM brjod de// 'di yis kyang ni rgyal po dang // phyag rgya'i rgyal mo brgya ru 'gyur// gnyis pa ni byang

210b1: chub chen po'i mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i tshul la 'jug pa yin no/ / 'di lta ste hUM/ 'dis ni phyag rgya zhes bya yi// yi ge hU~M ni brtan par 'gyur// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yis// phyag rgya'i/
210b2: rgyal mo rnam pa stong // gsum pa phyag rgya stong phrag ni// brgya yi tshogs su 'gyur ba yin// sangs rgyas 'khor lor 'jug pa yi// yi ge hU~M gis brtan par 'gyur// hUM rnal 'byor bzhi pa'i dbye ba ni// brgya phrag khri
210b3: du 'dir 'gyur ro/ / rig pa'i 'khor lo zhes bya ba// phyag rgya'i rgyal mo kun hUM bcas// 'khor lo'i phyag rgya ji skad yod// mdag gzhug pa ni bye par 'gyur// rtse gsum la sogs mtshon cha ni// rtag tu
210b4: phyag rgya'i rgyal po yin hUM/ / de nas sngags kyi tshogs 'byung ste// Tag gi bcu/ maHnyi shu/ phaT sum ba mya raT bzhi bcu/ paT lnga bcu/ riH drug bcu// bcwa bdun bcu/ ldaT brgyad banu/ taT dgu bcu/
210b5: taT brgya// ka ta ni lan stong yin// ta dang wa zhes bya ba dang // da Ni rnam pa bcu ru 'gyur// yi ge Da Ni lan gsum sbyar// yi ge a yang rnam pa bzhi// yi ge ba ni rnam pa lnga// yi ge a ni lan drug sbyang// ka ri lan
210b6: bdun yang dag sbyar/ / yi ge d+ha ni lan brgyad sbyar// yi ge sha ni phyed du 'gyur// kha Ta ni stong phrag brgya ru 'gyur// stong phrag brgya las rnal 'byor gyis// phyag rgya'i rgyud ni btu bar bya// rtog pa thams cad
210b7: bsdus pa gsang ba'i rnal 'byor chen po'i drug pa gsang ba'i tshogs chen po'i mchog/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po shin du gsang ba'i rnal 'byor rdo rje rtse mo
210b8: las/ byang chub pa'i tshul rgya chen po la 'jug pa zhes bya ba'i le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so// // rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi mchog tu gsang ba yang rdzogs so// // de nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul rgya chen

211a1: bo 'di las dkyil 'khor chen po'i dang por phyag rgya dang nye ba'i phyag rgya 'byung ba'i ye shes 'byung ste/ / gang tshe rdo rje slob dpon dang // rdo rje slob mar gyur pa na// phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya bcing // gang
