256b3: de las ni rab tu bshad/ / bzlas brjod sbyin bsreg chog ni// de ni rgyud mchog las bshad bya// gang phyir rig pa 'dzin kun gyi// bzlas brjod sbyin bsreg sgrub par bya// bzlas brjod sbyor ba med par ni// rig pa'i dngos grub 'byung mi
256b4: 'gyur/ / sbyin bsreg tsam ni med pa ru// rig pa'i bya ba byed pa 'gyur// gang gis rnal 'byor brtson 'gyurab// bzlas pa'i rim pa bshad byab// rig pa 'dzin pa thams cad kyi// snying po 'di ni gsang mchog yin// gas
256b5: ba'i rigs 'dir bzlas pa ni/ / rnal 'byor nyi shu yang dag byung // bzlas pa rnam pa nyi shu ni// gsang ba'i rgyung du nyi shu gcig/ gnas ngan len gyi bag chags rtogs// rtog pa bag chags zhes bya ste// bzlas pa tsam gyi them
256b6: 'gyur te/ / bzlas pa tsam gyis brjod par bya// nyes pa byas pa spong ba dang // de bzhin srid pa sbyong byed cing // rmad 'byung sna tshogs mthong 'gyur te// de bas bzlas pa brjod par bya// byang chub spyod pa 'byung 'gyur zhing //
256b7: tshul mchog mthong bar 'gyur ba ste// de bas bzlas pa'i cho ga ni// rnal 'byor pas ni nges par bya// gsang ba chen po'i rgyud 'di ru// hU~M ni dang por rab tu bsgrags// gsang ba thams cad yang dag 'byung // drugs bzlam
256b8: ba brjod par bya/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi gtso bo na// de bzhin yi ge hUM rab mchog/ gsang ba thams cad 'khor lor bcas// rigs lnga dag dang bcas pa 'byung // 'dir ni yi ge hUM 'byung bar// sngon la shes rab can gyis

257a1: ga migs thams cad yang stong du/ / lus kun lan brtag par bya// byung ba brtul pa 'byung ba jur/ sa las rnam pa kun du 'o// kye dang u0f7flalas kyang // rgan las rnas pa zan phyug// na
257a2: gad las ni sbyor ba 'byung / / snyi nyid las 'thung mi 'gyur// khong stong dngos po thams cad la// skye ba nyid ni snang mi 'gyur/ yi ge hUM gis sbyor ba yis// nga gi dbyings la yang dag sbyar// nyid nyon mongs can mi 'gyur// na
257a3: gnyis bo na thams cad pa/ / rgan dang zhog pa'i 'bad pa dang // lce yi tshigs las yang dag 'byung // mi ge d+hage sa zung ba// don ma tog yang dag zung // daltar 'byung ba'i sbyor ba las// gnas kyi nyon mongs can mi 'gyur/
257a4: tshig dang bcas pa'i ji bzhin sgra// 'dus byas thams cad dor bar bya// ji bzhin hUM gi sbyor ba las// chos rnams thams cad skye ba med// rnam par rtog las yang dag byung // de ni mi rtog yang dag byung // 'khor ba bdag gi thogs
257a5: ni/ / ji ltar yang ni shes mi 'gyur// 'dir ni skye ba mi snang zhing // 'dus byas dag ni 'jig pa min// de bas yi ge hUM tsam gyis// 'dus byas so sor brtag par bya// dag cing mthar thug gnas nyid ni// hUM gis kyang ni sbyar bar bya//
257a6: rang bzhin med pa'i sgra 'di ni// yi ge hUM las yang dag byung // 'di la dngos po yod ma yin// rang bzhin med cing bdag med pa// de bzhin chos rnams thams cad kyi// rang bzhin nyid ni yod ma yin// bdag gam sems can
257a7: gso ba med/ / gzung dang 'dzin pa rnam par spangs// zag pa med cing 'dus byas min// gnas ni dag pa bstan par bya// dngos grub sbyor ba'i ye shes kyis// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// /
257a8: yi ge hUM ni yang dag byung // ye shes dag pa yang dag byung // chos kyi dbyings kyis brtan par bya// sangs rgyas rdzu 'phrul chen po yod// 'dir ni nye bar mi dmigs te// gang phyir dus gsum gshegs snying po// sangs

257b1: rgyas snying po tshogs su bshad/ / sangs rgyas sras bcas thams cad dang // rdo rje can ni rgyal sras bcas// trAM tsam gyi ni sbyor ba yis// kun du yang dag dgug par bya// yi ge'i sbyor ba gcig gis ni// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying rtsa
257b2: brtan/ / gang phyir rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// 'di ni rang gi sbyor bas gnas// chos kyi rgyu mthun bag chags ni// byang chub sems ni ma rtogs par// thog ma med ldan 'khor ba las// 'byung ba cung zad yod ma yin// nyan thos dang
257b3: ni rang rgyal dang / / byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul ni// byang chub kyi ni sems med par// 'gags kyang mya ngan 'dra mi nus// gal te sangs rgyas 'byung med na// nyan thos dag ni galas byung // sangs rgyas 'byung ba yod midas//
257b4: rang rgyal de ni 'byung mi 'gyur// gal te byang chub sems dpa' med// sangs rgyas rnams ni gang las 'byung // gal te byang chub sems med na// de bas 'khor lo 'di kun ni// byang chub sems las yang dag byung //
257b5: byang sems gsang ba chen po ni// yi ge hUM las yang dag zung // sangs rgyas thams cad rab 'byung ba// yi ge hUM gi snang bar 'gyur// gang phyir mtshan ldan gzugs can ni// rtag tu sangs rgyas rab 'byung ba// hUM yig
257b6: ge ni sbyor ba hUM/ / de nyid rdo rje yang dag byung // chos dbyings rab sbyor rdo rje ni// de las yang dag 'byung bar 'gyur// de las rdo rje rnal 'byor che// rnal 'byor dbang phyug bla na med// the tshom med par rnal 'byor kun// yi ge
257b7: hUM gi sbyor bas 'grub/ / de lta bu yi bzlas pa yis// ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis ni// sngon ni bsngo ba mdzad pa ltar// rnal 'byor las byas dge ba sngo// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// rang gi sems kyang sngo bar bya//
257b8: rdo rje chen po mthar phyin byed// byang chub sems kyi bsgral bar bya// chos kyi dbyings kyi snying po che// sems can thams cad gos pa med// thams cad de bzhin gshegs snying po// nyon mongs 'dam gyi gos pa med//

258a1: ji ltar zla ba bzhin du dag/ zla ba gang pa'i 'od gsal ba// rtag tu yang dag rdzogs par gnas// rab tu dad pa 'grub par 'gyur// 'di ni dang po chos ye shes// de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po yin// rtag tu dag par
258a2: gnas pa ste/ / rang gi nyon mongs dag gis bsgribs// de bas rang sems rnam pa ni// zla ba gang bar shes par bya// bdag ni 'ga' yang yod ma yin// chos nyid 'di ni rgyal bas shes// ye shes bzla ba gang ba min// gang phyir bdag
258a3: ni yod ma yin/ / zla ba gang ba dang mtshungs rigs// gang phyir dag ci dgos pa med// sangs rgyas ye shes skyon med pa// zla ba'i sbyor bas sgom par bya// mthong nas shes rab can gyi bsam// 'di yang gang gis rtogs par 'gyur//
258a4: yun ring dus su sdug bsngal ba'i// de bzhin gshegs pa bcom ldan 'das// nyon mongs pa'i bag chags kun// de bzhin sbyor bar byed par bsam// byang chub sems ni sems chen po// nyon mongs thams cad 'joms byed pa/
258a5: chos kyi rgyu mthun bag chags kyi// gnyen po ru ni byung ba yi// de bas 'di yi mthu yis ni// sangs rgyas ye shes rnam par spyod// gnas ngan len ni bag chags bcas// 'dod pa'i bdam gyi gos pa med// nyi ma lta bu'i sems chen
258a6: po/ / nyon mongs rtsa ni rab sreg byed// zla ba lta bu'i sems chen po// dge ba'i sman ni rnam 'phel byed// so sa ka'i tsha ba'i zla ba bzhin// nyi ma'i gdung ba rab sreg byed// shar bar gyur pas zhi bar byed// nyon mo dra gdung bsam gdungs shing //
258a7: mi shes pa la nyi ma nyid// byang chub sems ni zla ba tshe// nyon mongs gdung bzhi byed pa// kun nas nyon mongs bag chags bcas// gnas ngan len ni 'joms pa'i mchog/ khab len gyi ni lcags bzhin du// nyon mongs bag chags
258a8: 'don byed pa/ / rdo rje'i rang bzhin rnal 'byor pas// byang chub sems de sgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gnas de ru// slar yang zla ba rnam par sgom// byang chub sems kyi mthu yis ni// bag chags thams cad sreg byed pa/

258b1: ye shes de ru 'byung 'gyur te// gzung ba dang ni 'dzin pa spangs// rnam par mi rtog mtshungs med pa// bdag med de bzhin stong pa nyid// mi shes ri bo 'joms par byed// rdo rje dang mtshungs khong stong med// rdo rje'i rang bzhin snying po ma ris
258b2: tshogs ri bo brtan pa ni/ / rdo rje des ni 'joms par byed// de phyir rdo rje'i rang bzhin bstan// de bas rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// zla ba'i dbus su zla ba mtshungs// zla ba gnyis dbus rdo rje yis// rdo rje'i ye shes brtan par bya// stong nyid de/
258b3: bzhin nyid de nyid// yang dag mtha' dang 'dus ma byas// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// yi ge hUM ni bsgom par bshad// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa mchog/ nam mkha'i dbyings dang mtshungs pa ni// zla ba'i dbus su skom par
258b4: drugi sbyong ba de yis ni/ / rdo rje'i mchog ni sgom par bya// lus kun la ni spro bya zhing // stong pa nyid dang mtshungs par spros// gzugs 'di nyid ni ming tsams// dngos po 'ga' yang yod ma yin// cha shas kyi ni rnam dpyad na//
258b5: gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin/ de dag grar brna brnags kyang/ nga shes bya 'od ma yin/ di na su rdzob ces bya ste sa pa 'i da / du yo ma yi/ ste du ying zhi du// gzugs zhes bya ba yod ma yin// de dag phra rab rnam brtags kyang // phra rab zhes bya yod ma
258b6: yi/ rig rten kun rdzob ces bya ste// dam pa'i don du yod ma yin// deka/ bu yi rang bzhin du// gzugs zhes bya ba yod pa yin// gzugs de yod pa ma yin// ji ltar yod ces bya ba yin// gal te gzugs de yod min/
258b7: ming yang de la yod ma yin// ming ni gang las yang dag byung // ming zhes bya ba ci 'dra bar// dngos shes bya ba de dang mtshungs// ming des so sor brtag byas na// gnas gang zhig na rab tu gnas// dngos po gcig ni rnam phyen//
258b8: ming ni mang po yang dag byung // re re yi ni dbye ba yis// sngar gyi ming ni nyams par 'gyur// de la ming ni yod min pa// ming ni yang dag 'byung ba med// gang la ming ni yod min na// ji ltar ming du brjod par bya// gang gis

259a1: ming ni rab gnas pa/ / rnam pa kun du dmigs mi 'gyur// gzugs ni nye bar mi dmigs la// de la gzugs ni ji ltar yod// 'di ni yang dag mi rtog pa// bag chags dag gis kun nas dkris// gang du byis pa rab
259a2: rmongs shing / / mya ngan 'das pa thob mi 'gyur// ji ltar gzugs ni rnam sgom pa// de bzhin tshor dang 'du shes dang // so sor du ni rnam phyen// de la snying po dmigs mi 'gyur// gang la snying po yod min pa// de la dngos po ji ltar
259a3: yod/ / gang la dngos po mi dmigs pa// dam pa'i don ni ji ltar yod// gang zhig bstan par mi dmigs gde ni yod min dngos por med// chos rnams thams cad med pas na// skye ba med par brjod par bya// gang zhig ma
259a4: skyes de yod min/ / gang zhig yod min ji ltar yod// mkhas pas chos rnams thams cad mi// 'gag pa med ces bya bar brjod// skye ba med cing 'gag pa med// de ni gzod nas zhi bar 'dod// de phyir rang bzhin mya ngan 'ang
259a5: 'di ni stong pa nyid du brjod/ / 'di ni yang dag de nyid che// yang dag mtha' ru brjod par bya// chos kyi dbyings ni snying po che/ theg pa chen por brjod par bya// de ni snying po khong stong med// rdo rje'i bstan pa bla na med// lus kun la ni
259a6: spro bya ste/ / bdag gi lus ni 'di lta bu// rdo rje'i bdag nyid ces bya gang // yi ge hUM ni yongs su spro// sgom pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sangs rgyas nyid ni 'grub par 'gyur// 'di 'dra'i chos ni skye ba med// 'dir yang
259a7: 'byung ba snang ba med/ / hUM zhes bya ba'i sbyor ba yis// skye bar yang ni snang mi 'gyur// chos nyid dag pa bden pa gang // yang dag mtha' ni zag pa med// chos dbyings brtan pa dam pa ni// yi ge hUM du 'dir rab bsgrags//
259a8: rdo rje yi ge hUM de nyid// chos dbyings stug po bstan pa yin// byang chub sems kang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang yin de nyid hUM// chos nyid dag pa 'di lta bu// rdo rje ye shes yid 'ong ba// sangs rgyas kun gyi snying po che// rdo rje bdag gi

259b1: yang da can na/ / gas sa sa ca ma cad dang / gnas gyur sa// sa pa napa byang bsam pa ma/ la lab dam pan// pa 'das tha ba ma par ga/ nga
259b2: la zla ba gnyis/ / dbus su zla ba rab bsgob bya// zla ba'i dbus bu rdo rjed// mkhas pa yis ni bsgom par bya// rdo rje'i dbus su yi ge hUM// sangs rgyas byang chub ba sgom bya// de la bu yi myong ba yis// lus kun rab
259b3: bsgom par bya/ / dza rje mdzad bzlas pa yis// dza rje'i bdag nyid byur du thog/ rje rjemadzad sgom pa rdzogs so// hUMgi sbyor ba bzhinadu// mi ga thams cad nam par banom// sems dpa' chen pa 'byung /
259b4: ba yis// yi ge bcu drug dag pa yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi yi ge hUM// gang phyir sangs rgyas rigs byung ba// rdo rje can dag kun gyi hUM// drag po gcod kun rab tu sgom// oM ni rin chen yang dag ldan// hrIHni pad
259b5: mar yang dag ldan/ / yi ge a ni sna tshogs brjod// de lta bur yang bsgom par bya// hUM ni sangs rgyas rdo rje dag/ hrI ni rdo rje snying po ste// yi ge hrIHni rdo rje bstan// sna tshogs rdo rje yi ge a// hUM ni rdo rje sems da
259b6: ste/ rdo rje rgyal po yi ge wa/ honi rdo rje chags pa ste// rdo rje legs pa yi ge sa// oM ni rdo rje rin chen te// rdo rje gzi brjid yi ge a// dz+haiM rdo rdo rje rgyal mtshan te// rdo rje gzhad pa yi ge ya// maM ge hrIHni rdo rje sbyar// rdorje
259b7: rnon po yi ge d+hi/ / paM ni rdo rje 'khor lo ste// rdo rje smra ba yi ge sa// yi ge shaM ni rdo rje las// rdo rje bsrung ba yi ge hUM// hUM ni rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rdo rje khu tshur yi ge baM// gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid// snying khar de bzhin sgom par bya// yi ge hUM
259b8: ni rnal 'byor pa/ / de ni myur du 'grub par 'gyur// nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pa yis// gzugs gcig rnam par spro bar bya// yi ge hUM bzlas tsam gyi ni// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// zla ba'i

260a1: dkyil 'khor dbus gnas par/ / deng bdag nyid ni sdom par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste// rdo rje gcig ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje'i dbus kyi lte bar ni// de ru yi ge nu bsgom bya// theg pa chen po mngon par
260a2: bsdus/ / ji bzhin mdo yi rjes 'brangs nas// ji bzhin rgyal po skyes bur bcas// yi ge hUM ni dang por bcas// de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas// snying kha ru ni bsgom par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje'i gzugs su ste// dbus su
260a3: yi ge hUM sgom bya/ / de bzhin yi ge thams cad kyang // rnal 'byor pas ni snying khar sgom// zla ba'i gzugs las yang dag gnas// bdag nyid yongs su sgom bya zhing // rigs kyi lha yi sbyor ba yis// rang bdag nyid ni sgom par
260a4: rdo rje sems dpa' gang 'ga' zhig/ gang dang gang zhig mngon 'dod pa// rig pa de ni snying khar bsgom// yi ge hUM ni dang bor sbyar// gang phyir de las rtogs pa 'byung // de bzhin yid kun rnal 'byor pas// snying khar sgoms
260a5: pas sgom par bya/ / yang na nam mkha'i sbyor ba yis// yi ge hUM ni dang bor sbyar// nam mkha'i rang bzhin sgom bya zhing // yi ge dag ni thams cad sbyar// yang na nam mkha'i zla dbus su// gnas pa'i yi ge hUM bsgom bya//
260a6: bdag nyid rigs kyi lha mor bsam// skad cig de la rab 'grub 'gyur// hUM ni ji skad bstan pa bzhin// sngags kun rab tu sgom par bya// rig pa kun gyi gsang ba ni// rgyud kun yang dag sdus pa ste// bzlas pa'i gsang
260a7: pab des sbas pa/ / gsang ba 'di ni rnam pa drug/ rig 'dzin rnams kyi snying po dang // rnal 'byor rgyud ni sdus pa dang // don yod shin du rmad 'byung ba// gsang ba las kyang mchog gsang bshad// bzlas brjod tsam gyi sbyor ba
260a8: yis/ / lta ba'i ngo bo 'joms par 'gyur// rang gi snying kha'i dbus su ni// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor sgom par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor de dbus su// zla ba gnyis bsgom par bya// dbugs 'byung rngub pa gang yin pa// rdo rje ma

260b1: ge hUM ru bsgom/ / me bsrubs pa yi sbyor ba yis// steng dang 'og tu rgyu bar bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yang dag gnas// dbus mu yi ge hrIHbsgom bya// steng 'og 'gro ba sgom par bya// yi ge hU ni de sbyar nas// ji ltar shing skam
260b2: gtsub snyan pa/ / gtsub shing yang dag sbyor gnas su// rtsol ba byas pa tsam gyis ni// skad cig gis ni me 'byung bzhin// yi ge a ni gtsub bstan te// yi ge hUM ni gtsub shing yin// rgyu ba'i rnal 'byor pa yis ni// skad cig
260b3: gis ni ye shes skye/ / shes rab pha rol phyin ye shes// yi ge hrIHdu 'dir brjod bya// byang chub sems ni yi ge d+hu// me yi sbyor bas bsrub par bya// bsrubs pa'i spyong 'di yis ni// ye shes dam pa skye bar 'gyur// rdo rje de ni
260b4: bsreg bya ste/ / rdo rje ye shes bla na med// b+ha ga sangs rgyas kun shes rab// ling ga rdo rjer brjod par bya// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// b+ha ga ling gar rab tu sgrub// b+ha gar ling ga gtsug nas ni// mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs
260b5: so/ / b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mkhas pas ling ga gzhug par bya// gsang ba gzi brjid chen po 'di// me grub pa yi sbyor ba yis// 'ga' zhig gis ni 'di sgrubs na// skad cig gis ni ye shes skye// zlas pa gsang ba rnam pa bdun
260b6: rdzogs so/ / / sbas pa gsang ba rgyud chen po// 'di nyid rnal 'byor kun du bsdus// de nyid chen po sdum pa ni// de nas gzhan yang rab bshad bya// zla ba gang ba yang dag gnas// bdag nyid rdo rjer bsgom par bya//
260b7: de yi dbus su rdo rje ste// rdo rje rigs kyi bzlas par bya// zla ba gang ba la gnas par// bdag nyid pad mar sgom par bya// de yi dbum mu pad ma de// pad ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya// zla ba gang ba la gnas par// bdag
260b8: nyid nor bur bsgom par bya/ / de yi dbus su rin chen dang // rin chen rigs kyi bzlas par bya// bdag nyid rdo rje gcig pu ni// rdo rje rnon por rab tu sgom// de yi las kyi rigs mchog la// las kyi rigs kun bzlas

261a1: par bya/ / sangs rgyas rjes dran nas brtsams te// sangs rgyas gzugs su rnam par sgom// de yi thugs khar zhugs nas ni// sangs rgyas rigs kun bzlas par bya// rdo rje sems dpa'i gzugs chen po// sems
261a2: dpa' gcig ni rnam par sgom/ / de yi thugs khar zhugs nas ni// rdo rje rigs kun bzlas par bya// pad ma'i sems dpa' chen po'i gzugs// 'jig rten dbang phyug rnam par sgom// de'i thugs khar zhugs nas ni//
261a3: pad ma'i rigs kun bzlas par bya// nor bu rin chen skal ba che// rdo rje rin chen rnam par sgom// de yi thugs khar zhugs nas ni// rin chen rigs kun bzlas par bya// sems dpa' chen po rdo rje las// sems
261a4: dpa'i gzugs ni rnam par sgom/ / de yi thugs khar zhugs nas ni// las kyi rigs kun bzlas par bya// bden pa dam tshig mchog gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad rab grol byed// thos pa tsam gyi thabs chen po/
261a5: yang na snying khar rdor rang bzhin// sna tshogs bdag po bzlas brjod mtshungs// shes rab can gyi gang bsams pa// phun sum tshogs kun bde bar thob// gsang ba yang dag bshad par bya// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam
261a6: sgom bya/ / de yi thugs khar 'jug bya zhing // yid kyis thams cad btsug nas ni// de yi sku ni mtshungs par sme// de yi thugs kha'i dbus su ni// rdo rje'i rigs ni rab tu bshad// ji bzhin sngon gyi rjes 'brangs nas// de bzhin
261a7: gshegs pa thams cad spro/ / de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs bzlas na// the tshom med par sangs rgyas kun// skad cig de nyid kyis 'grub 'gyur// rdo rje'i mda' ni zhi ba 'di// 'di lta bu yi
261a8: gzugs sgom bya/ / da yi thugs khar zhugs nas ni// rdo rje'i gar dang mtshungs par sgom// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje'i rigs can thams cad ni// the tshom med par dngos grub kun// ye shes zlas pas 'grub

261b1: par 'gyur/ / pad ma'i sems dpa' skom bya zhing // thugs khar ji bzhin 'jug par bya// sna tshogs thabs ni rab sgoms na// pad ma'i rigs can 'grub par 'gyur// rdo rje rin chen bsgom bya zhing // thugs khar ji bzhin
261b2: 'jug par bya/ / rin chen mdzod ni gtsug nas su// yang dang yang du spro bar bya// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje rin chen dga' chen po// the tshom med par dngos grub kun// bzlas pa tsam gyis 'grub par 'gyur// stong
261b3: gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'dir/ / rdo rje las su rnam par bsam// de yi thugs khar zhugs nas ni// sna tshogs rnam 'phrul spro bar bya// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yis// sna tshogs mdzod ni rab spros nas// the tshom med par
261b4: dngos grub kun/ / bzlas pa tsam gyi 'grub par 'gyur// shin tu gsang ba 'di lnga ni// bzlas pa gsang ba bla na med// de lta bu yi sbyor ba yi// sangs rgyas byang chub thob par 'gyur// bzlas pa'i cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di// rgyud/
261b5: kyi snying po kun bsdus shing // nyon mongs thams cad rab 'joms shing // rig pa 'dzin pas bzlas par bya// bzlas pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rig pa'i rtul zhugs nges par blang // gal te 'di ni dngos grub 'dod//
261b6: rnal 'byor pa yi rtul zhugs bya// bzlas brjod sbyin bsreg cho ga ni// rnal 'byor mchog tu brtson par bya// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// bye ba gsum ni yongs su bzla// bye ba gsum ni bzlas byas nas// sgrub pa
261b7: ngag ni brtsam par bya/ / byang chub sems ni dga' chen po// shes rab can gyi dkyil 'khor bri// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// sems can gcig gis yang dag bri// gang phyir rgyal po mchog gsang dbang // rdo rje
261b8: mchog ni rab ster byed/ / rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// de ni sngon du yang dag brtsam// shes rab can gyi dkyil 'khor bri// khru ni bcu par yang dag bri// gru bzhi pa la sgom bzhi pa// rtababs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan//

262a1: gang brgyad dang yang dag ldan// dar gyi chun pos rnam par ldan// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// 'khyer dag gis shin tu smras// rin chen dra bas yongs su bres// gser skad dril bu g.yer khas rgyan//
262a2: dang ni mtshams rnams su// rdo rje 'ching bas rab tu bcing // rdo rje rin chen rab tu bkod// rdo rje thig gis thig btab pa// dri yi sbyor ba'i cho ga dang // phur bus bgegs ni gsal bya zhing // tshen rtsi lnga yi srad bu ni//
262a3: rdo rje gas dbas bsrung bar bya// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// phyi rol dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya// ji skad sngar bshad de nyid ni// rdo rje gsang ba yongs su bkod// rdo rje gsang ba yongs bkod nas// phyi rol
262a4: dkyil 'khor thig gdab bya/ / rdo rje 'khor lo rab mdzes la// 'khor lo'i dbus su rab tu dgod// rdo rje chags pa yongs su dgod// tshon rtsi lnga ni rab tu dbye// ji skad gsang rgyud las gsungs bzhin// dkar
262a5: po sna tshogs 'od 'bar ba/ / sngon po ser po shin du 'bar// gcod sogs dang ni rab tu ldan// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs ldan// sna tshogs tshon rtsis bri bar bya// 'od zer dmar po sna tshogs 'bar// rdo rje 'khor lo
262a6: yongs bkod nas/ / zla ba gang bar rab bkod do// 'khor lo thams cad yongs su gzung // kha dog ji bzhin rigs pa bzhin// ji ltar mdzes shing shin du dkar// ji bzhin zla ba nya ba mtshungs// zla ba gang ba yang dag
262a7: bri/ / zla ba gang ba'i dbus su ni// rdo rje sems dpa' yang dag bri// gang gis mtshan ni gzung ba yis// skad cig gis ni sdig las 'grol// 'dzum pa dang bcas zla ba'i mdog/ shin tu chags pa dga' chen po// myur/
262a8: du rdo rje'itshig brjod de// rdo rje nyid kyi snying po yin// oM ma hA su kha badz+ra satwa hUM dzaHhUM baM hoHrdo rje'i glu ni blang bya zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa che// sangs rgyas byang chub rab ster byed// 'dod pa'i chags pa yang

262b1: dran/ / thams cad rjes chags bde ba thugs mchog mnga'// rdo rje sems dpa' rab tu dga' ba mchog/ kye khyod bde chen ston pas 'phel mdzad pa// rab tu myur du sgrub pa 'grub par mdzod// rdo rje'i glu ni de lta bu// glang zhing
262b2: 'khor lo spyan drang bya/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// rjes su chags shing rab 'grub 'gyur// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung yang dag gnas// rdo rje bsnyem tshul 'chang ba'i mchog/ rol pa dang bcas spyan g.yo ba/
262b3: bsnyems tshul chen po dga' ba che// g.yas pa'i phyag gis rdo rje ni// thugs kha ru ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ g.yon pa dril bu yang dag ldan// slar yang snyems tshul dang bcas pa// byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje che// rgyal po
262b4: chen po thub pa che/ / spyod pa chen po theg pa che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod//
262b5: rin chen chen po rdo rje che// rgyal mtshan chen po dran pa che/ sangs rgyas dran pa rdo rje che/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod/ 'dod chags chen po bdeb che/ bde bacher
262b6: po bla na med/ / sa dang pha rol phyin bde bar// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// shes rab chen po rdo rje che// rdo rje hUM mdzad las byung ba// byang chub sems ni rdo rje che// rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// rdo rje chen po chags
262b7: pache/ / rgyal po chen po thub pa che// don yod rgyal po rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje sems dpa' bdag grub mdzod// chos kyi srid pa 'khor le che// smra ba'i las ni bla da med// srung zhing srung ba drag po che// rdo rje kha tshur bdag grub mdzod/

263a1: rdo rje yi ni glu 'di yis// de nyid mchog tu skul nas ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// 'dod chags chen po dga' ba che// rdo rje sems dpa' sgom bya zhing // rdo rje sems dpa'
263a2: rgyal po che/ / mkhas pas dkyil 'khor dgod par bya// dkyil 'khor snga ma dang mtshungs par// dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag bri// de nas rdo rje la nas ni// mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 'don par bya// chos kyi rig pa 'dzin pa ni/
263a3: dbab dang gzhug pa la sogs pa// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams thams cad yang dag bya// bum pa la sogs yo byad dang // spos dang me tog la sogs mchog rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// las rnams
263a4: thams cad yang dag bya/ / rdo rje sems dpa'i rig pa yis// bum pa brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na// de ni zhabs kyi drung bzhag na// rdo rje bdud rtsi'i churaru 'gyur// rdo rje dbyings kyi sbyor ba yis// cho ga ji bzhin 'jug bya zhing // rdo rje sems/
263a5: dpa'i phyag rgya ches// bdag nyid la ni dbang skur bya// d+h+r-i gi yang dag zhugs nas ni/ rdo rje mchod pa yang dag mchod// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// ci rigs par ni bsgrub par bya// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar gnas//
263a6: phyag rgya chen po yongasu gzung // rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// rang bdag nyid ni sgrub par bya// de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che// skad cig re re bsgrub par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// brtan par 'gyur bar the tshom med//
263a7: gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bsgrubs nas ni// shin tu brtan pa bla na med// rjes chags sems dpa' chen po ni// skad cig gi ni sgrub par bya// de 'dra'i mchog tu gsang ba mthar phyin pa// sems dpa' rgyal chen yongasu dag pa
263a8: mchog/ dag pa'i tshul 'ad cung zad mtshungs pa med// rjes chags 'dod chags yongs su dag pa mchog/ rdo rje rgyal mchog dab dag dri ma med// gsang ba las byung 'bor lo dam pa 'dzin// rig pa'i gsang sngags tshul 'di byang chub

263b1: byed/ / snying rje dang ldan spyad pa spyod byed pa// de bzhin rab 'jigs sdug bsngal chen po'i pha rol phyin gyur pa// mchog tu mkhas shing phral rgyud dang rgyud dag las byung ba// de ru srid pa dag gi dra ba chen po gcod mdzad pa// gsang sngags
263b2: 'khor lo las byung 'khor lo ste/ / de bzhin gshegs pa kun gyi dgongs pa gcig/ sras kyi gtso ba dbang slar rgyal po ste// de yis thar pa'i grong khyer rab tu bshad// gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po de kho na nyid dam pa mchog du
263b3: gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde gsang ba'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs zhes bya ba'i rna ma da ste nyi rdzogs so// // de nas rnal 'byor gas sa
263b4: che/ / sangs rgyas thams cad kun 'dus pa// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan pa'i mchog/ nam mkha' sna tshogs dngos ldan pa// ri dbang rgyal po chen po ste// sangs rgyas kyi ni sprul pa sprul// rdo rje dbang po chen po'i gnas// sangs
263b5: rgyas thams cad yang dag 'dus/ / rdo rje rgyal po rtse mo ste// gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag byung // rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal ba che// chos dang long spyod rdzogs pa'i mtshungs// rdo rje kun gyis rab mdzes pa// mchog tu gyur pa'i
263b6: gnas de ru/ / rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po che// rnal 'byor pa ni mi gsung bzhugs// sems dpa'i dkyil dkrung yang dag bzhugs// gtso bos chos kun dbang du 'gyur// rol bcas rdo rje snyems tshul ldan// rdo rje sems dpa'
263b7: dga' ba che/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi gnas cig ste// chos chen po'i rnal 'byor mchog/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// thub pa'i dbang phyug la gsol btab// rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// byang chub sems
263b8: dpa'i dga' chen po/ / sems dpa' byang sems las byung ba// rang gi rigs 'byung bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang ba rgyal po ste// rgyud kyi snying po gsang ba che// gsang ba chen po rigs kyi dbang // mdo sde gsang

264a1: dbang rgyal po ste/ / theg pa chen po mngon sdus pa// zhi bas byang chub 'grub 'gyur te// thams cad yang dag sdus pa min// gtum pa thams cad rab 'joms pa// rang rigs rtag tu bshad du gsol// rdo rje 'chang brgyal
264a2: poste/ / kun du mi gsung bzhugs par 'gyur// mi gsung gsang ba ma gsungs te/ zhi bas bde ba la bzhugs 'gyur// gsang ba de bzhin gshegs pa mchog/ sems dpa' chen po snyoms par bzhugs// rtog cing gzigs
264a3: par mi mdzad de/ / gsang ba'i rnal 'byor bzhugs par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad 'dus nas ni// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad// sangs rgyas gcig bzhin yang dag 'gyur// don yod grub pa bla na med// sangs rgyas
264a4: thams cad rnal 'byor che/ / gsang ba 'dun las yang dag byung // rdo rje'i sbyor ba'i ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje can la bskul ba gsungs// oM badz+ra sa twa u tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje bskul ba gsungs pa na// chos dbyings sangs rgyas gcig tu
264a5: nyid/ / gsang ba'i rnal 'byor ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje sems dpa' bzhengs par gyur// thub pas mgon rnams la btud nas// tshig ni 'di skad gsungs par gyur// rnam pa kun du ci zhig bgyi// bdag la sangs rgyas kun gyis
264a6: gsungs/ / phyag na rdo rje brtan pa la// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs// gsang ba rdo rje rigs zhes pa// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor bshad du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas sdang byed// rab tu
264a7: bcad nas tshig gsung ba/ / mgon po rnal 'byor gzigs su gsol// bdag gi snodod ldan pa'i mchog/ 'di na sems can 'ga' yang med// gang phyir mu stegs la chags shing // skye dgu lta ba'i dri mas khyab// sems can
264a8: 'di dag 'dul bya min/ / sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin// log pa'i lam du yang dag zhugs// mun pa stug po la gzhol ba// la la lha mi lta ba chags// kha cig rtul zhugs lta ba'i gnas// kha cig dka' thub gdungs pas

264b1: 'khrul/ / nyon mongs pas ni 'khrugs pa'i sems// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga la chags// skyo bar yang ni mi 'gyur te// rdo rje rigs kyi gsang 'di la// nam yang sbyor bar mi 'gyur ro// de dag 'dod chags che la chags// 'dod
264b2: pa'i chags pa dag las rgyal/ / sangs rgyas byang chub chags bral ba// gsang ba 'di la sbyor mi 'gyur// lnga ba'i chags pas rgyal bar 'gyur// 'dod pa'i chags pas lta ba can// srid pa'i zhags pas shin du chags// sangs
264b3: rgyas bstan pa la chags thal/ / nga rgyal lhag pa'i nga rgyal bcing // gdug cing drag la shin du khro// snying rje med cing rtse med 'gyur// de la gsang ba rung ma yin// mongs pa kun mkhyen yin snyam pa// ye shes chen po la
264b4: mkhas pa/ / gsang ba 'di ni rung ma yin// 'dren pa ji ltar bshad par bgyi// gnod sbyin dang ni srin po nyid// sha za 'byung po gsang ba ba// lha la sogs pa gdug chen po// bstan pa la ni 'jug mi 'gyur// nga ni sangs
264b5: rgyas rab tu zhi/ / byang chub sems ni dga' chen po// sems can 'di dag shin du 'dug/ bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni rgyal chen theg chen la// nam mkha'i dbyings bzhin rab tu yangs// kye ma sems
264b6: can 'di dag dman/ / bdag gi tshig ni 'grub mi 'gyur// nga ni theg chen dag pa ste// nyon mongs 'dam gyis gos pa med// kye ma'o sems can 'di nyon mongs// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// da ni shes rab ye
264b7: shes che/ / theg pa che la shin tu bstan// kye ma sems can shes rab ngan// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// bsod nams chen po ye shes che// nga ni mchod pa chen po'i tshogs// kye ma'o sems can bsod nams
264b8: chung / / bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// sems can 'di dag nye bar 'tshe// 'jigs pa sna tshogs kun du khyab// rnam rtog gis bskyed shes rab ngan// sangs rgyas chos kyi snod ma yin// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig

265a1: rten 'di/ dag pa chen po dbang thug kyang // rmongs pa kunas pa nyid gyur ba/ skabs can rngu 'phrul chen pa ste// del rgyal ba thogs byed yod// sgyu ma'i sngags na yangs su 'dzin/ danam rbu sa byaste// sems can/
265a2: rmongs byed lhur len pa// de ni rgyal po lha chen po// gtso bo rgyal po chen po mtshungs// de ni dbang phyug che zhes bya// gdug pa'i sems can 'joms byed pa// de yi gzugs can rgyal po che// skyed byed byed pa po bdag po// tshangs pa chen
265a3: po rgyal po che/ / lta ba sna tshogs rab ster ba// 'dod pa'i khams kyi rgyal po che// dbang po zhes bya sha ci'i bdag/ brtson 'grus dbang phyug chen po'i bu// gdong drug rdzu 'phrul chen po can// dpung chen zhes bya'i ming che ste// gzhon nu maM
265a4: pa 'od lngamin/ / rgyal po chen po 'di lnga ni// khams gsum gyi ni bdag por bshad// rgyal po lnga ni gzi brjid che// lus gsum gyi ni ngo mtshar che// srul byed dbang phyug chen po ni// tshangs pa khyab 'jug dbang phyug che// de yi lus ba
265a5: can rgyal po che/ / dbang phyug chen po zhes grags pa// sems can gdug pa shin du dag/ sngags bcas 'khor dang bcas pa yi// rgyal po lnga po da dag ni// sems can dag ni nam rmongs byed// lta ba chen po 'dzin byed cing // bdud rtsi
265a6: dbang du gyur pa ste/ / nyon mongs chen pos rab nyon mongs// gzhan yang kun nas nyon mongs byed// sems can dag ni 'joms byed cing // bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi 'gyur// dbang phyug chen po bdag nyid che// bdag nyid dam pa'i
265a7: yid chen po/ / de lta bu yin ma rtog gis// sems can rnam par rmongs par byed// tshangs pa 'byin byed skye dgu'i bdag/ byed pa rang bdag byed pa po// lta ba chen po de lta bus// sems can dag ni rnam rmongs byed// khyab 'jug kun song
265a8: khyab byed pa/ / khyab 'jug rang bzhin grong khyer kun// de ltar yang dag mi 'dzin pa// lta ba'i 'ching ba rab ster byed// rgya cher rgyal po 'di rnams ni// lta bar sbal nges par ston// rmongs pa mkhas pa yin sems shing // sems can 'ching ba

265b1: byed pa yin/ sems can de rnams gzhan gyi skul// lta bar spa banges par ston// khyab 'jug changs pa la sogs pa// dbang phrug chen po phyag byed de/ sangs rgyas ye shes rnam kun du// bdag gi tshig 'di 'grub mi byed// sems can 'dir rdza/
265b2: mongs par 'gyur// de lags ba rung ma yin// de lta bu yi rnam pa yis// rdo rje sems dpa' dga' chen po// sangs rgyas kun gyi mkhyen nas ni// nal 'byor pa ni mi gsungs bzhugs// mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kum/ thub pa nyim ma
265b3: lus pas/ / gsung gcig gis ni gsang ba che// rdo rje yi ni tshigs gsungs pa// kye ma'o sems can 'di gdul bka'// gdug cing drag la shin du gtum// sangs rgyas kun gyis mi 'dul ba// de phyir bdag cag gsol ba 'debs//
265b4: mgon khyod shes rab chen po ste// khyod ni thabs chen brjod par bya// byang chub sems ni thabs chen po// nyon mongs thams cad nges par 'joms// gdug pa thams cad rab gdul ba// mgon po khyod la gsol ba 'debs// gdugs
265b5: 'dul byed rnam 'phrul pa/ / thabs chen po ni rab tu gsungs// sangs rgyas kun gyi sems can 'di// 'dul bar mi 'gyur snod min la// thabs chen khro bo chen po ni// thub pa chen pos bstan du gsol// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshig gsan nas//
265b6: phyag na rdo rje rdzu 'phrul che// tshig ngag gi ni zhus gyur pa// sangs rgyas kun la 'di skad gsungs// e ma'o gsang ba 'khor lo che// thabs chen bdag nyid chen po ste// chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa'i dngos// thabs kyi 'khor lor bston//
265b7: jiskad du ni bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du ni bdag gis bgyi// sems can kun la phan bya'i phyir// drag po nyid ni bstan par bya// de skad gsungs nas sems dpa' che// byang chub sems dpa' bdag nyid che// mi gsung bzhug
265b8: nas rnal 'byor gyis/ / drag po nyid la snyoms par zhugs// drag po'i dkyil 'khor rdo rje mchog/ ces bya'i ting 'dzin de lta bu// drag po chen po snyoms par zhugs// de bzhin thugs kha nas byung ba// drag po 'jigs rung yige haM//

266a1: khro bo chen po brjod par gyur// rdo rje hUM mdzad khro rgyal go mgon po thugs kha nas byung gyur// sa gzhi ma lus g.yos gyur cing // sa 'di dag ni sgra sgrogs gyur// stong gsum ma lus 'di dag ni// hUM hUM zhes bya brjod par
266a2: grur/ chang med gzhal du med pa yi// the bo'i rgyal po byur gyur pas// phyogs rnams kun tu gdug chen dag/ skad cig de la gtum par gyur// slar yang gcig nyi dgur nas ni// gong bur byas nas rab bsdams te// the bo'i rgyal po
266a3: sku chen po/ / 'jigs su rung ba gcig tu gyur// de ni khro bo'i rgyal po che// sangs rgyas kun gyi grags chen po// blo rgyal mdun du 'dug nas ni// slar yang snying po rab tu brjod// hUMt+yahUM tra/ 'jigs su rung ba'i spu langs byed// gnod
266a4: sbyin kun bdag gnod sbyin te/ / rdo rje gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul che// khro bo chen po brjod pa yin// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i 'od kyi khyab// rdo rje me ni drag po che// ma lus gsal zhing me 'bar gyur// phyi rol gyi ni
266a5: gdug pa can/ / ma lus dkyil 'khor las byung ba// rdo rje me ni rab 'bar bas// g.yo ba med cing shi bar 'gyur// lha chen la sogs gdug pa rnams// gang dag rigs kyi dkyil 'khor rnams// rdo rje gnod sbyin gyi gdung
266a6: nas/ / g.yo ba med cing 'bar bar 'gyur// de ni rdo rje gnod sbyin ne// drag po'i gzugs can rab 'jigs byed// thog nyer bster ba'i gdong can to// de bzhin ga nag dang sde bar gyur// mche ba gtsigs pa'i zhal mngang ba/ dbus chen
266a7: brjes shin du skrag/ spyan dmar spyan dang ldan pa ste// de bzhin rdo rje bstan pa'i zhal// drag po rdo rje drag tshogs 'dzin// gcig pu 'bar ba rab ldan pa// zhags pa lcags kyu rdo rje bdag/ sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byed pa// sa rnams
266a8: ma lus g.yo bar byed/ / sa 'di yang ni g.yo bar byed// gnod sbyin chen po 'byung po sogs// g.yo ba med cing 'og tu 'gyel// de ni drag po gnod sbyin che// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs par byed// de yi spyan sngar 'dug nas ni// ched du

266b1: pa yang dag badzad/ mam byang chub tunas pas/ kun du bzang ba kun dgag// sems can 'dul ba'i thabs su ni/ b+han+de med mub nyid dA ThAr// sngang na rje sems dpa' ga // zhi ba'i gzugasun pa gnas ga/ rdo rjeg nod sbyin
266b2: tha / / gas bulangs pa nga/ kyiga'o// pa ma sa// sa mgyu pan// me
266b3: wAn ya ho b+hag zhan ba d+hA T+Ta/ / shin du gtum zhing cher grags pa// de bzhin sngags la nas byung ste// zhal ba ni dang ni phyag brgyad pa// skal pa yi ni me lar drag/ ji dus kyi sa ltang byu / tsan mangs phyogs ni bzag
266b4: byed/ smin ma bskyod pas gtsigs pa'i zhal// de bzhin rnam par 'jig pa'i gdong // 'jig rten gsum sreg dam tshig ste// rdo rje can kun sreg par byed// 'bar 'phreng kun tu 'khrigs pa'i sgra// rdo rje bskal pa'i me ltar 'bar// rdo rje hUM
266b5: mdzad phyag rgya ni/ / phyag gnyis kyis ni yongs su gzung // rdo rje bsdams pa 'dzin rgyal po// lcags kyu dang ni zhags pas brgyan// rdo rje yi ni lu gu rgyud// phyag gnyis na bsdams 'jigs rung zhal// sangs rgyas thams cad bsdigs
266b6: byed pa/ / rdo rje gtum pos yang dag zung // drag po bka' ni nod par byed// mU rab ru ni bka' stsal cig/ min na sangs rgyas khyed rnams kun// the tshom med par bza' bar bya// de nas sangs rgyas kun gyi gsungs// Taka ki dza tru shin//
266b7: du drag/ rigs dang bcas par lha chen po// stobs chen po yis dgug par gyis// de nas rig pa'i mchog rgyal po// bsnyems pa'i tshul gyi bzhad byed cing // khro bo drag po rnga sgra sgrogs// rdo rje zhags pa skul bar bya// rdo rje zhags pa dra
266b8: bo che/ / dpung bcas grogs dang bcas pa dang // de bzhin rigs dang dkyil 'khor bcas// song la dbang phyug chen po khug/ badz+ra pA sha hUM/ dbang ldan rgyal po chen po ni// sna tshogs rang gi 'khor na gnas// 'jigs byed ma dang /

267a1: lhan cigs/ 'dod pa can ni mchog tu rol// rdo rje zhugs pa der song ste// zlo ba dgra yis bsdigs par gyur// dbang ldan rgyal po la snyan pa// khyod la ston pa spyan 'dren mdzad// skrag cing khros nas sa chen pos// 'jigs pa
267a2: yi ni tshig brjod pa/ / nga ni 'jig rten gsum rgyal go// nga las ston pa gzhan yod dam// rdo rjezhags pa khro bo ches// tshig ni lan gsum brjod par gyur// rdo rje khro bo rgyal ba che// khyod la shin du spyan 'dren mdzad// chen dbang phyug chen po yis/
267a3: slar yang lan gas ma smras pa ni// ni kho na rgyal po dang // ngal spyan 'dren gang zhig yod// de nas zhags pas bka' bzhin byed// bro bo drag bor ba 'jigs pas// yan lag thams cad bcings nas ni// dbang phyug chen po btub
267a4: par gyur/ / 'jigs shing sgra gnas lha chen po// shin du smre sngags 'don cing ngu// skyabs ni gang yang yod ma yin// 'jigs pa chen po kun du byung // stobs dang de bzhin nga rgyal gyis// stobs dang shugs ni bstan
267a5: nas su/ / zhags pa bcad nas zos par gyur// rang gi gnas su song gyur nas// 'jig rten gsum gyi lha rnams pos// lha dang lha min dri zar bcas// skad gcig gis ni 'dus gyur nas// 'khor rnams dag ni ngu bar
267a6: b+hur/ / ji lta sngon gyi ma byas pa'i// de lta bu ni yang dag mthong // sems can rab drag 'di su zhig/ rdo rje zhags pas mdun song ste// rdo rje rig pa mchog la zhus// dbang phyug chen pos bdag bcad de// drag po tshangs parabatu
267a7: brogros/ / rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// khro bo gtum po shin du drag/ de lta bu yi tshig gsan nas// thams cad tu ni 'bar bar 'gyur// khro bo rdo rje lu gu rbud// drag po yis ni bka' bsgo ba// myur du song la lha chen po// rigs
267a8: chen po dang bcas pa khrag/ khro bo'i rgyal po lu gu rgyud// gsanan dbang phyug tshig gnas song// yan lag thams cad bcings nas su// lha mo dang bcas kun du bkug/ skad cig 'jigs pas du byed cing // lha rnams thams//

267b1: dashin du 'jigs// 'jigs pas sdug bsngal sme sngags 'don// de ring 'dran la chen men// nob pa dang thugs ni thams cad kyis// dza kun dang 'thab par 'gyur// ma dang thob ba dang thugs kyis na/ gan
267b2: thams cad zos par gyur/ / lha chen la sogs thams cad ni// phyogs rnams kun du thos par gyur// mun pa yi ni kun du 'khrug/ phyogs rnams kun du 'jigs par byur// khro bo lugra chung 'ongs nas// rnam bkun
267b3: smra bar byed/ / ma lus phyogs rnams thams cad du// bdag cag/ nas ni bros par gyur// khre ba rje rje rig pa mchog/ slar yang shin du khros par gyur// 'bar ba'i 'phreng bas rab 'bar zhing // rdo rje drag po nyid ce
267b4: kAr/ / drag po ha zhes bzhad dgod// rang gi yan lagaza bar byed// rang gi mgo la rdeg byed cing // rdo rje gsor ba bskor bar 'bar// de lta bu mi khyad par dang // bcas pas khro bo yang dag zung // slar yang rang gi bdag
267b5: nyid dran/ / khro bo'i rgyal po brjod par gyur// oM sam+b+han su b+hA ni hU~M/ gr-ih+Na gr-ih+Na hA/ gr-idz+nyA pa ya gre drA pa ya hUM/ a na ma ho b+ha ga bAn badz+ra d+ha phaT// bre bo'i rgyal po bcas nas ni// yi ge dza ni yong bu brjod// rdo rje lugs
267b6: krung rab tu sngags/ / stobs dang ldan pa 'gal shog/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la Ag nis tri sha a~M ku sha dzadza/ rdo rje 'bar ba lcags kyu ni// song nas phyogs kun bdag nyid che// skad cig cig gi stobs chen rnams// lha rnams
267b7: thams cad bkug par gyur/ / rgyal po dbang phyug lnga dang ni// lha rnams thams cad grangs med par// rigs bcas dpung dang bcas pa nyid// gcig nyid tu ni bsdus par gyur// rdo rje ljags sgrog rab tu mngags// chings
267b8: shig stobs chen dang ldan pa/ / tshogs dang bcas pa'i lha rnams kun// bcing ba lnga yis bcings par 'gyur// nang gi 'khor dang bcas pa'i tshogs// lha tshogs gnod sbyin srin po dang // lha min rlung dang 'byung

268a1: po'i tshogs/ / gzhan yang gdug pa'i tshogs rnams ni// thams cad bcings par gyur nas ni// rdo rje nags pa rab tu mngags// rdo rje lcags kyu dang bcas par// song la dkyil 'khor dag thug cig/ rdo rje zhugs
268a2: pas mngon chags pas/ / yan lag kun las yongs su spro// rdo rje'i rang bzhin zhags pa ste// brtan par gyur par the tshom med// bye ba dag ni grangs med pacu// rdo rje lcags kyu rab tu byung // lha la sogs pa'i re re zhing /
268a3: spyi bo nas 'gugs yang dag sbyor// lha chen dbang phyug chen po yis// spyi bo'i gtsug tu btab nas ni// rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal po yis// dbang phyug chen po 'gugs par byed// lha sogs 'khor dang bcas pa kun/
268a4: phan tshun du ni ngu bar byed// shugs ring kun du byung nas ni// phan tshun du ni smra bar byed// kye ma'o sdug bsngal kye ma'o shi/ tshogs ni gang du khyer bar gyur// rdo rje 'bar ba chen po des// skad cig de la bsreg
268a5: gyur nas/ / ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug/ gnas de ru ni thams cad dag/ yongs su bskor nas kun du gnas// rdo rje kha khyer phyi rol du// lha rnams de dag thams cad gnas// rdo rje
268a6: ra ba'i phyi rol tu/ / lha la sogs pa thams cad bkug/ phyi rol rdo rje rab ni// lcags bsregs rang bzhin rdo rje mtshungs// rdo rje can gyi rdor 'bar mes// nang nas shin du gdungs par gyur// lha tshogs sems//
268a7: can de dag kyang // 'jigs su rung ba'i 'o dod 'bod// stong gsum 'di dag thams cad kyang // hUM hUM sgra ni yongs su brjod// 'o dod bos nas smra bar byed// ngan song dag ni ci zhig byed// sngon ma mthong ba
268a8: 'di ci zhig/ 'dir ni rdo rje 'dzin par 'gyur// rdo rje 'dzin pas rgyal po de// slar yang thugs rje kun du skyes// thams cad bcings pa las bkrol te// rdo rje me yi nye bar mdzes// rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// rang gi

268b1: dkyil 'khor nas phyung ste/ / lha la sogs pa kun pos te// nga yi tshig 'di rab tu nyon// de nas lha rgyal la sogs pa// khyod ni su yin smra bar byed// nged kyis khyod ni sngar ma mthong // gnas mchog 'di yang sngar ma mthong //
268b2: rdo rje gnod sbyin drag po che// ha ha zhes dgod bzhad pa yis// spras pa rdo rje gnod sbyin // thams cad za byed bzod dka' ba// de nas lha chen gyis spras pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes// nga yis khyod ni sngar ma mthong // bdag
268b3: nyid kho na rang byung ba/ / rdo rje drag pos rab smras pa// nga yi bka' la myur gnas kyis// min na rdo rje 'bar ba 'das// rang gi rigs ni sreg par byed// lha chen po yis tshig smras pa// bstan pa la ni nga mi gnas// 'jig rten
268b4: gsum gyi dbang phyug pa/ / su yi bstan pa la gnas pa// 'khor dang bcas pa'i stobs gang yin// de ri dang yis bstan par bya// khyod la stobs ni ci yod pa// stobs chen ldan pas bstan par gyis// dbang phyug
268b5: chen po rgyal po che/ / 'byung po'i tshogs bcas lhan cig tu// tshig dag sbas par gyur pa ni// drag po nyid ni bstan par bya// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// 'od zer 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab// ha ha zhes bya shin du
268b6: drag/ dbang phyug chen pos bstan par bya// oM shUl a tri shul ma hA sa ha pra shul A yu d+he// rtse gsum mngag gzhug rgyal po ni// stong phrag gcig ni byung bar gyur// rtse bcas kun du 'bar ba yis// rdo rje can dang
268b7: lhan cig 'thab/ / rA rA ya nas sbas pa// oM ma hAs d+ha pra tsakra a yuH/ khyab 'jug gis ni de dag smras// 'khor lo gcig tu rnam pa stong// thams cad 'od zer 'bar bas khyab// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab/
268b8: brgya byin gyi smras pa// oM ma hAs ha ma babs ca te/ rdo rje tong ni blang bar byung // rdo rje 'bang bache bas khyab// brgya byin gyi ni sbas pa yin// rdo rdorje can dang lhan cig 'thag// gzhon nus smras pa// oM ma hA sa tam

269a1: shAk+Sha.a u d+he gzhon nus de kang sbas nas ni/ / mdung ni rtsi gas pa stod byung gyur// d+ha ni drag po sgrogs byed cing // rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thag// tshangs pas smras pa// a ma hA sa ha rbadataN a
269a2: tshangs pas de skad sbas nas ni/ / mug te gang ni zung gyur nas// mtshon cha drag po 'jigs byed pas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thag// gzhan yang lhag ma ma lus pa// rnams kyis yang ni mtshon chad // re re stong
269a3: zag gcig gyur nas/ / rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// blan bral pa gang yin dang // byi rom gyi ni dam ldan pa// de rnams nges par steng gyur nas// rdo rje can dang lhan cig 'thab// me yang kun du 'bar gyur cing // 'jig
269a4: par byed pa'i rlung yang byung / / 'brug gi zla dang klog chen pos// khyab par srid gsum gnas par gyur// ta la ta la'i zla chen po// nam mkha'i bar snang la ni ngag/ rdo rje drag po tshogs chen po// lha rnams thams cad 'thab par/
269a5: byed// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// gtum po drag po 'jigs byed pas// lha yi lan gyi phyag rgya ni// rdo rje yi ni snying po gsungs// oM ma hA sa ha sra ha ra badz+ra tsakre// oM ma hA badz+ra shU le// oM ti ba ta dz+wA la a ga ni badz+ra/
269a6: oM badz+ra shag te/ oM ma hA badz+ran ti// de lta bu yi rnam pa ru// snying po dag ni stong phrag gcig/ srid gsum zhi bar bya ba'i phyir// rdo rje 'chang ni chen po byung // gtum po 'od zer 'bar bas khyab// rdo rje me dang yang dag/
269a7: ldan// drag pa'i snying po las byung gyur// rdo rje 'chang ni dbus na bzhugs// lha tshogs phyag rgya de dag ni// rnam par bshig cing tum bur byas// bcom zhing bsdams te bsres nas ni// phyogs rnams kun du thim
269a8: par gyur/ / rdo rje me yi rab bsdams pas// lha yi rgyal po 'bar bar 'gyur// 'og nas ni rab tu 'bar// steng nas me ni shin du gdungs// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches// dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa// lus srul po ni

269b1: chag so/ / nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// dur khrod gnas la rab tu dga'// lus la thal ba dag gis thugs// mi yi sha ni za bar byed// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// khrag rlon gyi ni rab tu bzlas// lpags pa rlon pa gas du
269b2: gyon/ lha rnams thams cad khyod kyi 'khor// nga yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// gdug pa drag chen mtshan mo rtsub slongs mo ba// khrag la spangs pa'i lpags can las la thal bas thugs// nga yi bka' nyon drag po'i sams ldan lus
269b3: rdul po/ / min na bskal pa'i me yi rtsa bzhin khyod theg bya// ra srags thal ba'i lung po bzhin du thal bar 'gyur// bskal pa'i mechen dang mtshungs pas ni rab 'jigs 'gyur// rigs bcas dpung ldan dkyil 'khor dang bcas
269b4: gnod sbyin drag rdo rje drag po yis ni rab gzhom gzhag par bya/ / dbang phyug chen pos spras pa// nga ni ma lus dbang phyug chen po'i 'khor los sgyur// 'jig rten gsum gyi lha tshegs ma lus pa yi 'khor// shin du drag cing rnam
269b5: gtsigs 'jig rten khyod yin yang / / khyod kyis nga yi bka' ni nyan par gyis// gdug dang sangs rgyas mang po'i 'khor ni sangs rgyas chos kyi 'byung gnas nga yi sprul// zhi zhing de la rnam 'dul gsang ba dri med nyon mongs med
269b6: pa'i pha rol byin/ / de 'dra'i mgon po dga' ba dus gsum bzhugs pa thams cad nas dbang skur// slar yang nga yis 'byung po'i tshig nyon zhes pa'i tshig ni 'di lta bu// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// 'dul ba'i don la shin du
269b7: mkhas/ / bre bo gdug pa gtum chen po// rab 'bar khro bo'i rgyal po ni// rdo rje'i byin rlabs phyag rgya las// bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// snyoms par zhugs nas sems dpa' ches// rang rigs khro bo las byung ba// gdug pa rnam//
269b8: ni 'dul ba'i phyir// khro bo'i chos kyi tshul bzung nas// rkang pa nas btsams spyi be'i bar// lus kun las ni rnam par byung // oM badz+ra kro d+ha uSh+NI Sha hUM/ rdo rje'i gtsug tor khro bo che// 'bar ba'i spyi bo nas phyung nas// sa rnams thams

270a1: bad kyis byed cing / khro bo rgyal po thams cad 'dzin pa// oM badz+ra hrI kroSh+Ta/ bu rgyal ba thog car can/ mdzod pa las ni rabaN+Da byung // jigs byed drug po yang dag ldan/ ma rnams thams cad
270a2: 'bar 'gyur ba/ / oM na sum u0f7fbadz+ra d+ha/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po 'alas rab tu byung bar gyud/ skye bo nas brtsams nang mthal bar// rdo rje 'bar ba yang dag ldan// ni d+hI/ thugs kyi khro ba rgyal pos// thugs 'anas ni ba
270a3: tubyung / 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab pa'i sku// 'jigs su rung ba spu langs byed// oM badz+ra aM ku sha A kar Sha ma hUM/ rdo rje lcags kyu khro bo che// phrag pa g.yas nas rab tu byung // rdo rje lcags kyu gsor byed cing // rdo rje 'bar ba yang
270a4: dag ldan/ / oM badz+rA pA shakro d+ha a ka d+ha ya nu phaT// rdo rje zhags pa khro bo cha// phrag pa g.yon nas rab tu byung // rdo rje 'bar bar yang dag ldan// rdo rje zhags par skor bar byed// oM badz+ra kI li kro d+ha hU~M phaT// khro bo'i rgyal po lcags
270a5: klu thogs/ / lte ba'i dbus gnas rab tu byung // kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan// blo mchog rdo rje gnod sbyin mtshungs// oM badz+ra maM khA la kro d+hanA pa ga khro bo chen po ske rags ni// rked pa'i rdo rje rab tu byung // kun nas 'bar
270a6: ba yang dag ldan/ / phyag rgya dang ni lhan cig ldan// oM badz+ra kro d+ha ba la hUM/ khro bo'i rgyal po chen po stobs// dpung pa g.yas nas rab tu phyung // rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar 'gyur// me yis shin du nga rgyal gyur// oM badz+ra pa la
270a7: mgro d+haH/ khro bo'i rgyal po gdu bu ni// dpung pa g.yon las yang dag zung // gas shing rdo rje 'bar bas khyab// rdo rje khro bas rab tu khengs// oM sa ma ye badz+ra krod+ha hU~M hU~M phaT/ dam tshig khro bo'i rgyal po na// de bzhin khro bo
270a8: gnod byed pa/ / khu tshur g.yas nas rab tu byung // kun nas 'bar ba yang dag ldan// oM badz+ra muSh+Ti kro d+ha hU~M phaT// khro bo khu tshur drag po che// khu tshur g.yon las rab tu byung // rdo rje 'bar ba dag gis gsal// rdo rje me

270b1: yis rab tu brgyan/ oM badz+ra ban d+ha kro d+ha hUM/ sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra aM dz+wa li ban d+ha kro d+ha trUM// sa ma ya hU/ oM badz+ra an dza li ban d+ha kro d+hi hUM/ sa ma ya hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha an dz+wa li hUM/ rdo rje 'ching ba rgyal po che// de bzhin rje
270b2: rje sor mo nyid/ / khro bo lag pa g.yas g.yon gyi// sor mo dag las yang dag byung // oM badz+ra na kha hUM/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha aM gu li ma hA kro d+ha hUM/ rdo rje sder mo khro bo che// de bzhin rdo rje sder mo'i gdong// phyag ni g.yon dang
270b3: g.yas pa yi/ / sor mo dag las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra ku mA ra kro d+ha ka ti rA ga hUM// oM badz+ra ku mA ra kro d+ha mu d+ha b+ha ka hUM phaT/ khro bo'i rgyal po rked pa dang // de bzhin khro bo spyi gtsug dag/ rgyal po brla ni g.yon pa dang //
270b4: g.yas pa dag las rab tu byung // oM shrI bi le ma hA kro d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha a shi ban d+ha trAM/ gnam lcags rdo rje lu gu rgyud// khro bo'i rgyal po rdzu 'phrul che// rgyal po 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab// pus mo'i lha nga dag la
270b5: byung / / oM badz+ra ban d+ha kro d+ha ha na hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+he a~M gu sha hU~M phaT// rdo rje dbyug pa khro bo che// rdo rje yi ni yan lag drangs// 'bar ba dang bcas gnod sbyin gnyis// rje ngar dag las rab tu byung // oM b+hur bu ra kro d+ha trAM/ oM d+ha badz+ra rba
270b6: d+ha mi g+ha be ga a na ya hU~M phaT/ de nas bka' thub khro bo che// de bzhin rdo rje don yod nyid// rgyal po shugs chen gnyis po ni// gdong gi mchu las rab tu byung // oM badz+ra ban d+ha ha la kro d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra pa ta la mA ra ya
270b7: krod+had+hAdz+nyA ya/ / nang pa khri bo shugs chen po// de bzhin mthil gyi khra ba nyid// 'bar ba 'brob lhur len pa// gnyis po zhabs kyi mthil las byung // de dag la sogs rgyal po ni// dpag tu med par rab tu byung /
270b8: gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa// phra rab rdul gyi khams dag ni// ba spu'i gseb ni thams cad dang // lus kyi gseb ni thams cad nas// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches// rang gi snying po las byung gyur// rdo rje khro//

271a1: po'i ting 'dzin gyis// phyogs rnams kun du yongs spros te// slar yang cig tu gyur nas ni// dkyil 'khor du ni yang dag gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi spyan sngar 'dus// ched du rjod pa yang dag brjod//
271a2: e ma'o sangs rgyas thabs chen po// e ma'o ye shes shin du bzang // sangs rgyas kun gyi ting 'dzin ni// theg pa chen po zhes byar bshad// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad ni// dpag tu med pa zhes byar gyur//
271a3: rdo rje'i rigs kyi khro bo 'di// thams cad rdo rje'i rigs su bshad// sems can kun gyi don bya'i phyir// de nyid sangs rgyas rigs chen po// de nas de yi gsang ba'i mtshan// thams cad rdo rje'i rig su bshad//
271a4: khro bo che las yang dag zung // rdo rje khro bo'i dbang phyug bshad// rdo rje gtsug tor rdor 'dzin sru// gnod mdzes bdag cag stobs po che// thugs kyi khro bo rgyal po che// rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba dang /
271a5: lcags kyu rdo rje zhags// rkerkad pa'i khro bo stobs po che// rke rags stobs ldan nyid dang ni// lag gdub de bzhin dam tshig dang // rdo rje khu tshur rdo rje bsdams// rdo rje sor mo shin tu drag/ rdo rje sen mo rdo rje gdong //
271a6: de bzhin rked pa khro rgyal po// khro bo spyi gtsug rgyal po dang // rdzu 'phrul chen po lu gu rgyud// rdo rje gnam lcags rdo rje dbyig/ rdo rje khro bo yan lag drag/ rdo rje bka' thub rdor don yod// rdo rje zhabs dang de bzhin
271a7: mthil/ / dam tshig rdo rje rgyal po 'di// rdo rje yi ni rigs su bshad// de dag la sogs rgyal po ni// rgyal po chen po rdzu 'phrul che// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // rtag tu gzhan yang grangs med pa// khros
271a8: pas rang gi sha za zhing / / 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab par gnas// skal pa yi ni me ltar 'bar// rdo rje'i khro bos dkyil 'khor ni// rdo rje'i rigs ni skyed nas kyang // rab tu drag 'dzin bka' sgos pas// gdug pa rnams ni 'dul bar gyis// nga

271b1: yi bka' yang mnyan par gyis/ / rdo rje can kun rang nyid kyi// bka' 'thob nas ni gzung bya ste// lha rnams kun gyi gsung cig gis// rig pa 'di ni rjod par gyur// oM ni sum b+ha badz+re hUM phaT/ rdo rje khro bo
271b2: stobs po che/ / gtsug tor la sogs kun gsungs pa// lha chen la sogs bdug pa rnams// 'og tu kha ltas 'brel par gyur// rdo rje khro bo stobs pos ches// lha rnams rgyal bar gyur nas ni// rdo rje 'bar ba
271b3: 'bar zhes pas/ / snying po dag ni yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra a na la da hA pa tsam thA b+hany+dza ran hUM phaT// khro bo chen po rdo rje'i me// skad cig de las byung nas ni// lha rnams de dag bsregs nas kyang // de bzhin 'og tu skyel bar
271b4: gyur/ / rdo rje mes ni rab tu sreg/ rdo rje 'bar bas 'bar bar gyur// tshig cing brtsos par gyur nas ni// lha la sogs pa'o dod 'bod// rdo rje khro chen de rnams de// de bzhin khro chen la sogs pas// thams cad gsung
271b5: gcig byas nas ni/ / slar yang snying po gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra a be sha a/ rdo rje dbab pa'i khro bo che// rdo rje can gyi thugs las byung // lha rnams kun gyi gnas song nas// de bzhin lha chen la sogs pa/
271b6: lha rnams kun la yang dag babs// rdo rje dbab par rab sdug bsngal// babs nas rang gi yan lag dag/ gcig la gcig ni za bar byed// rdo rje can cing bcas pa kun// rdo rje zhag pas yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra
271b7: dz+wa la a ga ni pra ti ba ta ma hA badz+ra aM ku sha A ka ra/ ya hUM/ rdo rje lcags kyu rgyal song nas// skad cig gis ni yang dag 'gugs// lha rnams thams cad bkug nas ni// spyi bo ru ni ltung bar byed// rdo rje lcags kyu
271b8: yang dga'agugs/ / rdo rje zhags pas drangs par gyur// rdo rje 'bar bas rab sregs nas// steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ ha ha zhes ni spogs byed cing // 'jigs pa'i sked chen sdug bsngal 'gyur//

272a1: shAb// rdo rje can la gsol ba 'debs// stobs chen gzhom par ma mdzad cig/ de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun// dkyil 'khor du ni dgug par gyur// rdo rje can dang bcas kun gyis// rdo rje lcags sgrog yang dag brjod//
272a2: oM badz+ra proT ban d+ha hU~M phaT/ lha tshogs gdug pa de dag ni// 'ching ba lnga yis bcings par gyur// rdo rje lcags sgrog tho ba che// 'ching ba brtan pa bcings par gyur// khro bordo rtsal poche// shin du gtum pa stos
272a3: chen po/ / slar yang snying po yang dag dran// rang gi snying po yang dag brjod// hUM/ snying po drag po brjod pa yis// gdug pa de rnams rab makyi'o// g.yo med shi ba bzhin du gyur// 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal nye bar thob// da nas
272a4: rgyal po rnam snang mdzad/ / chos kun dbang phyug dbang dang ldan// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po che// rdo rje 'chang la bos par gyur// sems dpa' chen po mnyan par gyis// 'di rnams sems can rab 'jigs byed// 'jig rten gsum
272a5: gyi 'khor lo 'di/ srog ni gzhom par ma bya zhig/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje kun bdag dbang ldan pas// sangs rgyas gsung ni thos nas su// rig pa 'di ni yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra u tiSh+Tha/ rdo rje slong
272a6: brdzu 'phrul che/ / de ni brjod pa tsam gyis ni// lha la sogs pa thams cad ni// slar yang gson pa nyid du gyur// sdug bsngal kun dang rab du bral/ 'chi ba'i sdug sngal zhi bar gyur// rdo rje slong ba'i byams pa'i/
272a7: sangs rgyas thams cad rab bskul pas// de nas lha la sogs pa kun// sangs rgyas byams pas langs par gyur// la mo sbyar nas tshig gcig gis// bcom ldan 'das la zhus gyur pa// bcom ldan nyes pa gang grini/
272a8: bdag cag 'di ltar 'dul bar mdzad// sangs rgyas thugs rje can kun gyis// bdag cag yongs su bskyab tu gsol// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// khyed cag yongs su skyab pa dang // phan gdags par ni ngas

272b1: mi nus/ / 'di ni drag po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas kun gyi bdag por bshad// de rnams kyis gsol pa/ khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi don// ji ltar rung lags mi 'tshal lo// gang zhig sangs rgyas bdag por gyur// sarba
272b2: rgyas 'phags pa ji lta bu/ / bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// sangs rgyas kun gyi byang chub gang // da ni rdo rje can du gyur// byang chub sems gang de rdo rje// rdo rje gang yin drag po 'dzin// de rnams kyi gsol pa/ sangs
272b3: rgyas thams cad rab tu zhi/ / de ni byang chub de dang mtshungs// brtse dang byang chub sems las byung // de 'dra'i drag po ga las byung // bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// 'di ni thabs kyi 'dul ba ste// gdug pa thams cad
272b4: rab 'dul byed/ / dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin pa 'di// byang chub sems las yang dag byung // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// rdo rje khro bo bdag chen pos// lha tshogs kun la bos nas ni// dbang phyug chen po la gsungs pa//
272b5: nga yi bstan pa'i bka' dag ni// kye gdug pa dag mnyan par gyis// min na rdo rje 'bar ba yis// rigs dang bcas pa nga yis sreg/ khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams kyi// tshig gcig tu ni 'di skad zhes// gtso
272b6: bos ji ltar bka' stsal pa/ / rgyal po chen po de bzhin bgyi// de nas lha chen gyis smras pa// rdo rje gnod sbyin ngas mi shes// nga ni rang nyid rgyal po ste// nga yi bka' ni mnyan par gyis// lha chen po yi tshig gsanaH/
272b7: rdorje khro bo rab 'bar bas// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'joms zhes pa// khro bo'i rgyal po yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra ni sum b+ha hUM// shin du gtum pa stobs chen po// khro bo 'di ni brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen po rgyal gyur na/
272b8: de bzhin sa la 'gyel bar gyur// g.yo med 'chi ba'i dbang du gyur// shing 'gyel bzhin du gnas par gyur// 'gul ba med cing g.yo ba med// rdo rje khro bos gdungs par gyur// bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal

273a1: rdo rje khro ba thams cad mkhyen/ bdag nyid chen po 'di yis ni// srog gi na ni zad pa dang // de nyid nyams par ci phyir byed// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ sangs rgyas thugs rjes skal ba yin// rdo rje cha zhes bya ba ste//
273a2: rdorje'i rig pa 'di gsungs so// oM badz+ra a yuHrig pa 'di ni brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen pos yang dag langs// rdo rje cha yis gson byas nas// bde ba chen po thob par gyur// rnam par snang mdzad thub chen la// zhabra
273a3: dag la ni btud nas gsol/ / mgon po bcom ldan skyabs su gsol// rdo rje 'dzin pa de gdug min// kun mkhyen bcom ldan bka' stsal pa// de yis rtse bar bya mi nus// 'di ni gdug pa shin du drag/ de nyid la ni sgrub
273a4: su song / / rdo rje khro bos lha chen po// kun du bos nas 'di skad spras// da yi bstan pa'i bka' dag ni// gdug pa chen po mnyan par gyis// rdo rje gnod sbyin bdag chen la// lha chen po yi slar smras pa// 'chi ba chen po
273a5: bzod nus kyi/ / khyod kyi bka' la gnas mi byed// rdo rje khro bo drag po che// khros pas gdug pa 'phel 'gyur nas// hUM ni shin du 'jigs byed pa// snying po drag po brjod par gyur// hUMHyi ge hUM ni brjod pa yis// dbang phyug chen
273a6: poslar yang 'grel/ / rdo rje khro bo drag po che// rkang par dgug pa yang dag brjod// oM pA ta A kar Sha na badz+ra hUM/ de nas rdo rje dbang po 'di// brjod pas rdo rje khro bo phyung // tshig ni 'di skad brjod par gyur// bka' stsol brjod/
273a7: cag 'od chen po// rdo rje khro bos bka' stsal pa// oM pA ta a kar Sha ya sarba badz+ra d+ha ra ka tsa ra baT badz+ra tra~M dzaHkhro bo chen pos 'di gsungs nas// dbang phyug chen po u mar bcas// rkang pas 'gugs pa'i rdo rje yis//
273a8: rdo rje rkang pa dag gis bkug/ rdo rje khro bos de dag bkug/ steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ 'jig rten thams cad dgod 'gyur cing // rdo rje gdung pas gdungs par gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dbang phyug chen po

273b1: A mar bcas/ / zhabs kyi mnan nas rdo rje yis// dbang phyug chen po rdog par byed// de ni rkang pa g.yon pa yis// dbang phyug chen po mnan byas nas// g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi// num dag gi bar du bcar// rdo rjegasang sngags
273b2: 'di yis ni/ / dbang phyug chen po rab tu mnan// oM badz+ra a kra ma ho// slar yang dbab pa'i rig pa ni// rdo rje khro bos yang dag brjod// oM badz+ra a be sha han ta na dzaT/ dbang phyug chen po bcas gyur pas// rang gi lag
273b3: pas lan stong du/ / rang gdong 'jigs su rung la rdeg/ stong phrag gcig tu yang dag gyur// 'jig rten gsum gnas thams cad ni// 'dod chen po 'bod par gyur// bdag cag gi ni rgyal po 'di// 'di lta bu yi bdag
273b4: nyid gyur/ / de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// brtse dang snying rje skyes par 'gyur// snying rje steng du gzhug bya ste// sangs rgyas byams pa yang dag brjod// oM bud d+ha me tri rak+Sha/ dpal ldan rdo rje 'dzin gtso bos// de nas sngags 'di
273b5: gsungs pa yis/ / dbang phyug chen po'i sdug bsngal de// skad cig de la nye bar zhi// phyag na rdo rje'i zhabs dag gis// reg pas dbang phyug chen po ni// sa chen po ni yang dag 'thob// ting nge 'dzin dang gzug
273b6: de bzhin/ / tha mal pa yi lus bor nas// rdo rje 'dzin la phul bar gyur// lha chen 'di nas shi 'phom nas// shi zhing lus ni bor nas su// gang gI sum cu rtsa gnyis kyi// bye snyed sangs rgyas zhing dang mnyam// thal bas
273b7: g.yogs pa'i gnas zhes pa/ / sangs rgyas zhing ni yid 'ong ba// de ru song nas lha chen po// sangs rgyas 'byung ba'ang snyan par gyur// thal ba'i dbang phyug dgra dbyangs can// de bzhin gshegs pa der gnas
273b8: gyur/ / de nas shi ba'i lus de yis// ched du brjod pa yang dag brjod// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yis ni// tshigs bcad gcig ni mngon par brjod// e ma'o sangs rgyas thams cad kyi// sangs rgyas

274a1: ye shes blar med/ / bsad nas skad cig bdag gis ni// mya ngan 'das pa'i gnas dgod mdzad// rdo rje khro ba rgyal po ches// dbang phyug chen po yang dag byung // khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams la// kun du bom
274a2: nas 'di gsungs pa/ / rab mchog dkyil 'khor 'di ru ni// gtso bo rab tu zhugs par gyis// gal te de bzhin mi byed na// dbang phyug chen po bzhin du bya// de nas lha kun 'jigs gyur te// skra gnas thams cad kyi zhus pa//
274a3: de bzhin du ni bgyid par 'tshal// bdag cag khyed kyi bran du gyur// rgyal po khyod kyi dam tshig ni// ji ltar sgrub par mi bgyid lags// bdag cag rnams ni khyod kyi 'khor// skal pa chen po bka' stsol cig/ rdo rje khro bos
274a4: 'aka' stsal pa/ / sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la// skyabs su rab tu 'gro bgyis// byang sems yang dag skyed nas ni// sems can kun la yang dag sbyor// srog gcod pa ni spang bar gyis// chu dang rdzun du smra ba dang /
274a5: gzhan gyi chung ma de bzhin du// de ni dang por spang bar gyis// sems can gnod dang ldan pa ni// ci nas kyang ni mi bya'o// byang chub spyod pa rab sbyor ba// de la lhod min brtson par bya// nga yi bstan pa'i bka' yini// 'di
274a6: ngag dam tshig yang dag brjod/ / nga yi tshig ni mnyan par gyis// min na khyod ni kun du sreg/ de nas 'jig rten gsum 'khor los// de nas tshig ni blangs nas kyang // byang sems yang dag skyed nas ni// dkon mchog gsum
274a7: la skyabs su song / / rdo rje khro bo rgyal po ches// kun du phyag rgya byin nas kyang // phyag rgya'i snying po 'di yis ni// rdo rje ti ri ti ri yi// dkyil 'khor du ni bcug gyur pas// oM badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu sparas ma ye// badz+ra satwa sa ma ya ma
274a8: naswa ra/ sarba ta thA ga ta sa ma ya traM// ni d+ha me b+ha ba/ oM pra ti ha ro ma b+ha// sarba karma su tsa ma tsit+ta shra ya ku ra ta ha ha ha ng+ku/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni// phyag rgya kun du babs par gyur// rdo rje ti ri ti ri yi// phyag tu kun du stan

274b1: par gyur/ de dag rim bzhin bcu nas ni// rdo rje rin chen dbang skur gyur// rdo rje mtshan ma lag byin nas// rdo rje ming ni dbang skur gyur// de la lha rnams thams cad ni// rdo rje ming gi dbang skur gyur// sngon la 'jig rten
274b2: gsum bdag po/ / go rim bzhin du dbang bskur gyur// khyab 'jug ces byar gnas pa ni// sgyu ma'i rdo rje zhes byar grags// gzhon nu rdo rje dril bu ste// tshangs pa rdo rje thub pa nyid// dbang po rdo rje mtshon cha nyid// de dag rig
274b3: pa'i bdag por bshad/ / rgyal po bzhi po gzi brjid che// rdzu 'phrul chen po stobs chen pos// bar snang la ni chu ba nyid// rdo rje'i ming gis dbang skur gyur// nyi ma rdo rje 'khyil pa ste// de bzhin zla ba rdo rje 'od// dbyig chen
274b4: dbyig to ste/ / gser skya rdo rje ser skya yin// de la sogs pa khro rgyal po// rdo rje khro bor dbang skur 'gyur// de nas mkha' spyod lha rnams ni// rdo rje ming gis dbang skur gyur// myos chen rdo rje myos pa ste// rdo rje phreng ba spang rtsi
274b5: khyed/ rnam par rgyal dang rgyal byed dang // rdo rje shis dang rgyal bar ldan// tshogs kyi bdag po rgyal po dag/ zhes bya la sogs dbang skur gyur// de nas sa la gnas pa rnams// rdo rje ming gis dbang bskur gyur// gtun shing
274b6: mdzod ni srung ba skye/ / me ni de bzhin rdo rje me// rdo rje rlung ni rlung chen po// rdo rje 'jigs byed don rdo rje// de 'dra la sogs pho nya rnams// rdo rje mchog gi dbang bskur gyur// de nas sa 'og gnas pa ni// rdo rje lcags kyu rkang za ba//
274b7: de bzhin gshin rje rdo rje nag/ sa yi gtsug ni bgegs rdo rje// chu lha mgon po rdo rje 'dzin// de nas lha mo ji bzhin du// go rim bzhin du dbang skur gyur// rdo rje ming gi dbang skur gyis// yum gyi mchog
274b8: rnams dbang bskur gyur/ / khyab 'jug ma ni rdo rje gser// drug ldan rdo rje gzhon nu ma// tshangs pa rdo rje brgyad bcu ma// dbang mo rdo rje khu tshur ma// gsod byed rdo rje gsod nyid ma// snar ma rdo rje 'od ldan ma/

275a1: de las dbyig pardor mchog ma// 'phrog ma rdo rje ske rags te// gsod byed rdo rje 'jigs ma ste// gnam lcags rdo rje gnam lcags ma// nam gu rdo rje dbang ldan ma// gos can rdo rje gos can ma// rdo rje thonya zhi ba ma/
275a2: rlung lnga rdo rje shugs can ma// lus ngan ma ni rdo rje gdengs// me lha de bzhin rdo rje 'bar// phag mo rdo rje gdong can ma// rdo rje nag mo tsa mu Na Ti/ chu lha rdo rje chu srin ma// sna tshad ma ni sbrul mo ste// de 'dra la sogs grangs med
275a3: palha mo rnams ni dbang skur gyur/ / rang rang rigs ni rtogs nas su// ji bzhin lha yi bdag por bshad// de nas phyag rgya bcing ba byin// de bzhin dam tshig snying po'o// lha rnams kun gyi bdag po kun// bkug nas de
275a4: bzhin dbang du 'gyur/ / rdo rje phyag rgya gnyis bcings nas// sdigs 'dzub dang ni lcags kyu bcings// 'ching ba dang ni grol byed par// dngos po bya ba'i don sems dpa'// de yi mdun du khyed rnams ni// bya ba
275a5: bsgrub phyir gnas par gyis/ / khyod kyi srog ni nyams gyur pa'i// de bzhin dam tshig sbyin mi bya// rgya cher phyag rgya chen por ni// theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// rdo rje rnal 'byor sbyor byed pa// de nyid ces bya
275a6: snyan pa yin/ / dkyil 'khor mchog rnams de dag dang // de bzhin lha la sogs pa kun// bkrug cing rab tu bcug par gyur// rdo rje can gyi dbang byas nas// rdo rje thams cad dbang sur gyur// rdo rje ming gi mtshan par byas//
275a7: lha chen po ni gcig pu nyid// zhabs kyi 'og tu brdabs nas bzhag/ 'jig rten gdug pa cher gyur pa// gdug pa'i snying po zhes byar grags// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rgyal ba yi// sems can 'ong bar the tshom byed//
275a8: thang cig tshes grangs re re ma// gang du zla gcig dkyil 'khor du// sems can stong phrag brgya dag ni// skad cig de la sdug bsngal byed// yid ni nye bar 'jal bar byed// mdangs ni nye bar 'phrog pa'i nad// mi yi skye

275b1: ba gsod pa dang / / than dug chen nyid dang ni// grong khyer dang ni grong rdal dang // grong dag 'joms par byed pa dag/ sems can rnams ni gcod byed dang // skye bo stong pa sbyor byed dang // de ltar drag cing 'jigs su rung // brtse ba med cing
275b2: sdig byed dang / / gsod pa dang ni 'joms par byed// shes rab 'phrog par byed pa dang // drag po sna tshogs gzug 'dzin pa// dud 'gro'i 'gro ba'i bar dang ni// sems can rnams la gnod byed dang // myur du mdangs ni 'phrog pa dang //
275b3: lo nyes thog dang char dang ni// char ni mi 'bab byed pa dang // drang dang dro ba'i gdung ba dag/ skad cig de la sbyang ba dang // gdon mi 'bab par byed pa dang // de bzhin bdud mchog bskyed pa dang // sems ni rnam par g.yeng byed dang //
275b4: de 'dra'i gnod sbyin mtha' yas dang // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dkon mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ste// skye dag sna tshogs nad kyi btab// ye shes kyi ni spyan gyi gzigs// dam tshig spang ba'i sems can dang // yams dang
275b5: de bzhin nye bar 'tshe/ / rims dang gdon dang dug drag po// skye dgu 'di rnams 'joms par byed// sna tshogs sdug bsngal kun du 'khrugs// 'jigs pa sna tshogs dag gi khyab// thams cad nyams shing zil gyi
275b6: non/ / sdug bsngal stug pos sdug bsngal 'gyur// slar yang bde bar bya ba'i phyir// nag po'i sngags ni yongs su bzung // mkha' 'gro ma mo rnal 'byor mas// 'gro ba'i don ni kun du khyab// rims dang gdon dang 'byung po dang //
275b7: mkha' 'gro ma mo 'byung po dang // gdug pa rnams kyis kun du khyab// 'jig rten sdug bsngal snod 'di ni// gzigs nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal pos// thugs rje dag ni skyed par gyur// kye ma'o sems can 'di sdug bsngal//
275b8: del rjes su brtse byed med// da ni kho na rang byung ste// de bzhin sdug bsngal thams cad 'phrog/ ngal log par rtogs pa ste/ skye dgu de la brtse ba med// dbang phyug chen po gang yin dang // gdug pa thams cad rab 'dul byed//

276a1: yang dag byang chub rang byung gyur// skye dgu ma lus bsgrub par bya// thams cad dag ni dgug bya zhing // de bzhin dam tshig bsrung bar bya// gnod dang phan pa byas nas ni// skye dgu 'di dag rnam par grol// de nas/
276a2: rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// dkyil 'khor skyob dang phan 'dogs pa// zhes bye de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// sems dpa' chen po snyoms par zhugs// mgon po chen po sangs rgyas kun// 'di ltar bka' ni gnod pa byed// de nas
276a3: sangs rgyas thams cad kyi/ / de bzhin snying po byung bar gyur// oM badz+ra swa b+ha ni sum b+ha hUM phaT// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sangs rgyas bka' ni gzung nas kyang // phyi rol dkyil 'khor dgug pa'i phyir// lcags kyu'i snying
276a4: bo rab tu phyung / / oM badz+ra sa ma ye A kar Sha ya sarba maN Da la badz+ra d+ha ra satwa ma ti kra ma hUM phaT/ rig pa 'dzin pas brjod par gyur pa yis// rdo rje lcags kyu shin du bstan// lcags kyu bdag nyid che mchog ni// bcu brag
276a5: grangs med byung bar gyur/ / stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rim bzhin rab tu thim par gyur// gang zhig phyogs rnams bcu po ru// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor mthong bar gyur// gdug pa de rnams bkug nas kyang // de bzhin/
276a6: gong bu gcig tu bya// rdo rje me yi kun drug spang sa// ri rab rtse mo pab nas ni// tshad med bzang du med pa rnams// phyi rol gyi ni dkyil 'khor 'ong sa// rdo rje dbang gi gnas kun du// 'khor nyid du ni yang dag gnas//
276a7: de nas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal po// gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bos nas ni// kye gdug ste dgu rnams la ni// rnam par 'tshe ba spang bar gyis// khyed rnams kyis ni dam tshig long// srog chags thams cad gsod paspongs//
276a8: min khyed rnams g.yas 'bar bas// de bzhin nga yis thal bar bya// gdug pa'i dam tshig dkyil 'khor gyis// tshig gcig tu ni zhus gyur pa// mgon po bdag cag sha za ste// ji ltar bgyi ba bka' stsol cig/

276b1: denas rdo rje 'di drag pos// ma bsdams pa yi tshig gas nanas/ rdo ma khro bo rab brjid dkal// sgyeng po drag po gsungs par gyur/ oM badz+ra krod+ha tan da ta btsa bo d+ha sa ya bi kri ra ban duSh+TA na/ sa ma ya mu dA ga
276b2: sar d+has/ 'ang 'a pa sarbA/ ma tshan pas 'di stod pa// bajug gtan pa de dag/ gcing sngal la la/ da// /
276b3: 'ad 'bed cing du bar gyur// gcig la gcig ni sla bar byed// de// dpra bzhin byas te// 'on kyang bden par sna ma bya// rdo rje sems dpa' drug sa na// rang bzhin gyi ni sangs rgyas bdag/ bas
276b4: gsang pa dab pa ya ka bcom ldan thams cad mkhyen pas gsungag ma ni semasatan ta ba tsan pa ya/ denas rgyal brda 'dzi// sangs rgyas bka' la gnas pa// deH
276b5: babyed/ / ting po drug po brjod par gyu/ oM ma hA badz+ra kro d+ha bad sarba du Sh+Ta man/ la ti rA shA ya/ sarbad+ha Sh+Ta sa ma ma yan ci ga ba d+has ma la si TA ye/ b+han dza ya/ dz+nyAn dza ya/ sarba drA ShaSha sa ma ma mra d+ha ban d+har+thi
276b6: sa/ / danas dun badz+ra / da / gtas pa rna pa kA ga zug/ g-is bas dang
276b7: bas ldan pa/ / dam tshig snang ba gzung nas ni// shin du 'jigs pas thug 'gyu cing // ma tsha baN thang // gtas 'jig pa de dag gi// ma pa tsho ma zhing kyil kyiman// rdo rje ba yis zan pa na/
276b8: thams cad kyi ni thas par bya// byang sems las zung rjeH// dza ltar sems can sreg par byed// de ni gzug pa'i tshig yin te// phan pa'i rigs can tul dag skyes// dod chags gyon la sogs lha ga/

277a1: mongs dri ma gang shes nas// rdo rje can gyi dri ma 'di// gzung nas ye shes me yis bsregs// sems can shin du 'jigs te skrag/ byang chub spyod pas byang chub gnas// mi bskyod pa yi gnas skyes shing //
277a2: rdo rje can ni mchog tu gyur// phyag na rdo rje sems dpa' che// rdo rje chen po phyag rgya 'gugs// zhes bya de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// 'jigs pa med par snyoms par zhugs// mkha' 'gro ma ni rjes sbyang phyir// rgyal ba la ni bka'
277a3: nod gyur/ / phyag na rdo rje stobs chen la// de nas sangs rgyas kun gsungs pa// oM ha na tan badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas rdo rje 'dzin drag po// sangs rgyas kun gyi gsung thos nas// 'jigs pa 'gugs pa'i rdo rje ni// rang nyid
277a4: kyi ni sngags 'di brjod/ / oM badz+ra A kar sha yaSh+TaM graM/ sarba duSh+Ta gaN badz+ra d+ha sad t+ye na hU~M dzaHde nas brjod pa tsam gyis ni// mkha' 'gro ma ni mdangs 'phrog pa// rnal 'byor sngags dang phyag rgyar bcas// ri rab tu ni kun du
277a5: 'dus/ / rdo rje lcags kyus bkug nas ni// 'bar ba dang bcas 'bar bar 'gyur// spyi bor thal mo sbyar nas tshig/ smras pa rdo rje 'dzin pas skyobs// skal chen rdo rje can gyi gsungs// kye gdug tshogs chen myur ba ru//
277a6: gsod pa spongs la bka' nyan gyis// de dag re re zhing smras pa// bdag cag 'di rnams sha za ste// gang zhig rtag tu gson gyur pa// bdag cag la ni thabs bstan gsol// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'chang // de yi thab/
277a7: ni'adi gsungs so// zla gcig lon nas shi ba gang // de ni bza' ba blang bar gyis// byang chub sems la chags bral nas// gsang ba smod pa lhur len pa// khyod dang lhan cig yang dag sbyor// de bza' ba ni gnang bar
277a8: gyis/ / phyag rgya yi ni snying po 'di// rtag tu bcad par bya ba ste// phyi rol thams cad spangs nas ni// sangs rgyas bstan pa bsrung bar gyis// oM badz+ra pra ti grih+Na tri da ya A ka ra Sha ya/ tsad+ya yaM ma sa d+hod+ha na mi ni ya te ta

277b1: sa ri d+ha yaM ni Sh+ka ma du sa ma ya hUM dzaHde nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ / rang gi sngags dang phyag rgyar ldan// khro bo'i spyi gtsug rgyal po ni// rnal 'byor pa ni de yis spros// gal te dam tshig las 'das na// khro ba
277b2: bdag nyid chen po yis/ / rtag tu mgo bo 'ges byed cing // rigs dang bcas pa nges par sreg/ bdud rtsi sman gyi rgyal po zhes// bya ba de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// sems dpa' chen po snyoms zhugs nas// nad kyi/
277b3: don du tshol bar gyur/ bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' stsal pa// oM badz+ra hUM phaT/ de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// sems can thams cad 'jigs byed pas// nad rnams thams cad bkug nas ni// 'gugs pa yi ni
277b4: snying po brjod/ / oM badz+ra sa ma ya a na ya sarba duSh+Ta dza ra ni dinA sha ya hUM phaT/ de nas brjod pa tsam gyis kyang // nad dang gdon gyi tshogs kun dang // rim+ba la sogs kyi nad thos nas// steng du rkang pa 'og tu mgo/ 'bar
277b5: ba'i me dang yang dag ldan/ / ha ha zhes sgrogs 'jigs par bye// bdag cag rigs ni ma gzhom par// khro bo chen po bka' stsol cig/ rdo rje rnal 'byor chen pos gsungs// de yi bka' ni rab tu nyon// sems can nye/
277b6: bar 'joms pa spongs// mdangs kyang 'phrog par ma byed cig/ de rnams kyi smras pa// kye rgyal po rdo rje bdag cag gi/ srog gi bsrung ba mdzad du gsol// bdag cag kun ni gzi brjid za// thabs ni cung zad brtsam du
277b7: gsol/ / rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// de nas stobs chen gyis smras pa// de yi sngags dang phyag rgya dag/ gang zhig srung la gnod ma byed// oM badz+ra kam bi sho d+ha ya sarba a ba ra na Ni bud d+ha sa twe sa ma ye hUM/ de nas
277b8: phyag rgya chen po kun/ / theg pa chen po mngon bsdus pa// mdo sde gsang ba rgyal po las// yongs su bshad pa thams cad kun// sngags dang phyag rgya gnas gang na// rtag par rab tu spyod byed pas// gnas de ru yang

278a1: rtag pa ru/ / byed rnams shin du gnod ma byed// de skad gsungs pas gdon kun ni// ti hi zhes ni sgrogs par gyur// spyi bo'i rnal 'byor pa la ni// gnod pa byed pa thams cad gtang // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin//
278a2: kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug gis// sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya che// blo gros chen po snyoms par zhugs// ngan song bcing bar bya ba'i phyir// mgon po dag la bka' nod byed// mgon chen sangs rgyas thams cad kyis// kun nu
278a3: snying po brjod par gyur/ / oM shak+ka pa ya badz+ra swA hA/ rdo rje sems dpa'i thabs chen po// rdo rje las ni yang dag byung // sems can rnams la brtse bya'i phyir// sdig pa thams cad bkug par gyur// oM sarba pA ba a ba ya na bi sha
278a4: d+ha na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM phaT/ de skad brjod nas rnal 'byor ches// skad cig gis ni ngan song bkug/ ri yi rgyal po nye ba ru// ngu 'bod la sogs snang bar gyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rnal 'byor ches// ngan song sems can la smras
278a5: pa/ / dkon mchog gsum dngang bstan la// myur du bstan pa skyabs su song // de dag thams cad kyis smras pa// stobs chen bdag cag sgrub tu gsol// gtso bos ji skad bka' stsal pa// de bzhin du ni bgyi bar 'tshal// de na
278a6: rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/ / sdig pa dral ba nges 'ching ba// sdig pa thams cad rab 'joms pa// mchog tu gsang ba gzungs par gyur// oM badz+ra pA Ni bi s+pho Ta ya// saHa pa ya ban d+ha na ni// pra mo k+Sha ya sarba pra ya ga teb+h+ya
278a7: sarba sa traM/ sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ya tra tha/ sems can ngan song rgyu can rnams// rig pa 'di yis dbang skur bas// ngan song 'khor lo dral bar gyur// rgya mtshor ni rab tu ltung // de bzhin ngan song shi 'phos nas// de kun
278a8: rab tu grol bar gyur/ / sdug bsngal kun las rab tu grol// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas thob gyur// de bzhin thub pa rnam snang gi/ zhabs drung du ni skyes par gyur// rdo rje sems dpa'i mthu yis ni// de bzhin mi khom zad par gyur// rdo rje

278b1: sems dpa'i mthu yis ni/ / de nas skad cig des zhi thob// rmang 'byung sna tshogs gsang chen po// cho 'phrul dag ni skyes par gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin gnas// rin chen bdun gyis
278b2: rab tu spras/ / rdo rje rin chen gyis rab mdzes// de yi rigs kyi nang song kun// sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par sbyangs// sems can bde ba skyes par gyur// rdo rje bde ba yang dag ldan// mchog chen po ya zhing 'di ni// dag
278b3: pa'i zhing du rab tu grags/ / sems can dag pa kun du khyab// de bzhin rnal 'byor rdor rang bzhin// slar yang shing gi nags la sogs// mad 'byung chen po snang ba med// rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin kun// nags
278b4: dang rtswa las skyes par gyur/ / mthon dmon dag dang rnam par bral// lag mthil bzhin du mnyam par snang // ka tsa li ltar reg na bde// stong gsum rab tu gnas par gyur// dmyal ba la sogs sdug bsngal kun// dang po
