278b5: ngan song nye bar zhi/ / bkres skom pa yi sdug bsngal dag/ kun du 'gags par rnam par gnas// rgya mtsho kun du thim par gyur// ri bo gzugs kyang kun du khyab// gzhan 'phrul gyi ni lha rnams dang // mtshungs pa ru ni mi
278b6: rnams gyur/ / slar yang mu khyud 'khor lo med// ri rab man d+ha ra dag med// lha yi 'jig rten gnas kyang med// rgya mtsho med cing lha min med// klu yi gnas bzhi dag kyang med// mi yi khyim dang khang pa med// grong khyer
278b7: ljongs dang yul 'khor dang / / phug dang bcas par rnam par bral// mi yi gnas kyang med pa nyid// chu bo phug dang lung ba med// mi dag gi ni lus kyang med// sems can 'ga' yang 'dir mi snang // ngan song 'khor lo
278b8: dag kyang med/ / mi khom med cing sdug bsngal med// bud med skyes pa la sogs med// rnga mo glang po lug kyang med// dpag bsam shing dang spos kyi shing // rin chen sna bdun rang bzhin mdzes// spos kyi chu yi rgya mcho dang /

279a1: rin chen sna tshogs rnams kyis mdzes// shing ni yid 'ongs thams cad la// rol mo'i sgra ni mngon par byung // ram mos chos kyi sgra dag kyang // stong gsum du ni yongs su byung // ji ltar rdo rje dbang po'i gnas// 3//
279a2: rab ri yi rtse mo ltar// de bzhin stong gsum gyi ni gnas// rnam pa sna tshogs 'od 'bar 'gyur// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// gru bzhir rab tu gnas par gyur// kun nas phyi rol gnas rnams ni// kha khyer du yang snang bar
279a3: gyur/ / sar yang nyi mthab med// skar ma med cing lha yang med// rang gi khang pa'i nang du yang // lha rnams nyid kyang mthong mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas 'od kyi yongasu gsal// 'od zer sna tshogs yid 'phrog pa// gang gis zhing ni yang
279a4: dag sbyangs/ / rdo rje rin chen yid 'ong ba// rdo rje dbang po'i gnas nyid kyang // slar yang snang bar mi 'gyur ro// gzhan du gzhi ni gcig pa'i gnas// gang du sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten
279a5: 'di/ lha yi pad ma yongasu gsal// rin chen sna bdun rab tu mdzes// dri yi tshogs ni yid 'ong ldan// bskal pa chen po'i zhing gi dbus// dkyil 'khor shin du sdug steng bya// dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad bcu yi//
279a6: seng ge'i khri thung gyur// kun nas phyogs rnams thams cad rtsa// dpag tshad stong phrag drug bcu ldan// rdo rje rin chen rang bzhin mdzes// seng ge'i khri ni bzhi byung gyur// rdo rje gler rnam par bres// dar gyi chun pos rnam
279a7: par 'phyang / / dril bu'i dra ba rnam par 'phyang // zhing ni kun nas rab tu spras// me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram// sna tshogs sprin gyis rab tu g.yogs// sna tshogs dri yi kun du khyab// dpag bsam shing gis nye bar spras// dpag bas pa shing ni yid
279a8: 'od ldan/ / rdo rje'i rol mo mdzes bdag/ skra ni mngon par 'byin par byed// 'di nyid dang ni lhan cig zhing // sgrib pa med pa'i rang bzhin du// phyogs rnams kun du snang bar gyur// slar yang 'jigs par 'gyur ba med//

279b1: stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten 'di// gang gA'i bye snyed grangs med pa// shin du phra ba'i rdul snyed kyi// sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal// til gyi ga bu gang ba bzhin// sangs rgyas thams cad yongs su gsal// phyogs
279b2: rnams kun nas ma lus par/ / sangs rgyas thams cad 'dir gshegs 'gyur// dbus kyi seng ge'i gdan dag la// chos dbyings 'jigs pa med pa la// rnam par snang mdzad stobs chen po// ston pa bcom ldan
279b3: bzhugs par gyur/ / shar du yang ni mi bskyod pa// lho ru rin chen 'byung ldan te// nub tu 'od dpag med pa yin// byang du don yod grub pa ste// mgon po chen po phyogs bzhi ru// rdo rje yi ni steng du bzhugs// phyogs dang phyog
279b4: mtshams dag tu ni/ / mnyam du dmigs nas rnam par gnas// chos kyi dbyings ni snyan par gyur// sangs rgyas thams cad brtan par bzhugs// mngon par byang chub rnam pa lnga// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan par mdzad//
279b5: sangs rgyas grangs med thams cad ni// rdo rje can ni lnga la bzhugs// phyogs ni re rer khyab gyur pa// sangs rgyas gcig gis yang dag bzhugs// mtshams dang steng dang 'og dag gi/ rnam snang mdzad kyi bstan par mdzad//
279b6: chos kyi dbyings ni brtan gyur pa// dbus kyi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas bzhugs// de nas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs snying po// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam 'phrul pa// sangs rgyas thams
279b7: cad rang nyid kyi/ / seng ge'i khri ni lnga la bzhugs// grangs med tshad ni med pa yi// sangs rgyas chos nyid ma lus pa// ri mo gsal ba dang mtshungs par// stong gsum dag ni ma lus gyur// byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba
279b8: chetshe/ / pad mi steng du zhugs par gyur// dbus kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// sangs rgyas rol pa dang ldan par// rdo rje can na thams cad bzhugs// shar gyi cha la yang dag bzhugs// bye ba

280a1: dag na grangs med la/ / rdorje rnam 'phrul gan byung ba// 'khor lo dang ldan pazhugs par byur// k+ko mi phyogs rnathams cad gnas/ bye ba dag ni grangs med // rin chen nam 'phrul yang dag ldan/ 'khor ma dang
280a2: ldan bzhugs par gyur/ / bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// nub kyi phyogs nas yang dag gnas// pad ma'i rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// bye ba dag ni grangs med lnga// byang gi phyogs na rnam
280a3: par gnas/ / las kyi rnam 'phrul ston byed pa// 'khor lo dang ldan bzhugs par gyur// gsang dang mchod pa gang yin dang // lha mo rdo rje lha mo ni// grangs med tshad ni med pa dag/ bcu gnyis kyi ni dkyil 'khor gang/
280a4: sgo bsrungs dag ni grangs med pa// rnal 'byor mchog dang ldan pa bzhi// rgyal po shar dang lho dag tu// nub dang byang ni yang dag gnas// chos kyi sku las yang dag byung // longs spyod rdzogs pa'i skur gyur pa// sems
280a5: dpa' chen po 'di dag kun/ / chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung // gang zhig phyogs bcu dag gi yang // byang chub sems dpa'i bdag nyid che// rnal 'byor chen po'i sa thob pa// de dag kun kyang 'dir 'ongs pa//
280a6: sangs rgyas zhing ni gang gA yi// bye ma dang mnyam ji snyed pa// yongs su gang bar gyur pa'i tshogs// de dag thams cad yang dag gshegs// sangs rgyas kun gyi mthu yi ni// zhing dag rgya ni chen por gyur// yul rnams
280a7: thams cad bya ba yang / / gnod pa med cing 'tshe ba'ang med// stong gsum gyi ni 'jig rten pa'i// ji ltar sngon ni bar med pa'i// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' yi// bar med pa ni de bzhin gnas// gang nas
280a8: sangs rgyas mi snang ba/ / phyogs ni rdul tsam yod ma yin// byang chub sems dpa' rnal 'byor che// gang dgas ni bzhi bcu dang // yang na chos las byung ba nyid// sangs rgyas sras ni grags pa che// rigs lnga byung ba la sogs

280b1: pa/ sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul ston pa dang // 'dir gnas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs// mchog rnams phyogs dang phyogs mtshams mthong // sangs rgyas dag ni grangs med kun// lha rnams yang dag gnas 'di ru// sangs
280b2: rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur/ / sangs rgyas dgra bcom martogs par// zhing 'dir 'ga' yang mthong mgyur// rdo rje rigs kyi 'khor lo min// dkyil 'khor gyi na tshogs kyang min// dbus dang phyogra ni yang dag bzhugs//
280b3: sangs rgyas lnga ni mthong bar gyur// dbang phyug chen po gnod byed pa'i// rdo rje khro bo mthong bar gyur// sangs rgyas lnga dang de bzhin du// khro bo drug bdun rnam par gnas// tshangs sogs lha rnams de dag kyang // ngo mtshar
280b4: dag ni skyes par gyur/ / 'jigs shing skrag nas lha de dag/ gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// gtso bo ji bzhin mthong 'gyur zhing // shin du ngo mtshar ci zhig snang // slar yang lha yi 'jig rten dag/ srid pa nang du
280b5: mthong ma gyur/ / 'gro ba lnga yi sems can min// ri rab dang ni rgya mtsho min// zla ba nyi ma ma mthong zhing // ri dang khang pa dag kyang min// ci bdag cag ni rmongs gyur tam// yang na mig ni long bar gyur// yang na bdag cag
280b6: sems g.yengs pa/ / sgyu ma'i rnam 'phrul 'di cig zhig/ bdag cag gis ni sngar 'jigs mthong // drag cing bkug nas thal bar byas// ri rab ri yi rtse mo ru// sdug bsngal chen pos gzir bar gyur// slar yang ri rab
280b7: yod ma yin/ / khro bo rdzu 'phrul chen po med// gzhan dang khro bo chen po gcig/ dbang phyug chen po gnod par byed// gnas ni chu ngur gyur pa yang // rgya chen po ru 'dir snang// stong gsum 'di yang mi snang ste// bdag cag
280b8: 'jig rten gzhan du phyin/ / de ltar brjod pa sna tshogs pa// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// mi smra bar ni gnas gyur nas// rdo rje can la lta bar byed// gnod sbyin 'byung po sha za sogs// gdug pa kun dang gdon

281a1: sogs kyi/ / mun par khyab pa bzhin du ni// stong gsum 'di na mthong bar gyur// gzhan ni cung zad ma mthong ste// gzhan du phyogs dag mun pas khyab// rdo rje la ci sbru ma yiyini nos bur ci// ku rmongs pa nyid gur ci//
281a2: gcig la gcig ni rmongs par gyur// ha ha zhes bya'i sgra sgrogs shing // bdag cag 'dir ni gang du byin// tshig ni rab tu brjod byed cing // gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// 'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang // 'di ni su yi gamadu byin//
281a3: bdag cag rang gi gnas na ltung // bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du byin// rdo rje khro bos gsang bar gyur// 'o na 'di ni ci zhig yin// lha yi gnas kyang ma mthong bzhin// rdo rje can yang mthong ma gyur// sangs rgyas dkyil 'khor
281a4: 'khor lo min/ / bdag cag rnams ni mun par gyur// rang gi gnas kyang ma mthong zhing // ri rab nyid kyang mthong ma gyur// mtsho dang rgya mtsho dag kyang min// skar ma zla ba nyi ma min// bdag cag thams cad gang nas 'ongs// yul
281a5: gang zhig tu 'gro bar bya/ / 'gro ba lnga yang yod ma yin// 'jig rten med cing ma mo med// mi dang mi ma yin pa dag/ rnam pa kun du mthong ma gyur// ston ni ji ltar de bzhin phyis// rmad du byung ba nyid ma gyur// gzhan dus ni
281a6: g.yos par gyur/ / rlung dag gis ni rnam par bskyod// 'brug gi sgra dang glog chen po// sdug bsngal thams cad yang dag ldan// bkres skom la sogs sdug bsngal dang // bral min kun du sdug bsngal gyur// der ni lha chen
281a7: sgyu 'phrul dag/ cung zad kyang ni mthong ma gyur// dmyal ba yi dgas dud 'gro dag/ rnam par nyams shing bshig par gyur// sdig pa dral ba'i phyag rgya yi// ngan song gsum ni nye bar zhi// lha gang 'du shes med pa dang //
281a8: gzugs med pa na spyod par gnas// phung po lnga ru rang bdag nyid// ngo mtshar de bzhin mthong gyur nas// rang bdag nyid la'ang rtog par byed// gcig la gcig kyang lta bar byed// de bzhin thams cad skrag cing 'jigs

281b1: ngomatshar gyur pa 'di ci zhig/ tshad med bskal pa chen po ru// bdag cag dag par gnas par gyur// bdag mchog las ni bdag cag grol// slar yang bdag tu 'dzin par gyur// sngon gyi bag chags mngon 'dod la// srid gsum
281b2: gnas ni mthong bar gyur/ / srid pa gsum yang mthong ma yin// de bzhin 'gro ba lnga yang med// gzhan du shin du dag pa gcig/ chos dang longs spyod rdzogs pa sprul// sangs rgyas lnga nyid mthong bar gyur// sred gsum gnas ni
281b3: gzhan dag min/ / tshe gas la thams cad mnyes par gyur// gcig la gcig ni smra bar byed// 'di ni su zhig bdag cag gang // bdag cag 'jig rten gzhan du phyin// sngon ni bdag gi 'jig rten 'di// 'gro ba lnga bcas de bzhin
281b4: ru/ / ri rab dang ni rgya mtshor bcas// lha rnams drug ni 'khor bcas mthong // srid pa gsum gyi lha rnams ni// gang zhig 'di ni mthong ma gyur// gzhal yas khang dang sems can ni// gtso bo ji bzhin mthong bar gyur// de 'dra'i
281b5: mtshar sna tshogs pa/ gnas chen 'dir mthong bar gyur// byang chub sems kyi rnam 'phrul 'di// sangs rgyas kun gyi rol pa yin// gang zhig stong gsum 'di yis ni// rang rgyal bdag nyid mchog gyur pa// de yang kun du mongs
281b6: gyur nas/ / rnam par 'phrul pa'ang mthong ma gyur// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong ma yin// rgyal dang rgyal ba'i sras kyang min// chos kyi dbyings ni brtan zhi ba// gnas ni de ru mthong mgyur// gzhan du stong ni gsum po 'di// rnam
281b7: pa kun du ma mthong nyid/ / sa dang me dang chu khams min// gser gyi dkyil 'khor dag byed min / 'gro ba lnga yi sems can min// zla ba nyi ma dag kyang min// skar ma gza' dang rgyu skar min// sems can dag kyang khams gsum
281b8: min/ / 'di dag thams cad stong par gyur// gzhan du nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor min// de dag thams cad 'jigs skrag nas// mya ngan 'das pa nye bar thob// gang yang phyogs rnams bcu po yi// nyan thos 'jigs pa med pa rnamama?//

282a1: byang sems can ni chen po yis// de dag kun ni skrag par gyur// dang rang gi ni zhing dag tu// sangs rgyas nyid kyang mthong mgyur// 'dus pa chen po dag dang ni// chos rnams ston pa dag kyang min// zhing de yi nis
282a2: can min/ / lha dang mi rnams dag kyang min// khang pa med cing zhing yang med// sa dang me dang rlung yang med// rang gi zhing yang ma mthong zhing // rdo rje sems dpa' 'jigs par gyur// skad cig gi ni mi dgar gyur// thang cig tu ni rmongs
282a3: par gyur/ / de lta bu yi nam 'phrul du// byang chub sems ni rab tu snang // sngon gyi bskal pa chen po la// 'khor lo rnam par 'phrul pa bstan// bcom ldan rdo rje'i rnal 'byor pas// de lta bu ni byin gyi rlabs// sems can gang dag
282a4: 'di na gnas/ / nyin dang mtshan mo mi shes gyur// de nas de nyid gsang ba che// chos kyi dbyings ni bstan pa'i tshogs// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sangs rgyas// de lta bu yi rnam 'phrul byung // stong gsum yongs su bsdus
282a5: pa yi/ / lha yi gnas ni bkod par gyur// sangs rgyas rnams kyi gnas gcig pu// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// la lar sngon pos rab tu mdzes// sa yi phyogs ni rab tu spras// rdo rje sngon pos rab tu rgyan// la
282a6: lar gser gyi mdog tu snang / / kha dog ser pos rnam par brgyan// sa yi cha yang rab tu sbas// rdo rje ser pos rab tu brgyan// la lar kha dog dmar po na// byi ru lta bus rab tu mdzes// sa yi cha yang rab tu spras// rdo rje dmar
282a7: pos rab tu brgyan/ / la lar gtsag gi mdog can gyi// be dUr+ya mtshungs rab tu mdzes// sa yi cha yang rnam par spras// rdo rje gcod kyi rnam par mdzes// la lar shel gyi mdog can gyi// shin du snang bas rab tu mdzes// sa yi chang
282a8: yang rnam par spras/ / rdo rje shel gyi rnam par brgyan// shar du sngon po chen po ste// lhor ni ser po yang dag ldan// nub kyi cha ni dmar po ste// byang ni gcod dang yang dag ldan// dbus kyi sa yi cha dag ni// shel gyi mdog

282b1: can bla na med/ / rdo rje chen pos shin du dag/ tshon rtsi lnga yi rang bzhin bshad// gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhi yis rab tu mdzes// cha mnyam legs par bgos pa ste// go rim dang ni yang dag ldan//
282b2: kun nas phyi rol gnas dag na// rdo rje kha khyer yang dag ldan// kun nas kha khyer dang ldan zhing // sgo yi kha khyer dag gis spras// ri mo rdo rje sngo rang bzhin// gzhan yang gser gyi mdog can dang // kha dog dmar po
282b3: mchog dang ni/ / gzhan yang shel ni bzang po dag/ rin chen kun gyi rang bzhin mchog/ dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mdzes gyur pa// sna tshogs gzugs ni 'dzin pa'i mchog/ rdo rje lha mo tshogs kyis mchod// dra ba dras
282b4: phyed pas sbas/ / zla ba phyed pas nye bar mdzes// g.yer ka'i dra bas kun du khebs// dril bu'i mchog ni kun du 'phyang // snga tshogs shing ni mid 'od ldan/ dpag bas ma shing ni yid 'ong ldan// spos dang me tog de bzhin dri// snang ba'i shing mchog yang
282b5: dag ldan/ / sna tshogs bkod pa nye bar ldan// sna tshogs rdo rje bdud rtsi'i chu// mtsho mchog chu yi gang bar gyur// rdo rje rgya mtsho rgya chen ldan// me tog sna tshogs kun du bkram// sna tshogs bdug pa dag gi gdugs//
282b6: tshegs dri yi chu yi gtor// sna tshogs dri yi kun du khyab// drag po chen po sras bcu dag/ de nas nyams dga' ba dag byung // shing dang pad sogs thams cad las// chos rnams 'byung ba thos par gyur// phyogs rnam
282b7: kun du rnam byung nas/ / dge ba'i zhing du stong nyid bcas// rnam par sgra ni gang shig grag/ chos kyi bde ba byung bar 'gyur// yaM/ laM/ shaM baM/ oM badz+ra satwa kro d+hA ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+ha A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT/ oM ban+da
282b8: krod+ha rA gA ya hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha ya sa d+hu sA d+hu hU~M phaT/ khro bo rdo rje rin chen mchog/ 'bar ba'i phreng ba bzod dka' bas// khro bo rdo rje ba na med// mchog tugs pagasangs par gyur// oM badz+ra b+h+rikra TI kro d+ha tan d+h+we /

283a1: oM badz+ra sUr+ya ma hA dz+wa la mA la kro d+ha dz+wa lA ya sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ki tu ma hA kro d+ha d+hi ni hU~M phaT/ oM an+d+ra thA sa badz+ra man+naT+Ta sa kro d+ha tata ta ta hU~M phaT/ khro bo chen po rdo rje chos// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab gyur pas/
283a2: khro bo'i rgyal po rab bzod dka'// mchog tu 'jigs su rung ba smras// oM badz+ra d+harma bi sho d+ha ya hU~M phaT/ oM tik+Sh+Na kri b+hi na d+ha hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra hi tu krod+ha pra be sha ya maN Ta waM sarba hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra krod+b+hab+haSha ta bA ta hU~M phaT/ rdo rje las
283a3: ni rgyal po che/ / gsang ba thams cad kun bsdus pas// 'bar ba gsal bas khyab pa byung // khro bo rgyal pos brjod par gyur// oM badz+ra karma kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra ka ba tsa kro d+ha rak+Sha rak+Sha hU~M phaT/ oM badz+ra yak+Sha kro d+ha khAd khA da hA
283a4: phaT/ oM badz+ra kro d+ha muSh+Ti sA d+ha ya sa ma hUM phaT/ sems dpa' 'di rnam gsang ba che// zhi ba'i gzugs las rnam par gyur// rdo rje khro bo drag po che// 'khor lo'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs gyur// de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin/
283a5: khro bo chen po stobs po che// gsang ba 'di rnams yongs su brjod// mchod pa'i lha mos gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra la s+yai rA ga ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra mA laM a b+hi Shiny+tsa ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gI N+ye ka ta ya hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra nri t+yai pa shI ku
283a6: duhUM phaT/ oM badz+ra puSh+pe pU dza s+pha ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra gan d+h+we pU dza swa ra Na sa ma ye hUM phaT/ oM badz+ra d+ha bi pU dza swa ra Na sa ma ye hU~M pha Ta/ oM badz+ra A lo ke d+hu dza s+phar Na sa ma ye hU~M phaT/ de nas rgyal ba rdo rje 'dzin
283a7: khro bo drag po shin du gdug/ rdo rje khro bo rab gtum pa// sgo srungs dag ni kun du byung // oM a ku sha ma tA kro d+ha A kar Sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM dzaHoM badz+ra pA sha ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sa ma ya hU hUM/ oM badz+ra s+phoT ma hA kro/
283a8: d+ha ban d+ha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM baM/ oM badz+ra a be sha ma hA kro d+ha a be sha ya sarba sa ma ya hUM phaT ho/ 'khor lo yongs su zlum por ni// rdo rje 'dzin pa chen por gyur// khro bo chen po'i tshogs kyi khyab// dkyil 'khor chen po

283b1: yang dag ldan/ / gnas chen po dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor chen po kun bsdus pas// shin du gsang ba chos chen po// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs sprul pa// de nyid snying po gsang ba che// thar pa chen po grong khyer mchog
283b2: dkyil 'khor rgyal po chen po ste/ / sems can don kun yang dag ldan// chos nyid rdzogs par byang chub pa// 'di 'dra chos dang longs spyod rdzogs// rigs lnga'i gsang ba gang yin pa// gdon mi za bar byed pa yid// de bzhin
283b3: gshegs pa'i rigs zhi ba/ / gang phyir dag pa'i tshogs chen po// de bzhin rdo rje'i rigs drag po// gang phyir lha chen rab 'dul byed// lha chen la sogs sprul byed pa// de bzhin pad ma'i rigs mchog ste// gang phyir gdul
283b4: bya'i sems can rnams/ / sprul pa sna tshogs yang dag byung // sprul pa'i 'khor lo zhi ba ste// drag po'i mchod pa rab skor ba// sna tshogs rigs can 'khor lo ste// rigs bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
283b5: rigs mchog ni/ / shar gyi 'khor lo yang dag byung // de nas rdo rje'i rigs drag po// sems can don du yang dag 'jigs// rdo rje'i rigs mchog chen po 'di// dkyil 'khor tshogs ni kun sdus pa// gsang ba'i dbang phyug
283b6: rgyal po che/ / gang phyir gsang ba'i bdag por bshad// rdo rje thams cad kun bsdus pa// rang gi rigs mchog bshad nas ni/ rdo rje 'dzin pa rgyal po ches// dkyil 'khor chen po kun du sprul// lha la sogs pa bdug pa kun/
283b7: skad cig de la yang dag bkug/ slar ni bcug par byas nas kyang // skad cig gis ni dam tshig pog/ rdo rje mtshan ma'i dbang skur ba// dam tshig ldan pa byin nas ni// bkug ste rab tu bcug nas kyang // de bzhin bcing
283b8: te dbang du byas/ / dam tshig la ni brtson byas te// dam tshig sdom pa de bzhin no// mi rnams pa ni phan pa'i phyir// dkyil 'khor mchog ni gsungs par gyur// 'khor le chen po grong khyer che// rdo rje rigs mchog chen po

284a1: ste/ / khams gsum rnam rgyal zhes bya ba// de nas yang dag bshad par bya// 'jig rten gsum tshogs pam byas nas// lha la sogs pa rab bcug gyur// de nas khams gsum rnam rgyal gnas// 'khor
284a2: le chen po grong khyer che/ / gang ming gzung ba tsam nyid kyis// sems can rab tu bcom nas ni// gdon la sogs pa 'bros par byed// rims dang gdon dang dug dag dang // drag po gdug pa dam tshig dang // mtshan bzung ba
284a3: yi modo nyid la/ / skrag pa dang ni g.yo bar gyur// sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i mchog/ mi gang dag ni gdul bya min// de bas rdo rje 'dzin rgyal ni// dkyil 'khor chen po sprul par gyur// rdo rje slob dpon skal ba che//
284a4: shin du byang zhing rab tu mkhas// dgongs pa yi ni cho ga shes// bzhung rnams thos shing don la mkhas// rab tu dang zhing blo ldan brtan// rig dang rigs min rab tu shes// byang chub sems la brtson par gyur// lha
284a5: gzhan dag la 'dod ldan min/ / gsang ba'i snying po mchog mthong ba// snying rje bdag nyid brtser ldan pa// dag cing des la rnam par dul// rang gi dang gi rnam par gnas// zhen cing chags la gdug pa min// rmongs//
284a6: ba med cing le lo med// rtse ldan pan pa'i bsam pa can// rtag tu rnam par bkod la dga'// gzugs 'dod pa yi yon tan la// chags shing lhag par rgyal gyur nas// srid la sems ni skrag par byed// srid la
284a7: mngon par chags pa med/ / theg pa chen po'i tshul la brtson// theg pa gzhan la 'dod ldan min/ sems can kun gyi don la brtson// dkon mchog gsum gyi mchog byung ba// nyon mongs kun du chags pa spangs//
284a8: gnyen po dag ni rab tu bsgom// 'dod chags la sogs nyon mongs che// mi sdug pa la sogs pa sgom// rigs dang rigs min cho ga shes// sngags dang phyag rgya shin du mkhas// dgug dang bzhug dang bcing ba dang /

284b1: dbang du bya dang gshegs gsol dang // ji skad rdo rje dbyings bshad bzhin// sngon du rig pa'i rdul zhugs bya// kha na mtho rdul tsam la// kun du mdzes par bya ba yin// chang dang tshon rtse srad bu dang // yo byad cho ga yang dag
284b2: ldan/ / bcing dang phur bus gdab pa nyid// sngar bshad rdo rje dbyings bzhin du// bza' ba dang ni mi bza' ba// rdo rje snyoms tshul ting 'dzin gyis// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// sngar ni ji ltar de bzhin pa//
284b3: de nas yang dag rab bshad bya// dkyil 'khor chen po mchog gyur pa// rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs// des grub thams cad byed pa'i mchog/ gru bzhi pa la sgo bzhi pa// rta babs bzhis ni rnam par brgyan// thag
284b4: bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan/ / dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan// rgya cher ji ltar rig pa ru// ji bzhin rdo rje grong khyer che// rdo rje dbyings dang rab tu mtshungs// rdo rje 'dzin pa'i grong khyer bri// 'khor lo lnga dang yang dag ldan//
284b5: kab brgyad dang yang dag ldan// de dbus rang bzhin 'khor lo ya// dbus su sangs rgyas dgod par bya// rnam par snang mdzad ston pa che// rdo rje sems dpa' 'od po che// byang chub sems dpa' rgyal po che// sangs
284b6: rtas longs spyod rdzogs dkyil 'khor/ / sangs rgyas spyan sngar rdo rje ni// 'bar ba'i dbus su dgod par bya// rdo rje me ltar 'bar nyid ni// phyag rgya 'jig rten gsum 'joms pa// g.yas su rin chen phyag rgya na//
284b7: dbar ba'i dbus su bkod par bya// gson du pad ma'i phyag tu zi// rgyab tu rdo rje rnon po ni// 'bar pa'i dbus su bkod par bya// b+hag rgya min rgyal po bzhi// 'bar ba'i medang rab tu ldan// rnam par snang mdzad da
284b8: 'khor che/ / chos dbyings grong khyer chen po la// 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po yi// phyag rgya dag kyang dgod par bya// gang dang gang gi thig gyur pa// dkyil 'khor shes rab can thig gdab// rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis/

285a1: rdzu ga mas dang // bdus sa m+b+ha k+Sha nas // sa sa su // gyug gnas pa/ ma n+d+ha ga
285a2: a badz+ra ba ka kramad+ha/ rgyan thams cad yang dag ldan// 'ab ba'i se bas thams cad/ / gas na rab tu bskul// oM badz+ri ma rdzas N+Te/ b+hag ky-i ga du/
285a3: snying po thams cad dgod par bya// sngar ni dgod pa gang yin pa// rdo rje gzugs ni sor dbyed bya// de rje hU~M ma dang dkyil 'khor na// rdo rje thugs kyis song nas kyang // rdo rje gas pa sa chogargyal ba/ bskyed shi
285a4: mnyam gzhag pa/ / zhal bzhi pa la phyag brgyad pa// mche ba dag ni cung zad gtsigs// khro bo'i rgyal po bar bas khyab// phyug na phyag rgya dang bcas mtshon// rdo rje hU~M mdzad byeg rgyan// steng daphyug gnyis yang dag ldan//
285a5: de bzhin kho nar daphyag gnyis dag/ lcags kyu 'phyang ba yang dag ldan// phyag gcig gis ni zhags pa rnams// gcig gi rdo rje yang dag rnams// mda' 'a gengs pa yi phyag ca dang // phyag gnyis dag ni shin du ldan/
285a6: rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya ste// dbang phyug chen po kun du mnan// g.yas pas lha mo u ma yi// nu ma'i bar du gnon par byed// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo dgod par bya// 'bar ba'i phreng bas
285a7: khyab cing 'bar/ / khro bo 'jigs par byed pa mchog/ mdun du rdo rje sems dpa' ste// g.yas su rdo rje rgyal po'o// g.yon du rdo rje chag sa ste// rgya bas rdo rje legs pa'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // lho ru khro bo'i
285a8: dkyil 'khor ni/ / khro bo'i rgyal po khro gnyar can// khro bas yongs su bkong ba bri// thams cad 'bang ba'i phreng bas khyab// gdong ni khro bcas bzhad ldan pa// rdo rje dbang phyug phyag rgyar ldan// khro gnyar can/

285b1: yongs su brjod// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// rdo rje khro bo bdag nyid che// sngags dang phyag rgya yongs su sku// rang gi gnas su yang dag bri// mdun du rdo rje rin chen te// g.yas su khro bo gzi brjid do// g.yon du
285b2: rgyal mtshan drag po ste/ / rgyab tu khro bo bzhad pa'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // nub kyi phyogs su dkyil 'khor ni// khro bo chen po rdo rje ste// khro bdag chen po rnams kyis skor// rdo rje chos ni mdun du ste// rdo rje rnon
285b3: bo g.yas su'o/ / de bzhin g.yon du rdo rje rgyu// rgyab tu rdo rje smra ba'o// rdo rje shugs kyis song nas kyang // dkyil 'khor dag ni mchog bzhi pa// rdo rje dbab pa las chen po// khro bo chen pos yongs su bskor// rdo rje las ni mdun
285b4: du ste/ / g.yas su rdo rje bsrung ba'o// g.yon du rdo rje gnod sbyin te// rgyab tu rdo rje khu tshur ro// dbus kyi 'khor lo'i mtshams bzhi ru// lha mo bzhi ni yang dag zi// mtshams su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la// rdo rje sgeg ma la sogs
285b5: br-i/ / phyi rol dkyil 'khor mtshams rnams su/ rdo rje me tog la sogs bri// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// ji skad sngar bshad cho ga bzhin// sgo bzhi dag ni thams cad du// sgo srungs rnams ni dgod par bya/
285b6: lpags ga zhags pa lcags sgrog dang // dril bu dbab pa bla na med// rang gi phyag rgya snying bar bzhag/ rang rang gi ni snying po yis// rdo rje dril bu yid 'ong ldan// rnam par snang mdzad rnam par dgod// bdag nyid rdo rje tho ba ni/
285b7: gtso bo rdo rje rig pa mchog rdo rnga rgyal po mchog byin rlab/ pa nyid rdo rje dkyil 'khor mchog/ de yi dkyil 'khor dbris nas/ rdorje ti ting 'dzug/ yang dag par ni brtan byas pa// lan bdun du ni song babyag
285b8: rnam gang yin yongs su dag/ mkhas pas lhag pa khrib bya// rdo rdo dril bu rtogs par bya// grub par gyur te nyes pa med// rdo rje lcags kyu la sogs can// mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya// 'khor lo dbu

286a1: su zhugs nas ni/ / mkhas pas skyon dbye bar bya// yid kyis rdo rje ri mo ni// bteg cing kun du phye nas kyang // rdo rje sgon bzhi po dag/ yid kyis dbye bar bya ba yin// de la snying po na 'di yin te// oM badz+ra d+hA ra ud kata
286a2: ya pra pe sha ya sa ma ya hU~M/ dkyil 'khor phyi rol gnas rnams su// phyi yi rdo rje rigs dag bri// khyab 'jug la sogs lha rnams ni// kha khyer gyi ni phyed la gnas// 'khor lo dang bcas rigs bcas te// sems can
286a3: gdug pa gdon la sogs/ / rims dang 'byung po sha za dang // mkha' 'gro 'byung po ma mo dang // lha mo mtshon cha dang ldan kun// ji ltar mngon par 'dod pa bri// phyi rol kha khyer gnas su ni// rdo rje khakhyer mdzes pa rnams
286a4: de nas mngon la slob dpon ces/ / dkyil 'khor dbus su 'dug nas ni// rdo rje dkyil mo bkrung bcas te// ting nge 'dzin la snyoms 'jug bya// ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba// de bzhin bdag nyid rnam par bsam// rdo rje
286a5: rig pa mchog rgyal po/ / bdag nyid yang dag byin gyis parlab// rdo rje khro bo rgyal po chog/ ces bye de 'dra'i ting 'dzin la// rdo rje sems dpa'i ting 'dzin gyis// skal ba chen po snyoms zhugs nas// jig dgong du gra
286a6: pa bzhin/ / shes rab can gyi thams cad bsam// ji ltar rdo rje rigs byung ba// ji ltar dkyil 'khor rdzogs par ni / rgya chen gsang ba chen po dang // rdo rje slob dpon cho ga mchog/ rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba// rtog pa
286a7: 'di las rab tu bshad/ / de nas dbus su 'dug byas nas// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// khro bo'i phyag rgya bcings nas ni// phyag rgya thams cad yongs su bcings// khro bo rdo rje ljags kyu bcings// sangs
286a8: rgyas thams cad spyan drang bya/ / mtshan rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa ni// lan gcig tu ni brjod par bya// rdo rje me tog sogs mchod pas// 'dren pa thams cad mchod par bya// gsang ba'i mchod pa gang bya ba// phyag rgya thabra/

286b1: cad yongs su bcing // phyag rgya nye ba'i phyag rgya ldan// de bzhin du ni mchod pa nyid// phyag rgya'i lan la sogs pa kun// cho ga rab tu ldan pa dbul// rdo rje dril bu dkrol bya zhing // gdug pa'i dkyil 'khor bsdigs
286b2: par bya/ / gdug pa'i sems ni gdul bya zhing // nyon mongs mchog tu gsang bar bya// dbab cing brjod pa nyid du bya// rdo rje mchod pa mchod par bya/ glu dang mchod pa yang dag ldan// rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya// rdo rje yi ni glu 'di dag/
286b3: blang zhing mchog rnams mnyes par bya// btud cing dbul bar bya ba nyid// rdo rje glu ni blang bar bya// sha ta shata ma ta sata ti ri/ Ta ta Ta ta bri ti ha ta/ ma ta sha ta pre ta ka da ta/ ku Ta ta bi Ta bi Ta Ta TaT// ba Ta i ti ta Ta TaT/ kar
286b4: ra Ta ra ra Ta/ rdo rje ti ri ti ri yi// phyag rgyas bdag nyid dbang skur bya// ji ltar 'dod pa bka' mnos nas// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu bskul// sngon po gos kyi stod g.yogs bya// sngon po yi ni mig dgab bya// rdo rje ti
286b5: ri ti ri yi/ / phyag rgya rdo rje slob ma bcing // oM grih+Na badz+ra sa ma ya hUM ba/ ci rigs par ni gzug bya zhing // rdo rje'i sngags ni bskul ba bya// rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje slob ma gzhug par bya// oM badz+ra sa ma ya pra
286b6: sha ya mi/ rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji ltar snga ma bzhin// ye shes dbab pa'i las dag ni// mkhas pa dag gi bya nyid do// mchod pa dang ni gtor ma nyid// rdo rje can gyi sngar gsungs nyid/
286b7: shes rab can gyis kun bslab cing // bdag nyid dang bas rab tu bya// rdo rje hUM mdzad phyag rgya yi// shes rab can gyis hUM bsgrub bya// lha la sogs pa gdug pa kun// bkug cing de ru gzhug par bya// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor bslab
286b8: bya zhing / / bdag nyid dam ni gzhan yang rung // rdo rje phreng bas dbang skur bya// rdo rje mna' yi phyag rgya yis// sngon la mna' ni bsgag par bya// rdo rje ye shes ye shes che// rdo rje ye shes rab sgrub bya// lag pas rdo rje mtshan ma bzung

287a1: rdo rje sngags ni rabu bsgrub bya/ / rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis// rdo rje mtshan ma rab tu sbyin// oM badz+ra pA Ni ka rma kA ro b+hA ba// de nas ming gi dbang skur zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab tu bskul// rdo rje yi ni sngags 'di yis//
287a2: rdo rje ming gi dbang gyur bya// oM badz+re kro d+hAn/ a Sh+NI Shiny+tsa mi/ oM badz+ra nAm a b+hi she ka ta te badz+rA nA ma/ ye shes 'byung ba phun bu tshogs// mkhas pa pon rnam par bya// shes rab mchog gis bslab bya zhing // rdo rje rdul
287a3: 'byor rab tu sgrub/ / snying khar rdo rje bris nas ni// sna tshogs las rnams yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i phreng bas khyab cing 'bar// snying khar rdo rje sgom par bya// rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su sgom par bya// rgyal
287a4: po las rnams thams cad 'dzin/ / bdag nyid yongs su sgom par bya// yang na khro bo'i nang nas gcig/ bdag nyid yongs su sgom par bya// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// 'gro ba thams cad dbab par bya// hUM sa twa badz+ra kro d+ha a be sha
287a5: aHkhro bo rin chen ting 'dzin gyis/ / rdo rje rin chen yang dag bris// bdag nyid rdo rje rin chen te// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya// rdo rje pad ma mgrin bcings nas// / ma'i phyogs su yang dag bri// bdag nyid rdo rje chos sgomasarba/
287a6: des ni nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// spyi bo rdo rje bri bya zhing // rdo rje 'bar ba 'dzin pa dgod// bdag nyid rdo rje las sgoms nas// gdug pa thams cad gsal bar bya// ho badz+ra ra ta na kro d+ha b+ha Sha ma na ya tra/ hrIHbadz+ra d+ha makro d+ha
287a7: rA sha sa paT/ gas badz+ra krod+ha rAH/ tshogs sangs rgyas thams cad ni// blag rgya dang bcas dkrug par gyi// ye shes brlab cid de nas bzung // de bzhin ljon yang dag parlag// lag par rdo rje ljags kyi bris/ ljigs
287a8: 'dzub yi ge tu ldan pa/ / khro bo yas ni sor mo bskyod// lha rnams 'gugs par byed pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kr-i d+ha A kar/ a d+hu phaT/ de bzhin log tu nang mthil la// rdo rje lcags bu yang dag zi// de yis lha ni ga shig

287b1: bar ra/ / de ni dgug pa'i mchog yin no// oM badz+ra kro d+ha a kra ma a~M ku sha A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT/ dpung brkyang dang yang dag ldan// rdo rje lcags kyu yang dag bris// lha ni gang dang gang la mnan// de dang de ni dgug pa'i mchog
287b2: oM badz+ra kro d+ha na A kar Sha ya hU~M phaT/ stan la rdo rje lcags kyu ni// yang dag bris pas de mnan zhing // lha ni gang zhig kun d+ha mnan// de dang de ni 'gugs pa'i mchog/ oM badz+ra kro d+hA ya san/ a gar+Na ya A kar/ Sha
287b3: mai te te badz+ra sa ma ya ma nu s+phar hU~M phaT/ phyag rgya dbab par yang dag dpab// mkhas pas ye shes sab par bya// rdo rje sbyor ba thams cad kyis// grub pa dag kyang yang dag brtsam// g.yon brkyang pa li gnas rnams su//
287b4: bdag nyid khro bos slob par bya// myur du sangs rgyas ye shes ni// ring por mi thogs yang dag dbab// oM badz+ra kro d+ha kA ya a be sha hU~M a// rdo rje hUM mdzad yang dag sbyor// khro bo bdag nyid sgoms par bya// sangs rgyas byang
287b5: chu ba yang dag dgug/ rdo rje sngags ni rab tu skul// oM badz+ra be d+yo ta ta ma ma thA kro d+ha a na ya ho b+ha ga b+ha na badz+ra hUM phaT/ bdag nyid khro bo rgom bya zhing // khro bo'i lta bas lta bar bya// 'khor ba'i btson ra 'jigs rung bar//
287b6: sems can thams cad gsad par bya// oM driSh+Ti ma dz+ha ma nams rbas nAM// rtag tu rang nyid go bgos par// yid kyi bdag nyid sgom bya zhing // gzhan dag kyang ni sgom byas nas// 'gro ba 'di kun srung bar 'gyur/
287b7: oM badz+ra rak+Sha rak+Sha sarba satwa hUM phaT/ gsang ba'i phyag rgya rnal 'byor che// rnam pa bzhi ni bslab par bya// rdo rje ye shes de nyid che// sangs rgyas byang chub ye shes bsam// rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// sems can
287b8: gang phyir kun du chags/ / yid kyi gzugs ni sgom bya zhing // yi ge hUM ni rab tu brjod// rdo rje sbyor ba 'di dang ni// rdo rje mkha' 'gro'i phyag rgya yis// sems can gang la yongs su chags// de yi nyon mongs rnam par

288a1: nyams/ / Taka ki a sa la ba/ a la be ats+tsha Ta ka ki hU~M phaT/ 'di ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang // kun nas nyon mongs zhu zhing g.yo// Taka ki dza/ sems can gang gi rgyud la ni// rdo rje yis ni lta bas ltas// rdo
288a2: rje rnal 'byor spyan chen pos/ / de yi sdug bsngal nyams par gyur// Taka ki hUM/ yi ge hUM ni gyur pa las// nye ba'i sems can gang yin pa// de yi snying khar rdo rje yis// shes rab can gyi yid kyis bsam// de nas
288a3: 'jigs pa thams cad las/ / phyir mi ldog pa'i phyag rgya yang // rdo rje rnal 'byor mkha' 'gro dang // rdo rje phyag rgya gdab par bya// Taka ki ho/ rdo rje rnal 'byor rmad 'byung che// rdo rje rnal 'byor rdo rje gang // rnal 'byor mtha
288a4: 'gro dkyil 'khor ni/ / shes rab can gyi mchog gsang bslab// dbang po gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pas// yan lag kun la yongs su 'khyud// yi ge hUM ni sbyor byed pa// sdug bsngal rnam par nyams par 'gyur//
288a5: rdo rje khro bo rab drag 'dzin// rtag tu bdag nyid sgom par bya// de yi khro bo'i sku gang yin// gcig tu mchog tu gsang ba bdag/ sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'ang rung // bdag nyid dang ni mtshungs pa ru// lus ni
288a6: yang dag sbyor ba ni/ / dbang po snyoms 'jug brjod par bya// sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa' 'am// rdo rje khro bo 'am sems dpa' gzhan de'i lus gang yin pa dang bdag gi lus gang yin pa mtshungs par the
288a7: rab nyid 'di ni dbang po gnyis snyoms par 'jug pa zhes bya'o/ / yang na rnam par bsgom pa yi// ji skad bshad bzhin yan lag 'khyur// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// dpung pa dam por bsdam par bya// yan
288a8: lag kun la yongs 'khyud pas/ / sangs rgyas byang chub rab grub 'gyur// dpa' bo gnyis ni snyoms 'jug pa// 'dod pa'i 'dod chags brtag mi bya// 'di yis mtshungs par sgoms pa yis// mtshungs pa

288b1: ni dbang tha lan/ / rba trug stur ba sad// mchu bzunganas na byan // sems can gang shig namasas pa// des na pa ba na ya cag/ rdung/ sams can thams cad bang byed pa// lag na
288b2: sbyor zhing / / bdag nyid khro bar rnam sbyangs nas// de nas bde ba thob par 'gyur// hUM/ gang gis hUM ni rab sbyor zhing // sems can dag ni gang dag gis// yan lag thams cad bsdus byas na// de yi nyon mongs
288b3: bsrabs pa 'gyur/ / hUM phaT/ ye shes chen po thabs ldan pa// rdo rje'i rigs ni thams cad nyid// de bzhin 'khor lo'i 'khor bcas pas// mkhas pa yis ni bslab par bya// sangs rgyas sbyor ba'i ting
288b4: 'dzin gyis/ / rtag tu bdag ni sgoms par bya// rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam par sgom// bsgom pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni// skad cig sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// a/ rdo
288b5: rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po/ / bdag nyid yongs su sgom par bya// hUM/ rdo rje khro bo khro gnyer can// mkhas pa yi ni sgom par bya// traM/ rdo rje sde ru rang bdag nyid// sangs rgyas thams cad sgom par bya// hrIHrdorje
288b6: dbab pa khro bo che/ / mkhas pa yis ni sgom par bya// a/ bdag nyid rdo rje sems la ni// rdo rje sems dpa' rnam par bsgom// hUM badz+ra satwa/ rdo rje rgyal po bdag sgom bya// dza badz+ra nA dza/ rdo rje chags par bsam par bya// ra
288b7: badz+ra rA ga/ khro bo legs pa bsgom par bya// sabadz+ra rbang+ku/ de nas rdo rje rin chen no// oM badz+ra ra tan/ rdo rje gzi brjid de bzhin no// dz+wA la ya/ bdag nyid rdo rje rgyal mtshan sgo pa// tehaM/ rdo rje bzhad pa rnam par grom// hA sa badz+ra ngas/
288b8: rdo rje chos ni bsgom par bya// sho d+ha ya/ rdo rje rnon po rnam par sgom// ts+tshin d+ha/ rdo rje rgyu ni 'khor lo che// pra be sha ya/ rdo rje smra ba rnam par slob// b+ha Sha/ rdo rje las ni sgol par bya// karma/ rdo rje go cha rnam par sgom/

289a1: rak+Sha/ rdo rje gnod sbyin bsgom par bya// kha d+ha/ rdo rje khu tshur rnam par sgom// gaM gang dang gang la 'dod pa nyid// rigs kyi lha ni ci 'dra bar// rang bdag nyid ni sgom par bya// de ni 'di yis skad cig 'grub//
289a2: hUM/ rdo rje phyag rgyas lan cig bcing // mkhas pas rdo rje bzlas pa brjod// ji skad bzlas pa'i rgyud du bshad// gzhan du khro bo gzung bar bya// yid kyi kyang ni brjod bya zhing // lus kyi phyag rgyas bskul bar bya// dkyil
289a3: 'khor gsum ni mnyam sbyor bas/ / skad cig de la mkhas pas bsgrub// de nas nyams dga' rdo rje'i rigs// phyag rgya chen po grangs med pa// lus kyi phyag rgya yang dag ldan// gang phyir sems can snod min pa// de yi phyir
289a4: na nyung ba gsungs/ / phyag rgya chen po yongs sdu ba// theg pa chen po mngon sdus las// rgyud chen gsang ba zhes bya ba// rgyud de rab tu bshad pa yin// gsang ba'i cho ga 'di yis ni// rnal 'bor bya ba sgrub par bya// rdo rje rnal
289a5: 'byor sbyor ba yi/ / skad cig gis ni sangs rgyas 'grub// 'dir ni phan yon mang po dag/ rang gi las la nges pa sbyar// gang zhig gtul zhing mngon par sbyor// skad cig gi ni sangs rgyas 'grub// mtshams med lnga po
289a6: byed pa yang / / zhugs nas mngon par brtson 'gyur zhing // rnal 'byor cho ga sgrub byed na// 'grub par 'gyur bar the tshom med// tshe 'di la ni rnal 'byor pas// rab tu dga' ba'i sathob 'gyur// gang gi rdo rje can sbyor bas//
289a7: gdon mi za bar sa thob 'gyur// skal pa grang med dga' ba ni// spyod pa'i bdag nyid med par min// rnal 'byor 'di la mngon par brtson// de bsas ni rnyed dka' min// theg chen 'di ni gsang ba ste// sangs rgyas
289a8: chos kyi tshul bstan pa/ / sangs rgyas byang chub snying po che// de las sa ni thob dka' min// g.yon kyang cha lugs gnas nas ni// khro bo'i tshig ni rab tu brjod// khro bo'i lta bas yang dag khros// las rnams thams

289b1: cad sgrub par bya/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mdo sde'i dbang po gsang pa'i rnal 'byor gsang ba de khon nyid dam pa mchog tu gsang pa'i rtog pa'i rgyal po rdo rje rtse mo las khams gsum rnam par rgyal brnas
289b2: bya ba rnam par bshad pa ste gsum pa rdzogs so/ / / rdo rje'i rigs las le'u dang po'o// / de nas gsang ba dag ni kun bsdus mchog/ sems kyi dga' ba kun sbyor yang dag zung // bya ba
289b3: byas shing mchog tu rnam par mdzes/ / rdo rje dbang phyug thams cad rnam 'phrul tshogs// de nas sangs rgyas kyi ni rigs chen mchog/ rdo rje snying po'i thugs byung bde ldan pa// shin tu gsang ba'i yon tan mchog
289b4: sdus pa/ / rdo rje rgyal po bud med gzugs can gyur// e ma'o bud med dga' ba che spyod pa// gsang ba kun du sdus pa las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mnga'// de yi gsungs nas cang mi gsung
289b5: bzhugs so/ / gzungs kyi dam tshig yang dag byung ba mchog/ ting 'dzin gnas nas chos nyid gsad pa ni// spyi bo rkang mthil kun sdus bstan pa las// de yi rigs kyi dkyil 'khor tshogs dag byung // hrIHde nas
289b6: dga' ba'i ming can dag kyang phyung / / rdo rje bud med thugs las byung ba mchog/ gzugs khams mchog gi lha las shin du 'das// rdo rje'i mtshams rnams lha mo'i tshig dag grag/ dga' bcas 'dzum pa dang ldan spyan
289b7: mnga' ba/ / bzhad cing sgeg dang bcas pa'i zhal ldan pa// tshangs sogs rigs kyi lha yi lha mo ste// yid 'ong dga' ba chen pos rgyal 'gyur ba// lha me rdo rje rnal 'byor ma de yang // 'khor lo'i dbus su gnas nas
289b8: rtog byed pa/ / de yi rig pa sdus mdzes shing yid du 'ong // rdo rje chen mo rdo rje rmongs byed ma// oM sarba ta thA ga ta ma hA rA ga mo ha na ya hi/ snying po sangs rgyas rmongs par byed pas gsungs// de bzhin gshegs pa

290a1: mchog kyang mongs par 'gyur/ / sangs rgyas kun gyi dga' ba rmongs byed dga'// sangs rgyas gzugs dag yongs su sbyar ba mchog/ nam snang thub pa'i dbang phyug mchog den// bud med gzugs kyi
290a2: sprul pa nyid du 'gyur/ / dbang phyug rngu 'phrul pog ya ga de ni/ 'khor gyi sring po gang yin bzhi por gyur// oM badz+ra krod+ha sa ma ye s+thi de nas gsang ba'i brtan pa'i tshogs ni ba// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs skas
290a3: kun khyab pa/ / rdo rje gsang ba'i dbang phyug rmongs byad bdag/ sangs rgyas btsun mo dag pa'i chos nyid bzhugs// san nam padrug tu g.yos par gyur// 'od zer sna tshogs phyogs bcu dag tugs la//
290a4: lha mo lha dang bcas pa'i lha mo rnams// zil gyi mnan cing shin du rgyas par 'gyur// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs lha mo'i tshogs// de dag rang gi gzhal yas khang na gnas// de nas sangs rgyas rin chen
290a5: 'byung ba yis/ / gsang ba'i dbang phyug dam pa 'dren pa ste// rdo rje dga' ba chen po rnam par dgod// gdug pa kun gyi dbang phyug yi ge ni// snying po las byung chos nyid dag pa ste// rdo rje btsun mo bzhi dang dbus ma lnga//
290a6: dkyil 'khor tshogs kyi shar phyogs chal gnas// mi bskyod pa yi dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog/ de nas rdo rje rigs can las byung ba'i// shar gyi dkyil 'khor khro bcas dkyil 'khor bcas/ mi bskyod dam pa'i
290a7: da tshig pa gnyid can/ / de yi snying po skul ba gsungs par gyur// snying po rab mchog 'byung ba gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra kro d+ha sa ma ye dzi/ oM badz+ra roSha aM ku sha a nA ya sarba dzi/ oM badz+ra ro Sha karma badz+ri ba
290a8: a na ya di dza/ oM badz+ra duSh+Ti kro d+ha tiSh+Tha ya sarba dzi/ rin chen 'byung ldan de ni bud med gzugs// rin chen mchog tu yid du 'ong ba des// 'khor gyi snying po dag ni bzhi po gsungs// oM badz+ra b+h+ri kA TI kro d+ha ha ra

290b1: har sarba gad+hA dzi/ oM badz+ra dz+wa la mA la pra be sha ma hA kro d+ha A ga ni dz+wa la ya sarba ra b+hi sha dza dzaM/ oM badz+ra d+h+wadzA a kra kre u re pa tA kro d+he de hi sarba dzi// oM badz+ra a ta Ta Ta d+ha si ni rbA sa ma a ta Ta Ta ha ra ha ra dzi/ yi ge/
290b2: dzi ni shin du brtan par gnas// snying po shin du mchog tu gyur pa gsungs// rin chen dbang phyug dam pa de yis ni// snying po skul bar byed pa'i mchog dag gsungs// snying po mchog gsungs rmad byung gsungs par
290b3: gyur/ / 'od dpag med de bud med gzugs gyur pa// rdo rje btsun mo dam pa 'byung ba'i mchog/ snying po bzhi po dag ni gsungs par gyur// oM badz+ra shud d+hi ha na duSh+Ti d+hi/ oM tik+Sh+Na kro d+he ts+tshin dan sarba d+hi ri/ badz+ra ha
290b4: tu ma hA kro d+ha pra be sha ya sarba d+hi/ oM badz+ra dzi ha ma hA kro d+ha b+ha Shi pa tsa ud ga ra ya d+hi/ snying po rig mchog brtan pa gsungs par gyur// pad ma'i dkyil 'khor dbang dang ldan pa mchog/ 'od dpag med pa'i gsang
290b5: mchog bstan pa ste/ / snying po skul ba'i mchog ni gsungs par gyur// dga' ba chen pos mtshan ma dag kyang phyung // don yod grub pa bud med gzugs gyur pas// la la shin du skal pa dang ldan te//
290b6: 'khor gyi sring mo dag ni bzhi po gsungs// oM sarba mu khe karma badz+ra ni ma he kro d+ha ku ru sarba ni/ oM badz+ra ka pa tsa kra kro d+he rak+Sha ma Ni/ oM badz+ra kre d+he ma hA ya k+Shi ni badz+ra daMSh+Ta ka ra le bi la ba ga sarba ni// oM badz+ra muSh+NI
290b7: badz+ra kre d+he ni/ de nas las kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dag/ mchog tu gsang bsdus pa dga' chen po// dbus kyi gtso bo'i dkyil 'khor skul byed pa// las kyi btsun mo'i snying po mchog 'di gsungs// hUM
290b8: dbus kyi gsang ba sna tshogs 'byung 'gyur ba/ / gtso bo 'di dag rnam par snang mdzad gsungs// oM badz+ra sha ri hUM/ oM badz+ra rad na shwa ri hUM/ oM pad ma shwa ri hUM/ oM karma shA ri hUM/ rdo rje rgyal mo dang bcas

291a1: bskul ba las byung gang yin pa/ / rdo rje btsun mo rnal 'byor bzhi yis dbus kyi dbang phyug nyid du gnas// rdo rje rin chen chos ldan btsun mo yan lag mdzes pa dang ldan pa// 'di ni gsang ba'i tshogs
291a2: las gzhan du rnal 'byor mchog ni 'ga' yang med/ / rdo rje sems dpa' mchog tu 'jigs mi mda'// de ni rang gi 'khor tshogs dbus na bzhugs// de ni rtse dang phan pa'i sems kyis ni// rdo rje gsang pa'i dkyil 'khor/
291a3: mchog gsungs gyur// de nas 'khor lo'i grong khyer bstan byas nas// khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i bdag nyid des// rdo rje rnal 'byor dbang phyug btsun mo yi// dkyil 'khor gsang ba'i rnal 'byor yang dag bri//
291a4: grong khyer rnam pa gnyis su yang drug bri// 'khor lo rnam pa gnyis su sbyar bar bya// de bzhin grong khyer 'dirar yang dag 'ong ba dang // yang na ji ltar 'dod bzhin yang dag bri// de yang phyag rgya dag gi tshogs dang bcas/
291a5: sgom par 'os pa rdo rje yang dag bri// yang na gsang ba'i chos kyi mchod gyur pa// nga ni gzugs dang ldan pa yang dag bri// dbus kyi rim par rdo rje sems dpar bzhugs// zhags pa dang ldan 'khor gyi phyag rgya
291a6: bcas/ / dzardza 'bar ba nor bu pad ma las// 'bar ba dang bcas me dang ldan par bzhag/ shar gyi dkyil 'khor 'khor mo lnga yi bdag nyid ce// rdo rje dkyil 'khor gang du mi gyud ga// rdo rje'i phyag rgya che dang
291a7: rol par gyur/ / dbang phyug chen po rtse gsum ldan non mchog/ de nas phyogs pa'i'i gnas dag dang // rdo rje lcags kyu mda' dang dga' ba dag/ 'bar ba'i me yi 'od zer yang dag ldan// 'bar ba'i dbus na
291a8: gnas pa'i phyag rgya lnga/ / de nas rin chen rigs ni yid 'ong ba// rdo rje'i dbus na rdo rje rin chen bzhugs// de nas phyogs bzhi'i gnas dag tu// rin chen gzi brjid rgyal mtshan bzhad phyag rgya// de bzhin pad

291b1: ma'i rigs ni yid 'ong la/ / rdo rje pad ma'i phyag rgya ste// de nas phyogs bzhi'i mtshams dag tu// pad ma ral gri 'khor lo de bzhin sgra// de bzhin las kyi byas pa'i rig de las// rdo rje rnon po me chen dang ldan pa// de yi
291b2: phyogs bzhi'i mtshams ni brtan pa ru/ / las dang gnod sbyin bsrung ba khu tshur rnams// de las rgya cher gzugs kyi tsho gas dag la// rdo rje btsun mo'i mchog drag mkha' 'gro ma// 'bar ba'i mchab chen po 'jig
291b3: rung ma/ / dbus na rdo rje nyi ma 'bar bar ldan// ma dag bsrung ba'i cho gar bcas// rgya char gzhung mchog rtag tu lta bar bya// sbyang dang dbab pa'i las rnams thams cad ni// yan lag mchog ldan dam pa nas bzung bya//
291b4: de nas phyag rgya phyag rgya'i yan lag bsngab// mchod pa'i phyag rgyas mchod pa'i phyag rgyar brjod// de nas sgo dang mtshams bcas dkyil 'khor du// btsun mo dag po gnas lcags gnod sbyin mchog/ de nas sgor 'jug pa
291b5: yi tshogs la ni/ / badz+ra dza dzaHdgug pa'i theg rdo ba sprin ni rgya che ba// badz+ra hUM hUM/ de bzhin 'ching ba'i chos ni ster byed pa// badz+ra ba baM/ de nas ye shes chos nyid sna tshogs pa// badz+ra a aHde nas gsang ba'i
291b6: sreg pa dang bcas mchod/ / badz+ra hU~M khi de nas yan lag phreng ba sna tshogs ldan// badz+ra d+hU g+hu/ de nas thu blang ba dang rol mo dag/ badz+ra d+hA taM/ de bzhin gzhan dag kyil la dang phyug mchog/ badz+ra hUM ste/ de nas phyi rol mo
291b7: tog rgya chen po/ / badz+ra ti te/ de bzhin rol cha stong phrag dag brdungs pa// badz+ra Ta ta/ spos dang dri ldan rim pa dag bri ba// badz+ra d+hA tu/ de nas 'od zer snang ba rab tu spro// badz+ra krod+ha/ de nas rdo rje lcags kyu'i tshogs kyi dgus
291b8: par ba/ / dga' bas mnyes bya rdo rje yang dag ldan// oM sid d+hi ya badz+ra/ a na ya badz+ra/ de nas chags pa'i sa ni 'dod chags pa// rA ga ya badz+ra/ a ti badz+ra/ de bzhin nyi ma la ltag// dz+wa la ya badz+ra/ rgyal

292a1: mtshan gyini da ti badz+ra/ gzhad pa yini tras badz+ra/ de bzhin rjes su chags pa ni ka ma sa badz+ra/ ral gri gzung bar bya ba ni ts+tshanal badz+ra/ gzhan yang stong ba yi ni/ tham sa badz+ra/ den cig gi
292a2: dbyung ba b+hU hi badz+ra/ las kyi mchod pa'i dkyil 'khor brtan pa'i tshogs ni t+yai badz+ra/ de nas cho ga'i cha'i nirak+Sha badz+ra/ de bzhin du bza' ba'i ni khA b+hi badz+ra/ yid 'ong lus ni brtan par bcing bar bya// b+han d+ha ya badz+ra/ den
292a3: ye shes gyon de bzhin brkyang / / de nas khros pa'i yid kyis skul bar bya// so dag gi ni ma mchu bsdam par bya// de bzhin mig dag kyang ni btsum par bya// de nas khro ba'i ting dzin pa rko'o// gsang ba'i phyag rgya dag gis
292a4: bdud bzhi bcom/ / de nas rdo rje'i tshig gis snying po brjod// phyag rgya'i tshogs ni rnam pa sna tshogs bslab// lus kyi phyag rgya'i tshogs dag ni// theg pa chen po mngon sdus las// rdo rje sems dpa'i bka' bzhin du/
292a5: rgyas pa ru ni yongasu brjod// gsang ba mchog rdzogs so// // de nas rgyal po rdo rje 'dzin// kun mchog gnas kyi dbang phyug ni// rdo rje phra mo la bzhugs nas// rdo rje phra mo brjod par gyur// oM sarba ta thA ga ta suSh+Ta
292a6: badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hU~M phaT/ bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs su ni// phan pa'i don du rnam bsam bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni// sems ni zhi ba nyid du gyur// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma hUM/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal po//
292a7: bdag nyid yongs su sgom par bya// rdo rje phra mo 'di yis ni// rang sems skad cig gis 'dul yung/ oM muSh+Ta badzA rad na badz+ra kro d+ha kra ma ka hU~M phaT/ rdo rje rin chen ring bdag nyid// mkhas pa yis ni sgom par bya// sarba/
292a8: rgyas chos nyid myur thob cing // rin chen kun mchog gtso bor 'gyur// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra d+ha k+Sho kra ma hUM phaT/ bdag nyid dag ni rdo rje chos// gzod nas dag pa rnam par sgom// gsung gi phyag rgya 'di yi ni// rdo rje chos dang

292b1: mtshungs par 'gyur/ / oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra kaH kro d+ha kram hUM phaT/ bdag nyid rdo rje las su ni// yang dang yang du bsgom pa zhing // rdo rje sngags kyi skul nas ni// rdo rje las dang mtshungs par 'gyur// dbang srung ba yimam/
292b2: dpa' che// 'khor los sgyur ba bzhi po ru// rtag tu bdag nyid sgom byas nas// dbang bskur ba yang thob par 'gyur// hUM/ oM suk+Sh+ma dz+nyA na kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje rgyal po rang bdag nyid// rnam par sgoms ni rengs par
292b3: 'gyur/ / snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad kun du dgug/ oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra aM ku sha A ka ra Sha ya ma hA kr-i d+ha hUM phaT/ mda' 'gengs pa yi sbyor ba yis// rdo rje chags pa sgom par bya//
292b4: snying po 'di dag nyid kyis ni// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes chags pa// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra kro d+ha a nu rA ga ya hUM phaT/ sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byas shing // bdag nyid kyang ni rnam par sgom// rdo rje
292b5: dga' ba bdag nyid de/ / rdo rje dngos grub thob par 'gyur// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+radaSh+Ti kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje rin chen rgyal po ra// dbang skur ba ni brtan pa'i mchog/ rdo rje sngags kyi skul byas nas// rdo rje rin chen
292b6: mtshungs par gyur/ / oM sum+b+ha badz+ra d+hI hrI oMd+ha ta ra ha ra hUM phaT/ rdo rje gzo brjid ting 'dzin gyis// rtag tu bdag nyid 'bar bar bya// phyogs rnams kun tu yongs spros nas// rdo rje sngags ni rab tu skul// oM
292b7: suk+Sh+ma dz+wa la man ra la kro d+ha sUr+ye dz+wa la hUM phaT/ sbyin pa rarin chen rgyal mtshan du// rtag tu bdag nyid rnam par bsam// sems can thams cad dag bya zhing // rdo rje sngags ni rab skul zhing // oM su
292b8: badz+rad+he dza kro d+ha gtas man hU~M me pra ya ts+tsha hU~M phaT/ chos chen po yi bzhad pa bzhad// rdo rje bzhad pa bdag rten pa'i// rdo rje sngags kyi skul bya zhing // bdag nyid khon chos kyi gsungs// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra hA sa kro d+ha ha hrIH

293a1: phaT ha ha/ bzod nas zhi ba skye ba med// chos rnams thams cad rnam dag pa// bdag nyid rdo rje chos rgyal po// rdo rje tshig gi lan gcig brjod// oM suk+Sha badz+ra kro d+ha ya shod+ha hUM phaT/ shugs can ral gri
293a2: dag gi tshogs/ / rdo rje rnon po shin du brtan// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra ts+tshed kro d+hats+tshin d+hats+tshin d+ha hU~M phaT/ chos kyi 'khor lo skor byas nas// rdo rje 'khor lo dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM badz+ra suk+Sh+ma badz+ra hU~M ka ra kro d+ha tsakrats+tshin d+ha
293a3: ta e shwa ri/ pra be sha hri da yaM ts+tshin d+ha hUM phaT/ da ni brjod byed brjod bya min// bdag ni rdo rje smra ba brtan// chos 'dod pa nyid brtan byas nas// rdo rje smra ba thob par 'gyur// oM su k+She badz+ra hU~M kA ra kro d+ha ha ra pa tsa ya
293a4: wa mu dre na hUM phaT/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing // rdo rje las ni brtan par brtag/ rdo rje tshig gi chos bshad na// rdo rje las ni thob par 'gyur// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra karma kro d+ha sarba kar+ya hr-i da ya hUM phaT/ bdag
293a5: ni rgyal po byams pa che/ / rdo rje srung ba bstan pa'i bdag/ rtag tu bdag nyid sgom byas nas// ngan 'gro thams cad nyams par 'gyur// oM su k+Sh+ma badz+ra ka ba tsakro d+ha rik+Sha hUM phaT/ sdig pa thams cad bza' bya zhing //
293a6: rdorje srung bsgom par bya// rdo rje sngags ni sbrul byas na// rdo rje nyon mongs thams cad 'joms// oM suSh+Ta badz+ra yak+Sha ha ra b+hak+Sha sarba duSh+Ta badz+ra yak+Sha hU~M phaT/ rdo rje khu tshur rgyal po bdag/ byang chub sems ni dz+dza
293a7: su dran/ / bgegs rnams thams cad bcing byas na// rdo rje khu tshur dang mtshungs 'gyur// oM su k+ShaHdza mu k+Shan d+ha ban d+ha hUM phaT/ sna yi rtse mo'i sems de ni// brtan par byas nas yang dag bcom// yi ge hUM nyid
293a8: sbyor byas na/ / nyon mongs thams cad rnam nyams 'gyur// hUM/ dang po snying kha sna rtse ru// brtan par byas nas de rang bzhin// mtshan ma de ni spro byas na/ nad sogs dgra ni 'jigs par 'gyur// nA sha ya

293b1: badz+ri hUM/ sems de brtan par byas nas kyang // rnal 'byor 'dzin pas sgo bya zhing // shes rab can gyis khro ba dag brtsam// gnas ngan dag ni nges par 'jig/ bi nA sha ya sarba badz+ra hUM/ rnal 'byor
293b2: rig pas ji srid 'dod/ / mtshan ma de ni bsdu byas na// ma lus sdig pa thams cad ni// nyams shing 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro// oM suk+Sh+ma badz+ra pra t+ya shIg+h+raM hUM/ gsal bar phyogs rnams ma lus par// sems can
293b3: kun la byams pa spro/ / ji srid rdo rje spro byas pa// de srid sems can bde bar 'gyur// b+hai ra badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT/ kye ma'o mgon med sems can 'di// 'jigs pa las ni skyob pa dag/ snying rje'i sems de spro bar bya//
293b4: rdo rje ye shes thob par 'gyur// ka ru NA badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ de bzhin gshegs pa kun snying po// sems can thams cad gzod nas dag/ e ma'o bde ba e ma'o chos// phyogs rnams kun du yongs su spro// hUM kA ra bi
293b5: shud d+ha hU~M phaT/ 'khor ba'i sems can dmigs nas// bde ba dang bcas btang snyoms bya// btang snyoms sbyor ba 'di yis ni// sems can rnams la yongs su spro// oM bi sho d+ha badz+ra kro d+ha hU~M phaT// rdo rje'i gzug
293b6: ni yang dag bris/ / gang gi steng du nges bzhag pa// de nyid kyis ni dri ma'i tshigs// thams cad rnal 'byor pa yi 'joms// hUM badz+ra pra brta/ gang la byang chub sems nyid ni// rjes su dran pas rab phab na// sems
293b7: can de yis sangs rgyas kyi/ / byang chub nyid ni thob par 'gyur// hUM bo d+ha satwa pra brta/ phyag na rdo rjes rjes nan// dag pa'i chos nyid phab byas nas// sems can de yis bde ba ni// dam pa thob 'gyur the tshom med//
293b8: hUMbadz+ra d+ha ra pra brta/ rnam pa'i mchog rnams kun ldan pa// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas chos rnams pab byas na// 'jigs pa nges par 'byung mi 'gyur// hUM bud d+ha pra bta// zla ba

294a1: rdo rje rang bzhin dngos/ / skyed pa bzhin du bsgom byas na// blo bzang zla ba rdo rje mtshungs// myur du mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// bud d+ha pra brta ya hUM// zla ba'i dbus su rang bdag nyid// sgom zhing gang la phab
294a2: byas pa/ / sems can de rnams mi ldog par// 'gyur ba ru ni the tshom med// satwa pra brta ya hUM/ phyag na rdo rje rang bdag nyid// mkhas pa yis ni sgom bya zhing // gang du phab pa'i gnas de ni// dpal dang bde ba 'phel bar
294a3: 'gyur/ / myu ra ba nyid tu the tshom med// badz+ra satwa pra brta ya hUM/ sangs rgyas gzugs su rang bdag nyid// mnyam par bzhag pas sgom bya zhing // rdo rje de ni gar phab pa// rdzu 'phrul rgya ni chen por 'gyur// bud d+ha pra brtam
294a4: hUM/ rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// rang gi lus ni rab skor ba// gang gi ming gi byas pa de// the tshom med par byang chub thob// oM badz+ra ba li ta kro d+ha mA ra ya hUM/ dbugs ni dbyung dang rngub pa la// yi ge hUM ni rab sbyor
294a5: zhing / / rdo rje khro bo snyoms 'jug pas// 'dod chags la sogs nyes pa gzhom// oM badz+ra shA sa bi pa ta la hUM phaT/ rdo rje lta bas lta bya zhing // rdo rje khro bo rab sbyor bas// sems can gang la lta byas na// de ni 'khor ba'i
294a6: las grol 'gyur/ / oM badz+ra dr-iSh+Ti ba nA sha ya hU~M phaT/ lus ngag gi ni bdag nyid gnas// rang sems 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang // byang chub sems ni rjes dran na// des kyang sangs rgyas nyid thob 'gyur// hUM d+hId+ha ya
294a7: A kar Sha ya badz+ra kro d+ha hUM phaT/ rdo rje rig pa mchog rgyal por// mkhas pa yi ni bdag nyid sgom// 'bar ba yis ni khyab pa'i sku// rdo rje sgoms pas 'grub par 'gyur/ hUM/ gsang ba'i bdag po kun gyi snying
294a8: popo'i sngags ni gsungs par 'gyur/ / de nas rdo rje 'chang ba'i rnal 'byor dbang po rtog par mdzad// gdul bya min la shin du 'phrog cing 'dul bya la chags spro// sa 'dzin mchog gi dbang poslab pa rnam par rol pa'i sa// suk+Sh+ma rdzogs so// /

294b1: gsang ba gar ma nyi zla ste// rdo rje dam tshig brjod par bya// rnam rtog gi rtags mdzes gyur pa// de nas mchod pa'i cho ga bshad// bdag nyid sangs rgyas gzugs dang ni// sangs rgyas nam 'phrul rab tu gom/
294b2: dang po sbyor byung ji skad bshad// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra karbe shwa ri hUM/ rang gi snying khar byang chub sems// sangs rgyas kun gyi tshogs bsams nas// mchod pa yi ni mchog
294b3: 'di yis/ / 'dren pa thams cad mchod pa bya// hUM/ dbang phyug chen po dang bcas pa// lha rnams thams cad dgug bya zhing // bdag nyid rdo rje khro bo yos// khro bo'o mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM sarba ta thA ga ta pU
294b4: dza karma sa ma ya bi ti bi sta ri trai lo kya bi dza ye shwa sarba duSh+TA na ma hA sa ma ya badz+ri hUM/ khro gnyer can kun de bdag nyid// khro bo ran chen gyis sgom bya// sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs bya zhing // rin chen mchod
294b5: pas rab tu mchod/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta ka pA sha sa ma ya s+phad Na ma hA bA dza A kar Sha ya bi d+hi ba sta ra sa ma ya hUM/ chos kyi dbyings dang mtshungs par snang // rdo rje chos ni brtan pa bdag/ chos kyi mchod pa rab mchod pra//
294b6: sangs rgyas thams cad mchod par bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta d+harma d+hA tu s+pha ra Na ma hA pU dza bi d+hi bista sa mo ya hUM/ bdag nyid rdo rje las nyid ni// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul sgom par bya// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod bya zhing
294b7: las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta lo ka d+hA tu dzi bi ta ma hA karma pU dza bi d+hi ba stangs ma ye hUM/ phyag na rdo rje bdag rdo rje// de bzhin gshegs rnams dgug par bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rab mchod pas/
294b8: mchod pa ru ni sgom par bya// oM badz+ra satwa sid d+hi dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza// rdo rje lcags kyu brtan pa'i mchog/ rtag tu bdag nyid skom par bya// sgom pa sgrub par bya ba'i phyir// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya// oM

295a1: badz+ra A ka ra sha dz+nyA na sa ma ya hUM dza/ rdo rje chags pa bdag nyid ste// bkug pa rnams ni mnyes par bya// rdo rje chags pas rab mchod pas// sgrub par bya zhes yang dag sbyar/ oM badz+ra ra ti rA ga sa ma ye hUM
295a2: dza/ / rdo rje legs pa rang bdag nyid// sgom zhing rgyal ba mnyes par bya// rdo rje legs pa rab mchod pas// sangs rgyas thams cad dgug par bya// oM badz+ra sAd+hu karma dz+nyA na sa ma ye hUM dza// rdo rje rin chen rgyal po che// rang
295a3: bdag nyid ni sgom par bya/ / de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing // rin chen char ni kun du dbab// oM badz+ra b+h+ri ku nI ba shA ku ru hUM/ rdo rje nyi ma rang bdag nyid// 'od zer phreng ba dang ldan sgom// sangs rgyas rnams
295a4: ni dbang bya zhing / / phyogs rnams su ni 'od zer spro// oM badz+ra sUr+ya man Da la ba shrI ku ru hUM/ de bzhin gshegs rnams dbang bya zhing // bdag ni bde ba'i rgyal po nyid// sems can bsams kun rdzogs par bya// rin
295a5: chen rgyal mtshan rab tu mchod/ / oM badz+ra d+h+wa dza gra kre yU re ba shI ku ru hUM/ ha ha zhes dgod bzhad bya zhing // rdo rje bzhad pa bdag nyid de// sangs rgyas thams cad dbang du bya// bzhad pa'i mchod pas rab tu mchod//
295a6: oM badz+ra aT+TA hA sa na ba shI ku ru hUM/ bdag ni pad ma'i rgyal po nyid// sems can bsam kun rdzogs par bya// bdag gis sangs rgyas rjes chags bya// 'dod la chags pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra pad ma rA
295a7: g.ya hUM/ / bdag ni rang nyid rnon po ste// shes rab pha rol phyin pa brtan// bdag gi nyon mongs gcad byi zhing // de bzhin gshegs rnams chags par bya// oM badz+ra tik+Sh+Na rA ga ya hUM/ lha mo rdo rje sgrol ma
295a8: bdag/ chos kyi 'khor lo rabaskor ba// bdag gi rdo rje can mnyes bya// 'dod chags brtan pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra maN Da la rA ge rA ga ya hUM/ nam mkha'i lha mo chos smra ba// brjod du med pa'i bdag nyid

295b1: bstan/ / dag pa'i chos la dga' bya zhing // de bzhin gshegs rnams mnyes par bya// oM badz+ra bA ka rA ke rA ga ya hUM// bdag ni rang nyid las yin te// phyogs rnams kun du rab tu grags// bdag ni nam mkha'i mdzod kyang yin//
295b2: mchod pa'i char gyi rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra karma sa ma ye pU dza hUM/ bdag ni rang nyid srung ba ste// sangs rgyas byams pa brtan pa dag/ bdag gi sangs rgyas mchod par bya// chos kyi mchod pas kun du mchod// oM badz+ra ka ba
295b3: ban d+ha rak+Sha hUM/ bdag gi nyon mongs bza' bar bya// rdo rje gnod sbyin brtan pa bdag/ bdag gi sangs rgyas mchod par bya// chos kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra yak+Sha mA rA ya badz+ra daMSh+Ta hUM phaT/ nga ni sangs
295b4: rgyas byang chub yin/ / rdo rje khu tshur rang bdag nyid// phyir mi ldog pa'i 'khor lo ste// las kyi mchod pas rab tu mchod// oM badz+ra karma muSh+Ti sid d+h+ya sid d+hA hUM phaT/ 'di 'dra'i sna tshogs mchod pa kun// ye shes gsang
295b5: sngags rab thob byed/ / ma lus lha mo sems dpa' kun// rgyal po ji bzhin rab rnyed hUM/ sgeg mo phreng ba de bzhin glu// gar ma me tog sogs sbyor bas// sems dpa' la sogs lha mo dag/ shin du srung ba'i mchod pa
295b6: yi mchod pa'o/ / de nas las ni thabs chen po// gang gi myur du rab grub 'gyur// gang gi dga' ba la sbyor ba// sbyin sregs las kyi cho ga'o// ji ltar sbyin sreg dngos grub kyis// las ni bla med byed pa ltar// de bzhin rig
295b7: pa'i las rnams kun/ / de lta bu ni byed pa min// sbyin sreg rnam pa mang ldan pa// mdo ru sdus na rnam pa lnga// rgyas par rnal 'byor chen po yi// gsang ba'i mdo las rab tu bshad// rig pa 'dzin pa'i rnam 'phrul pa// dzi/
295b8: ltar sbyin sreg rnam pa yis// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'grub 'gyur ba// mdog sdus rab tu bshad par bya// sbyin sreg las ni rnam pa lnga// re re zhing yang rnam par mang// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa nyid// mngon spyod kyi ni gsum

296a1: pa ste/ / dgug pa yang ni bzhi pa yin// lnga pa dbang dang yang dag ldan// sbyin sreg lnga po de rnams ni// dbang du byed pa mchog yin no// de nas thab khung rab bshad pa// sbyor ba ji bzhin sbyor bar bya// zhel
296a2: thab khung zlab po ste/ / kun nas yongs su zlum po yan// rgyas pa la ni gru bzhi ste// mngon spyod la ni gru gsum yin// thab khung rdo rje'i rnam pa can// kun du dgug par byed pa'i mchog/ de bzhin thab khung ring por bya//
296a3: dbang du byed pa'i mchog yin no// de dag rnam pa lnga ru bshad// thab khung las ni bla na med// srod kyi dus su zhi ba bya// snga dro'i dusu rgyas pa'i las// nyi ma byed na mngon spyod kyi// drag po'i las ni nges par bya// dgug pa
296a4: dus rnams thams cad du/ / mtshan mo dbang du bya ba yin// sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// mnyam par gzhag pas las rnams bya// shar du khaltas zhi don du// rgyas pa byang du yang dag gnas// lho ru kha ltas gyur pa
296a5: yi/ / mngon spyod kyi ni las rnams so// steng du kha lta// de bzhin dgug/ phyogs rnams kun du dbang du bya// phyogs mtshams thams cad mnyam sbyor bsam// yang na nub kyi phyogs su bshad// zhi la sangs
296a6: rdzas phyag rgya ste/ / rgyas la nor bu'i mtshanams so// rdo rje khro bo mngon myong la// dbang la pad ma'i rigs kyis so// shin du dgug pa dang ldan pa// rdo rje lcags kyu dkrug pa la// sbyor ba lnga po 'di yis ni// sbyin
296a7: sreg las ni rab tu sgrub/ / zhi ba'i shing ni yang nga bste// rgyas pa de bzhin 'bras bur bcas// tsha ba mngon spyod las dgal// dgug pa la ni tsher ma can// dbang la me tog bcas par bshad// de rnams yams
296a8: shing go rim bzhin/ / sngon la yams shing rnam pa lnga// rnal 'byor pa yi yang dag sbyar// de la 'dam gyi thugs pa yi// shing la shi ba rab tu sgrags// gang du sdig pa rnam 'jig cing // kun du 'khrug par sregs

296b1: 'gyur ba/ / bud shing mngar bdag gi me// mnyam par bzhag pas rab sbar nas// til mar gyi ni sbyin sreg byas// sdig pa thams cad sregs par 'gyur// oM sarba pA paM da ha na badz+ra ye swA hA/ bud shing mngar ba dag gi
296b2: ni/ shin tu mnyam par bzhag pas sbar// 'bras kyi sbyin sreg byas nas ni// bsod nams tshogs ni 'bel bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra pU Sh+Ta ye swA hA/ bud shing mngar ba dag gis ni// mnyam par bzhag pas me sbar nas//
296b3: mar spyugs ngur ba'i sbyin sreg gi/ rdo rje tshe ni mngon 'phel 'gyur// oM badz+rA a yu she swA hA/ yam shing de dag nyid kyi ni// dge ba 'byung bas me sbar nas// ku sha'i myu gu'i til mar gyis// 'jig rten gsum
296b4: yang srung bar 'gyur/ / oM a pra ti ha ta badz+ra ya swA hA/ sngon la zhi ba sbyar bar bya// dbus kyi gnyis la rgyas dri bzhin// zhi ba dang ni rgyas pa yi// sbyin sreg las ni dang por 'gyur// shing ni tsha ba'i yam shing gis//
296b5: mngon spyod kyis ni las dag la// mngon spyod dang ni bcas pa yi// dgug pa la yang de nyid kyi// rdo rje khro bo'i ting 'dzin gyis// sngon la cha ba'i yam shing gi/ khros pa me ni rab sbar nas// mkhas pas cher mas sbyin
296b6: bsreg bya/ / rer ba dang bcas shing dag kyang // tsher ma can gyi nges par dgug/ gang dang gang ni 'dod gyur pa// sangs rgyas rnams ni nges par 'gugs// oM badz+ra A ka ra Sha ya dza/ bud shing me tog dam sogs kyi/
296b7: rab tu 'bar ba'i me sbar nas// me tog 'bras bu dmar mo yang // sbyin sreg byas na dbang byed mchog/ hUM badz+ra bA sha ya dza rtse ba'i yam shing dag rtsa zhing // rab tu drag pa'i me sbar nas// 'bras bu khab bsreg byas na/
296b8: mngon spyod kyi ni mchog yin no// hUM badz+ra mA ya phaT/ gsang ba'i sbyin sreg thams cad ni// de na gzhan yang rab bshad bya// sbyin sreg 'khor lo cho ga yis// de nyid du ni ji bzhin sbyar// yam shing tsha ba dag gis ni//

297a1: shin du drag pas me sbar nas// 'jigs rung lcags kyus sbyin bsreg bya// gdug pa thams cad rab 'jigs 'gyur// oM badz+ra ban d+ha ya phaT/ me tog dang bcas shing ma la// rdo rje khro bo'i tong 'dzin
297a2: gyis/ / sngags sogs 'bras bus sbyin bsreg ni// dbang du byed pa mchog yin no// oM badz+ra ba shaM ka ra ya swA hA// kha ba dang ni mngar ba nyid// yam shing mngar po sbyar bya zhing // 'dod pa'i me tog 'bras bsregs ni//
297a3: 'dod pa'i gzugs can mchog tu 'gyur// oM badz+ra karma rU pa ne swA hA// de nas bud shing de dag nyid kyis ni// rab tu khros pas me sbar nas// smyug ma'i 'bras bu phra mo bsregs// myur du mi snang nyid du 'gyur// oM
297a4: badz+ra a tri sha ya swA hA/ / shes rab bud shing de nyid kyis// drag po'i me no ra ba s+pha ra nas// nam mkha' stobs kyi me tog dang // bsregs na mkha' la 'gro bar 'gyur// oM badz+ra khe tsa ri na swA hA/ de nas mngag gzhug pa dang
297a5: g.yog/ bka' bzhin byed pa rab tu skul// ci nas kyang ni myur 'grub pa'i// go rims bzhin du rab bshad bya// shing ni kha bos bud shing bya// thab khung rdo rje'i dbyibs su sgo// khros pas rdo rje me tog bsreg/ yi ge
297a6: dza ni yongs su brjod/ / sngags kyi sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje'i sngags ni rab tu skul// rdo rje me tog dag bsregs na// bka' byed mchog ni rnyed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra a dz+nyA kar ya dza/ yams shing de dag
297a7: nyid dang ni/ / thab khung de nyid brko bya zhing // byang chub sems dpa'i sman ma gang // sregs na bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// oM badz+ra so rab shaM ka ra ya dza/ bud shing de dag nyid kyi me// kun du thab khung de kho na// rdo rje sem
297a8: dpa'i sman ma ni/ / bsregs nas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur// hU~M badz+ra pA Ni ba shaM ka ra ya dza/ yang na sangs rgyas sman ma 'am// yang na bdag dang mtshan ma dag/ sgrub pa'i sbyor bas sbyin bsreg bya// sangs

297b1: rgyas bka' bzhin byed par 'gyur/ / oM bud d+ha sha kar ya dza// tshig gi sbyor ba 'ang yas na// sbyin pa zag bya zhing myur du 'grug// rdo rje'i sbyar bas dngos grub kun// batsham med par 'grub par 'gyur//
297b2: rig sogs kun kyang // de nas gsang ba phyag rgya che// rdo rje'i rnal 'byor rab grub phyir// rnal 'byor chen po sgrub par bya// rig pa gang zhig yid 'ong ba// sring mo'i rigs ni thob bya'i phyir// rig pa'i lha mo dang ldan
297b3: par/ / shin tu rnal 'byor sgrub par bya// bud med sdug dang lhan cig tu// mkhas pas 'dug pa bstan par bya// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// de nyid tu ni ji skad bshad// kun tu gur gum bye ma dang /
297b4: g+har mig sran bcuganas ni// de yi sems dpa' shes par bya// gang phyir dgongs pa rab tu bsgrags// sdug pa de yi rig pa ni// mngon par 'dod pa gang yid 'ong// rang gi rigs kyi lha mo gang // de ni bud
297b5: med ces byar grags/ / rig pa'i sbyor ba de yis ni// rang gi rigs kyi lha dag sgrub// mig sman la sogs gzhug pa ni// pad ma'i steng du yang dag dgod// b+ha ga pad ma zhes bshad de// gzhug pa
297b6: dgod par bshad par bya/ / b+ha ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// mig sman dag ni sgrub par bya// b+ha ga mig sman gzhug pa ni// pad ma'i steng du yang dag dgod// pad ma dang ni lhan cig dgod// rnam pa bzhin
297b7: 'grub par 'gyur/ / oM gu h+ya ra ti badz+ra shAM ka ri sid d+ha hUM// dro dang dub 'byor dang rdul// rnam pa bzhin 'grub par 'gyur// oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid d+ha trUM/ b+ha gar 'gi wang bzhag nas ni// gsang ba'i phyag rgya gzhas
297b8: bar bya/ / mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi dag gis// dngos grub rnam pa bzhi ru bshad// oM gu h+ya badz+ra sid d+ha hUM/ rdo rje sems dpa'i phyag rgya yi// b+ha gar gur gum bcug nas ni// dgab cing de ni 'bar 'gyur na// rnam pa

298a1: bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/ / oM badz+ra d+ha ragrA u0f7f sad d+ha d+na/ dze rnga bya ba'i sbyar ba dang // rdo rje phyag rgya bsdus pa dang // rdo rje khra ba snyems 'jug dang // rdo rje'u tshur sbyar ba dang // dam tshig mchog na 'di dag dang /
298a2: hUM gi sor mo'i sbyor ba dang // chos kyi phyag rgya de bzhin 'dir// oM la sogs pa'i yi ge dang // sbyin bsreg cho ga 'di yis ni// ye shes phyag rgya rab sgrub bya// rgyas pa ru ni thams cad dag/ gsang ba'i rgyud tu rab
298a3: traM bshad/ / cho ga'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub ches// tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas ni// mchog nyid bsgrub par 'gyur ba yin// rdo rje rigs chen yid 'ong ba// rgyud chen kun las btus pa las//
298a4: gang zhig mngon par brtson 'gyur ba// don yod pa yi dngos grub 'gyur// tshogs ni bsags pa med pa dang // sangs rgyas mthong ba med pa ru// gsang ba'i snying po chen po 'di// thos pa tsam du'ang mi 'gyur ro//
298a5: gsang ba'i rnal 'byor gyi cho ga rdzogs so// // de nas gsang ba'i phyag rgya bzhi// dkyil 'khor mkhas pas bslab par bya// ye shes de nyid gsang ba yang // yongs su bsgrub pa rab tu bskor// shin tu gsang ba
298a6: chen po ni/ / dngos po thams cad khyab la dgod// 'di ni rdo rje drag po ba'i// rang nyid lnga pa dang bcas pa// gas brjod du med pa mchog/ ye shes mchog gi tshul thob byed// bde ba chen po rab grub don// dga' ba chen po
298a7: shin du brtan/ / oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma me rgu gso badz+ra pra te b+h+ri ku TI badz+ra ra ta oMHdz+ra pad ma badz+ra ti ta/ oM badz+ra karma a tri kro d+ha/ shar dang lho yi phyog cha dang // nub dang byang gi phyogs cha dang // dbus dang byog/
298a8: bzhi dag tu ni// sbyor bas phyag rgya dgod par bya// phyag rgya'i dkyil 'khor dam pa ni// thams cad bri zhing dgod pa bya// rdo rje sems dpa' rgyal po che// mthong gyur 'di la the tshom med// ji skad bshad pa'i rnal

298b1: 'byor bzhin/ / rdo rje rnal 'byor rjes sbyor skyes// rnal 'byor dag ni lhag ma dag/ de dag thams cad brtan par bya// shin du gsang ba de nyid che// mchog tu gsang ba de nyid mchog/ gsang ba chen po gas ba
298b2: 'dzin/ / rdo rje gsang ba brtan pa che// rig pa mngon par 'dod 'gyur ba// rang gi lag gi yang dag bri// rgyal me chen mo brjod byas na// dkyil 'khor du ni skad cig 'grub// oM sarba ta thA ga ta bi shud d+ha d+harma ho/
298b3: rang gi dkyil 'khor che bris nas// rig pa brjod pa la brtson bya// byams pas dgug pa'i sbyor ba yis// 'khor ba snying rje spyad par bya// oM bi shud d+ha d+heSh+Ti dza/ rang gi gsang sngags bris nas ni// bu mo'i mtshul
298b4: 'obyas te/ / 'jig rten dbang phyug btsun mo che// shes rab pha rol phyin lha mo// oM swa b+hA ba bi shud d+ha mu khe hUM/ pha rol phyin drug spyod pa yi// byang chub spyod pa rab rnyed dka'// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor brtan gyur
298b5: na/ / 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni 'jug bya zhing // 'dod pa'i yon tan mchog lnga yi// rol cing dga' ba nyid du bya// mdo sde gsang dbang las bshad pa// gsang ba lnga ni rab sgrub pa//
298b6: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru bshad// de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la sogs// 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga ru brjod// 'dod pa'i sbyor ba 'di yis ni// skal pa can gyi dngos grub thob// gsang ba de nyid chen po ste//
298b7: rigs lnga dag ni rab sgrub pa// 'dod chags chen po rab sgrub phyir// rol cing rab tu dga' bar bya// bde ba chen po grub don du// spyod pa chen po tshul chen po// de nyid rnal 'byor kun bsdus pa// de nas
298b8: yang dag bshad par bya/ / rdo rje hUM mdzad rnal 'byor gyis// rnal 'byor bya ba sgrub par bya// ji ltar yi ge hUM las byung // gsang ba rgyal po chen po byed// rdo rje hUM mdzad sbyor ba yis// rnal 'byor bya ba sgrub pa ruH//

299a1: u0f7f// de lta min na phyag rgya che// dam tshig zhes bya gtan mi 'grub/ phyag rgya chen po mdor smras na// rdo rje phyag rgya yongs su bzung // de nas grub pa'i phyag rgya che// grub pa'i yi ge yang dag gis// myur du rab tu
299a2: 'grub 'gyur ba/ / rmad 'byung chen po rab bshad bya// oM sarba ta thA ga ta badz+ra sa ma ye hUM/ zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gang bar bzhugs// phyag rgya chen po yongs su gzung // rdo rje sngags kyi bskul bya zhing // sangs
299a3: rgyas byang chub rab tu sgrub/ / hUM badz+ra ma Ta/ rdo rje'i rig pa mchog rgyal po// bdag nyid yongs su bsgom bya zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad 'jigs byas na// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM b+h+r-i kr-i TI ba ra ta/ dang
299a4: bdag nyid ni dbang skur ba/ / rin chen phyag rgya yongs su bzung // rin chen char ni rab pab nas// 'grub 'gyur 'di la the tshom med// oM pad ma badz+ra hrIHtha/ shes rab can du rang bdag nyid// rdo rje sngags kyi skul
299a5: zhing / / pad ma'i rigs chen skul bar bya// hUM karma badz+ra kri ti ta/ sna tshogs rdo rje rgyal po che// bya ba sna tshogs bdag nyid che// sangs rgyas thams cad mchod byas na// dngos grub las ni thob par 'gyur// bud med//
299a6: sdug dang lhan cig tu// dkyil 'khor dag ni yang dag bya// mdo sde gsang dbang rgyal po las// rnam pa bzhi ni rab tu byung // de nas mtshan nyid sna tshogs yongs bsdus pa// rab tu spyan yangs dga' ba chen po mchog/
299a7: bzhin tshogs dang rdo rje spyan ldan pa// shes rab spyan gyi btsun mo mchog chen ldan// oM badz+ra ka ma ho/ badz+ra hU~M hUM/ ka Ta ma shwa ra da baT/ kar na badz+ri gri/ badz+ra grwa ra/ badz+ra phaT/ ka ra ra gri shud d+hi g+hi/ shud d+hi/ shud
299a8: d+hi kri/ bud d+ha/ satwa dAH/ rA ga/ duSh+Ti/ ra tan/ te daM/ keH/ ny+dzas/ d+harma/ kriSh+Ta/ he u0f7f/ g+ho// d+harma/ rak+Sha/ yak+Sha/ sa ni taM/ sid d+hi/ yo ga/ gu h+ya/ bi sha ka/ tsaH/ tsa ri/ dz+nyA na/ ratra/ sum g+ha/ tag gU/ hUM phaT/ hUM baM/

299b1: ga d+hag na/ d+hA/ na zug sar+b+ha/ d+hArmA/ d+harmAm+b+ha b+h+yaH/ A / k+Shad+hA/ n+ta/ ku sa / tu
299b2: oM sarba ta thA ga ta u0f7fkre d+hi/ oM a nud pa naM ne aM/ oM a nu ruM te AM/ au a na le au/ yau ne lo I/ ai ra te na su/ oM rata ta A/ oM sa u ri/ o la e rI/ oM a ta li/ ai ta re l-I/ o a sha nas/
299b3: o b+he ha g+he ai/ oM sarba sha ba ri ba ri pU d+he yo/ oM b+ha ra de oM// oM s+pha ra Ne aM/ oM bish+tsa aHoM ma he tse pre ka/ oM tiSh+Tha kha oM a mu kha ga/ oM a b+hi She g+hA/ oM dz+nyA ne da/ oMts+tshe daH/ oM ba ri hir+yAH/
299b4: o b+ha she dza/ oM b+ha d+he dz+ha/ o pra sha menya/ oM kro d+ha Ta/ o ha ra netra/ oM b+haM g+ha Da/ oM k+Sha be D+ha/ oM a Nu Na/ oM Ta ka ki le ta/ oM bi su le tha/ oM d+hA ra NId/ oM bta ke d+haM/ oM ba le ki na/ o tre te pa/ oM sarba/
299b5: ha ra ni pha/ oM b+hu sha ni ga/ a b+hi ba sha ni b+ha/ oM ar te ma/ oM a li ni ya/ o tra hi ra/ oM bi sha la/ oM bud d+he wa/ oM d+ha me sha/ oM ya ma b+he Sha/ oM sarbe sa/ oM d+ha lin ti/ to tha/ hUM dza/ hA sa// oM a/
299b6: a ro/ ni ba/ da shwa/ tra ra d+hi/ b+hu ga sa ya/ a ti/ kro d+ha/ d+ha ma sha/ b+ha ra ya/ yug ti/ dang sha na/ hA sa ya/ he ma hA ne/ d+ha ra Na/ oM sarba ta thA ga ta sa bi dz+nyA ma hA mu ne rA dzA ga/ d+ho rA dzA kra ya hi hA hA hUM hUM ha//
299b7: de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsang ba 'di// mdo sde gsang dbang las gsungs pas// chos dbyings brtan pa'i rang bzhin te// chos dang longs spyod rdzogs las byung // bde legs sgom pa byas dang mtshungs pa med//
299b8: e ma'o gsang ba chen po gsang ba kun bsdus pa// rnal 'byor rgya cher bsdus pa'ang mtshungs pa med// bde ba chen po 'di ni brtan zhing brtan pa'i dngos por 'gyur// dga' ba chen po'i slob dpon dga' chen nyi ma ste//

300a1: mchod 'as gsang ba'i kun bsdus pa// kun mkhyen gsung las byung ba'i dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// tshogs rgyas rab tu 'del bar 'gyur ba gsungs pa yin// rdo rje chen po skal baches
300a2: gsang ba thams cad rjes su bsdug/ / de nyid chos ni rnal 'byor che// sdug po bsdus par 'jug par bya// brgya dang sum bcu rtsa drug ldag/ tshogs kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// bri dang rdor tshig sa
300a3: ge yis/ / dkyil 'khor gsang ba bslab par bya// rgyud kyi dkyil 'khor kun bsdus pa// dkyil 'khor gsang ba 'dir ni// de nyid yi ge rnam dag pa'i// rnal 'byor chen po'i jug par bya// gru bzhi pa
300a4: sgo bzhi pa/ / rta babs bzhis ni rnam par rgyan// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar gyi chun pos rnam par brgyan// rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yis// stug po gsang ba shin du brtan// de nyid gsang/
300a5: ba bslab bya'i phyir// shes rab can gyi dkyil 'khor bslab// e ma'o dkyil 'khor sbyor ba yis// gsang ba'i dkyil 'khor kun sdus pa// rdo rje dbyings sogs sbyor ba yim// mkhas pas yang dag
300a6: bri zhing dgod/ / gruba'i mnyam pa'i rim pa ni// de nyid kyi ni nang du bya// dkyil 'khor gyi ni dbus kyi char// sangs rgyas gzugs ni dgod par bya// de yi phyogs rnams thams cad du// ci rigs par ni
300a7: yang dag bri/ / ngos bzhi'i rang bzhin dkyil 'khor la// yi ge sum bcu rtsa drug dgod// sangs rgyas kyi ni phyogs kun du// yi ge bcu drug yang dag bri// yi ge bcu drug rgyal po ni// phyag rgya'i tshogs dang 'od bcwa
300a8: pa/ / dkyil 'khor chen po'i logs bzhi ru// yi ge rnams ni yang dag bri// yi ge sum cu sum cu ni// phyogs rnams kun du dgod par bya// sangs rgyas thugs ka'i dbus su ni// yi ge hUM ni sbyar bar

300b1: gang zhig sbyor ba'i ming can gyis/ / sangs rgyas dbus su dgod par bya// rdo rje yi ge rab sbyor byed// shes rab can gyi yi ge rnams// rdo rje'i rig pa 'dzin pa yi// dbus rdo rje rdo rje bzhi// shar du yi ge sum cu
300b2: gri/ yi gesum cu de bzhin lhor// sum cu byung gi phyogs cha ru// nub tu sum cu sbyar bar bya// yi ge bcu drug yang dag sbyor// dbus su sangs rgyas bzhi ldan bya// rdo rje rnal 'byor rnal 'byor che// rnam
300b3: 'byor dbang phyug dbang phyug che/ / dpal ldan 'jig rten rnal 'byor ldan// dbab pa brtan pa'i tshogs gyur pa// swa ba las byung rgyal ba che// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor 'jug par bya// u ra te ko ta ma hAM r+ya yoH
300b4: d+ya bi ra te nA ma ne/ de nas sbyor ba 'di yis ni// rdo rje 'khor lo gzhug par bya// ha ha he ho gsad pa chen po yi// rtse gsum ral pa gsum 'dzin pa// rgya chen gzi brjid chen po'i don// rdo rje thig gi yongs su bskor
300b5: slob dpon chen pos blto byas nas/ / yi ge rab tu brjod par bya// rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor 'khor lo yis// rdo rje'i 'khor lo kun du spro// a A'i rnal 'byor yang dag gzung // i I dbang phyug chen po'i 'o/
