300b6: u U rnon po 'chang ba ste// e I spu dbyangs rab bskul ba// oM A stobs byed rtsibs chen po// oM AHshes rab spyan bzang ba// rdo rje lcags kyu 'di yis kyang // rdo rje 'chad ni bskul bar bya// jib+har
300b7: 'khor lo rdo ltar rigs/ / dzangs ji ltar rdo rje'i rigs// de bzhin 'khor la yongs su dgod// rdo rje slob dpon dka' thub tsho// skal ba chen po gsang pa 'di// rdo rje la lar lo yang dag // rnam 'phrul don
300b8: rab tu skor/ / 'khor lo dbab dang bzhug pa dang // cho ga ji bzhin 'jug par bya// rdo rje dbyings sogs dkyil 'khor du// rgyas par ji skad bstan pa bzhin// rigs kyi dkyil 'khor 'khor lo dang // 'khor

301a1: lo dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa/ / 'khor lo gnas ni dbang du 'gyur// chos kyi 'khor lo yang dag ldan// rdo rje 'khrugs dang zhal ldan dang // ngas byed rin chen gzi brji dang // rgyal mtshan bzhad pa
301a2: yang dag ldan/ / chos dang rnon po gtso bo mchog/ rgyu dang gtum po drag po che// las dang bsrung ba gnod sbyin grub// sna tshogs sbyor ba yang dag ldan// 'khor lo'i rnam par 'phrul pa 'byung // de lta bu yi sbyor ba yi//
301a3: rdo rje 'khor lo kun du bri// rdo rje 'dzin kun slob dpon gyis// dkyil 'khor 'dir ni gzhug par bya// bu dang slob ma yin pa la// gsang ba'i tshogs chen sbyin mi bya// gzhan du bskal pa dang ldan pa// ga
301a4: 'di khyed kyi ci bder byin/ / de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsang ba'i mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin du gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog tu gsang ba'i rtog pa'i rgyal po chen po rdo rje rtse mo las rdo rje rigs kyi
301a5: de kho na nyid shin du sa pa'i rnam par bshad pa ste le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so/ / // de nas bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang bcas pas slar yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
301a6: de kho na nyid rdo rje sems dpa' la mtshan Artsa brgyad pa 'dis gsol ba btab par gyur to/ / rdo rje hUM mdzad rdo rje mchog/ rdo rje mchog 'dzin rdo rje'i mda'// rdo rje khro gnyer rdo rje'i lus// rdo rje 'bar ba rgyal mtshan che/
301a7: rdo rje gad rgyangs rdo rje'i bdag/ rdo rje sde ste chos mchog 'dzin// rdo rje rgyal mtshan shin tu no// rdo rje 'khor lo zlas pa che// las kyi rdo rje rdo rje che// rdo rje gnod sbyin 'jigs chen po// rdo rje phyag rgya sgra chen po// rdo rje khu tshur
301a8: brtan pa che/ / rdo rje 'bar ba rdo rje che// las chen po ste mda' chen po// rdo rje legs pa dga' ba che// rdo rje rgyan ni 'phrog byed pa// rdo rje 'od de rgyal mtshan che// rdo rje'i tshems ni rab dga' ba// rdo rje pad ma shin du gcod//

301b1: rdo rje dkyil 'khor rdo rje rig/ rdo rje ljags te sna tshogs che// sna tshogs mtshon chen skye dgu mnga'// go cha chen po rdo rje sku// rdo rje mche ba 'jigs byed pa// rdo rje sngam+ba pa rdo rje che// rdo rje khro bo gzhu chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu mdzod chen
301b2: po/ / zhags pa chen po dbang chen po// rdo rje lcags sgrogs 'bebs pa che// rdo rje dbeb pa 'jigs byed pa// yi ge dza ste yo ge hUM/ yi ge hU~M ni dam du 'ching // yi ge ho ste yi ge ha// rdo rje phyag rgya dregs pa mchog/ rdo rje
301b3: sems dpa' khro bo che/ / lcags kyu sdig med rdo rje khro// rdo rje bdud de bdud kyi mchog/ bdud kyi bdud de rab 'joms pa// rdo rje dga' ba zhib che// rdo rje dka' thub shis mdzad pa// rdo rje drag po shin du gdug/ rdo rje rang dbang
301b4: rdo rje mdzad/ / rdo rje 'dod pa khro bo che// rdo rje sgra ste sgra chen po// sangs rgyas hUM mdzad yi ge hUM// yi ge phaT sogs dang mnyam pa// yi ge phaT ni 'bar ba'i dka'// yi ge sa ha rang bzhin med// gtso bo gsod dang slong mdzad
301b5: pa/ / dri med skrag dang dbugs 'byin mdzad// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas khre bo che// khro bo rdo rje de bzhin gshegs// 'dod chags las byung de bzhin nyid// rdo rje khro bo khyed phyag 'tshal// mtshan/ rgya rtsa brgyad dam pa 'di// nyin re zhing
301b6: du ban gcig ni/ / gang zhig 'don par byed pa de// dngos grub mchog ni thob par 'gyur// de dag la mi 'jigs pa med// phongs dang bran dag nyid mi 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdo rje 'dzin bstan pa// dngos grub mchog ni thob par
301b7: 'gyur/ / dpa' bo khyod la gsol ba 'debs// gdug pa rnams ni gdul ba dang // de bzhin sems can don bya'i phyir// tshul chen skyed par mdzad du gsol// gsang ba rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud rdo rje rtse mo zhes bya ba rdzogs so//
301b8: rgya gar gyi mkhan po rdo rje slob dpon chen po karma badz+ri' zhal snga nas dang / lo ts+tsha ba dge slong gzhon nu tshul khrims kyi sgyur cing zhus pa'o// / bam po bcu gnyis pa// / rgya gar skad du/ sarba ra ha s+yo nA ma tan tra rA dzA/ bod skad du/

302a1: thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba rgyud kyi rgyal po// bcom ldan 'das ye shes sems dpa' la phyag 'tshal lo// 'byung lnga nyid kyis lnga yi bdag nyid can// mi rnams lus la nges par mthong ba dag/ rang sems rab tu
302a2: sgoms par gyur na ni/ / dngos der snyoms pas nges par sangs rgyas 'gyur// rang shes gsang ba dam pa ni// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med de// gnyis med gnyis kyi tshul can te// sangs rgyas rtag par rab tu 'dud// gang
302a3: yang bdag med las byung zhing / / gnyis med ye shes las byung ba// sdug dang mi gdug rnams spangs pa// ci la'ang phyag ni mi 'tshal to// ma skyes pa ni yang dag bskyed// skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni// sangs rgyas
302a4: skur ni sgom pa de/ / rang gi ye shes mchog phyag 'tshal// rnal 'byor pa dang sems can kun// ma skyes pa ni yang dag bskyed// skyes pa'i 'og tu rtag par ni// nyon mongs bag chags kyi sun 'byin// lus can rnam
302a5: ni 'khor gyur pa/ / sdug dang mi sdug rnam 'byed yin// sems gang de nyid sdug bsngal te// sems can rnams kyi lus 'byung ngo // sems de yi ni rgyun nyid kyi// 'gro ba sdug bsngal gnon par 'gyur// rnam par snang
302a6: mdzad rgyal ba mgon/ / sangs rgyas thams cad bsdus gcig pu// sangs rgyas thams cad rtogs gyur pa// sangs rgyas 'khor ba sgrol ba po// sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir// thugs rje'i nyams dang yang dag ldan
302a7: rgyu yi de nyid mnyam sbyor bas/ / 'bras bu'i de nyid rnams kyang ston// 'bras bu'i de nyid yang dag zhugs// rgyu yi de nyid mi 'dod do// gang du 'dod pa skyes gyur pa// de nyid 'khor ba'i bag chags yin// mkhas pa yi ni tshe
302a8: ga yis/ / bsgom pa ru ni yongs su brtags// gang zhig slar yang gcig gyur pa// rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byer byung // sangs rgyas rjes dran la dmigs shing // chos ni rjes su dmigs pa yi// tshogs gnyis

302b1: kyi ni sbyor ba yis/ / rkang gnyis dam pa nyid du 'gyur// b+ha gar li dag rab bzhag ste// sangs rgyas skur ni rnam par sgom// sangs rgyas rjes dran rnal 'byor pa// sangs rgyas sprin ni sgom par bya// b+ha gar ling ga rab bzhag/
302b2: ste// rdo rje chos ni rnam par sgom// chos ni rjes dran rnal 'byor pa// chos kyi sprin las char rab 'bebs// mtshan ma ling ga zhes bshad de// phyag rgya'i mtshan ma rnam pa bzhi// 'joms pas b+ha ga zhes bshad de/
302b3: nyon mongs 'joms pa'i dam pa yin// sems can kun gyi dngos kun gyi// rang sems chos ni bsdus pa yin// chos bdag med pa'i sbyor ba yis// gsad na rang nyid 'chi bar 'gyur// rang gi sems nyid rdzogs
302b4: sangs rgyas/ / rtogs par bya ba sems nyid yin// rang gi sems nyid gsad bya ba// sems nyid kho na gsang bar bya// sbyar ba nyid dang yang dag 'brel// gang yang srid pa 'byung ma yin// gang tshe sangs rgyas de tshe ni// sbyor
302b5: lnga sangs rgyas bdag ces sgom/ / ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba// sangs rgyas nyid phyir mdor bsdus pa// sangs rgyas rnal 'byor med par ni// rnal 'byor pa ni 'tshang mi rgya// phra mo'i dngos po ci bzhin mthong // sdug
302b6: ba'i dngos por de bzhin te/ / dngos dang dngos med khyad par ni// sgom pa kun du brtags pa yin// dngos po sgom pa'i dngos ma yin// sgom par bya ba sgom pa min// dngos po sgoms par 'gyur ba yi// rang gi
302b7: sems ni yongs su sbyad/ / sangs rgyas sangs rgyas yul ma yin// sems can yul du'ang mi 'gyur gyis// rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// sangs rgyas sangs rgyas rtogs pas min// gnyis med sbyor ba bdi la
302b8: yang / / ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes brtag/ rgyu yi de nyid ji ltar mthong // 'bras bu'i de nyid de nyid yin// rgyu yi de nyid cung zad med// 'bras bu'i de nyid de bzhin no// de nyid de ni de bzhin shes// de nyid rnal 'byor pa kun spyod//

303a1: rgyu yis rgyu ni dngos por min// 'bras bu'i dngos por 'bras bus min// rgyu de 'bras bu'i dngos por rung // rang gi sems ni so sor snang // ye shes de ni rgyu dngos te// gsang de 'bras bu'i dngos po
303a2: yin/ / gsang ba gnyis med spyod pa yis// de yi dngos pos mchog yin no// de nyid de nyid rtogs gyur pa// gsang de gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa// gsang ba de rig shes pa ste// mchog ni mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// sdug pa'i
303a3: ngo bor gang bshad pa/ / mi sdug pa yang de yi dngos// sdug dang mi sdug gzugs gang yin// mi mthong de ni de bzhin gshegs// rnam shes tsam ni med pa ru// rnal 'byor rnal 'byor 'byung mi 'gyur// ci ltar ye shes
303a4: mchog dag pa/ / de ltar dag pa de bzhin gshegs// rnam par shes pa rnam pa bzhi// phyag rgya bzhi yi cho ga yis// gsang ba gnyis med sbyar ba yis// sku gsung thugs ni yang dag byung // thugs ni phyag rgya chen po ste//
303a5: dam tshig phyag rgya kun du 'gro/ chos kyi phyag rgya gsung gi ste// las kyi phyag rgya sku yi yin// rgya yis rgyas btab dngos po ni// gsang bdag gsang ba'i rnal 'byor pa'o// rang rig pa yi ngo bo yis//
303a6: ting 'dzin ye shes brtags pa yin// lus ngag sems su rnam brtags pa'i// bya ba rgyud du rnam brtags pa// gsang ba rnam pa gsum du bshad// rdo rje las can sna tshogs bzhin// sangs
303a7: rgyas lnga yi bdag nyid ni/ / gsang ba'i ye shes bla med yin// phyag rgya bzhi po gsang ba de// rnal 'byor pa yi las grub byed// 'byung ba chen po bzhi po yang // phyag rgya bzhi zhes bshad pa yin//
303a8: phyag rgya bzhi yi mnyam sbyor ba// lha mo bzhi dang yang dag sbyor// sa ni spyan zhes bshad pa yin// chu ni mA ma kI zhes bshad// me dang rlung zhes grags pa ni// gos dkar mo dang sgrol ma yin// dbang chen sa yi

303b1: khams yin te/ / chu yi khams ni chu dkyil 'khor// me ni me yi khams yin ste// rlung ni rlung gi dkyil 'khor ro// dbang chen kha dog ser po ste// gru bzhi paste rgyas pa yin// chu yi dkyil 'khor zlum po ste/
303b2: dkar po'i mdog can zhi ba yin// me yi dkyil 'khor kha dog dmar// gru gsum dbang gi las rnams la'o// rlung gi dkyil 'khor gzhu yi dbyibs// nag po'i gdug pa'i las rnams la// 'byung ba che'i
303b3: bdag las grub pa/ / las kyi dngos grub yon tan bzhi// las kyi dngos grub dngos grub mchog/ 'khor los sgyur ba rnam pa bzhi// zhi ba la ni spyan gyi tshul// rgyas pa pad ma'i rdo rje can// dbang la rnam par
303b4: snang mdzad gnas/ / rdo rje khro bo mngon spyod la'o// zhi ba dgongs ka b+ha ba yin// ra bzhin rgyas pa snga drol// gdug pa'i las rnams nyi ma'i gung // dbang gi las ni mtshan byed bya// zhi la dkar po sbyar
303b5: bar bya/ / ser por snang ba rgyas pa la// dbang gi las kha dmar po ste/ gdug pa nag po rab tu sbyar// ting 'dzin ye shes las byung ba// las kyi sgrub pa dam pa yin// bcom ldan dag pa bsgom bya ste/
303b6: sangs rgyas kun las mi g.yo gyur// b+ha ga'i dbus su gsang ba'i bdag/ rdo rje'i dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs// lnga yi bdag gyur bdag nyid ni// bsgoms na g.yo ba med par gyur// snying la
303b7: gnas pa'i lha mche/ / rnal 'byor pa yi rnal 'byor bskyed// sangs rgyas thams cad skyed mdzad yum// rdo rje'i dbyings kyi dbang mor bshad// 'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug ste/ 'di dag
303b8: 'jig rten dug gsum yin/ / sangs rgyas bcom ldan drug mi mnga'// rdo rje dbyings ni de bzhin gshegs// chags dang sdang dang rmongs pa rnams// bsgoms nas khams gsum pa

304a1: yi bdag/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gyur te// sangs rgyas bden pas drug bcom so// rang sems so sor rtogs pa yi// gti mug sems ni de bzhin gshegs// rmongs pa
304a2: nyid ni 'jig rten gyur/ / sems can kun la blta bar bya// zhe sdang sems ni de gzhin gshegs// phra mo'i ye shes yang dag skyed// sdang gyur rdo rje nyid du gyur// sems can thams cad gzhig
304a3: par bya/ / 'dod chags sems ni de bzhin gshegs// byang chub sems ni yang dag bskyed// chags gyur bzang po nyid gyur pa// sangs rgyas thams cad chags par bya// byams pa'i sems ni
304a4: de bzhin gshegs/ / nga rgyal yang dag bskyed nas ni// mdza' bor gyur cing kun nyid gyur// sangs rgyas kun la 'khyud par bya// chags pa'i lta bas byams pa ste// thugs rje'i chos ni smra bar/
304a5: dang // kun la mi 'jigs sbyin pa dang // sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes bya ba'o// rnal 'byor sbyin las rab dga' ste// tshul khrims ldan las dri med 'gyur// gzod pa la ni 'od byed pa// brtson las
304a6: 'od 'phro can dang ldan/ / bsam gtan las ni gyad dka' ba// shes rab kyi ni mngon myur mthong // thabs chen las ni ring du song // stobs dang ldan las mi g.yo 'gyur// smon lam rgyan
304a7: legs blo ldan/ / ye shes ldan las chos kyi sprin// rgyal ba de bzhin gshegs pa ni// rang rig bdag nyid bcu gcig 'gyur// pha rol phyin pa bcu rnams dang // stobs dang dbang ni
304a8: rdzogs gyur cing / / sa bcu las ni 'das gyur pa// mtshan ma brtan gyur de las ni// rdo rje'i chu ni rdzogs sangs rgyas// chos kyi bdud ci bcud len yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi mtha' yas pa//

304b1: gzung dang 'dzin pa spangs pa yin// chos kyi bdud rtsi bcud kyis len// rdo rje'i chu ni dag 'thungs pas// rdo rje slob dpon rnal 'byor pa// gdod nas dag par de tshe 'gyur// gdod nas dag par gnas kyur
304b2: de nas byang chub sems su 'gyur/ / byang chub sems kyi bdag can 'gyur// byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs// rnam par grol ba'i ras kyi g.yogs// byang chub sems ni tha na med// yang dag
304b3: bskyed gyur rnal 'byor pa/ / rdo rje sems dpa' snying la 'dug/ sems can khams ni mtha' yas pa'i// mar gyur dam tshig 'dzin byed pa// rdo rje dam tshig gis spyad na// rtag tu dam tshig gnas
304b4: par 'gyur/ / khams gsum lam ni nyams dga' bar// bud med ces bshad ji snyed pa// cho ga bzhin du kun spyad cing // thugs kyi rdo rje smad mi bya// rdo rje gsum gyi sku la gnas// dam tshig phyag rgya ji
304b5: snyed pa/ / rdo rje dam tshig gsum gyi bya// gsung gi rdo rje smad mi bya// rdo rje sems dpa' las byung ba'i// phyag rgya kun ni bud med bzang // de rnams ston pa'i rnal 'byor pa// phyag rgya thams cad dbang du
304b6: 'gyur/ / 'jig rten khams ni thams cad na// bud med ces bya ji snyed pa// phyag rgya chen po'i sbyor ba yi// de dag kun la nye ngar spyad// gsang ba mchog gi rnal 'byor pa// ting 'dzin ye shes dmapa
304b7: yin/ / gal te dngos grub mchog 'dod na// nga rgyal ma yin hUM ma yin// rig pa ma yin sngags rig min// lag pa'i phyag rgya'ang mi bca'o// mchod rten gyi ni las mi bya// glegs bam dag kyang
304b8: klag mi bya/ / dkyil 'khor dag ni mi bya zhing // rdo rje mchog gsum phyag mi btsal// slob dpon smad par mi bya ste// bla ma sangs rgyas kun dang mnyam// khyod kyi srog chags gsang bar

305a1: bya/ / brdzun gyi tshig kyang smra bar bya// khyod kyi ma byin blang bya zhing // gzhan gyi bud med bsten par bya// sbyin bsreg yang na bsam gtan min// lus ngag yid ni mi byed pa//
305a2: gzhan min sems kyi bya ba ste// 'di ni gsang ba'i mchog yin no// sngags rnams thams cad rab tu 'grub// rnal 'byor kun kyang rnam kun du// de bas 'bad pa thams cad kyis// sarba
305a3: rgyas chos nyid sgom par bya/ / ma 'dres chos ni bcwa brgyad po// sangs rgyas chos zhes bshad pa yin// de rnams rtag tu bskam pa ni// sangs rgyas chos ni sgrub byed yin// bsam gtan
305a4: bzhi dang gzugs med ban/ / rtag tu thob par byas pa dang // 'gog pa'i snyoms 'jug de yis ni// sangs rgyas byang chub rab tu bsgrub// byang chub phyogs ni sum cu bdun// chos su
305a5: yang dag bshad pa gang / / de rnams bsgoms pas dag pa dang // byang chub sems dpa' 'gro phran yin// 'gro ba rnams la spro ba'i sems// brtan zhing snying po rab bsgoms pa// stong pa'i
305a6: de nyid las byung ba/ / rdo rje ye shes zhes bya bshad// chos bdag med las yang dag byung // gnyis med ye shes dam pa ste// chos nyid mchog gi ye shes ni// chos kyi dbyings zhes yang dag
305a7: bshad/ / 'di ni chos dbyings ye shes te// rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'dzin skyes// rdo rje ye shes rang bzhin sems// rdo rje dbyings zhes bya bar bshad// sems kyi spro ba'i stong ba yis// phra mo'i ye shes
305a8: sogs sbyor ba/ / de bzhin gshegs kun ye shes ni// rnam par snang mdzad ces byar bshad// byams pa spro ba'i sbyor ba yis// sbyor ba spyod par byed pa'i mchog/ zag med brtan par gyur pa yi//

305b1: thugs ni mi bskyod pa zhes bshad // thugs rje spro ba'i tshul gyi ni// sems can phan 'dogs mdzad pa po// thugs ni 'gro don yang dag ldan// rin chen 'byung ldan zhes bshad do// dga' bas spro ba'i sbyor
305b2: yis/ / theg chen mchog ni dri ma med// thugs ni 'do gsal dag pa ni// 'od dpag med ces de bshad do// btang snyoms spro ba mdzad pa'i shugs// sems can thams cad rtogs mdzad pa// don yodan
305b3: med bya ba ni/ / don yod grub par de bshad do// byang chub rang bzhin ye shes mchog/ de 'dir rdo rje zhes bshad de// rdo rje ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje sems dpar de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams
305b4: cad spyan 'dren pa/ / rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad de// rdo rje'i rigs rnams kun gyi rgyal// rdo rje rgyal por de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad chags byed pa// mnyes par byed pa zhes bshad de//
305b5: bdud kyi sbyor ba chags pa che// rdo rje chags par de bshad do// sangs rgyas thams cad mnyes byed cing // legs so zhes pa rab sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa' dga' byed pas// rdo rje lags
305b6: par de bshad do/ / byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa gang // mkha' mnyam rdo rje las byung ba// don yod rin chen chen po ste// rdo rje rin chen de bshad do// ma rig bral ba'i ye shes ni// tshogs dag las ni
305b7: nges par byung / / thar pa'i snang ba gzi brjid che// rdo rje nyi mar de bshad do// rnam pa kun gyi dngos ye shes// thar pa'i lam 'jug thob mdzad gang // chos kyi rgyal mtshan tog chen po// rdo rje dpal du de bshad
305b8: do/ / rdo rje bzhad pa rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas kun 'byung rmad byung ba// 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' che// rdo rje bzhad par de bshad do// sangs rgyas kun gyi rnal 'byor che// sangs rgyas chos ni rtags

306a1: mdzad pa/ / de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos dag pa// rdo rje chos su de bshad do// shes rab rnon po theg pa che// nyon mongs thams cad des gcod mdzad// shes bya'i sgrib pa gcod pa po// rdo rje rnon
306a2: bor de bshad do/ / sangs rgyas rol mo 'khor lo na// chos kyi 'khor lo rab bskor bas// sems dpa' chen po theg pa che// rdo rje chu zhes de bshad do// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/ gsung gi
306a3: sgra ni rnam par spangs/ / 'jam pa'i gsung gi bdag nyid gyur// rdo rje smra bar de bshad do// pha rol phyin pa kun gyi zhabs// chos rnams thams cad rtogs mdzad pa// sems can kun don sprul pa'o//
306a4: rdo rje las zhes bya bar bshad// sangs rgyas rjes dran yang dag grub// theg pa dman pa rnam spangs shing // byang chub sems la rab zhugs pa// rdo rje bsrung bar de bshad do// sdig pa rnams cad zad
306a5: byed cing / / de bzhin nyon mongs rnam sreg la// nyon mongs zad pa nyer len pas// rdo rje'i gnod sbyin de bshad do// sku gsung thugs kyi rdo rje rnams// bcing ba ru ni yang dag gyur// de nyid de nyid
306a6: ye shes te/ / rdo rje khu tshur zhes bshad do// dam tshig phyag rgya thams cad ni// rdo rje bsdams las yang dag byung // rdo rje khu tshur gnyis gyur pa// las kyi phyag rgya zhes bshad do//
306a7: nga rgyal med cing snang ba med// mtshan ma med cing zhen pa med// bdag med mnyam nyid ye shes ni// rdo rje sems dpa' zhes byar bshad// gsang ba'i mnyam par 'byor pa 'dir// ye shes pha rol
306a8: byiphyin dge ba/ / rnam pa bcu gnyis yang dag byung // rdo rje pha rol phyin pa'i 'od// byang chub sems ni rab sgom pas// pha rol sangs rgyas nyid son pa'i// pha rol byin thob ye shes ni//

306b1: rdorje sems par bshad pa yin// bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi rnams ni// shes rab pa rol byin do // chos bzhi gcig tu gyur pa na// rdo rje rin chen mar bshad do// gsang pa' ye shes ye shes ma/
306b2: de nyid pha rol phyin dge ba// pha rol phyin pa che las byung // rdo rje chos mar shes par bya// pha rol phyin pa'i dge ba ni// sbyor ba'i thabs su blta bstan pa// rdo rje las mar shes par bya// gang phyir de ni rol
306b3: pa dag/ sgeg mo sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin// tshul khrims pha rol phyin dge bas// brgyan pa'i yan yag yid 'ong yin// glu ma bzod pa'i pha rol phyin// ched du brjod pa'i chos brjod pa'o// gar ma
306b4: brtson 'grus pha rol byin/ / myur du sangs rgyas nyid ster ba'o// bdug pa shes rab pha rol phyin// kun du khyab par spros phyir ro// me tog bsam gtan pha rol phyin// 'dod pa'i 'dam gyi ma gos
306b5: pa'o/ / mar me smon lam pha rol phyin// phyogs kun snang bar byed pa yin// dri ni thabs kyi pha rol phyin// dri ngan thur sel dge ba yin// sangs rgyas kun gyi thabs chen po// dbye ba rnam pa bzhi
306b6: yi gnas/ / thams cad 'dod pa'i thabs chen po// rdo rje lcags kyu zhes bshad do// byang chub spyad pa spyod byed pa// rdo rje zhags pa zhes bshad do// theg pa 'di la rten 'gyur gang // rdo rje lcags
306b7: sgrog ces bshad do/ / chos rnams thams cad ma skyes shing // gdod nas zhi ba mkha' dang mnyam// de lta'i tshig ni rab 'jug pas// rdo rje dril bu zhes bshad do// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis//
306b8: sems can kun gyi don ston pa'i// sems ni rang bzhin gyi 'od gsal// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// yang dag rdo rje rtogs pa ste// 'dzin pa'i sbyor nyid lcags kyu yin// phra ba

307a1: 'jigs pa mang 'gas bya/ / dgyes pas lags so nas byag// sbas pas rin pom du bshad// gas brjid ces byanya ma yin// bsgreng ba btog tu bshad pa ste// rnam par 'byung
307a2: pas bzhad par bshad/ / 'dod chags dge ba pad ma yin// nyon mongs dgra bcom ral gri ste// dkyil 'khor sbyong bas 'khor lo yin// gang gi brjod pas zla bar bshad// kun nyid sna tshogs rdo/
307a3: rje yin// bzhig dka'i sbyor ba go cha yin// 'jigs pa'i spyod pas mche ba ste// phyag rgya'i stor nyid bcing ba yin// dkyil 'khor du ni gang bshad pa// yid kyi dkyil 'khor dam pa yin/
307a4: gzhal yas khang ni ye shes te// sems kyi brtsegs pa bsgred pa yin// phyi yi gru bzhi pa gang yin// tshad kyi mnyam pa nyid gyur pa// byams pa la sogs sems gang yin// thig bzhi zhes ni bshad
307a5: pa yin/ / chos kyi sbyor ba rjes dran nyid// gang de rdo rje thig tu bshad// lta ba kun las rnam grol ba// ye shes thig tu bshad pa yin// tshul khrims tshogs kyi dam pa ni// gang zhig rgyan du
307a6: bshad pa yin/ / rang dbang la sogs sems gang yin// re ba sngar ni yang dag byung // rnam par thar pa bzhi po ni// sgo rnams su ni yang dag bshad// yang dag spong ba bzhi po ni// rta babs
307a7: rnams dang ka bar byung / / dran pa nyer bzhag bzhi po ni// khyams rnams bzhi por shes par bya// rdzu 'phrul kang pa bzhi po ni// de ni sgo khyud rnam bzhi yin// byang chub yan lag bdun po na//
307a8: phreng ba me tog rgyan brgyan pa// 'phags lam yan lag brgyad pon// ka ba brgyad ces bya bar bshad// sgrib pa gnyis las rnam grol zhing // ting 'dzin ye shes kyis brtags pa/

307b1: rgyas shes kyang par rnams// rdu rab cas ni yang dag bshad// na mangs thams ca da ngas gcad pa/ nyan mang 'brag pas d+ha baSh+Ta// yang dag gcod cing grong ba nyid// sem
307b2: spong ba la gnas pa/ / tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba nyid// nyon mongs pa yi byed 'brog pa// dra ba byed ces bya bar bshad// rang bzhin 'od gas pa gang yin de// byang chub sems ni bla ma
307b3: yin/ / sems ni don kun skyed byed pa// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor yin par bshad// shes rab ye shes rang bzhin dag/ rdo rje lta bu'i ting 'din byeg// thang pa'i sdang ba gzi brjid de// nyima'i
307b4: dkyil 'khor yin par bshad/ / tshon rtsi lngar ni yang dag bshad// lta ba lnga yi me tog yin// ye shes lnga yi des sbyor nyid// sangs rgyas lnga zhes yang dag bshad// nam mkha' bzhin du
307b5: bdag med pa'i/ / nas shes ye shes dam pa yin// ye shes de mi rgyan bshad pa// chags pa'i sems zhes bya bar bshad// chags bral las ni byang chub 'byung // chags pa'i sems
307b6: las gzhan yin no/ / de bas chags dang chags bral ba// byang chub sems zhes yang dag bshad// 'jig rten chags dang bral bas 'dul// phyag rgya'i dngas grub chags las byung // der ni
307b7: thabs kyi sgom pa dag/ dngos grub thams cad ster ba yin// ji ltar 'jig rten 'dul 'gyur ba// de ltar nal 'byor pa yis stang// ji ltar gdul bya dag gyur pa// zhen pa kun du mchod
307b8: par gyur/ / mtshan nyid gang shig yang dag bshad// mtshan nyid de ni mtshan par gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi phyag rgya yis// rgyas btab ye shes yin par bshad// phyag

308a1: bsgoms pas rnal 'byor pa/ / rtag tu phyag rgya'i bdag can 'gyur// rgyas btab dngos po shes nas ni// bsgoms na phyag rgyas btab par 'gyur// mtshan dang mtshan nyid 'brel pa
308a2: ni/ / shes nas rnal 'byor yang dag spyad// ji ltar mtshan nyid yang dag grub// de bzhin dag pa myur du 'grub// g.yas pa'i cha yi mtshan ma ni// shes rab can ni rab tu bstan// g.yon gyi
308a3: mtshan ma ji ltar mthong / / de yi thugs rje mtshon pa yin// phyag ni gnyis ga'i mnyam sbyor las// ting 'dzin gnyis su bshad pa yin// zhabs gnyis kyi ni mtshan ma yis// tshegs
308a4: gnyis dag ni bstan pa yin/ / sor mo lnga yi mnyam sbyor las// dkyil 'khor lnga yis rgyan pa yin// sangs rgyas lnga yi mngon byang chub// rim pa bzhin du bstan bya ste// gang zhig gung mo ston
308a5: pa ni/ / nam mkha' las ni byung ba mtshon// gang zhig 'dzub mo ston pa ni// de ni dbang chen dkyil 'khor yin// srin lag tu ni yang dag bshad// chu yi dkyil 'khor zhes bshad do// gang zhig
308a6: mthe bo ston pa ni/ / de yi me ni mtshon pa yin// gang zhig mthe'u chung ston pa ni// rlung gi dkyil 'khor nyid du 'gyur// gang zhig lte ba ston pa ni// rdo rje dbyings kyi dbang phyug bshad/
308a7: gang zhig snying kha ston pa ni// rdo rje sems mar rjes su dpag/ gang zhig smin mtshams ston pa ni// rdo rje rin chen ma zhes bya// gang zhig lkog ma ston pa ni// rdo rje tshes mar shes par bya//
308a8: gang zhig spyi bo ston pa ni// rdo rje las mar shes mar bya// byang chub lngar sngon byang chub pa'am// yang na ye shes lnga rnams sam// sangs rgyas lnga dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khor byang chub

308b1: yin pa bstan/ / sngon gyi sgrar ni ji skad bshad// mdun du de ni rab tu bstan// rgyab kyi sgrar ni ji ltar bshad// phyi mar de ni yang dag bstan// gang du thog ma'i sgrar gyur pa//
308b2: de ni rgyu yi sgra ru bstan// gang zhig tha ma'i sgrar gyur pa// 'dir ni 'bras bur yang dag bstan// sangs rgyas bcom ldan gnyis mi mnga'// rgyu dang 'bras bur ldan 'gyur min// gang
308b3: phyir thig ma tha ma med/ / de phyir rtag pa zhes bshad do// rang sems rtogs pas sangs rgyas te// rtogs par bya ba'ang sems nyid yin// sangs rgyas zhing zhes bshad pa dang // byang
308b4: chub sems su shes par bya/ / rang bzhin dag pa'i sems can ni// kun du rig par yang dag bshad// sems can rang bzhin dag pa ni// byang chub sems su shes par bya// dang por gyur
308b5: bsnying khar rdebs/ / brtan pa nyid du'ang rang nyid 'gyur// sgra 'dzin pa ni ral pa'i dbus// 'od dpag med du mnyam bzhag yin// btsum pa na ni rjes bshad pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje
308b6: gsung / / dbang po gnyis ni mnyam sbyor ba// rnam par snang mdzad ces bshad do// bu mo lo grangs bcu gnyis par// skyes mchog thub pas gang gsungs pa// pha rol phyin pa bcu gnyis
308b7: sra/ / gsungs kyi gzhan du mi rtag go// bu mo lo grangs bcu drug par// de bzhin gshegs pas gang gsungs pa// rdo rje sems sogs sems dpa' yi// bsgoms pa'i don gyi sgra
308b8: yin no/ / lha mo lo grangs nyi shu par// 'khor los sgyur bas ji skad gsungs// mchod pa nyi shu'i bdag nyid can// nyi shu po dang rims bzhin no// rang gi chung ma rang rig las/

309a1: byung ba'i rang dag yin par bshad// gzhan gyi chung mar gang bstan pa// gzhan sdug gzhan kya gru pa yin// gca dang rdzogs bshad pa// rdordul shes tha mad yan// shA
309a2: dang padad+ma ma zhes bshad pa/ / chos kyi ye shes rnyog med yin// yongs su gsal bar rnam shes pa// dkyil 'khor thugs kyi dam pa yin// sku gsung thugs kyi spyod pa yis// 'bad pa yis
309a3: ni mchod byed pa/ / rang gi rdo rje pad mar ldan// dbang po gnyis las byung ba yi// rang gi khu ba thig le yis// rdo rje sems dpa' mchod par bya// tshogs gnyis kyi ni sbyor ba yis/
309a4: sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// gnyis med gnyis nyid la brten pa// thugs rje nyams dang yang dag ldan// dbang po gnyis kyi mnyam sbyor bas// rang gi khu ba mkhas pa yis// rnal
309a5: 'byor chen po byung nas ni/ / dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyis rlag// dgod dam rab tu smra ba'am// sangs rgyas rol mo gar byed pa// lha lo bzhi yi mnyam sbyor bas// rgyu dang mi rgyu rnams kyi
309a6: ral/ / gsang shing legs par bsgril ba dang // tshad dang ldan zhing mdzem pa yis// shes rab can gyi thig gdab pa// mu gsung thugs ni bsgoms pas so// zur bani pa la no bzh-i ga/
309a7: babs bzhis ni mdzes byas la// thig bzhi dang ni yang dag ldan// dar dang me tog phreng bas brgyan// grwa yi mtshams ni thams cad dang // sgo khyud kyi nind rnams su// rdo rje rin chen
309a8: spras pas ni/ / phye yi dkyil 'khor thig gdab bo// rdo rje'i thig gi yongs ko shing // ka ba brgyad kyi nye bar mdzes// ka ba brgyad kyi nang gnas pa'i// dkyil 'khor brgyad par bstan pa

309b1: dang / / grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar ni// rdo rje lha mo'i tshogs kyi mchod// 'khal la dang yang dag ldan// dkyil 'khar lnga yas rnam par brgyan// drub byed kyis brgyan cing // rdza lab kyas
309b2: ni nyer spras pa/ / khru ni bcu gnyis bya ba'am// khru bcu drug tu rab tu brtag/ yang na khron nyi shu tsam// nyi shu lnga dang ldan pa yag// zhwa ni nyi shu lnga pa yis// dkyil 'khor yang dag byin gyi brlag/
309b3: sgo rnams kyi ni dbus ma'i cha// cha dgu ru ni rnam dbye ba// dkyil 'khor sgo ru bsams na ni// khu der ni bya ba yin// khyod dkyil 'khor rnam pani// snying po'i dkyil 'khor dang mnyam par// dgu cha run rnam
309b4: bgos te/ / grwa yi dkyil 'khor dor bar bya// tha mar khyams dang ldan pa yi// dkyil 'khor lngas ni brgyan pa dang // kha dog lnga dang yang dag ldan// gru bzhi par ni brtag par bya// lta ba lnga po
309b5: bzung dka' ga/ / bdag lnga yid de bzhin gshegs// sangs rgyas lnga dang mnyam myong ga/ tson gyis rab tu bsgyur// dkyil 'khor lnga yi dbus su ni// sangs rgyas lnga ni dgod par bya// kha dog lnga dang ting 'dzin gyis//
309b6: 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga yi khyab// shel dang zla ba'i 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// de bzhin gshegs pa rnam snang mdzad// dpa' bo'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ en
309b7: dra nI la'i 'od 'dra zhing / / rdo rje thams cad gcig bsdus pa// mi bskyod ye shes las byung ba// rdo rje'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// 'dzam bu'i gser gyi 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad
309b8: gcig bsdus pa/ / sems can kun gyi don du byung // 'bar ba'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs// dpa' bo chen po pad ma 'dra// pad ma rA ga'i nor bu'i 'od// chos kyi ye shes las byung ba// chags

310a1: pa'i lta ba de bzhin gshegs/ / ma nad kyi ni 'od 'dra zhing // sangs rgyas thams cad gcig bsdus pa// sangs rgyas kun gcig las byung ba// byams pa'i lta ba de bzhin
310a2: gshegs/ / dbus ma'i sa yi bzhi dag pa// nor bu chu shel mdog 'dra ba/ shar phyogs nyid du sngon po che// lho ru ser po yang dag ldan// nub phyogs der ni dmar po ste// byang du ldang dang yang
310a3: drag ldan/ / kun du khyams dang ldan pa la// sgor ni khyams dang bral ba'o// gang zhig dbus mar yang dag bshad// sangs rgyas ye shes bla med yin// gzhan dag don kun yang dag ldan//
310a4: ting 'dzin ye shes dam pa yin// nam mkha'i dbyings kyi dbus gnas par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas sku ni rnam bsgoms la// spyan ni dbus su bsam par bya// bzhin
310a5: babangs spyan ni yangs pa dang / / nor bu chu shel mdog 'dras// mtshan rnams thams cad yongs su rtogs// bud med sku pa'i mchog 'dzin pa// phyag tu 'khor lo sgom bya ste// mas
310a6: gsum pa ni dbang byed pa/ / dngos kun grub byed ye shes ni// 'khor lo yid bzhin nor bu'i mdog/ nam mkha'i rdo rje dbus chud par// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas
310a7: spyan nam bsgom la/ / nam mkha'i rdo rje mchog bsgom mo// zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs pa dang // su ta la sbol po'i mdab ma'i mdog/ mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag
310a8: rdzogs/ / nam mkha'i sgyu ma'i mchog bsam mo// phyag rgya uta pal sngon dpar te// khams gsum pa ni phyag byas pa// sangs rgyas byang chub byed pa'i mchog/ gsang

310b1: ba'i dngos grubardo rje can/ / nam mkha' rdo rje'i dbum rgyud pa// zla ba'i dkyil lakhor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas blani rnam bsgom la// rdo chos mar dam par bstsas// mdzes pa'i rnas la stsa
310b2: sangs pa/ / pad ma rA ga lta bu'i mdog/ sku mdog dmar po yang dag byung // chags pa'i pad ma 'dzin thug pa// mtshan rnams thams cad yang dag rdzogs// brgyan rnams kun
310b3: kyis rnam par brgyadan/ / phyag d+ha uta pal dmar po na// sangs rgyas thams cad rab sgoms pa'o// chos kyi ye shes byed pa mchog/ gsarab dam tshig rdo rje can// mkha'
310b4: dbyings rdo rje'i dbus chud par/ / zla ba'i dkyil 'khor dam pa bsam// sangs rgyas gzugs ni rnam bsgoms la// sgrol ma mchog ni bsam par bya// zhal mdzes spyan ni yangs padang /
310b5: tshogs rgyan gyis rab tu brgyan// kha dog ser po nyid bsnams zhing // bud med spu ma'i dregs bdog// phyag tu u ta pal dam pa ni// ser po sdang ba bsgom par bya// rdo rje nyid 'dzin las
310b6: byung ga/ sems can kun gyi phyag byas pa'o// oM ru ru sU ru dz+wA la tiSh+Tha sid d+ha lo tsa na sarba aR+tha sA d+ha ni swA hA/ oM shaM ka re shAn+ti ka re gu TaT gu Ti Ti ni// g+hA ta ya kA ta ya
310b7: krAHTa ni swAhA/ oM kA Te bi ka Te ni ka Te ka Ta~M ka Te s+yAH// oM d+ha ra tsatatA re tsu re swAH// rig pa'i lha mo bzhi'o// sU ni lus kyi ngo bo yis// thugs ni sems kyi rnamapa
310b8: nyid/ / gsung ni ngag gi rnam pa yis// mchod na mchod pa'i bdag nyid 'gyur// sku gsung thugs kyi gsang ba ni// mkhas pa yi ni bsrung bya ste// bsrungs

311a1: na mchog tu gsang ba ni/ / rtag par kun du 'byung ba'i 'gyur// dngos po yongs su dag pa ni// med pas kun du rtag mi 'byung // rnal 'byor pa yi rna la 'byor thob// tshogs
311a2: med yang dag mi mthong ngo / / de bas gsang ba'i ye shes 'byung // rnal 'byor kun du 'byung bar 'gyur// shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i thabs// ting nge 'dzin ye shes brtags par yin// chos rnams
311a3: thams cad rnam dag pa/ / dag pa nyid du gyur pa ni// ci ltar lha'i nor bu ni// rang gi 'od kyi rtag tu snang // srid pa yongs su dag pa yang // rnal 'byor rnal 'byor thob byed yin// rdo rje dbyings ni gsang chen du//
311a4: gang zhig dbang skur mkhas pa la// thugs kyi gsang ba'i rnal 'byor mchog/ mkhas pa de la bshad par bya// thams cad gsang ba zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po rdzogs s+ho// rgya gar gyi mkhan po pad ma
311a5: kA ra bar ma dang / zhu chen gyi lo tso ba dge slong rin chen bzang pos bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o// ye d+ha mA he tra pra b+hA bA he dun te bAn ta thA ga to h+ya ba dang/ te bAny+tsa yo ni ro d+ha e baM bA dI ma hA shra ma NaH/
